www.tensixtyai.com

title: Virtual Assistant
description:
We are a dynamic and fast-growing team focused on streamlining email marketing and communication. We use Instantly.ai, a powerful email outreach tool, to automate and optimize our email campaigns. We’re looking for a detail-oriented and reliable Virtual Assistant to help us manage and upload email lists to Instantly.ai efficiently and accurately.

Job Description:
As a Virtual Assistant, your main responsibility will be to assist in the seamless integration of email contacts into Instantly.ai. You’ll ensure that our email lists are up-to-date, clean, and formatted correctly for import into the platform. You will work closely with our marketing team to help execute email outreach campaigns by ensuring all email data is correctly uploaded and ready for use.

Key Responsibilities:

Collect, organize, and upload email lists into Instantly.ai with attention to detail and accuracy.
Ensure email data is formatted properly for seamless integration with Instantly.ai (CSV, Excel, etc.).
Regularly review and clean up email lists to remove duplicates, invalid email addresses, and other errors.
Monitor email campaign performance and troubleshoot any issues related to email list uploads or integrations.
Communicate effectively with the team about progress, challenges, and any improvements needed in the process.
Maintain a high level of confidentiality and security for sensitive email data.
Qualifications:

Previous experience with Instantly.ai or similar email automation platforms is a plus.
Strong organizational and time management skills with the ability to meet deadlines.
High attention to detail and ability to spot errors in email lists or data.
Proficient in Excel, Google Sheets, or other spreadsheet software.
Comfortable with data entry, handling email lists, and working with different file formats (CSV, Excel, etc.).
Excellent communication skills and responsiveness.
Nice to Have:

Familiarity with email marketing tools, CRM platforms, or other email automation tools.
Basic understanding of email deliverability best practices.

title: Financial Analyst
description:
Company Overview:

Join our fun-loving team on a mission to make high-quality organic spices & herbs affordable for everyone! We thrive on action and data-driven insights, and we're passionate about shaping the future of the organic food industry. If you're a curious, data-oriented individual looking to grow, we want you on board!

Job Description:

Are you a numbers whiz with a knack for uncovering insights that drive business decisions? Do you have a curious mind that's always seeking out the next big opportunity? We're looking for a dynamic Financial Analyst & Bookkeeper who loves diving into data and is proficient with Xero accounting software.

In this full-time role, you'll be responsible for maintaining our bookkeeping records and conducting daily product research. Your financial analysis reports will directly influence which products we launch next, playing a pivotal role in our company's growth and direction. This role has immense potential for growth as we build out our financial analysis teams.

Responsibilities:

Bookkeeping & Accounting:

Maintain accurate and up-to-date financial records using Xero.
Manage accounts payable and receivable.
Reconcile bank statements and oversee cash flow.
Financial Analysis:

Analyze financial data to identify trends and provide actionable insights.
Prepare monthly, quarterly, and annual financial reports.
Assist in budgeting and forecasting activities.
Product Research:

Conduct daily research on potential new products.
Evaluate product viability based on market trends and financial data.
Collaborate with the team to recommend new product launches.
Collaboration & Strategy:

Work closely with the marketing and sales teams to align financial goals.
Participate in strategic planning sessions to drive company growth.
Use data-driven insights to support decision-making processes.
Qualifications:

Education & Experience:

Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, Economics, or related field.
Proven experience as a Financial Analyst or Bookkeeper.


Skills:

Proficiency in Xero accounting software is a must.
Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
Highly data-oriented with exceptional attention to detail.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Having experience in crop or food business-related accounting is a plus.


Personal Attributes:

Curious mindset with a passion for continuous learning.
Bias for action and the ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment.
Fun-loving attitude and a team player.


Benefits:

Be part of a dynamic and fun-loving team.
Opportunity to shape the future of an exciting organic spices brand.
Immense potential for growth as we build out our financial analysis teams.
Competitive salary and growth opportunities.
This job is 100% remote and allows for people to work during Filipino working hours.
Full-time position: 8 hours a day, 5 days a week.
Access to industry-leading professional development resources.


How to Apply:

Ready to spice up your career? We'd love to hear from you!

Please attach your resume and a brief cover letter explaining why you're the perfect fit for this role.
Include your minimum expected monthly pay in USD.
Send your application with the subject line "Financial Analyst & Bookkeeper Application - [Your Name]".

Join us in our mission to bring affordable, high-quality organic spices to kitchens everywhere!

DAY TO DAY RESPONSIBILITIES:
  – Complete, manage, and assign tasks in ClickUp (similar to Asana)
  – Communicate over Slack with your manager who will be myself (Blake) and the account managers
  – Troubleshoot client support tickets that the account managers cannot solve themselves. 
  – Work together with team and assist in other area such as billing clients, helping sales team with tech related issues, updating or creating new SOPs, create custom marketing funnels, create or update facebook ads, write ad copy, etc. 


TOOLS WE USE: ClickUp, SlackZapier, HighLevel, Google Drive, Google Sheets, Google Docs, Google Domains, Facebook Ads, Zoom, Vimeo, MailGun, Twilio, etc

TYPE OF WORK YOU WILL BE DOING: 
  – Build landing pages on a tool similar to ClickFunnels
  – Edit images and infographics in Canva
  – Create and edit In Google Sheets
  – Basic Video Editing

   Each item on this list will require your own creativity, and in time as we grow. With you being one of our early hires, you will 
   quickly move up to positions that require higher levels of creative thinking. These opportunities will match your strengths and 
   include things such as building out complex automations to make the company more efficient, media buying, working directly 
   with clients, becoming the manager of your own team, or anything else that you feel you have a passion for and can be of 
   value to the company. (I encourage employees to pitch ideas on additional ways they feel they can add value)


MORE ABOUT US & OUR VALUES:
IronKlad Group Oversees Marketing, Advertising, Sales, and business operations for many small gyms like the gym we own (CrossFit East Coast).

We have a fast growth culture. We value meaningful work and meaningful relationships. We value truth and transparency. We also like to have fun. 

Having a learned a lot over the years growing teams in other companies, we cannot wait to take those lessons and apply them to this new business. One of the biggest lessons we learned that relates to this position, is how important it is to have employees who that love what they do, and truly feel like they are an integral part of the team. To recreate the positive cultures from our past experiences, at IronKlad Group we have implemented numerous benefits that you can read more about in the ‘perks’ section of this job posting.

Something else I wanted to mention is that I have had too many interviews with Filipinos who shared horror stories about how other companies have treated them, and hope that this part of the job description puts you at ease. Personally I think that treating people like this no matter who they are is not only ethically wrong, but is also foolish. I have always treated my employees with the utmost levels of understanding, and respect. And in turn (in most cases), they treat me the same and also do amazing work. This leads to us both enjoying our day to day lives, loving the fact that we are growing something that changes the lives of our customers, and of course we both earn significantly so we can live the lives we should be.

If you end up working for us, you will quickly realize just how serious I am about all of this. Because at the end of the day its the people like yourself that make a company successful, and is exactly why when you choose who you want to work for, I think you should strongly consider us or others with similar values.

And to put you at ease, I understand some of you are better at English than others. What is most important is that we are able to communicate over slack. 

I can’t wait to meet you! 

- Blake


TO APPLY FOR THIS JOB:
Complete this form https://forms.gle/1vdRhvcf4HsP5xbW7

We will not reply to direct messages that have not completed the form.

title: ON-CALL SCHEDULER & ONBOARDING SPECIALIST - MAC USER REQUIRED!
description:
Are you seeking a stable, long-term remote role that allows you to make a meaningful difference in people’s lives? Join an award-winning, woman-owned, family-operated boutique staffing company based in Washington, DC. We specialize in connecting elite nannies, babysitters, newborn care specialists, and chefs with the best families in the Washington, DC area.
This is an excellent opportunity for a highly motivated and detail-oriented individual who thrives in a supportive team environment. We value excellence, integrity, and collaboration and offer competitive benefits to our dedicated team members.

WHAT YOU'LL DO
As On-Call Scheduler/Onboarding Specialist, your role is integral to our operations and client satisfaction. You’ll focus on two primary areas:

Administrative Tasks
- Process digital paperwork for clients and caregivers.
- Perform time-sensitive data entry with accuracy and efficiency.

Staffing
- Act as the primary staffer during on-call hours (5:00 PM – 10:00 PM ET).
- Match caregivers with families based on service requests.

Your daily tasks will include:
- Responding to emails, texts, and phone calls professionally and promptly.
- Assisting with staffing caregivers for jobs.
- Managing and processing caregiver and client paperwork.

WHAT WE'RE LOOKING FOR
To excel in this role, you should possess:
- English Language Mastery (C2 Advanced/Mastery level required).
- Strong Written Skills in English.
- Exceptional problem-solving, multitasking, and communication abilities.
- Previous experience in staffing, recruitment, or onboarding for U.S.-based companies.
- Proficiency in Google Suite, Microsoft Outlook, and Airtable.
- A professional, well-groomed appearance for video calls.
- A proven track record of reliability.
- A quiet, distraction-free home office.
- A warm, friendly, and outgoing demeanor on video and phone calls.

TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS
Please include the following in your application:

- Test scores:
Jitters: Less than 30ms
Latency: Less than 150ms
Packet Loss: Less than 1%
- Voice Recording
- Specs for your Mac computer

WORK HOURS
Monday – Friday
2:00 PM – 10:00 PM ET (2:00 AM – 10:00 AM PHT)

WHY JOIN US?
We’re proud to offer a supportive and inclusive workplace where every team member is valued. Here’s what you can expect:
Competitive Pay: PHP 110,308.80/month ($1,920/month)
Benefits: Paid sick days, vacation days, and holidays.
Opportunities to grow your skills and contribute meaningfully to a dynamic team.

HOW TO APPLY
If this sounds like the opportunity you’ve been looking for, we’d love to hear from you! Submit your resume along with your required test scores (Jitters, Latency, and Packet Loss), and a voice recording.

title: Leasing Coordinator
description:
Leasing Coordinator


We’re looking for a new team member who has strong experience in property management and customer service. The position requires someone passionate about solving problems and helping customers be successful. Your work will directly impact the entire real estate industry and how properties are managed in the future.


Responsibilities

Identify and recommend opportunities to automate your most time-intensive tasks.
Partner with the product team to design and test software for our internal tooling and customer-facing applications.
Remotely coordinate the collection of house keys and installation of lock boxes.
Review inspection reports and discuss the scope of work with property owners.
Remotely coordinate and manage a large number of repair and cleaning requests with appropriate vendors.
Remotely coordinate and manage a large number of repair and cleaning requests with appropriate vendors. Coordinate and manage a large number of repair and cleaning requests with appropriate vendors.
Source and evaluate service vendors to build out our network of professionals.


Requirements

The best candidates will:

Be familiar with leasing and make-ready processes: You must have an understanding of what it takes to get a residential unit rent-ready and leased.
Understand typical home repairs: You will be coordinating standard home repair requests and therefore it’s important to know handiwork, plumbing, electrical, and other repair departments.
Have excellent task management skills: You will have a list of things to do each day and therefore need to enjoy going through and bringing this “inbox” down to zero.
Excel at customer problem solving: When you interact with a customer, you can quickly uncover their true objectives and help them chart a path to solving the repair request. You can teach others to do this too.
Be very comfortable using software: You should have experience with software and be able to quickly pick up new tools and features with little guidance.
Enjoy phone conversations: You like picking up the phone to get results faster.
Be collaborative: We will be looking to build a larger team, and therefore collaboration is key.
Be organized: You are accustomed to writing everything down (process flow) in an easy-to-understand manner to make sure you can help build an entire support team.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills: You go “over the top” for any customer.
Great work ethic: You can work in a fast-paced, changing environment.


Fill out this form to complete your application.:
https://bos.bamboohr.com/careers/50?source=aWQ9MTU=

DEVICE REQUIREMENTS:

At least iCore 5, Ryzen 5 or higher processor with 16GB RAM
Dual Monitor
Noise-canceling headset
Camera

The Personal Injury Paralegal will play a crucial role in ensuring that our clients receive the best possible representation.
Responsibilities
• Assist attorneys in preparing for trials, hearings, and client meetings.
• Conduct thorough legal research using tools such as Lexis-Nexis to gather relevant case law and statutes.
• Draft legal documents, including pleadings, motions, and discovery requests.
• Interview clients and witnesses to gather information pertinent to personal injury cases.
• Organize and maintain case files, ensuring all documentation is accurate and up-to-date.
• Prepare summaries of depositions, medical records, and other important documents for attorney review.
• Collaborate with clients, medical professionals, and experts to support case development.
• Stay informed about changes in personal injury law and relevant legal procedures.
Requirements
• Proven experience as a paralegal or legal assistant, preferably in personal injury law.
• Ability to comprehend and summarize medical records.
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills; ability to write clearly and concisely.
• Familiarity with litigation processes and procedures related to personal injury cases.
• Knowledge of environmental law or estate planning is a plus but not required.
• Ability to manage multiple tasks efficiently while maintaining attention to detail.
• Strong organizational skills with the ability to prioritize workload effectively.
• A commitment to maintaining confidentiality and professionalism at all times.
Join our team and contribute to making a difference in the lives of those we represent!

title: Senior Associate - Accounting and FP&A - Immediate Start
description:
About Us:
Profitability Partners is a distinguished fractional CFO business based in Tampa, Florida, specializing in delivering financial expertise to small and medium-sized businesses, e-commerce companies, and startups. We are on the lookout for a highly experienced Senior Accountant and FP&A Analyst with a comprehensive background in audit, general accounting practices and experience with FP&A. This remote, full-time opportunity is ideal for an overseas professional eager to take on a central role in our expansion, with the potential to grow into a managerial position overseeing our accounting operations.

Key Responsibilities:

Month-End and Year-End Closing:

Manage the month-end and year-end close process, ensuring accurate and timely recording of all financial transactions.
Conduct thorough account reconciliations and adjust journal entries to reflect the correct financial position.
Prepare detailed financial reports and statements, analyzing for variances and providing insights on financial status.

General Accounting & Financial Management:
Maintain accurate and comprehensive financial records and general ledgers.
Manage all aspects of bookkeeping, including accounts payable, accounts receivable, invoicing, and payroll.

Financial Planning & Analysis:
Support clients in financial modeling and creating forward-looking cash forecasts to support capital allocation decisions

Data Analysis of Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)
Analyze client operational data and that ties into financial performance. Condense and present data in a manageable, easy to digest format for clients to draw strategic insights from

Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in Accounting or Finance; Master’s degree or MBA preferred.
CPA certification is required.
At least 3 years of GAAP-based accounting experience, with a focus on audit with time spent at a Big 4 accounting firm.
Experience with accounting software (e.g., QuickBooks, NetSuite, Wave).
Experience as an FP&A analyst or manager and familiarity working with financial models and forward-looking projections
C1 level or higher proficiency in English.
Demonstrated expertise in managing full-cycle accounting and tax filing processes.
Strong analytical, problem-solving, and organizational skills.
Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
A strong sense of ethics, confidentiality, and professionalism.
Ability to work during U.S. Eastern Standard Time business hours full-time.
Ability to work independently, prioritize effectively, and meet deadlines.

title: Technical Support Representative
description:

At The Digital Headhunter, we specialize in empowering independent Executive Recruiters and Search Firm Owners to compete and thrive in a crowded market. 5. Integration Management: Set up Zapier integrations between Expandi and Uptics to automate tasks and workflows between apps without coding.
6. CSV Uploads: Upload CSV files to Uptics and Expandi to import contact data for use in automated messaging and lead generation.
7. Web Design: Ability to design and update websites/funnels as needed.
8. AI Tools: Familiarity with AI trends, including implementing chatbots on websites for enhanced user interaction.

Qualifications:
1. Experience with Microsoft and Google email platforms
2. Strong understanding of DNS records
3. Familiarity with Uptics, Expandi, and Zapier
4. Detail-oriented with excellent problem-solving skills
5. Self-starter who thrives in a fast-paced environment

What We Offer:
1. A collaborative work environment where your technical expertise drives success
2. Opportunities for growth within a thriving digital marketing company
3. Competitive pay and flexible remote work options

title: Full-Time Financial and Operations Specialist – Xero, Systems, and Administration
description:
We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Financial and Operations Specialist with exceptional written and verbal English skills for a full-time, remote role.

This position involves taking ownership of financial systems, operations management, and administrative tasks. It begins with a critical Xero cleanup project—reconciling over 1,500 unreconciled lines—and transitions into a long-term role managing financial and operational workflows. The ideal candidate will be a thinker and problem-solver who thrives in complexity and can provide exceptional support to leadership, ensuring the business operates efficiently and continues to grow.

In addition to the cleanup, this role requires categorizing revenue and costs accurately for the past 3–4 years, auditing financial records to ensure compliance (including accurate GST claims on imports), and providing actionable insights based on detailed financial analysis. The right candidate must bring an eagle eye for detail, ensuring no discrepancies go unnoticed and financial reporting is flawless.

This role is not for the faint-hearted. It requires significant experience in bookkeeping, operational management, and system integrations, as well as the ability to communicate clearly and confidently while taking initiative to drive results.

Responsibilities
1. Financial Cleanup and Management:

Reconcile over 1,500 unreconciled lines in Xero, ensuring all transactions are accurately categorized.
Categorize revenue and costs for the past 3–4 years to create a robust, accurate financial history.
Audit financial records to ensure all GST claims (e.g., imports) and compliance requirements have been met.
Analyze costs and revenue by broader categories (e.g., profitability by sales channels, merchant fees, marketing costs).
Maintain clean, accurate, and up-to-date financial records.
Prepare detailed financial reports that highlight trends, discrepancies, and key insights to inform business strategy.

2. Systems and Integration Management:
Manage and optimize backend operations for platforms like Shopify, TradeMe, and ServiceM8.
Resolve system integration issues, ensuring data flows seamlessly across platforms.
Develop efficient workflows to prevent future bottlenecks and inaccuracies.

3. Email and Administrative Management:
Monitor inboxes daily, responding to inquiries and organizing communications into structured folders.
Forward invoices and key documents to the appropriate systems or teams.
Handle customer follow-ups for overdue accounts and ensure timely resolution of inquiries.

4. Help Desk and Customer Support:
Assist with customer inquiries via email or help desk systems, maintaining professionalism and promptness.
Track issues and follow up as needed to ensure all tasks are completed.

5. Payroll and Staff Support:
Oversee payroll systems, ensuring staff hours and leave are logged accurately.
Manage sick leave, annual leave, and other time-off requests, escalating anomalies to leadership.
Maintain detailed records of staff attendance and ensure compliance with contractual allowances.

6. Process Improvement and Reporting:
Identify inefficiencies in financial and operational workflows, recommending and implementing improvements.
Generate custom reports on revenue, costs, and profitability across categories (e.g., retail, service, e-commerce).
Provide regular updates and progress reports to leadership, flagging critical issues promptly.

7. Strategic Collaboration:
Work closely with leadership to align on priorities, providing clear and concise requests for necessary data.
Proactively follow up on outstanding items while respecting limited availability.
Support decision-making by presenting data in actionable formats.

Rewards and Opportunities for Growth:

We value hard work, honesty, and initiative. For the right person, this role offers not just a job but a career. If you make my life easier and help the business thrive, you’ll be rewarded generously for your efforts.

Bonuses: Performance bonuses may be offered for meeting key deliverables, such as completing the Xero cleanup project or exceeding expectations.
Growth Opportunities: Pay increases and additional responsibilities will come with trust and demonstrated results.
We believe in rewarding those who go the extra mile and making work a rewarding experience for everyone involved.

title: Dispatch Virtual Assistant
description:
Role Overview:
The Dispatch Virtual Assistant will play a pivotal role in managing real-time dispatch operations for a dynamic delivery service. This position requires exceptional problem-solving skills, strong attention to detail, and the ability to work efficiently in a fast-paced environment. The Dispatch VA will ensure drivers are routed effectively, schedules are met, and clients are kept informed. As the team grows, the successful candidate will also provide training to new team members, becoming a knowledge expert within the team.

Job Responsibilities:
Real-Time Monitoring:
- Use GPS tracking software to monitor driver locations and optimize routes dynamically. 
- Ensure drivers follow the most efficient routes, accounting for time, traffic, and multiple delivery points.

Communication with Drivers and Clients:
- Maintain real-time communication via Signal App, providing updates on route changes, delivery priorities, and client requests. - Respond promptly to inbound messages and send outbound updates to ensure smooth operations.

Scheduling and Route Optimization:
- Assign delivery tasks based on proximity, urgency, and workload using mapping tools. 
- Calculate and assign efficient routes to minimize time and cost while meeting hourly pay standards for drivers.

Customer Updates:
- Notify clients of delivery updates, including estimated times, delays, or cancellations via email, text, or phone. 
-Handle real-time inquiries, escalating complex issues when necessary.

Driver Support and Problem-Solving:
- Address unexpected situations like vehicle breakdowns, incorrect delivery addresses, or delays. 
- Provide actionable solutions to minimize downtime and ensure timely deliveries.

Incident Reporting:
-Log all delays, incidents, or deviations for management review, including comprehensive end-of-day reports on performance and challenges.

Training and Expansion:
- Develop in-depth knowledge of the dispatch process, delivery routes, and client requirements. 
- Train new team members as the dispatch team expands.

Qualifications:
- Professional Experience: At least 2–3 years of experience in dispatch, logistics coordination, or a similar role.
- Technical Skills: Proficiency in GPS tracking software, routing tools, and Signal App for communication.
- Communication Skills: Fluent in written and spoken English with the ability to provide clear and professional instructions.
- Problem-Solving: Quick decision-making skills to resolve on-the-road issues and maintain smooth operations.
- Adaptability: Comfortable working in a high-pressure, fast-paced environment with changing schedules.
- Availability: Flexible to work between 5 PM and 12 AM EST, 5–7 days a week.

Key Attributes
- Proactive and Initiative-Driven: Anticipates challenges and addresses them before escalation.
- Attention to Detail: Ensures accuracy in route planning, scheduling, and reporting.
- Reliable and Responsive: Promptly addresses all communications and updates.
- Resilient: Thrives in a role with daily challenges, adapting quickly to unforeseen issues.

Working Conditions
- Requires constant monitoring of systems and real-time communication.
- High level of focus and reliability is critical to ensure smooth delivery operations.
- The successful candidate will be trained extensively to handle the unique challenges of the dispatch industry.

Expectations for Success
- Problem-Solving Mastery: Resolve issues quickly and reroute drivers as needed.
- Knowledge of Clients and Routes: Build expertise in delivery routes and client-specific requirements.
- Effective Communication: Maintain clear and professional communication with all stakeholders.
- Efficiency Focus: Minimize time, cost, and disruptions while maintaining quality service.

title: Email Marketer
description:
We’re on the lookout for an Email Marketer to join our expanding team and drive our company’s growth!

title: Customer Service Associate
description:
Position Overview:

The Customer Service Associate plays a critical role in supporting both generator sales operations, applying electrical and generator permits and overall client satisfaction across various services. This position is responsible for managing and maintaining accurate and organized records as well as overseeing the Sales Tracker to ensure timely communication and smooth sales processing. Power Plus Systems, LLC has been a dominant force in the residential electrical contracting industry for two decades, and we continue to lead the way. Competencies:

Ability to manage multiple trackers and scheduling sheets with a high level of accuracy and attention to detail.
Strong verbal and written communication to effectively collaborate with internal teams, clients, and leads.
Proven ability to handle customer inquiries and concerns with professionalism, patience, and problem-solving skills, ensuring a positive customer experience.
Proficiency in using CRM tools, trackers, and scheduling software, with the ability to adapt quickly to new platforms.
Excellent time management to ensure timely updates and follow-ups on leads, scheduling, and customer inquiries.

A minimum of two years of experience in a customer service position.

Extended periods of sitting at a desk and working on a computer.


Benefits:

Growth opportunities in a well-established company.
Ongoing training and professional development opportunities.
Opportunity for advancement within the company.
A supportive and collaborative work environment.
Company-observed paid United States holidays (full time).
Paid vacation.


How to Apply:

If you are ready to join Power Plus Systems, LLC, a well-established residential electrical contractor that values its team members and offers excellent benefits, please submit your application through the link below.

remotecareers.ppselectrical.com

Power Plus Systems, LLC is an equal opportunity employer and welcomes applicants from all backgrounds to apply.

Join us at Power Plus Systems, LLC, and be part of our continued success as we embark on the next 20 years of excellence in residential electrical contracting!

title: LinkedIn Marketing Specialist
description:
A LinkedIn Marketing Specialist is responsible for leveraging the LinkedIn platform to enhance a brand’s visibility, engage with prospects, build relationships, and ultimately drive business goals like lead generation, brand awareness, and thought leadership. Their role involves a variety of tasks and strategies that require a deep understanding of LinkedIn's tools, audience behaviors, and business objectives.

Here are the key roles and responsibilities of a LinkedIn Marketing Specialist:

1. Profile and Page Optimization
Company Page Management: Ensuring that the business's LinkedIn page is fully optimized and engaging. This includes updating the cover photo, bio, company info, and creating compelling posts.
Personal Branding for Executives: Helping executives build their LinkedIn presence by optimizing their personal profiles and encouraging them to engage with relevant content.
SEO for LinkedIn: Optimizing both personal and company pages for searchability within LinkedIn and via search engines (e.g., using relevant keywords).
2. Content Creation and Strategy
Content Development: Creating and curating content such as articles, posts, infographics, videos, case studies, and presentations that resonate with LinkedIn's professional audience.
Content Calendar: Developing a content calendar for consistent and strategic posting that aligns with the brand’s goals.
Thought Leadership: Promoting executives, founders, or subject matter experts within the organization as thought leaders by creating insightful, valuable, and relevant posts/articles.
Content Engagement: Encouraging employees, followers, and network connections to engage with posts, share content, and comment.
3. Audience Growth and Community Engagement
Audience Targeting: Building and maintaining a targeted audience through LinkedIn’s audience segmentation tools, including LinkedIn Ads, LinkedIn Groups, and personalized outreach.
Engagement Tactics: Responding to comments, messages, and engaging with other posts and conversations to build brand loyalty and trust.
Networking: Actively connecting with potential leads, influencers, and decision-makers in the industry through connection requests and direct outreach.
4. Lead Generation and Nurturing
Lead Generation Campaigns: Running LinkedIn lead generation campaigns using LinkedIn Ads (e.g., Sponsored Content, InMail, Lead Gen Forms) to drive high-quality leads.
LinkedIn Sales Navigator: Utilizing LinkedIn’s Sales Navigator tool for advanced lead search, lead recommendations, and building relationships with decision-makers.
Follow-ups and Nurturing: Developing strategies for nurturing leads through personalized messages, connection follow-ups, and retargeting.
5. Advertising Campaigns
LinkedIn Ads Management: Setting up and managing LinkedIn ad campaigns (Sponsored Content, Sponsored InMail, Text Ads) to drive traffic, generate leads, or promote brand awareness.
A/B Testing and Optimization: Running tests on different ad creatives, messaging, and audience targeting to optimize campaigns for better performance.
Budget Management: Managing advertising budgets effectively, ensuring that LinkedIn ads provide a strong ROI.
6. Analytics and Reporting
Performance Tracking: Analyzing the performance of LinkedIn marketing efforts using LinkedIn analytics tools and third-party analytics platforms.
Metrics Reporting: Reporting on KPIs such as engagement rates, follower growth, lead generation, conversion rates, and ROI.
Continuous Improvement: Using data and insights to continuously refine LinkedIn strategies for better results.
7. LinkedIn Groups and Communities
Community Management: Creating and moderating LinkedIn Groups or participating in existing groups to engage with a highly targeted community of professionals.
Building Relationships: Actively networking within these groups to foster trust and share valuable insights, establishing the brand or executive as a subject matter expert.
8. Collaboration with Sales and Other Teams
Aligning with Sales: Working closely with the sales team to ensure LinkedIn marketing strategies are aligned with sales goals and that the sales team has the necessary tools (e.g., LinkedIn profiles, content) for outreach.
Cross-team Collaboration: Collaborating with the content, PR, and other marketing teams to ensure consistency in messaging and branding.
9. Competitor and Industry Analysis
Competitive Research: Monitoring and analyzing competitors' LinkedIn activity to identify trends, best practices, and opportunities.
Industry Trends: Staying updated on industry news, LinkedIn algorithm changes, and emerging trends to adjust strategies as needed.
10. Event Promotion and Webinars
Event Promotion: Promoting company events, webinars, and online workshops through LinkedIn posts, sponsored content, and direct outreach to prospects.
Engagement during Events: Facilitating discussions or live updates during events to enhance engagement and reach.
11. Crisis and Reputation Management
Crisis Communication: Managing brand reputation by responding to negative comments or public issues on LinkedIn in a professional manner.
Brand Voice: Ensuring that the brand’s voice and messaging are consistent, positive, and aligned with company values.
Key Skills and Tools for a LinkedIn Marketing Specialist:
Content Creation: Writing, designing, and creating visual content for LinkedIn.
LinkedIn Analytics: Proficiency in LinkedIn’s native analytics and third-party platforms like Google Analytics or Hootsuite.
Sales Navigator: Expertise in LinkedIn’s Sales Navigator for lead generation and outreach.
Advertising Platforms: Experience with LinkedIn’s paid advertising options (Sponsored Content, Sponsored InMail, Text Ads, etc.).

title: Email Campaign/Promotions Ops Analyst
description:
We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented professional to fill the Email Campaign/Promotions Operations Analyst role. This hybrid role requires experience in managing technical issues, monitoring system alerts, and conducting quality assurance on CRM campaigns. The ideal candidate will have a knack for troubleshooting, diagnosing, and resolving promotional issues, while also ensuring the quality of all marketing deliverables. You will work across teams to ensure smooth operations, documentation, and adherence to campaign strategies, particularly outside regular working hours.


Salary Range:  PHP 70,000 - 90,000 per month

Note: Rate/Salary will depend on your current competencies matched to the position’s job description and requirements based on the assessment results.


The Benefits:
Work Set-up: Permanent Work From Home 
Bonuses:  
Attendance Bonus of $ 25 for every monthly perfect attendance
Performance Bonus
Anniversary Bonus of PHP 5,000 for your 1st year in service and PHP 10,000 for 2 years in service 
Referral Bonus of $ 300 for every successful referral 
Holiday Paid Time Off (PTO) for 7 days in a year
Paid Time Offs (PTO) for 6 days in a year
Prepaid Health Card

Key Responsibilities:
On-Call Support Responsibilities:
Monitor business dashboards (e.g., Tableau, Power BI, Chronosphere) and respond to alerts indicating potential promotional issues.
Provide swift incident response, troubleshoot issues, and mitigate the impact by taking preliminary measures.
Work with cross-functional partners to identify, root cause, and fix issues, escalating when necessary to relevant teams or leadership.
Record incidents with detailed logs, including the nature of the issue, steps taken to resolve it, and any follow-up actions required.
Assist in building dashboards or alerts to detect anomalies in campaigns or promotional activities.
Document frequent customer experience gaps and establish protocols to quickly detect and resolve issues.

Quality Assurance Responsibilities:
Conduct Quality Assurance (QA) reviews for email marketing deliverables (templates, popups, flows, and SMS) to ensure branding, copy, and target groups are consistent.
Check all technical setups of CRM campaigns (using Braze, Iterable, Salesforce, etc.) before launch to ensure proper execution and deliverability.
Own the preparation and execution of CRM campaign tactics: promotions, in-app banners, emails, and customer lists.
Work closely with cross-functional teams on campaign execution, maintaining documentation such as tickets, campaign overviews, calendars, and internal status reports.
Join daily stand-ups to review workload, flag SLA violations, and report QA misses to leads.
Record areas where operators frequently make errors, ensuring ongoing improvements in the process.

Must-Have Qualifications:
2+ years of experience with an ESP platform (Braze, Iterable, or Salesforce preferred).
1+ years of experience in QA tasks for CRM platforms.
Intermediate experience with CRM tools such as Braze, Iterable, or Salesforce.
Basic SQL experience (inner join, left join).
Proficiency with JIRA, Slack, G-Suite, and Google Sheets.
Experience working with business dashboards such as Tableau, Power BI, Chronosphere, or Sigma.
Experience reviewing, updating, and scheduling digital campaigns (email, push, in-app, promo codes).
Availability to work a day shift, either 5 AM – 3 PM PH Time or 1 PM – 10 PM PH Time, Friday through Monday (10 hours/day).
Willingness to work on weekends and holidays.

Nice-to-Have Qualifications:
Experience building dashboards or alerts to identify anomalies.
Basic knowledge of HTML and advanced SQL experience.
Previous experience in the tech industry or working with app-centric clients.

Critical Soft Skills:
Ability to meet deadlines, handle fast response times, and adhere to a highly detail-oriented work style.
Excellent English communication skills, both written and verbal.
Thoroughness in reviewing, testing, and double-checking all deliverables.
Strong project management skills with a proactive approach to problem-solving.

Take on this hybrid role where support, QA, and cross-functional collaboration meet!

Please send me the link to your updated resume if you're interested in moving further.

title: [PROJECT - FIXED TERM] Back-end Developer (Python FastAPI / SQLModel)

Join us in creating cutting-edge web experiences that make a difference. Be a part of the Doublewood team and help us build the future of technology.

Qualifications:
------------------
* 2-3 years of PPC experience on platforms like Google Ads, Meta Ads, TikTok, or Pinterest.
* Strong understanding of Google Analytics, campaign tracking, and A/B testing.
* Familiarity with marketing automation tools (e.g., Smartly.io, Adzooma) is a plus.
* Fluent in English (written and spoken).
* Availability to work with international teams remotely.

Why Join Us:
----------------
* Be part of a brand empowering women worldwide.
* Work in an innovative and supportive team environment.
* Competitive salary and performance-based incentives.
* Opportunities for growth and learning in a dynamic, expanding market.

How to Apply:
------------------
* When applying, use 7 Apply Points.

To confirm your application, 
please provide detailed answers to the following:
------------------------------------

1.) Describe a successful PPC campaign you managed. What challenges did you face, and how did you overcome them?
2.) What tools or strategies do you use to automate PPC campaign management?
3.) Have you worked with multi-language or international campaigns? If so, describe your approach.
4.) What attracts you to this position and LUNAcare as a brand?
5.) What is your salary expectation range?

Important Note:
---------------------
Applications that do not include the required 7 Apply Points or fail to answer all questions in detail will not be reviewed.


Our Vision: 
--------------
"LUNAcare is dedicated to creating a world where menstruation is embraced as a natural, empowering experience that benefits both women and the planet. We believe that innovation has the power to improve individual lives and contribute to the future health of our environment. Our mission is to bring real change through high-quality, eco-friendly products designed not only to support women’s health but also to protect nature.

As we strive to become a leader in women’s health, our focus goes beyond menstrual products alone. We are committed to fostering a future where technology and sustainability work hand in hand, where humanity becomes the steward of the planet, and where women’s wellness is a global priority. At LUNAcare, every individual plays a crucial role in this mission. We understand that a satisfied woman leads to happier partners, stronger families, and ultimately a healthier, more harmonious world. Together, we’re building a movement that creates meaningful, lasting change for women and for our world.

If you are ready to drive real impact and contribute to a global mission, join us in creating a better future for both women and the planet."

title: Intake Coordinator | ABA Clinics
description:
Position Summary:
We are seeking an organized and compassionate Intake Coordinator to join our Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA) clinic. As the first point of contact for prospective clients, you will play a crucial role in guiding families through the intake process. The ideal candidate will have excellent communication skills, a strong attention to detail, and a deep understanding of the importance of delivering exceptional client service in the field of ABA therapy.

Key Responsibilities:

Client Onboarding: Manage the intake process for new clients, including initial inquiries, scheduling assessments, and collecting necessary documentation.
Communication: Serve as the primary point of contact for families, providing clear and compassionate guidance on the intake process.
Data Management: Maintain detailed and organized client records, ensuring compliance with HIPAA and clinic policies.
Scheduling: Coordinate assessment appointments and assign appropriate staff, including Board Certified Behavior Analysts (BCBAs) and Registered Behavior Technicians (RBTs).
Collaboration: Work closely with clinical and administrative teams to ensure a smooth transition from intake to therapy services.
Problem Solving: Address client concerns or barriers during the intake process and escalate issues as needed.
Reporting: Track and report on intake metrics, including inquiries, completed intakes, and waitlist statuses.

Qualifications:

Bachelor’s degree in psychology, social work, or a related field (preferred).
Previous experience in a healthcare, ABA, or mental health setting is highly desirable.
Strong knowledge of ABA therapy and terminology is a plus.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Strong organizational skills with attention to detail.
Ability to handle sensitive information with confidentiality and professionalism.
Empathy and patience in working with families navigating autism services.

Work Environment:
This is a full-time position in a fast-paced clinical environment. The role requires collaboration with families, clinical staff, and insurance providers to ensure a seamless intake process.

Please send an email to support@nesscares.com with a subject line "Intake Coordinator Application"
Can travel in QC or Rizal (once in a while for team meetings)

title: Sales and Customer Success Support Specialist
description:
We are a growing SaaS company specializing in customer engagement solutions. Our platform offers features such as live chat, AI chatbots, messaging, IVR solutions, and CRM integration, empowering businesses to connect with their customers effectively. 

We are seeking a Sales and Customer Success Support Specialist to act as the first responder to engage and nurture leads promptly and effectively. This position is critical for qualifying Sales Qualified Leads (SQLs) and supporting the sales pipeline by maintaining strong, proactive communication with prospects.

This role combines elements of pre-sales support, lead qualification, and customer success, requiring someone with technical aptitude, excellent organizational skills, and the ability to engage clients with minimal supervision.

Key Responsibilities:
• Inbound Lead Engagement: Promptly respond to inbound leads, maintaining consistent engagement to nurture potential clients.
• Outbound Support: Assist in outbound prospecting efforts, including cold emailing, LinkedIn outreach, and calling prospects, ensuring the sales team has a steady pipeline of engaged leads.
• Lead Qualification: Support the sales team by gathering information from potential clients to qualify SQLs, capturing their needs and pain points to help tailor solutions.
• Demo Preparation: Capture prospects requirements and coordinate with the sales team to prepare for customized product demonstrations.
• Upselling Opportunities: Engage with existing customers to identify opportunities for upselling and ensure ongoing engagement and satisfaction.
• Technical Expertise: Quickly learn our product and services, developing a deep understanding of our SaaS platform, enabling you to respond to technical inquiries and demonstrate how our solutions solve customer challenges.
• Customer Success Support: Assist with client-facing support, including new customer training and proactive nurturing of customer relationships.
• Collaboration: Facilitate communication between prospects, clients and internal teams to ensure technical requirements and needs are met.

Required Qualifications:
• Fluent English speaker with exceptional communication skills (verbal and written).
• Previous experience in SaaS or similar technical roles.
• Proven ability to manage inbound and outbound lead generation activities.
• Strong understanding of customer service principles and practices.
• Experience using help desk software and ticketing systems to manage and track leads and customer interactions.
• Ability to work independently with minimal supervision, demonstrating a proactive and self-motivated approach.
• Excellent organizational skills, with a focus on promptly following up with leads and managing multiple priorities effectively.
• Willingness to support flexible schedule requirements.

Location: Remote 
Work Hours: US Pacific Time 

If you’re a self-starter who thrives in a collaborative and technical role, with a passion for helping customers succeed, we’d love to hear from you. Apply now and become a part of our growing team. 

To apply:
- Reply with subject line: Sales Support Candidate - [Your Name]
- Include a link to your resume and LinkedIn profile (if available)
- Answer ALL of the below to be considered:
1. How would you approach engaging an inbound lead? Provide an example of a strategy you’ve used to nurture a lead effectively.
2. Imagine a prospect expressing interest in the product but raises a concern about pricing or features during your initial engagement. How would you respond to keep the conversation moving forward?
3. What’s your approach to identifying upselling opportunities with existing customers? How have you successfully cross-sold or upsold products in the past?

title: Virtual Executive Assistant
description:
Who We Are

DSM Talent is the division that helps agency owners build a remote team in the Philippines by recruiting and managing amazing talent.

Who We're Looking For
We are seeking a proactive and tech-savvy Virtual Executive Assistant who excels in organization, client communication, and problem-solving. This full-time remote position is perfect for someone with excellent people skills, integrity, attention to detail, and a passion for helping others succeed.

You’ll thrive in this role if you genuinely enjoy creating efficiency, ensuring seamless coordination, and supporting a team to reach its goals. The position requires a commitment to work 8 hours a day, 5 days a week, during a night shift (9 PM - 6 AM PH Time) to align with our US-based clients.

Responsibilities
Inbox Management: Prioritize, categorize, and respond to emails, flagging critical messages and ensuring the executive's inbox is streamlined.
Calendar Management: Schedule and manage appointments, meetings, and events to optimize productivity.
Client Communication: Handle customer inquiries, feature requests, and support issues with professionalism and clarity.
Team Coordination: Act as a liaison between the executive, clients, and team members to ensure seamless communication.
Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs): Develop, document, and manage SOPs to improve operational efficiency.
Social Media Management: Create and post engaging content to maintain a professional online presence.
Research: Conduct in-depth research on tools, trends, and solutions to support business growth and decision-making.
Lead Generation: Identify and research new prospects to support outbound marketing and sales efforts.
Ad Hoc Projects: Assist with one-time tasks such as setting up new tools or launching special initiatives.

Experience
Relevant Experience: At least 2 years as an executive assistant, ideally in a remote setting, with prior exposure to SaaS or tech-forward environments.
Technical Proficiency: Comfort using tools like Slack, Notion, Linear, Google Docs, and other project management and communication platforms.
Strong Communication Skills: Exceptional written and verbal English skills to handle client and team interactions effectively.
Problem-Solving Skills: A demonstrated ability to troubleshoot issues and find solutions independently.
Organizational Skills: Proven experience managing schedules, emails, and workflows efficiently.
SaaS or Startup Familiarity (Preferred): Experience working in tech startups or SaaS companies is a strong plus.

How We Will Help You Succeed
Ongoing Training: Stay at the forefront of your role. We offer regular training sessions to ensure you're updated on the latest tools and best practices.
Supportive Environment: Our team is globally dispersed yet tight-knit. We believe in collaboration and will always be there to assist and guide.
Open Communication: We maintain a transparent work environment. Regular check-ins and feedback sessions are scheduled to ensure alignment with organizational goals and to offer support.
State-of-the-art Tools: To ensure your tasks run smoothly, we'll provide you access to the best tools and platforms in the industry.
Wellness and Balance: Recognizing the demands of a night shift, we prioritize your well-being with health and wellness support, ensuring a balanced lifestyle.

Employment Type

This is a full-time role, and we're not looking for an agency.
Please add the words "Lumpia" at the beginning of... Why are you interested in this position?

title: E-Commerce Project Manager – Global Impact, Organized Success
description:
About Us
-------------
LUNAcare is a mission-driven e-commerce company focused on women’s health and sustainability. We create innovative, high-quality menstrual products like LUNACUP and LUNA+ to make a positive impact on women’s lives and the planet.

We’re growing fast, and we need a motivated Project Manager to help us stay organized, on track, and achieve our goals.

Our mission is to redefine how menstruation is experienced—making it more natural, comfortable, and empowering for women while building a sustainable, internationally recognized brand.

We’re seeking a Project Manager to help turn our ambitious vision into a reality by managing our growing list of projects and supporting our global expansion.

What You’ll Do
--------------------
• Manage Projects: Oversee key projects, from website updates and branding initiatives to product launches in new markets.
• Optimize Processes: Implement and refine workflows using Notion to ensure everything runs smoothly.
• Coordinate Teams: Work with team members across marketing, product development, and customer service to align on goals and tasks.
• Drive Expansion: Support our international growth into Poland, Germany, Austria, and beyond, ensuring a seamless customer experience.
• Improve Systems: Help us transition from PrestaShop to Shopware and enhance website analytics, customer segmentation, and automation.

Why You?
-------------
• Experience in Project Management: At least 2 years of experience in e-commerce or related fields.
• Organizational Wizard: You thrive on structure and love managing multiple tasks efficiently.
• Tech-Savvy: Proficient in project management tools (experience with Notion is a big plus).
• Detail-Oriented: You excel at analyzing ideas and ensuring every step is executed perfectly.
• Ambitious & Adaptable: You’re excited to work in a fast-paced environment and contribute to global growth.


Application Process
--------------------------
• Use 8 Apply Points to Apply

To apply, follow these steps:
-------------------------------------

1.) What is your experience managing e-commerce projects?
2.) How do you ensure team members meet deadlines and stay organized?
3.) Share a tool or strategy you use to streamline workflows.
4.) Use exactly 8 Apply Points when applying.

Applications that don’t follow these steps will not be considered.

Join Us
---------
If you’re ready to bring order to ambitious ideas and play a key role in our global expansion, we’d love to hear from you. At LUNAcare, your work will have a real impact on women’s lives worldwide.

- Project management tool experience (Trello)
- Frame.io familiarity (or willingness to learn)

---

REQUIRED EQUIPMENT:

- High-performance computer capable of handling 4K multi-camera editing
- Minimum 1TB available storage (can include external drives)
- Fast, reliable internet connection for large file transfers

---

PROJECT MANAGEMENT:

- Daily updates required during active projects
- Use of Trello for project tracking
- Frame.io for video review and feedback
- Clear documentation of work completed
- Organized file management
- Regular communication about progress and challenges

---

APPLICATION REQUIREMENTS - READ CAREFULLY

Incomplete applications will not be considered. Your application must include ALL of the following items in order, clearly labeled:

---

1. COMMUNICATION & AVAILABILITY

- Confirm you can use Google Chat for daily communication
- State your timezone
- Specify your proposed 8-hour work window (in both your local time AND US Central Time)
- Confirm you can maintain these hours consistently Monday-Friday

---

2. TECHNICAL SETUP

- Detailed computer specifications including:
--- Processor (CPU)
--- RAM
--- Graphics card
--- Storage capacity and available space
- Internet speed test results from speedtest.net including:
--- Download speed
--- Upload speed
--- Screenshot of results
- List of current Adobe software versions you use

---

3. PORTFOLIO & EXPERIENCE

- Links to exactly 3 long-form YouTube videos you've edited
--- For each video, explain your role and what specific elements you're most proud of
--- Videos must be at least 10 minutes long
--- If videos are private/unlisted, ensure links are accessible
- Link to your favorite YouTube creator's channel
--- Explain in detail why their editing style resonates with you
--- Describe specific editing techniques they use that you admire

---

4. PROFESSIONAL APPROACH

- Describe your typical workflow for a video project
- Explain your system for organizing project files
- Detail your quality control process before delivering finals
- Describe how you handle revision requests
- Share an example of how you've handled constructive feedback

---

5. CONFIRMATION

- Explicitly confirm you understand this is a full-time position at $600 USD/month
- Confirm you understand the time off policy
- Acknowledge you understand daily updates are required
- Confirm you have the available storage space (1TB minimum) for large projects

---

Applications missing any of these elements or not following this format will not be reviewed. Please take time to ensure your application is complete and detailed.

If your application meets these requirements, we will follow up regarding next steps which will include a paid test project to evaluate your skills and communication style.

title: Technical Project Manager
description:
We are seeking a Technical Project Manager with a unique blend of strong leadership skills and deep technical expertise to join our dynamic team.

In this pivotal role, you will oversee the management of multiple software projects from conception to deployment, ensuring they align with business objectives and meet the highest quality standards.

Reporting directly to the CEO, you will serve as the central nexus connecting our technical efforts across backend, frontend, and data teams.

You will leverage your deep understanding of system architecture, technology stacks, and development processes to guide and mentor our team of PHP Laravel backend developers, JavaScript/React frontend developers, and Python developers.

This is an exciting opportunity to be part of a fast-growing startup that has been expanding rapidly for over two years.

We are building a massive portfolio of innovative software products that drive our business forward, and we value A players who can lead technical teams effectively while fostering a collaborative and high-performance culture.

TO APPLY: Visit https://careers.cashforarms.com/technical-project-manager-ous and apply here!  Important, applications on this site won't be reviewed, you must apply on our site.


Key Responsibilities

- Lead and manage multiple software projects from start to finish.

- Guide technical teams using your expertise and ensure alignment with company goals.

- Oversee system architecture across projects and maintain high-quality development standards.

- Facilitate clear communication between technical teams and stakeholders.

- Ensure all project deliverables are met on time and to the highest standard.


Requirements

- Minimum of 5 years' experience in software development and project management roles, leading cross-functional technical teams to successful project completions.

- Exceptional English communication skills, both written and spoken. Ability to create technical documentation, project reports, and business correspondence that drive alignment and collaboration.

- Deep expertise in system architecture, with a strong understanding of how frontend, backend, and data layers interact. Familiarity with microservices, monolithic, and modular architectures.

- Mastery of development methodologies including Agile, Lean, and hybrid models, with the ability to tailor approaches to specific team and project needs.

- Extensive hands-on experience with PHP Laravel, JavaScript/React, and Python technologies. Capable of providing technical guidance and strategic direction in these stacks.

- Proven leadership abilities, with a track record of mentoring teams, fostering collaboration, and delivering complex projects on time and within scope.

- Exceptional problem-solving skills, including navigating intricate technical challenges and conducting thorough root cause analysis.

- Demonstrated expertise in breaking down complex technical architectures into clear, actionable roadmaps. Skilled at aligning technical decisions with business objectives to empower teams and achieve measurable outcomes while keeping stakeholders informed.

- Client-centric mindset, focused on delivering high-value solutions that exceed expectations and drive business objectives.


Preferred Skills

- Significant experience in startup environments, showcasing adaptability and flexibility in lean, agile settings where broad skill sets are essential.

- Advanced knowledge of DevOps practices, including automation, infrastructure management, and orchestration tools like Docker, Kubernetes, and AWS.

- Expertise in application security best practices, including implementing data encryption, secure coding standards, access controls, and secure data handling protocols.

- High proficiency in performance optimization techniques, including frontend and backend optimization, load balancing, caching strategies, and database tuning for scalability.

- Experience with CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure, automating build, test, and deployment processes to streamline delivery and improve reliability.


Perks for Driven Professionals

We are looking for people with ambition and vision, ready to grow within a fast-paced startup. If you’re ready to push boundaries and build something meaningful, we’ve got you covered.

- Competitive Pay: Earn a competitive hourly rate of ?600 - ?750 that rewards your expertise.

- Paid Time Off: Enjoy generous paid time off, accrued annually.

- Career Growth: Play a crucial role with significant impact on our projects and company success.

- Performance-Based Incentives: Earn incentives based on your performance, with objective feedback to help you grow.

- Work-From-Home: Enjoy the flexibility of working remotely with a schedule that suits your needs.

- Continuous Learning: Access cutting-edge tools and ongoing training programs to develop your skills and excel in your role.

title: Property Management Support
description:
Job Description - Property Management Support

We are looking for someone to join the Moorview Lets team in the Property Management Support role. This role will work closely with the Property Managers within the business, to deliver 5* service to both tenants and landlords.

The ideal candidate will be highly organised, detail-orientated, with an excellent email manner and high standards for their work.
The ideal candidate should be proficient at using IT and be able to use tools like MS Office and the Google suite of products.

Responsibilities
* Process tenant check-out requests including returning their deposits and processing deductions (where required)
* Uploading maintenance items to our Property Management System ‘COHO’ - from WhatsApp/Asana/Check out reports
* Creating maintenance reports for internal review
* Ensuring compliance certification is up to date and instructing works where required
* Updating core KPIs with commentary
* Approving invoices for works and sending these for payment
* Liaising with cleaning contractors and managing schedule for regular (communal) and ad-hoc (end of tenancy) cleaning
* Other administrative duties as required by the Property Managers

Requirements
* Proficiency in MS Office (MS Excel and MS Powerpoint in particular) and using Google Suite
* Excellent time management skills and ability to prioritise work
* Attention to detail and problem solving skills
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills
* Strong organisational skills and ability to multi-task
* Flexible with a 'can do' attitude and growth mindset, prepared to take on new challenges.


What we can offer you
As a company we believe in creating a working environment where people feel cared for, safe and have opportunities to develop their skills. We welcome open and honest communication in the business to enable transparent understanding of the working environment. Collaboratively we support each other to improve and in doing so we encourage a strong challenge and support model in day to day tasks and events to accelerate personal development and business growth.
To this end we have an open working style which is friendly and fun but also professional. Alongside our commitment to keep the team healthy and safe, we also believe passionately in providing opportunities within the company for people to develop their skills and knowledge.

Working Pattern: Full time, Mon-Friday, 9am-5pm UK time (with an hour for lunch)

Holidays: 15 days per year + UK Bank Holidays

title: HR Specialist *Superstar Only*
description:
Are you a skilled and resourceful Talent Acquisition recruiter with a proven track record in talent acquisition?

Can you effectively coordinate the full recruitment lifecycle, ensuring that every step is executed with precision, even under high-pressure conditions?

We are deeply committed to identifying top talent who possess not only the necessary skills but also well-rounded, holistic qualities. Our objective is to find individuals who bring value to the organization in every aspect, from professional expertise to cultural fit.

If you are passionate about discovering exceptional candidates and dedicated to achieving recruitment excellence, we welcome your application.

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES

A talent acquisition role typically encompasses the full-cycle recruitment and hiring process to secure qualified candidates for an organization. The primary responsibilities often include:

- Leverage job boards, social media, networking, and other recruiting tools to find and connect with potential candidates.
- Perform initial screenings, coordinate interviews, and assess candidates’ skills and alignment with the company culture.
- Create and revise job descriptions, and publish open positions on various job sites.
- Oversee job postings across multiple recruitment channels, maintaining consistent branding and messaging.
- Collaborate with the Talent Acquisition Manager to design and implement recruitment strategies that support business objectives.

JOB QUALIFICATIONS

- Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related discipline.
- Previous experience in recruitment, HR, or talent acquisition, ideally with 2-3 years in a comparable position.
- Recognized for exceptional achievements, such as attaining Latin honors (Summa Cum Laude, Magna Cum Laude, Cum Laude).
- Distinguished for outstanding accomplishments: recognized for achievements including awards such as "Top Team Leader of the Year" and "Employee of the Year," and demonstrating rapid career progression into higher roles.
- Exceptional communication and interpersonal abilities.
- Proficiency in using tools such as Asana, Slack, Outlook, and ClickUp is a plus.
- Expertise in sourcing candidates through platforms like LinkedIn, Online Jobs, Jobstreet, and Upwork.
- Ability to manage multiple recruitment projects simultaneously.
- Solid understanding and capability to oversee inclusive hiring practices.

JOB REQUIREMENTS

- Reliable Computer/Laptop
- High-Speed Internet Connection (+backup)
- Conducive Work Environment

WORKING SCHEDULE

- Full-time Employment Opportunity

BENEFITS

- Competitive Salary
- Training and Development Opportunities
- Opportunity to contribute to a rapidly expanding company dedicated to promoting holistic beauty
- Great potential for career advancement into various leadership positions

APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS

Since this is a long-term position, there will be an in-depth qualification process. If you believe you have what it takes, here's what to do next:

Please apply to this job ad with the phrase “I’m a Talent Acquisition Superstar” and answer the following questions:

1.) Why are you specifically interested in this Talent Acquisition Specialist position?
2.) How do you prioritize tasks when managing multiple assignments or deadlines?
3.) Can you describe a proud moment in your career, the actions you took to achieve it, how it showcased your strengths, and the values you learned from it that you still apply today?
4.) What are the names of your last three supervisors, mentors, or instructors, and how would they rate your performance on a scale of 1 to 10?
5.) Schedule Availability:
5.1) Are you available to work weekends?
6.) On an English Proficiency Scale (from A1-C2), how would you rate your level of English proficiency and your ability to adapt your language to the target audience?
7.) Please complete the following tests and attach the screenshots of the results in a Google Drive link (set to open access):
7.1.) Go to www.typing.com/student/typing-test/1-minute, complete the test and take a screenshot of your results. You don't need to sign in, just close any requests to sign in.
7.2.) Go to www.grammaring.com/english-grammar-test and take the test. Please take a screenshot of the final result.
7.3.) Go to www.speedtest.net/ and take a screenshot of the final result.
7.4.) Go to speed.cloudflare.com/ and take a screenshot of the final result.
8.) Please attach your updated CV in a Google Drive link (set to open access).

If you believe you meet our qualifications and requirements, we encourage you to apply now and become a valuable part of our rapidly expanding company.

title: Amazon Sourcing Analyst
description:
Overview
Are you someone who thrives on finding hidden opportunities and loves diving deep into data? We’re seeking an Amazon Sourcing Analyst who can consistently deliver results. Your mission will be to identify 20+ profitable leads daily with compelling, data-backed reasoning for why each product is a winner. If you're self-motivated, detail-oriented, and can follow instructions with minimal guidance, this role is for you.

We’re not interested in lengthy resumes or polished cover letters.  Please do NOT share these with us. 
You can show us you can do the job by demonstrating the exact skills we’re looking for in our screening test.

What You’ll Do
Analyze online product listings and sales data to identify products with high profit potential.
Evaluate sourcing opportunities using tools like Keepa, SellerAmp, and manual research methods.
Provide detailed reasoning for each profitable lead, focusing on ROI, competitive landscape, and demand metrics.
Maintain accuracy and consistency while meeting daily lead quotas.
Adapt quickly to feedback and adjust your approach as needed.
What We Expect From You

Strong analytical and decision-making skills.
Ability to identify profitable opportunities using Amazon-specific tools.
Meticulous attention to detail and data-backed reasoning for every lead.
Excellent communication skills to explain your rationale concisely.
Dependable and proactive attitude—able to thrive with minimal supervision.
To ensure you’ve read this listing carefully, include the phrase “Purple penguins are underrated” in your application. Applications without this will not be considered.


What You’ll Need
Familiarity with sourcing tools like Keepa, SellerAmp, or others.
Basic understanding of Amazon FBA business models.
Proven ability to hit quotas consistently in a sourcing role.
Reliable internet connection and access to required tools.

title: Part Time Property Management Transaction Coordinator
description:
Job Description: Transaction Coordinator & Administrative Support at 
Wasatch Leasing & Property Management

Company Overview:
Wasatch Leasing & Management LLC is a UTAH based provider of comprehensive property management services dedicated to maximizing property owners' returns and tenants' satisfaction. With a commitment to excellence and innovation, we strive to deliver exceptional value to our clients in the dynamic real estate market.

Position: Transaction Coordinator & Administrative Support
Location: Remote (Mountain Standard  Time Zone)
Hours: Monday - Friday
Expected Salary:  (Salary varies based on skill level,production and results)

Job Purpose:
The Admin, Payroll, and Transactions Coordinator is a key support role in ensuring seamless administrative operations, payroll processing, and transaction management in a dynamic property management company. The ideal candidate will be highly organized, detail-oriented, and able to manage multiple responsibilities while maintaining professionalism and confidentiality.

Job Responsibilities:
 
Email and Calendar Management:
Coordinate daily team meetings.
Notify the Program Manager and team of urgent issues requiring immediate attention.
Main admin of the company’s operating systems.
Responsible for ordering office supplies to ensure operational efficiency.
Serve as the primary point of contact for administrative inquiries and support across the company.
Serve as a resource for employees seeking guidance or assistance on administrative policies, procedures, and protocols.

Document Management:
Draft an SOP based on the meeting notes conducted by the Program Manager and send it for approval.
Maintain and organize SOP files, ensuring documents are updated and easily accessible.
Keep a log of company credentials, logins, and passwords.

Team Onboarding & Support:
Prepare W8 BEN contract agreements and credentials for new hires.
Send onboarding documents and file them in the designated 201 folders.
Conduct a two-day onboarding meeting covering SOPs and payroll processes.
Add new personnel to relevant team meetings, communication channels (e.g., Skype), and time trackers.
Share and train new hires on Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) and payroll processes.
Enroll W2 personnel in ADP and train W8 personnel on Veem payment requests.

Exit Procedures:
Prepare exit checklists for resigned or terminated personnel.
Remove and deactivate accounts from all systems for departing team members.

Payroll Management
Prepare, review, and process payroll for all employees per pay period.
Create and share payslip templates with personnel.
Ensure compliance with company policies and payroll regulations.

Transaction Coordination
Respond to inquiries from property owners, tenants, and vendors related to transactions or accounts payable.
Review vendor profiles to ensure all requirements for payment processing are complete.
Process vendor invoices, ensuring adherence to SOPs.
Process management bills, ensuring adherence to SOPs.
Reconcile accounts, address discrepancies, and maintain accurate financial documentation.
Communicate with vendors regarding payment schedules, disputes, or missing information.
Process owner disbursements and phonesale transactions.

Bank Account and Financial Monitoring
Check and monitor Trust and Operations bank accounts for Wasatch Leasing & Management LLC. Update cash flow reports for University Bookkeeping Services Team
Prepares funds necessary for payrolls and other Operations Expenses.

Property Management Operations
File Preliminary Notices at the State Construction Registry for newly managed properties.
Create and manage AppFolio accounts for showing agents and team members.
Complete assigned activities in AppFolio in a timely manner.

General Responsibilities
Accuracy: Maintain a high level of precision in documentation and financial transactions.
Professionalism: Exhibit professionalism in interactions with property owners, tenants, vendors, and team members.
Problem-Solving: Investigate and resolve discrepancies or disputes effectively.
Multitasking: Manage multiple priorities and meet deadlines consistently.
Confidentiality: Handle sensitive information and financial records with discretion.

Qualifications
Bachelor’s degree in business administration, accounting, or a related field (preferred).
Proven experience in property management, payroll, or financial transactions coordination.
Proficiency in property management systems (e.g., AppFolio) and financial tools.
Strong organizational and multitasking skills.
Standard communication skills
Excellent problem-solving abilities.
High attention to detail and commitment to accuracy.
Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.

Who We Are

M-Power Solutions is more than just a company – we're a family of innovators, go-getters, and dream-chasers. Our mission? To empower businesses and individuals to reach their full potential through cutting-edge CRM and marketing automation solutions.

Our Company Values

Dedication to Growth: We believe in being 1?tter every day, both personally and professionally.
Dedication to Showing Up: For our clients, for each other, and for ourselves.
Dedication to Excellence: We strive for the highest standards in everything we do.
Dedication to Empowerment: We uplift and enable others to reach their full potential.

Key Responsibilities:

- Proactively identify and pursue new business opportunities through various channels

Qualifications:

- Exceptional English communication skills, both verbal and written
- Ability to handle rejection professionally
- Strong personality with the ability to handle assertive clients professionally
- Outstanding listening and negotiation skills
- High emotional intelligence and ability to read client needs
