title: Virtual Assistant for Growing Real Estate Media Company
description:
About Us: 
Elevate is a real estate media company founded by Luke Andersen, providing photos, videos, and other media services to real estate agents in California. After over 11 years in the industry, Luke decided to start his own venture to gain more flexibility, especially to spend more time with his 2-year-old daughter. As the business continues to grow, we're looking to bring on a dedicated Virtual Assistant who can help manage key tasks. We need someone reliable, detail-oriented, and ready to grow with us.

Position Overview: 
We are looking for a Virtual Assistant to begin by focusing on quality control from 8-10am PST Tuesday-Saturday, ensuring the final media products meet our standards before being delivered to clients. The VA will work closely with our editing team to communicate requests and submit media. As you become familiar with our workflow, you'll have the opportunity to take on additional responsibilities such as social media management, client communication, and general administrative support. The ideal candidate will be available during 8-10am PST to start, but also free to eventually expand their hours to 4pm PST. There is room for growth as the company expands so we’re seeking someone with patience who is willing to take on more responsibility over time.

Key Responsibilities:
- Perform quality control on photos and videos before client delivery
- Communicate editing requests to photo and video editors. 
- Help with social media content planning and scheduling
- Manage client communication and assist with scheduling
- Provide general administrative support as needed
- Contribute ideas to improve workflow and client service

What We’re Looking For:
- First and foremost - someone with EXCELLENT and PROMPT communication. 
- Someone able to work 8-10am PST to start. And ideally be able to expand into additional hours throughout the day until around 4pm PST. 
- Someone available to work Tuesday through Saturday. 
- Strong organizational and time management skills
- Attention to detail, especially for quality control
- Ability to adapt and take on new responsibilities as the company grows
- Proactive, reliable, and able to work independently
- Familiarity with social media management or real estate services is a plus, but not required

Important: Please send us a custom video recording answering the following three questions:
1. Tell us about yourself. Who are you, and what do you enjoy doing?
2. Why do you want to work with Elevate? What stood out to you about this opportunity?
3. Tell us about your work experience.
4. What hours (Pacific Standard Time) and days of the week are you available? 

Submissions without video recordings will not be considered. 

In addition to the video, please submit your resume and to prove you've read this entire job posting, include the phrase "I love photography" in your application. 

We look forward to hearing from you!

Thanks,
~ Luke
https://sdelevatemedia.com/

title: Virtual Assistant for Creative Marketing and GoHighLevel Support
description:
Hello, and thank you for your interest! I am seeking a skilled and creative Virtual Assistant to support my business with GoHighLevel services, creative marketing tasks, and administrative duties. If you’re an organized, tech-savvy individual with a knack for marketing and a proactive mindset, I’d love to hear from you.

Please read the entire post carefully and include answers to the questions below in your application. This will help us ensure the role is a good fit for you! The role is currently part time but will likely convert to full time after a month or two if you are open to it!

About the Role

In this role, you’ll work on a variety of tasks related to marketing, automation, and client management—mostly but not limited to GoHighLevel. Some of your responsibilities may include:

 • Website Development: Build a 10-page website (e.g., Wallace project).
 • Creative Ad Content: Design and create ad creatives for events like Black Friday, Cyber Monday, and holiday promotions, adapting colors, wording, and styles as needed.
 • Client Onboarding
 • Create new subaccounts in GoHighLevel with proper settings.
 • Install automations and workflows.
 • Marketing Support
 • Create engaging images and videos for ads and social media.
 • Set up automations for campaigns.
 • Provide administrative support like invoicing and lead generation.

Skills That Are a Huge Plus (but not entirely necessary)

 • Video editing
 • Caption writing
 • Social media posting
 • Facebook and Google Ads management
 • Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) creation
 • Lead generation
 • Email marketing and invoicing

Questions to Answer in Your Application

General Background and Tools

 1. Can you share examples of past clients or projects you’ve worked on? What were your main responsibilities for them?
 2. Do you have access to ChatGPT? If so, how do you use it in your work?
 3. Do you have an Adobe or Canva account? Which do you prefer and why?
 4. Are there other tools or software you’re proficient in that could be helpful in this role (e.g., Trello, Asana, Slack, etc.)?

GoHighLevel Expertise

 5. What is your favorite feature of GoHighLevel, and what are you best at when using it?
 6. What do you like least about GoHighLevel?
 7. Are you comfortable with all aspects of GoHighLevel, including pipelines, workflows, SMS/email campaigns, and automations? If not, what areas do you feel you’d need more training on?

Marketing and Creativity

 8. Can you share an example of a creative marketing strategy or design you implemented that produced measurable results?
 9. Can you send me a picture of a U.S.-based Google Business Profile in the local service industry that could use more online reviews?

Work Habits and Communication

 10. How do you track your time effectively?
 11. What are your typical working hours (in your time zone)?
 12. What is your preferred method of communication (e.g., email, Slack, Zoom)?

Logistics and Practical Details

 13. Are you comfortable completing a paid sample task at a higher rate before hiring?
 14. Based on the sample tasks listed above, can you provide estimated timeframes for completing them?
 15. What is your desired rate? Is this number flexible? 
 16. How many hours per week can you work? Is this number flexible? 
 17. Do you have a reliable internet connection, a working microphone and webcam for meetings, and a workspace? Where do you usually work?

Work Preferences

 18. Are you looking for a long-term or short-term comittment for this job?
        19. Are you currently employed? Do you plan to be? 
 20. What type of work environment do you work best in? I want to make sure you are a happy part of the team and enjoy working for our company!

Critical Thinking and Attention to Detail

 21. Did I make any spelling mistakes in this job posting? If so, which word did I misspell?

What We’re Looking For in a Candidate

 • Proactive, self-motivated, and creative.
 • Familiar with GoHighLevel and other marketing tools.
 • Able to meet deadlines and communicate effectively.
 • Skilled in adapting to different types of creative and technical tasks.

How to Apply

If this role sounds like a fit for you, please send your application with answers to the questions above, along with your resume and any relevant portfolio or work samples. Please respond THOROUGHLY to every question on this application. We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Ecomm Amazon Bookkeeping Full Time

title: Short-Term Rental Operations Manager
description:
ABOUT THE COMPANY

At FIBI Vacation Rentals, we are dedicated to maximizing both revenue and guest satisfaction. Our team values trust, integrity, courage, innovation, creativity, and a commitment to educational leadership. We specialize in identifying strategies that elevate revenue while delivering exceptional guest experiences.

Business & Growth Goals
Scale to become a business worth 100 million USD valuation

Mission
To set the professional standard for short term rental management.

Our Niche
- Identifying Ways To Improve Revenue Performance
- Providing Exceptional Guest Experiences

Core Values
- Trust & Integrity: Act with honesty, accountability, and reliability.
- Courage & Creativity: Bring innovative ideas and take calculated risks.
- Education-Driven Leadership: Share knowledge and guide the team toward continuous improvement.

Benefits of Working With Us
- Direct interaction with Company Founders, ability to have your voice heard, and opportunity to impact decision making and company direction
- Employee Stock Plan Available
- Employee Growth Plan
- Unlimited Paid Time Off
- Kid & Family Friendly Environment


JOB SUMMARY
As the Short-Term Rental Operations Manager, you will play a pivotal role in driving operational excellence, managing a high-performing team, and enhancing guest satisfaction across our properties. You will oversee daily operations, act as a point of escalation for guests and vendors, and contribute to both strategy and execution to ensure FIBI Vacation Rentals meets its mission and values.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

General Operations
- Team Leadership: Manage our various front-line operations departments, including Guest Communication, Cleaning Coordination, Repairs & Maintenance team members. Ensure team members are appropriately trained, following standard procedures and policies effectively, and meeting productivity goals. 
- Performance Management: Review team member compliance to policy and training. Ensure team members are completing all assigned tasks appropriately and timely, as well as following up as needed and identifying next steps and additional support when team members require escalated decisions. 
- Employee Development: Conduct monthly performance reviews for each team member through one-on-one meetings and coaching, providing additional support or training when needed, as well as ensuring productivity and performance standards are developed and met, as well as working with Workforce Management when write-ups/discipline/termination is necessary.
- Daily Huddles: Lead daily team huddles and provide support to frontline staff by answering questions and clarifying tasks.
- Guest Relations & Conflict Resolution : Handle escalated guest issues, resolve conflicts, determine if/when refunds or compensation is provided and appropriate, and speak with supervisors to address guest situations if/when necessary. 
- Vendor Management: Identify and report the need for new vendors and serve as a point of escalation for vendor-related issues, such as payment, scheduling, or performance expectations. 
- Property & Software Knowledge: Stay familiar with the properties managed and the software used to streamline operations.
Strategic Planning: Participate in high-level meetings, contributing to process improvements and implementing strategic changes.

Accountability
- Communication Oversight: Ensure emails are answered and forwarded appropriately, phone lines are managed, and messages are responded to promptly.
- Task Management: Review tasks in BreezeWay and ClickUp, ensuring employees are accountable and tasks are completed on time.
- Schedule Management: Oversee shift schedules, confirm attendance, and manage follow-up on tasks and responsibilities.
- Supply & Inspection Oversight: Oversee ordering of supplies, ensuring competitive pricing and timely delivery to correct locations. Conduct spot checks on cleaner coordinators and evaluate their inspections.

Approvals
- Guest Requests: Approve special requests, refunds, and disputes based on set guidelines.
- Property Costs: Review and approve property-related costs in collaboration with the client success team.
- Vendor Approvals: Approve new vendor contracts and in-the-moment orders (e.g. additional guest amenities).
Cancellations & Accommodations: Manage cancellations and accommodations as per company guidelines.

Delegation
- Task Delegation: Assign tasks, set clear expectations, and monitor progress in BreezeWay and other systems.
- Issue Management: Review BreezeWay issues, delegate to appropriate departments, and follow up on task completion.
- Review Management: Analyze review scores, identify action items, and manage supply orders and essential R&M (Repairs and Maintenance) requests.
- Cleaner Coordinator Evaluation: Ensure tasks are being correctly identified and addressed by the cleaner coordinator.



QUALIFICATIONS & KEY TRAITS

- Problem Solving & Conflict Resolution: Ability to resolve complex issues independently and confidently.
- Adaptability: Flexible and capable of managing changing priorities in a fast-paced environment.
- Innovation & Critical Thinking: Thinks outside the box, researches solutions, and takes calculated risks.
- Communication Skills: Strong verbal and written English proficiency with attention to detail in documentation and reporting.
- American Home Knowledge: Strong understanding of American home systems, equipment, and construction standards.
- Familiarity with Airbnb Policies: Deep understanding of Airbnb's terms of service and short-term rental regulations to inform decision making across all departments. 



APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS

Please follow these application instructions carefully. Applications missing any of these components or not following these instructions will not be considered.

Video Application
1. Submit a 1-MINUTE MAX video introduction.
2. Must speak in very clear English with minimal accent.
3. Start the video by saying the word “PICKLES”.

Questions to Answer in Your Video
1. What is your relevant experience? Describe how it aligns with the responsibilities of this role.
2. What’s the riskiest decision you’ve made on behalf of an employer? Explain the context, your decision-making process, and the outcome.

Resume 
Along with your Video submission, please include your resume which much detail relevant prior work experience and various software knowledge related to the Short Term Rental industry.

title: Risk Analyst for Online Gambling
description:
***PLEASE DO NOT APPLY FOR THIS POSITION IF YOU DO NOT HAVE EXPERIENCE IN CONDUCTING KYC VERIFICATION WITHIN THE ONLINE GAMBLING INDUSTRY*** 

We are a leading online sweepstakes casino offering an exciting array of games, including slots, table games, and more, exclusively to players in the USA. Our platform is designed to offer a thrilling gaming experience in a secure and responsible environment. At our company, we're committed to delivering exceptional customer service and a seamless gaming experience to all our players. 

About the position:
We are seeking a diligent and detail-oriented Risk Analyst to join our team. The Risk Analyst Specialist will play a crucial role in ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements and maintaining the integrity of our customer verification processes. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of KYC principles and regulations, along with excellent communication and analytical skills.

Responsibilities:
• Conduct thorough customer due diligence checks to verify the identity of new and existing customers.
• Review and analyze customer documentation, including identification documents and proof of address, to ensure compliance with regulatory requirements.
• Collaborate with internal teams to resolve KYC-related issues and escalate any compliance concerns.
• Stay up-to-date with changes in regulatory requirements and industry best practices related to KYC and AML (Anti-Money Laundering) regulations.
• Maintain accurate records of KYC checks and related documentation in accordance with company policies and procedures.

Requirements:
• Excellent English communication skills: verbal, written, and reading is a MUST
• Proven KYC experience, ideally in the online gambling industry is a MUST
• Strong understanding of KYC principles, AML regulations, and industry best practices
• Excellent attention to detail and analytical skills
• Must be able to work in a fast-paced environment and handle multiple tasks simultaneously.
• A commitment to upholding the highest standards of privacy and confidentiality

Work Schedule:
• This is a full-time position in a work-from-home setup. You will be working 8 hours a day, 5 days a week.

TO APPLY FOR THIS POSITION, FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS BELOW:
1. Include the phrase "KYC" in your SUBJECT.
2. Send a COVER LETTER with a LINK to your CV/Resume

***APPLICATIONS WITHOUT CVS/RESUMES WILL NOT BE CONSIDERED***

title: Executive Operations Assistant
description:
Overview:
The Executive Operations Assistant will provide high-level administrative support to senior management and manage day-to-day office operations across multiple business entities. This role is crucial in maintaining efficient office processes, assisting with customer and vendor communications, and overseeing various administrative and operational duties. The ideal candidate will have exceptional organizational skills, attention to detail, and the ability to manage a diverse set of tasks with professionalism and independence.

Responsibilities:
ACCOUNTABILITY #1: Customer & Vendor Communications
Answer and direct phone calls and respond to customer inquiries (e.g., product availability, quotes, production updates).
Address and resolve customer complaints, escalating issues as necessary.
Coordinate with vendors to ensure timely payments, handle prepayments, and manage account statuses.
Objective of Customer & Vendor Communications: Ensure timely and effective communication with clients and vendors to maintain strong relationships and support business continuity.

ACCOUNTABILITY #2: Order Management & Invoicing
Manage order entry and invoicing processes as needed.
Coordinate with the finance team to ensure accurate and timely billing and follow up on past due invoices.
Handle any required documentation for order processing, including shipping details and customer inquiries.
Objective of Order Management & Invoicing: Facilitate efficient order processing and billing to maintain smooth operational workflows and optimize cash flow.

ACCOUNTABILITY #3: Inventory and Product Updates
Regularly update inventory information on internal systems and external platforms.
Manage product listings, including new product uploads, discontinued items, and adjustments on Sage and ESP.
Coordinate with internal teams to ensure up-to-date product information and manage related tasks on BusinessWorks and other ERP systems.
Objective of Inventory and Product Updates: Ensure accurate product data is maintained, enabling efficient inventory management and effective sales operations.

ACCOUNTABILITY #4: Office Management & General Administrative Duties
Act as the primary contact for daily office needs, including supply management and liaising with external vendors.
Coordinate routine maintenance and office IT support, including managing service requests for printers and other office equipment.
Assist with ad-hoc tasks as needed to support overall business operations.
Objective of Office Management & General Administrative Duties: Maintain a productive and organized office environment by managing resources, vendor relationships, and day-to-day office requirements.

ACCOUNTABILITY #5: Task, Email, and Calendar Management for CEO & President
Manage and organize the CEO’s and President’s (Dominic) calendar, including scheduling meetings, appointments, and travel arrangements.
Monitor and respond to emails on behalf of the CEO as required, prioritizing and categorizing communications for timely follow-up.
Assist with task management and follow-up on action items to ensure the CEO’s and President’s daily schedules run efficiently.
Objective of Task, Email, and Calendar Management: Provide seamless administrative support to the CEO and President, allowing them to focus on high-level strategic priorities by managing their daily tasks, communications, and scheduling needs.

Key Skills and Qualifications:

Proficiency in Written and Spoken English:
Exceptional proficiency in both written and spoken English is crucial for this role. Effective communication with US-based clients and employees is essential to maintain professionalism in all interactions.
Ability to articulate and convey technical information clearly to clients and team members.

Technical Proficiency:
Strong working knowledge of ERP systems, such as BusinessWorks, and experience with platforms like Sage and ESP for inventory and product updates.
Comfortable using CRM, task management software (e.g., Asana), and basic accounting tools.

Organizational and Multitasking Abilities:
Proven ability to manage multiple responsibilities, prioritize tasks, and complete work efficiently.
High attention to detail and strong organizational skills to handle administrative, billing, and reporting tasks effectively.

Problem-Solving Skills:
Ability to anticipate challenges and proactively seek solutions, particularly when managing customer and vendor inquiries or coordinating with internal teams.

Interpersonal Skills:
Demonstrates a positive attitude and professionalism in all interactions, with the ability to build strong relationships with team members, vendors, and clients.

Education and Experience:
Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Communications, or a related field is preferred but not required.
Proven experience in administrative support roles, with a demonstrated ability to manage diverse responsibilities.

Preferred Qualifications:
Experience with ERP systems, particularly BusinessWorks or similar platforms.
Familiarity with Sage and ESP websites for product and pricing updates.
Competency in handling invoicing, billing, and order management processes.

title: Virtual Assistant
description:
The individual must be able to perform the following: 

1. Assess Core Administrative Skills
Task 1: Calendar Management
Provide a mock scenario with overlapping meeting requests across time zones. Ask the candidate to propose a schedule that accommodates all stakeholders.
Evaluate: Time zone awareness, conflict resolution, and organizational skills.
Task 2: Email Drafting
Share a scenario where the candidate needs to respond to an inquiry from a potential business acquisition partner. Ask them to draft a professional email using AI tools like ChatGPT.
Evaluate: Tone, clarity, grammar, and efficient AI utilization.
Task 3: Document Management
Provide a draft document with errors and ask the candidate to proofread and reformat it according to specific style guidelines.
Evaluate: Attention to detail and document organization.


2. Test Business Assistance Capabilities
Task 4: Project Coordination
Simulate a scenario where the candidate must create a project timeline for an ARBO compliance audit. Include milestones, deadlines, and required documentation.
Evaluate: Project planning and use of tools like Trello or Asana.
Task 5: Research
Assign a topic such as "Current ARBO compliance challenges for remote teams." Ask them to research and summarize key points using AI tools.
Evaluate: Research quality, summarization skills, and effective use of AI.
Task 6: Financial Administration
Provide mock invoices and expenses. Ask them to process the information into a basic budget or expense tracker.
Evaluate: Financial accuracy and attention to detail.


3. Evaluate AI and Automation Skills
Task 7: ChatGPT Utilization
Assign a task where the candidate must use ChatGPT to generate:
A response to a hypothetical client inquiry.
A short summary of a regulatory report.
An automated draft for a recurring meeting agenda.
Evaluate: Creativity, efficiency, and appropriate use of AI capabilities.
Task 8: Automation and Workflow Optimization
Present a repetitive task (e.g., sending follow-up emails or scheduling reminders). Ask them to suggest ways to automate it using tools like Zapier or similar.
Evaluate: Problem-solving and familiarity with automation tools.


4. Communication and Relationship Management
Task 9: Virtual Meeting Setup
Ask the candidate to set up a virtual meeting, create an agenda, and share it with attendees. Evaluate their ability to include relevant information and manage technical aspects like setting up Zoom links or adding the meeting to a shared calendar.
Evaluate: Organizational and communication skills.
Task 10: Conflict Resolution
Provide a scenario where two team members have conflicting views on a project timeline. Ask how they would communicate and resolve the issue.
Evaluate: Diplomacy and relationship management skills.


5. Problem-Solving and Proactivity
Task 11: Handling Ambiguity
Give a vague instruction like, "Prepare a brief overview of ARBO-related risks for a new acquisition." Observe if they seek clarification, conduct relevant research, and deliver a meaningful summary.
Evaluate: Proactiveness and problem-solving.
Task 12: Process Improvement
Ask them to review a mock workflow for onboarding new acquisitions. Request suggestions for improvement, particularly focusing on AI tools to enhance efficiency.
Evaluate: Analytical thinking and innovation.


6. Confidentiality and Ethics
Task 13: Scenario-Based Test
Present a scenario involving sensitive information (e.g., a document marked confidential). Ask how they would handle and store it securely.
Evaluate: Awareness of confidentiality protocols.


7. Test Responsiveness and Adaptability
Task 14: Simulated Workday
Assign tasks mimicking a typical day in the role, including:
Scheduling.
Drafting emails.
Researching healthcare/law/economy & business updates.
Preparing a basic financial report.
Evaluate: Multitasking, time management, and overall competency.
Task 15: Crisis Scenario
Present a situation where a last-minute virtual meeting with stakeholders needs to be arranged. Observe how they handle the pressure and organize the event quickly.
Evaluate: Adaptability under pressure.


8. Provide Feedback
After the test, share constructive feedback to gauge their ability to accept input and adjust their approach. This will help assess their openness to learning and improvement.

Communication

Maintaining a customer database with current information, and updating customer files

Keeping track of email for service requests.

title: CRM Specialist
description:
Location: Florida, 1542 Kingsley Avenue Suite 144 Orange Park, FL 32073

Type: Full Time

Experience: At least 3-5 years experience in a similar position. Experience with international company is preferred

Jobs' location is in Orange Park, FL. We accept applications for partial or full remote work.

PREFERS APPLICANTS IN THE PHILIPPINES

Record Retrieval Solution is a Florida-based company dealing with online medical records retrieval services.
As our company has been growing rapidly over the past years, we’re looking to develop our marketing organization and better manage sales opportunities and leads with optimized CRM Management capabilities.

The position will be the primary driver of leads and clients management and will have significant responsibility in running the company internal CRM system. This role ensures our CRM system's integrity, effectiveness, and continual optimization. 
The CRM Specialist will manage and support our CRM’s daily functions, streamline workflows, and ensure that data is accurate and readily available to enhance our team's and clients' experience.

This role involves quantifying and validating contacts from existing databases, reaching out to target companies and key individuals, and managing the data for targeted marketing campaigns via email and SMS. 
This role will be mentored and managed by the marketing manager and an external marketing strategist (fractional CMO, functional reporting).

CORE RESPONSIBILITIES (non-exhaustive list)
CRM Management & Optimization:
Maintain the CRM platform (Scale CRM) to support sales, marketing, and customer support teams.
Regularly evaluate CRM features and implement updates and customizations to meet evolving business needs.
Monitor data integrity and perform routine audits to ensure data accuracy.
Configure the CRM system according to business requirements. 
Customize features for lead management, customer tracking, and reporting.
Design a database structure that supports efficient data storage and retrieval.
Integrate existing data sources into the CRM system. 
Maintain data integrity through regular updates and quality checks.

Data Management, Analysis & Reporting:
Generate and analyze CRM reports to track customer interactions, sales performance, and campaign effectiveness.
Provide actionable insights to departments based on CRM data.
Data Validation and Updating
Quantify contacts from existing databases. 
Requalify and validate contact details to ensure current and accurate data.
Regularly update contact information as needed. 

User Support & Training:
Serve as the primary point of contact for CRM-related issues, providing troubleshooting and solutions as needed.
Conduct training sessions for new CRM users and ongoing sessions to update staff on new features and best practices.

Integration & Automation:
Work closely with the marketing team head and CMO to integrate the CRM with other tools and systems (e.g., Zapier, Gravity Forms, WordPress, etc.).
Create and manage automated workflows to enhance efficiency across departments.
Work closely with the team in charge of developing and maintaining the company client interface portal to ensure inter-connexion and bi-directional flow of data between both systems

Documentation & Compliance:
Maintain comprehensive documentation of CRM processes and customizations.
Ensure that CRM usage aligns with relevant data security, privacy regulations, and company policies.

New Data Acquisition and Outreach
Identify target companies, key individuals, and business development opportunities.
Potential contacts can be reached through email, phone, or social media to gather information. 
Populate the CRM with new, relevant contact data for future outreach.

Marketing Campaign Preparation
Segment contacts based on various criteria (industry, location, interest). 
Prepare and manage targeted marketing campaigns using email and SMS.
Track and report on the success of marketing campaigns. 

REQUIREMENTS / QUALIFICATIONS
Education & Experience:
Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Information Technology, or a related field.
3+ years of experience in CRM management, customer data analysis, or a similar role.

Technical Skills:
Proficiency in CRM platforms, preferably Scale or similar (e.g., Salesforce, HubSpot).
Solid understanding of CRM customization, database structures, and data integration techniques.
Familiarity with integration, API use and automation tools such as Zapier, Gravity Forms, and WordPress. 
Knowledge of data management and reporting tools; experience in generating actionable insights.
Basic knowledge of HTML, SQL, or data manipulation is a plus.

Data Management & Analytical Skills:
Strong experience in maintaining data integrity, validating contacts, and managing large datasets.
Ability to analyze CRM data and generate insights to drive marketing and sales strategies.
Experience with segmenting contact lists and managing targeted marketing campaigns.

Communication & Training Skills:
Strong verbal and written communication skills for collaborating with cross-functional teams with the ability to explain technical details to non-technical teaUpgrade to see actual infombers.
Experience in providing CRM user support, conducting training, and documenting processes.

Project Management & Problem-Solving Skills:
Demonstrated organizational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks effectively.
Proactive in troubleshooting, with a strong ability to identify issues and implement solutions.

Compliance & Documentation:
Understanding of data privacy regulations (e.g., HIPAA) and experience ensuring CRM compliance.
Ability to maintain accurate, detailed documentation of CRM configurations and processes.
Knowledge of medical records or healthcare industry practices is a plus.

Marketing Campaign Experience:
Hands-on experience in preparing and managing email and SMS marketing campaigns.
Familiarity with campaign performance metrics and ability to track and optimize outreach effectiveness.

Soft Skills:
Detail-oriented with a commitment to data accuracy and quality.
Team-oriented mindset and ability to work effectively with sales, marketing, and customer support departments.
Self-motivated and adaptable to evolving CRM requirements and system enhancements.

Benefits:
Paid time off
Paid holidays

Schedule:
8 hour shift

Work location:
Work Location: on site / partial remote / full remote accepted

ABOUT Record Retrieval Solutions:

Based in Florida and having developed strategic relationships with record management leaders and governing institutions across the United States, such as CIOX, MRO, and Scan-STAT, our record retrieval expertise spans the nation. 

As innovators of the medical record retrieval industry, with over 30 years of experience, we empower our employees to evolve with us and remain at the forefront of the record retrieval industry.

At RRS, we are constantly working to build positive relationships both internally and externally, as we believe quality relationships are the cornerstone of any successful business. Recruiting people who understand our values, are able to enhance our team dynamics, and work well with our clients is our top priority.

Our company culture is driven by principles such as initiative-taking, relationship-building, and continuous learning and growth. We are looking for self-starters who are constantly pushing themselves forward to succeed. If you are motivated to learn, have a can-do attitude, and identify with our values and company culture, then please reach out to us — our team may be the perfect fit for you.

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description:
We are seeking a talented and driven Digital Marketing Specialist to join our growing team. In this role, you will be responsible for creating, implementing, and optimising digital marketing campaigns that drive brand awareness, engagement, and conversions. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of digital marketing platforms, data analytics, and trends, with the ability to manage multiple projects and collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. Being apart of a newly established business the chosen applicant will have the opportunity to progress their career within the company and aid in the growth and progression of the business.

Key Responsibilities
Campaign Management: Plan, execute, and optimize digital marketing campaigns across various channels (e.g., social media, email, SEM, display advertising).
Content Creation: Develop engaging content for websites, blogs, social media, and email marketing campaigns to attract and engage target audiences.
SEO & SEM: Conduct keyword research and implement strategies for SEO (Search Engine Optimization) and SEM (Search Engine Marketing) to improve organic search rankings and paid search performance.
Social Media Strategy: Develop and manage social media strategies to build brand presence and engage with target audiences on platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, and Twitter. 
Email Marketing: Design and implement email marketing campaigns, including creating newsletters, promotional emails, and customer engagement sequences.
Analytics & Reporting: Monitor, analyze, and report on the performance of digital marketing campaigns using tools like Google Analytics, Google Ads, social media insights, etc. Provide actionable insights to improve campaign effectiveness.
A/B Testing: Run A/B tests on ads, landing pages, and email campaigns to improve conversion rates and customer engagement.
Collaboration: Work closely with design, content, and sales teams to ensure alignment between digital marketing strategies and company objectives.
Website Design, creation and upkeep - Build & Maintain the companys website to reflect the core values, aim and passion of the business.
Required Skills & Qualifications
Experience: Minimum of 2-3 years of experience in digital marketing, with hands-on experience in SEO, SEM, email marketing, social media, and content management.
Technical Skills: Proficiency in digital marketing tools (e.g., Google Analytics, Google Ads, SEMrush, Hootsuite, Mailchimp, HubSpot, etc.).
SEO & SEM: Strong knowledge of SEO best practices and paid search strategies.
Analytical Thinking: Ability to analyze and interpret data to drive decisions and optimize campaigns.
Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills; ability to create compelling content and reports.
Creativity: Ability to think outside the box and develop innovative digital marketing strategies.
Project Management: Strong organizational and multitasking skills, with the ability to meet deadlines and manage multiple projects.

Preferred Qualifications
Knowledge of design tools such as Adobe Photoshop, Canva, or other graphic design software.
Experience with influencer marketing and partnerships.
Familiarity with marketing automation platforms.

Education
Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, Business, or related field or similiar.

title: Project Manger / Task Wrangler for WordPress Projects
description:
Quick Job Summary:
You’ll juggle tasks, coordinate projects, and ensure smooth communication internally and with our clients.

Location:
Remote

Job Type:
Part-Time (2-3 hours per day, M-F)

Payment Type:
Salary: $7/hour USD



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:

### Job Responsibilities: 

Are you ready to juggle tasks, keep the team on track, and delight our customers? Here's what you'll be doing:

1. **Inbox Superhero:** Keep our customer support inbox tidy and organized, swiftly triaging requests and questions like a pro.

2. **Timeline Whisperer:** Make sure our customers know exactly what to expect and when by setting clear, friendly expectations about our deliverables.

3. **Quick Win Achiever:** If something quick and easy lands in your wheelhouse, tackle it and score those small victories!

4. **Task Distributor Extraordinaire:** Assign tasks to our development team with precision and clarity to keep projects moving smoothly.

5. **Quality Assurance Champion:** Follow up on assigned tasks, ensuring the work is done to your specs and ready for the spotlight.

6. **Delivery Pro:** Be the friendly face delivering completed work to our clients, wrapping up each task with a bow.

7. **Customer Listener:** Dive into our customers' emails, read between the lines, and ask smart questions to truly understand their needs (even when it’s not exactly what they’re asking for).

8. **Project Juggler:** Manage a whirlwind of ongoing tasks using our project management tools, keeping everything on track and prioritized.

9. **Accountability Partner:** Stay on top of task timelines, nudge developers for updates, and hold them accountable for meeting deadlines.

10. **Problem Solver:** Spot a blocker or unanswered question? Escalate them internally and make sure nothing falls through the cracks.

Join us in keeping projects on track, clients happy, and our team running like a well-oiled machine. Let’s build amazing WordPress solutions together!




### Professional Development

**Stay Curious:** Pursue professional development opportunities to sharpen your WordPress skills. We’ll usually foot the bill for training and other resources to help you grow.
**Find Your Fit:** Seek out learning opportunities that excite you—we’ll also share recommendations and often attend the same trainings as a team.
**Keep Up:** Stay in the loop with high-level WordPress news and trends to ensure you’re always ahead of the curve.

### Sharing & Training

**Spread the Knowledge:** Share what you learn with your teammates using our project management tool. Whether it’s a quick note or a detailed screencast, your insights will make a difference.
**Teach and Empower:** Create engaging “how-to” video screencasts to guide teammates and customers when appropriate.
**Lead the Way:** Train teammates on best practices and contribute to the continuous improvement of our internal processes.
**Collaborate with Purpose:** Work together with the team to refine and enhance our workflows, making our agency even more awesome.

### Daily Communication (via Our Project Management App)

**Stay Connected:** Most customer communication will happen over email, but internal communication lives in our project management app.
**Be Visual:** Use quick video screencasts when written updates won’t cut it—they’re great for explaining ideas and resolving issues.
**Report Progress:** Send daily status updates outlining what you’ve accomplished, any questions you have, and blockers you’re facing. These updates are crucial for our globally distributed team.
**Be Responsive:** Regularly reply to to-dos assigned to you, updating their progress, asking questions, or flagging issues as needed.

### Time Logging

**Track Wisely:** Log all your work time in our simple time management software. We trust your judgment on how you spend your time—no micromanagement here.
**Strategic Insights:** Your time logs help us ensure resources are allocated effectively and that we’re making smart strategic decisions.
**Stay Calm:** We aim for a calm and balanced work environment. Check out our philosophy: [tobycryns.com/calm-company/](https://tobycryns.com/calm-company/).
**Collaborate for Success:** Work with teammates to meet timelines and deliverables. Use your influence to gather support and keep projects on track.

### You’ve Got This

**Own Your Role:** Take ownership of your work. If something is blocking your progress, let us know, ask for what you need, and escalate if necessary.
**Ask & Explore:** Regularly ask questions and dive into your work-related curiosities to keep growing and improving.
**Be Human:** We know you have a life outside of work. As long as you deliver on the expectations you set, you’ll thrive with us.
**Manage Your To-Dos:** Create and organize your task lists in our project management tool, ensuring everything gets done as promised.
**Advocate for Success:** Influence teammates and champion your tasks to ensure everything stays on schedule.

### Requirements

** Exceptional written communication skills—your words will be your greatest asset.
** High-level spoken English proficiency for the occasional recorded screencast or customer call.
** Stellar analytical, organizational, and time management abilities.
** The ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a team setting.

### Time Expectations & Weekly Google Meet Calls

**Flexible Hours:** Work approximately 2-3 hours per day (10-15 hours per week) whenever it fits your schedule.
**Monthly Check-Ins:** Join a monthly Google Meet call for up to 1 hour during the 9am-5pm CST timeframe. It could be a quick 5-minute sync or a full hour, but it’ll never exceed that time.
**Proactive Meetings:** If you feel more collaboration is needed for a specific project, advocate for and schedule additional calls as necessary.
**Occasional Customer Calls:** Sometimes, you’ll need to schedule calls with customers to clarify details or resolve confusion. These calls will also fall within the 9am-5pm CST window.

We’re excited to see what you bring to the table and how you’ll help us create amazing WordPress solutions!



How to Apply:
Interested candidates are invited to apply directly here on OnlineJobs.ph.  Submit a resume and cover letter outlining why you feel like you'll be a great fit for the job.  


Note:
The Mighty Mo! is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage applications from candidates of all backgrounds and experiences.



About Us:
The Mighty Mo! is an established WordPress marketing agency based in Minneapolis, MN, USA. We're a growing 3-person company seeking a part-time Project Managerl to join our fully-remote team. We are looking for an individual who is eager to deliver amazing experiences to our loyal customers.  Learn more about how we work here: themightymo.com/why/

title: Executive Virtual Operations Assistant
description:
Job Title: Executive Virtual Operations Assistant

TO APPLY FOR THE JOB, GO TO: https://forms.gle/cp96TiBBpbNWzdN76 

 - INTRODUCTION TO SERAYA - 

Seraya is a premium holiday home company in Dubai, striving to be the Aman Resorts of the holiday home space by blending the comfort of private residences with the sophistication of five-star hospitality. 
- Website: www.serayastays.com
- Instagram handle: @SerayaStays

- JOB DESCRIPTION - 
As Seraya grows, we are looking for a dedicated and experienced Executive Virtual Operations Assistant to take on a pivotal role in managing and optimizing our operations. This position offers the opportunity to contribute meaningfully to a high-growth, premium environment where your expertise will enhance guest experiences, streamline property management processes, and develop efficient systems to support our expansion. You will work closely with the executive team, ensuring our operations run smoothly while upholding the highest standards of service in Dubai’s premium holiday home market.

This role is structured in phases to ensure a clear and impactful progression. In Phase 1, you will focus on establishing the foundation for streamlined operations, including booking management, property logistics, and the development of standard operating procedures (SOPs). As you transition into Phase 2, your responsibilities will expand to encompass guest service coordination, onboarding and training future VAs, and analyzing performance metrics to drive continuous improvement. Through both phases, you will play a vital role in supporting daily operations and contributing to Seraya's growth and success.


 - KEY RESPONSIBILITIES - 

Phase 1 - Immediate Responsibilities:

Booking Management
- Coordinate check-in and check-out processes to ensure a seamless guest experience.
- Register guests with the Dubai Department of Tourism and Commerce Marketing (DTCM) and relevant building management teams as required.
- Enter guest information into CRM systems 

Financial Tasks
- Oversee expense management, maintaining accurate expenditure records including receipts/invoices.
- Produce monthly financial reports for performance tracking.
- Handle payment processing, including paying invoices and issuing refunds.
- Listing Optimization
- Update property descriptions, amenities, and photos for optimal platform appeal.

Building Back-End Systems
- Develop communication templates to ensure consistency and professionalism in all guest interactions.
- Create and enhance standard operating procedures (SOPs) for key operations, including housekeeping, maintenance, guest registration, and other essential tasks.
- Implement additional backend systems to streamline processes and boost operational efficiency.
Operations
- Schedule cleanings between guest stays and coordinate with housekeeping.
- Coordinate with contractors for repairs and maintenance issues.
- Manage ordering and restocking of essential supplies.
- Monitor property condition by reviewing cleaner reports and addressing any concerns.

Executive Team Assistance
- Provide troubleshooting support and general administrative assistance to the executive team.
- Support special projects, urgent tasks, and other leadership priorities.
- Collaborate on internal process improvements, suggesting adjustments to meet operational goals.


Phase 2 - Gradual Onboarding of Additional Responsibilities

Guest Communication and Service Coordination
- Handle all guest inquiries, excluding price negotiations. 
- Manage lifestyle service requests, such as car rentals, nanny services, and private tours.
- Hiring and Training Future VAs
- Assist in recruiting and training new VAs, and developing onboarding resources.
- Mentor new hires to ensure consistency in guest service and operations.
- Data and Performance Analysis
- Track KPIs related to bookings, guest satisfaction, and property upkeep.
- Provide insights based on performance data and support executive decision-making.
- Enhanced Executive Support
- Collaborate with the executive team on high-level projects and strategic initiatives.
- Serve as a liaison between the executive team and the VA team, ensuring smooth task delegation.


- REQUIREMENTS - 

- Essential Qualifications 
- Leadership Experience: Proven track record of managing teams with strong leadership and organizational abilities.
- Operational Expertise: Exceptional planning, scheduling, and management skills, with keen attention to detail and the ability to multitask effectively.
- Technical Proficiency: Skilled in using digital tools for property management, guest communication, and team coordination, 
including:
  - Airbnb
  - QuickBooks
  - PMS platforms (e.g., Hostaway, Guesty)
  - Excel or Google Sheets for database management and KPI tracking.
- Communication Skills: Fluent in English, with exceptional written and verbal communication abilities.
- Professional Experience: Minimum 3+ years in holiday home management or similar roles, ideally within startups or small companies.
- Work Ethic: Self-motivated, detail-oriented, and capable of working independently in a fast-paced environment.
- Availability: flexible to work 40 hours per week during standard Dubai office hours, with the willingness to accommodate occasional ad hoc requests on weekends when necessary.

Preferred Qualifications
- Industry Knowledge: Experience with holiday home operations in Dubai and familiarity with local regulations and trends.
- Performance Optimization: Expertise in creating performance reports from PMS systems and Airbnb data.
- Procurement Skills: Experience in vendor negotiation, procurement, and building credit relationships.
- Platform Mastery: Proven ability to create and optimize Airbnb listings, with a history of achieving Superhost status.
- Technical Proficiency: Skilled in using digital tools for property management, guest communication, and team coordination, including:
  - Notion
  - Canva
  - Pricelabs 
  - AirDNA
  - Project Management tools 


 - PAY STRUCTURE - 

Base Pay:
- Monthly Salary: $1,213 
- Hourly Rate: $7 per hour
- Required hours per week: 40 
- Required Hours: We are seeking a full-time employee to work approximately 40 hours per week, Monday to Friday, with the flexibility to handle occasional ad hoc requests on weekends if absolutely necessary.

Onboarding Bonus:
- A $250 bonus will be awarded upon successful completion of the one-month probation period.

Incentive Structure for Phase 2:
- Monthly Salary:  $1,386
- Hourly Rate: $8 per hour
- Additional bonus: Additionally, bonuses may be awarded based on the achievement of Key Performance Indicators (KPIs), which will be defined at a later stage.

TO APPLY FOR THE JOB, GO TO: https://forms.gle/cp96TiBBpbNWzdN76

description:

title: Email Marketer - Cold Email Specialist (Commission-Based)
description:
We are looking for a driven and skilled Email Marketer to join our team on a commission-based structure. Your primary responsibility will be to build email lists, execute cold email campaigns, and convert prospects into paying customers for our premium fitness program, Fit Fierce Forever.

Responsibilities:
Research and gather high-quality, targeted email leads within the fitness and wellness niche.
Write and execute engaging cold email campaigns tailored to our target audience.
Manage follow-ups and convert leads into sales via email communication.
Analyze campaign data to optimize performance and improve conversion rates.
Independently choose and set up the tools required for email marketing and automation.
Target Audience:
Men over 30 located in the United States, United Kingdom, Canada, Ireland, Australia, and New Zealand who are looking for efficient home fitness solutions.

Requirements:
Proven track record in cold email marketing, lead generation, and email list building.
Strong copywriting skills with a focus on persuasive communication.
Ability to work independently and meet ambitious sales targets.
Experience with setting up and using email automation tools (candidates must provide their own tools, e.g., Mailchimp, ActiveCampaign, GMass).
Strong understanding of compliance and best practices in cold emailing 
Bonus: Knowledge of the fitness/wellness industry.
Compensation:
$150 commission per sale generated through email campaigns.
Unlimited earning potential based on your performance.
About Fit Fierce Forever:
Fit Fierce Forever is a premium fitness program designed for busy men over 30 who want to build muscle and stay fit without spending hours in the gym. The program includes easy-to-follow meal plans and home workouts (3x per week) that require no equipment. Join us in empowering individuals to achieve their fitness goals on their own terms.

Why Join Us?
Flexible, remote work opportunity.
High commission structure with no earning cap.
A chance to work with a growing fitness brand and make a real impact.

title: E-commerce Product Lead with Expertise in Bulk Uploads, Product Edits and Imports
description:
We are a growing company with 3 E-commerce stores seeking an experienced and tech-savvy Product Leadr to join our dynamic team and contribute to our growing businesses. This is a full-time position.

PLEASE READ THE ENTIRE JOB DESCRIPTION AND ANSWER ALL QUESTIONS FOR YOUR APPLICATION TO BE CONSIDERED.

This role demands extremely high attention to detail, a patient demeanor, and a meticulous approach. The ideal candidate must also have proficient English writing and speaking skills as occasional communication with vendors via email, chat, or phone will be required.

Work hours will align with U.S. business hours. Training is provided and compensated. There will be an initial 1-month trial period.

The candidate will be expected to handle the following tasks:

• Manage and Maintain Product Information:
- Uploading new products
- Updating existing product listings with accurate information
- Coordinating with new and existing vendors for product details, ordering processes, lead times, etc.
-Maintaining accurate product and vendor databases

• Research, Analysis, and Optimization:
- Researching new and relevant products/brands
- Monitoring product performance, sales metrics, and customer feedback
- Using data insights to make recommendations for listing optimizations and business strategies

• Technical Expertise and Enhancement:
- Making mass uploads and changes to products on Shopify (e.g., pricing, descriptions)
- Optimize listings for product rankings, conversion rates, and sales growth.
- Quality-checking images, titles, and descriptions for accuracy
- Website coding experience (advantageous)

• Collaboration and Communication:
- Manage 3 stores, and lead a team of 1-2 VAs.
- Collaborate with the team to resolve product and website issues.
- Work directly with manufacturers/vendors for product issues/questions

• Inventory Management and Operations:
- Overseeing inventory reconciliation and efficient tracking of stock levels
- Documentation and Record-Keeping:
- Creating and maintaining up-to-date records of SOPs, listing performance, and product details

• Other basic operations and administrative tasks

Qualifications:
• Work experience as a Product Manager
• Minimum of 2 years’ Product Management experience in an E-commerce company
• Proven expertise in Shopify. Being a Shopify Certified Developer will be an advantage.
• Advanced knowledge of MS Excel and Google Suite software (Google Sheets, Google Docs, etc.)
• Write mushroom in your application to show your attention to detail
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English
• Highly organized, detail-oriented, and good analytical skills with an ability to meet deadlines

Other preferred experience includes:
• Airtable
• ClickUp
• Website scraping tools

Communication and meetings will be primarily conducted through voice chat (Google Meet) and Slack.

Before we proceed, here are a few things we'd like to confirm:
• Payments will be made weekly for the first four weeks starting from the third week of employment, and then bi-monthly every other Tuesday.
• Your work schedule will consist of 40 hours per week
• Your working hours will be from 9 PM to 6 AM (or 10 PM to 7 PM), PHT, with a 1-hour break, five days a week
• You’ll need to send an End of Shift (EOS) report every day, covering the following:
a. What did you do today? (detailed description)
b. What issues did you run into?
c. Is there anything I can help you with?

If you're okay with the above, please reply with "I AGREE TO ALL TERMS" and answer the following questions in complete sentences, using proper grammar and punctuation (please answer in number format instead of in paragraphs):

1. What is your previous experience with managing products for E-commerce companies?
2. Please provide a list of tools or software you have utilized in previous roles for product management. For each tool, include details on its specific functions (such as web scraping or bulk upload) and briefly describe how you applied it in your work.
3. How large of a team have you managed before?
4. Have you worked with Shopify before?
5. Are you currently engaged in another job or commitment?
6. How fast is your internet?
7. Do you have a reliable computer?
8. How often do you experience power outages and internet issues?
9. What backups do you have in case of power outages?
10. What backups do you have in case of internet outages?

Please carefully review the entire job description and also use this format as your subject line when replying to this post: “Your First Name + I Am Your Product Manager" (e.g. Kevin - I Am Your Product Manager). Please also include your resume.

AI-generated responses will not be considered.

title: Game Analyst
description:
Job Title: Game Analyst – Ronin Blockchain

Location: Cebu or Leyte, Philippines (Preferred)

About the Role

We are seeking a dynamic and analytical **Game Analyst** to join our team, focusing on the rapidly growing Ronin blockchain gaming ecosystem. This role is pivotal in identifying, evaluating, and providing actionable insights on emerging games to support informed investment decisions and enhance content strategies.

Key Responsibilities

Game Research and Evaluation

- Conduct detailed assessments of new and upcoming games on the Ronin blockchain to identify high-potential projects.
- Play and analyze games to gather key metrics, user feedback, and gameplay insights.
- Develop a tiered evaluation system (e.g., A, B, C, D) to prioritize games for further research and potential investment.

Collaboration with Game Development Teams

- Engage with game developers to gather insights about their projects, including roadmaps, features, and investment opportunities.
- Build strong relationships with local developers and gaming communities to stay informed on the latest trends and releases.

Data Analysis and Strategic Recommendations

- Collect and analyze data on player metrics, game performance, and market trends to assess the viability of gaming projects.
- Prepare reports and present actionable recommendations to stakeholders for strategic decision-making.

Content Writing and Marketing Support

- Write and publish **weekly content pieces** focusing on Ronin Network games, including reviews, industry updates, and analytical insights.
- Collaborate with the marketing team to ensure content aligns with branding and strategic goals.
- Contribute to social media posts or articles highlighting key findings and game analyses.

---

Qualifications

Must-Have Skills:

- Strong passion for gaming, with familiarity or experience in blockchain-based games, particularly within the Ronin ecosystem.
- Excellent analytical skills to evaluate games based on qualitative and quantitative factors.
- Strong communication skills to collaborate with development teams and present findings effectively.
- Residing in Cebu or Leyte, Philippines, with a strong network or familiarity with the local gaming community.

Preferred Experience:

- Background in game testing, analysis, or blockchain-related roles.
- Knowledge of Ronin games such as **Axie Infinity, Lumetera, Kydro, or Pixel Heroes** is an advantage.
- Experience with market trend analysis and data visualization is a plus.

---

What We Offer

- The opportunity to work at the forefront of blockchain gaming investments.
- A supportive and innovative work environment that fosters growth and collaboration.
- Competitive compensation with opportunities for career advancement.

---

How to Apply

If you are passionate about gaming and blockchain technology, we’d love to hear from you! Please send your **resume** and a **brief cover letter** detailing your interest and experience to Upgrade to see actual info

title: FULL STACK DEVELOPER
description:
Welcome, Applicants!
Work Hours: Full-time, 40 hours/ week, EST (North York, ON)
Yearly Compensation: $30k to $33k USD per year (based on experience)
Employment Type: Independent Contractor - Remote


About the Job
Our client specializes in strategically placing Digital Billboards in unique locations and aims to become the leading provider of On-Demand Portable Digital Billboards. Their innovative approach and cutting-edge interactive products set them apart in the industry. They are looking for a skilled Full Stack Developer who is passionate about creating scalable, high-quality web applications that power their digital signage solutions. The ideal candidate is an enthusiastic developer with a knack for both front-end and back-end technologies, thriving in an environment that celebrates creativity and innovation. This role includes substantial upside and growth potential.

Key Responsibilities:
-Contribute to the development and maintenance of scalable web applications using React, Next JS, and Tailwind, CSS, ensuring high-quality user interfaces for our digital  signage products.
- Assist in implementing responsive UI/UX designs that are intuitive and enhance the interactive experiences of our digital signage solutions.
- Write robust and maintainable NodeJS code for server-side logic under the guidance of our development team.
- Support the management of Linux-based (Ubuntu) server environments to guarantee  smooth deployment and operational consistency of our applications.
- Aid in configuring and optimizing NGINX servers to improve the delivery and performance of our applications.
- Utilize Docker to help containerize applications, facilitating consistent development, testing, and production workflows.
- Use git for version control, collaborating on branch management, pull requests, and resolving merge conflicts as part of the team.
- Assist in deploying applications to cloud platforms like GCP, AWS, and Vercel, contributing to the high availability and scalability of our services.
- Help design, develop, and maintain Postgres databases, or work with Supabase as a backend service, to support efficient data management.
- Collaborate with the team to contribute to the definition, design, and release of new features, with an emphasis on user engagement through gamification.
- Maintain code integrity and contribute to the organization, helping to ensure applications are performant, high-quality, and responsive across various digital  signage platforms.
- Provide support in technical troubleshooting for our applications, ensuring reliable operation across different digital signage formats.
- Participate in gamification initiatives, applying creative techniques to increase interactivity and repeat usage within our digital signage offerings.
- Assist with the process of reskinning HTML-based games to meet brand guidelines and client needs, facilitating the creation of tailored interactive experiences

Requirements:
- Proficient in front-end technologies, specifically React, NextJS, and TailwindCSS.
- Strong experience with backend development using NodeJS.
- Comfortable working with Linux environments, particularly Ubuntu.
- Experience configuring and managing NGINX servers.
- Proficient in Docker for containerization and orchestration of microservices.
- In-depth knowledge of git and best practices for version control.
- Familiarity with cloud services (GCP, AWS, Vercel) and managing scalable cloud-based applications.
- Experience with relational databases, preferably Postgres, and/or experience with Supabase.
- Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work both independently and as part of a team.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with digital signage or interactive displays is a plus.
- Familiarity with networking, security, and maintenance of production systems.
- Contributions to open-source projects or a public portfolio of projects.

 Bonus Points:
- Proficiency in additional programming languages such as Python, Go, or C++ is highly valued, as these skills can contribute to new feature developments.
- Experience with IoT (Internet of Things) development is especially relevant to our product line and will be considered a significant asset

Start date: As soon as possible

Please apply only if you have the necessary must-haves. Applicants must meet the minimum qualifications to be considered for the role. We are prepared to offer an attractive salary to the successful candidate

Job Overview

We are seeking dedicated and proactive individuals for various Property Management roles within our organization. Whether you are Property Manager, Assistant Property Manager, Admin & Executive Assistants, Maintenance Coordinator, Leasing Coordinator, Tenant Screener, and HOA Specialist, we have a place for you. 

Ideal candidates will be responsible for ensuring our properties are well-maintained, fully occupied, and operating efficiently. Strong communication skills, attention to detail, and the ability to manage multiple tasks are essential for all positions.

Key Roles:

Property Manager

Property Maintenance: Oversee maintenance and repair activities, ensuring properties are well-maintained and issues are promptly resolved.
Tenant Relations: Act as the primary point of contact for tenants, addressing their concerns and needs, and ensuring high levels of tenant satisfaction.
Leasing and Marketing: Manage the leasing process, including advertising vacancies, showing properties, screening applicants, and preparing lease agreements.
Financial Management: Oversee the financial performance of the properties, including budgeting, rent collection, expense management, and financial reporting.
Compliance: Ensure properties comply with local, state, and federal regulations, including safety standards and fair housing laws.
Vendor Management: Negotiate and manage contracts with service providers, including maintenance, landscaping, security, and cleaning services.
Record Keeping: Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of property transactions, tenant information, maintenance activities, and financial reports.
Strategic Planning: Develop and implement strategies to maximize property occupancy, enhance property value, and improve operational efficiency.

Assistant Property Manager

Support: Assist the Property Manager with daily operations, including tenant relations, maintenance coordination, and financial management.
Tenant Communication: Handle tenant inquiries and follow up on maintenance requests.
Leasing Support: Assist with leasing activities, including showing properties and processing lease agreements.
Administrative Duties: Perform administrative tasks such as preparing reports, managing records, and coordinating meetings.

Admin & Executive Assistants

Administrative Support: Provide administrative support to the property management team, including scheduling, correspondence, and documentation.
Office Management: Oversee office operations, manage supplies, and ensure a well-organized work environment.
Executive Assistance: Support executives with calendar management, travel arrangements, and special projects.

Maintenance Coordinator

Maintenance Scheduling: Plan and schedule regular maintenance activities to ensure properties remain in excellent condition.
Vendor Coordination: Liaise with external service providers for repairs, maintenance, and inspections.
Work Order Management: Track and manage work orders, ensuring timely and efficient resolution of maintenance issues.
Inventory Management: Maintain an inventory of maintenance supplies and equipment, ensuring adequate stock levels.

Leasing Coordinator

Leasing Process: Manage the leasing process from start to finish, including advertising vacancies, showing properties, and processing applications.
Lease Agreements: Prepare, review, and finalize lease agreements, ensuring all terms and conditions are met.
Move-In Coordination: Facilitate the move-in process, ensuring tenants have a smooth transition into their new homes.

Tenant Screener

Application Processing: Review and process rental applications, conducting thorough background and credit checks.
Screening: Interview prospective tenants to ensure they meet the company's criteria.
Record Keeping: Maintain accurate records of tenant applications and screening results.

HOA Specialist

HOA Management: Manage homeowner association (HOA) operations, including coordinating meetings, enforcing rules, and addressing member concerns.
Financial Oversight: Oversee HOA finances, including budgeting, dues collection, and financial reporting.
Community Relations: Foster positive relationships within the community, addressing resident concerns and organizing community events.

Qualifications

Experience: Minimum of 1 year of experience in property management or a related field, depending on the specific role.
Skills: Strong organizational, communication, and negotiation skills. Proficiency in property management software such as AppFolio, Buildium, Vantaca, etc.
Certifications: Relevant certifications such as Certified Property Manager (CPM) are a plus.
Knowledge: Understanding of property management laws and regulations, financial management, leasing processes, and maintenance operations.

Personal Attributes

Detail-Oriented: High attention to detail and accuracy in managing property-related tasks.
Problem-Solver: Ability to identify and resolve issues efficiently and effectively.
Customer-Focused: Strong commitment to providing excellent customer service to tenants and property owners.
Team Player: Ability to work collaboratively with team members, vendors, and other stakeholders.
Time Management: Excellent time management skills with the ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines.

HOW TO APPLY: Kindly apply through our career page: https://www.careers-page.com/our-assistants/job/QV7R5RY8
