title: Automation Specialist & Lead Generation Expert (Remote)
description:
Job Title: Automation Specialist & Lead Generation Expert (Remote)

Company Overview:
We are an agency that provides solutions in the business, education, and wellness sectors. Our mission is to empower entrepreneurs and clients by streamlining operations, enhancing visibility, and driving growth through strategic solutions in automation, lead generation, and marketing.

Position Overview:
We are seeking a skilled Automation Specialist & Lead Generation Expert to join our remote team. This role focuses on creating and managing automations (e.g., Zapier), generating qualified leads, and crafting compelling sales and marketing copy. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of automation tools, lead generation strategies, and effective copywriting techniques to support sales and marketing initiatives.

Key Responsibilities:
 • Set up, manage, and optimize automation workflows using tools like Zapier to improve business efficiency
 • Identify and implement lead generation strategies to grow the sales pipeline
 • Write persuasive and effective sales and marketing copy for emails, landing pages, ads, and other content
 • Monitor and analyze lead generation campaigns, providing insights and recommendations for improvement
 • Collaborate with the team to align automation processes with marketing and sales goals
 • Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to automation workflows
 • Stay updated on the latest tools, trends, and strategies in automation, lead generation, and copywriting

Qualifications:
 • Proven experience with automation tools such as Zapier, Make (formerly Integromat), or similar platforms
 • Strong knowledge of lead generation techniques and tools (e.g., LinkedIn, email campaigns, CRM tools)
 • Excellent sales and marketing copywriting skills with a portfolio of previous work
 • Strong analytical skills to measure and optimize campaign performance
 • Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines consistently
 • Strong attention to detail and problem-solving skills
 • Excellent communication and collaboration abilities
 • Experience working in a remote environment is a plus

Application Process:
To apply for this position, candidates MUST complete all three of the following steps:
 1. Submit a resume outlining your relevant experience.
 2. Submit a portfolio showcasing examples of your work, including automation workflows, lead generation strategies, and sales/marketing copy.
 3. Submit a link to a newly created video introduction where you:
 • State the current date (to verify it’s a new video).
 • Explain why you are the perfect fit for this role.
 • Provide a brief overview of your experience in automation, lead generation, and sales/marketing copy.

Please Note:
 • Do not apply if you do not complete all requirements as described above.
 • Old video introductions or videos that do not include the required components will not be considered.

We are excited to see how your expertise can help optimize our processes, attract new leads, and drive sales for our clients!

title: Data Cleansing / Data Formatting – 100% Work From Home, Day Shift!
description:
Work Schedule:
Hours: Day shift! Part-time (minimum 2 hours per day)
Pay: PhP 200 per hour
Location: Anywhere in the Philippines – work from home, remote, or province
Work Type: 100% Work From Home

About the Work:
Are you an experienced Data Cleansing / Data Formatting specialist looking for an exciting new career opportunity with a work-from-home lifestyle? Join a leading data science organization and take advantage of this excellent opportunity. We connect top talent with top companies, and this role is perfect for individuals passionate about advancing their careers, gaining international experience, delighting our client, and enjoying the benefits of working from home.

About the Company:
Our client is a leader in their field, dedicated to providing exceptional services to their clients. They value innovation, efficiency, and client satisfaction and understand the crucial role this position plays in achieving their objectives.

Duties and Responsibilities:
Data Review and Validation: Examine data for accuracy, consistency, and completeness. Identify and correct errors or inconsistencies.
Data Cleansing: Remove duplicate records, standardize data formats, and rectify inaccuracies in datasets.
Data Formatting: Convert data into a standard format suitable for analysis or reporting. Ensure data is organized and structured according to project requirements.
Data Integration: Merge data from various sources into a unified format and ensure compatibility.
Documentation: Maintain detailed records of data cleansing processes, methodologies, and changes made.
Quality Assurance: Implement and follow data quality standards and practices. Conduct regular audits to ensure data accuracy.
Collaboration: Work with other teams, such as data analysts, data scientists, or IT departments, to understand data requirements and address issues.
Reporting: Generate and present reports on data quality, cleansing progress, and formatting results.
Troubleshooting: Identify and resolve data-related issues or anomalies. Provide solutions to improve data quality.

Qualifications:
Education: Typically a degree in a related field such as Computer Science, Information Systems, Mathematics, or Statistics. Relevant certifications are a plus.
Experience: Previous experience in data entry, data management, or a related role. Familiarity with data cleansing tools or software is advantageous.

Technical Skills:
Proficiency in data management and analysis tools (e.g., Excel, SQL, Python, R)
Experience with data cleansing and formatting software (e.g., Talend, Informatica, OpenRefine)
Knowledge of database management systems (DBMS) and data integration technologies
Attention to Detail: Strong focus on accuracy and precision in data handling
Analytical Skills: Ability to analyze data and identify trends or patterns that may require cleansing or formatting
Communication Skills: Clear and effective communication skills to document processes and collaborate with team members
Problem-Solving Skills: Ability to troubleshoot data issues and implement effective solutions
Organizational Skills: Efficiently manage and prioritize tasks to meet deadlines

title: EXECUTIVE ASSISTANT
description:
About the Role:

We are seeking a highly organized and proactive Executive Assistant to join our fast-growing finance broking business in Australia. This is a dynamic role where you’ll have the flexibility to support the team across various functions, including client onboarding, data entry, filing, scheduling, and much more. You’ll work directly with the lead broker, to help free up at least 10 hours per week while also supporting other brokers as the business rapidly expands. This is an excellent opportunity for someone who thrives in a fast-paced environment, is detail-oriented, and can anticipate needs before they arise.

Key Responsibilities:

Client Onboarding & Support: Manage client onboarding, liaise with clients, banks, and brokers.
Data Entry & Filing: Handle basic filing, data entry, and create templates (Word, Excel, SOPs, etc.).
Support Broker Operations: Assist with residential mortgages and admin for brokers.
Scheduling & Travel: Manage appointments, travel arrangements (twice a month), and minutes of meetings.
Marketing & Social Media: Help refresh the brand, organize business cards, templates, and graphics. Support marketing efforts and social media management.
Automation & CRM: Use tools like CRM systems, BizConnect, Adobe, Outlook, and more. Help automate tasks between Outlook and CRM (Zapier integration).
Process Improvement: Create processes to streamline daily tasks and ensure efficiency as the company continues to grow.
What We Are Looking For:

Experience in a fast-paced environment, especially within financial or brokerage settings.
Ability to create templates, manage schedules, and handle client onboarding with attention to detail.
Strong organizational skills and the ability to anticipate the client's needs and preferences.
Comfortable with CRM systems, automation tools (e.g., Zapier), and office software (Word, Excel, Teams).
Experience with marketing, branding, and social media management is a plus.
A proactive, action-oriented mindset, willing to give opinions and keep the client accountable.
AI knowledge is a bonus, as we explore new tools for efficiency.
Not afraid to take charge, with experience managing multiple tasks and priorities.

Monthly Salary: PHP 45,000

Apply through this link: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeYwhqUdiaAozgjlPPNRfZZYMxxt_aOyW0l7JL4xjxvLzMUwA/viewform

title: Shopify Web Project Manager
description:
We are on the lookout for a Web Services Manager who can steer their web initiatives to new heights and lead projects that make a real difference. This role is all about blending big-picture strategy with hands-on development, ensuring every project not only meets but exceeds expectations. With the power to shape the future of their web team and deliver top-notch, business-aligned solutions, this is a unique opportunity to be the driving force behind their digital success. Ready to lead, innovate, and make your mark?


What’s in it for you? 

 Leadership that’s Got Your Back - Full support from a leadership team that’s invested in your success.
Collaborative Culture - Work closely with talented designers and team members—never feel silo’ed.
 Endless Growth - Your achievements will be recognized, and your career growth actively encouraged.
 Shape Your Future - Autonomy to create the role and department you envision. Take control of your career path!
Score Big Bonuses - Enjoy the potential for four-figure bonuses annually.
 Innovate & Lead - Bring your ideas to life in a high-growth environment where your voice matters.
 Be a Game Changer - Make a lasting impact in a company that’s all about setting trends and raising the bar.


Your responsibilities include:

Project Management

>Task Delegation: Manage the delegation of tasks to team members and freelance talent, aligning assignments with project needs, current workflows, and individual skill sets.
>Team Feedback & Direction: Provide continuous feedback and clear direction to ensure all work aligns with company standards and meets client expectations.
>Technical Guidance: Offer technical guidance and direction for web development projects, ensuring adherence to industry best practices and company standards.
>Phase Transition Management: Oversee the seamless handoff between project phases, ensuring that all technical requirements are thoroughly documented and communicated to the relevant teams.

Project Execution & Technical Oversight
>Technical & Development Expertise: Utilize a deep understanding of technical and developmental processes to manage projects effectively, while also participating in hands-on development when necessary to ensure high-quality web solutions.

Familiarity with the Following is a Requirement for the Role:
UX/UI Knowledge
Web Development
Coding
Page-Building
Shopify (Page Building)

Client & Stakeholder Management
>Primary Point of Contact: Serve as the primary point of contact for all web-related inquiries and requests, providing expert guidance on technical matters such as code setup and webpage theming.
>Collaboration with Project Managers: Work closely with the Web Project Manager to review creative briefs, delegate tasks to developers, and adjust timelines to meet project goals.

Quality Assurance
>Testing & QA Processes: Implement and maintain rigorous testing and quality assurance processes for all projects, ensuring the highest standards of work are consistently met.
>Development Review: Review and provide detailed feedback on all development work before it is submitted to the Project Manager or Brand Manager for final approval.

Process Improvement
>Efficiency Optimization: Identify and implement strategies to improve processes within the web department, enhancing efficiency and overall effectiveness.

Perks:

13th Month Bonus (Wild right?! )
Permanent work-from-home / remote set-up 
Health insurance 
Dental insurance 
Mental health insurance 
Great starting salary 
Growth opportunity 
Performance-based raises 
Prizes and bonuses 

Specifics:

Time
>Full-time, PST time zone
>This is a remote position so you can have the freedom to work from anywhere

Miscellaneous
>Attire - business casual when in meetings
>Professional setup (Pains me I actually need to write this down… )
>Clean background
>Good camera
>Good microphone
>Strong wifi

Tech Stack
MUST-HAVE’s
>Page Builders Software Experience - Liquid Code, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Shopify Page Builder (MUST-HAVE at least ONE of these)

Tech Stack:
>Page Builders Software - Liquid Code, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Shopify Page Builder (MUST-HAVE at least ONE of these)
>Shopify Experience (they really want this but not a definitive must-have)
>ClickUp/Asana (Project Management)
>Slack (Comms)
>Wordpress (bonus)
>Figma (bonus)

Compensation
$14,400-$24,000/yr

For interested applicants, please send your updated resume to nolascobree@gmail.com with the subject line: "WEB PM"
We maintain a high standard of compliance.

title: Call Center Appointment Setters
description:
Call Center Appointment Setters

Performance-Driven Cold Calling Experts Wanted - Earn What You’re Worth!
Do you thrive on making connections, setting appointments, and tackling challenges head-on? Are you a cold-calling pro who’s hungry for results, unafraid of rejection, and ready to make 200+ calls a day without missing a beat? If you’re looking for a full-time, performance-based role that rewards your effort, we want to hear from you.
What We Offer:
Performance-Based Pay: Earn big with no fixed salary. Your income depends entirely on the results you deliver—bonuses for appointments set and demos attended. This is a role where hard work pays off.
Flexible Remote Work: Work from anywhere as long as you have a solid internet connection and can maintain a high call volume.
Thorough Training: We provide in-depth training for the first two weeks. Learn the ropes, follow the process, and get set up for long-term success. After that, it’s all about hitting your numbers.
Supportive Environment: Our No Jerks Policy ensures a positive, goal-oriented atmosphere where everyone is driven to succeed.
Who Should Apply:
Cold Calling Pros: You have proven experience making cold calls, building rapport quickly, and setting up appointments. You understand that success comes from volume and persistence.
Self-Motivated Go-Getters: You don’t need to be chased to make your calls. You’re driven by hunger and ready to do what it takes to achieve your goals.
Resilient & Tenacious: You understand that most prospects will say no, and that doesn’t deter you. Instead, it fuels you to keep going.
Tech-Savvy: Comfortable with CRM tools, sales software, and understanding the basics of SEO and online reviews. If you’re not an expert, we’ll train you on the essentials, but you need to be quick to adapt.
Full-Time Commitment: This is not a side hustle. We’re looking for candidates who are ready to dedicate themselves full-time to mastering our process and hitting their targets consistently.
What We Expect:
200+ Calls Daily: High call volume is the foundation of this role. You should be comfortable with a fast-paced environment.
A Willingness to Learn: The first two weeks require a focused learning period. Follow our process diligently to set yourself up for success.
Top 3% Mindset: We want those who aim to be the best, push through challenges, and have a clear why driving their performance.
About Referrizer:
Referrizer is a leading marketing automation company that helps local businesses improve their online presence, increase reviews, and attract new clients. We use cutting-edge technology to make reputation management easy, so companies can focus on what they do best.

APPLY NOW

referrizer.typeform.com/to/YyE6CZsv?typeform-source=www.google.com#posted_on=https://www.onlinejobs.ph/&posted_by=noah&cost_per_ad=xxxxx

title: SOC Engineer \ Cybersecurity Analyst - Level 2
description:
Job Title: SOC Engineer Level 2

Job Type: Full-Time
Work Days: MON-FRI | 6 AM - 3PM EST \ 9 AM - 6PM EST
Reports To: Incident Response Service Delivery Manager

Job Summary: We are looking for an experienced SOC Engineer Level 2 to join our Security Operations Center (SOC) team. As a Level 2 SOC Engineer, you will play a critical role in monitoring, analyzing, and responding to security incidents. You will be responsible for handling more complex security threats, guiding Level 1 engineers, and contributing to the overall security posture of the organization. This role requires strong technical expertise, excellent analytical skills, and the ability to work in a fast-paced environment.

Key Responsibilities:
 • Advanced Threat Detection and Response: Monitor and analyze security alerts and incidents, conduct in-depth investigations, and respond to complex security threats, ensuring they are mitigated effectively.
 • Incident Management: Take the lead in managing security incidents, coordinating with other IT and security teams to contain, eradicate, and recover from security breaches.
 • Forensic Analysis: Perform detailed forensic analysis on compromised systems to identify root causes, attack vectors, and indicators of compromise (IOCs).
 • Vulnerability Management: Assist in the identification, assessment, and remediation of vulnerabilities within the organization’s infrastructure.
 • Security Tool Management: Maintain and optimize security tools and technologies, including SIEM, IDS/IPS, firewalls, and endpoint protection systems.
 • Collaboration: Work closely with Level 1 SOC Engineers, providing guidance, mentorship, and training to help them improve their skills and effectiveness in responding to security incidents.
 • Documentation: Create and maintain detailed documentation of security incidents, forensic analysis, and response actions, ensuring compliance with organizational policies and industry standards.
 • Reporting: Generate and analyze security reports, providing insights and recommendations to improve the organization’s security posture.
 • Continuous Improvement: Stay updated on the latest cybersecurity threats, vulnerabilities, and best practices, and contribute to the ongoing improvement of SOC processes and technologies.
 • On-Call Support: Participate in a rotating on-call schedule to provide after-hours support for critical security incidents.

Qualifications:
 • Education: Bachelor’s degree in Cybersecurity, Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field, or equivalent experience.
 • Experience: 3-5 years of experience in a SOC or cybersecurity role, with at least 1-2 years at a Level 1 position or equivalent.
 • Certifications: Relevant certifications such as CompTIA Security+, CompTIA CySA+, or equivalent are preferred.
 • Technical Skills:
  - Strong knowledge of security monitoring tools (e.g., SIEM, IDS/IPS) and their configuration and management.
  - Proficiency in network security, endpoint security, and incident response techniques.
  - Experience with forensic tools and methodologies for analyzing compromised systems.
  - Familiarity with scripting and automation (e.g., Python, PowerShell) to streamline security processes.
  - Knowledge of cloud security practices and tools (e.g., AWS, Azure) is a plus.
 • Soft Skills:
  - Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to think critically under pressure.
  - Strong communication skills, with the ability to explain complex security issues to technical and non-technical stakeholders.
  - Leadership qualities, with a proactive approach to mentoring and guiding less experienced team members.
  - Ability to manage multiple priorities and tasks in a dynamic environment.

title: Paid Media Manager
description:
CLICK HERE TO APPLY: https://emazinggroup.applytojob.com/apply/1hHqAfsWer/Paid-Media-Manager?source=OLJEMAZING

Paid Media Manager:

Join our team as a Paid Media Manager and lead paid advertising campaigns across platforms like Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, Google, YouTube, and more! You’ll create, optimize, and manage campaigns to drive traffic and revenue, analyze performance, and stay ahead of trends to maximize results. This is a remote, full-time position that offers flexibility, creativity, and the opportunity to grow in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment. If you’re ready to make an impact and grow with us, we’d love to hear from you!

What You’ll Do:

•Manage and optimize campaigns on platforms like Meta, TikTok, Google, and others! You'll set budgets, and target audiences, and adjust ads to drive engagement and revenue.

•Analyze performance data across channels, turning insights into action and strategy! Utilize multi-touch attribution to understand what drives success and refine our approach.

•Spot emerging trends, submit creative requests, and collaborate with the team to deliver fresh, on-brand ad content.

•Oversee tracking setup, catalog feeds, and pixel implementations to ensure smooth campaign performance and accurate data.

What You’ll Need to Succeed:

•At least 5 Years of Hands-On Experience: Proven expertise in digital ads and e-commerce campaigns across multiple platforms, with experience working with US-based brands.

•Analytical Skills & Tool Mastery: Expertise in Google Analytics, Data Studio, and Excel—transforming data into actionable insights to optimize performance.

•Digital Marketing Savvy: Solid knowledge of DTC (direct-to-consumer) strategies and platforms like Shopify+, and a strong grasp of e-commerce best practices.

•Go-Getter Mindset: You thrive in fast-paced environments, communicate with ease, and handle multiple projects independently.

•Strong Communication Skills: Ability to create clear documentation, present findings to senior management, and collaborate effectively with stakeholders.

•Strategic Thinking: Ability to develop and execute long-term growth strategies for paid media across various platforms.

•Problem-Solving and Adaptability: Strong troubleshooting skills—whether it's campaign performance or technical implementation, you can adapt strategies to improve results.

•Excellent Time Management: You can juggle multiple campaigns and deadlines, particularly in a remote working environment, while maintaining high standards of work.

Nice-to-Haves:

•Comfortable with Multi-Touch Attribution (MTA) platforms? We love candidates who can confidently track and analyze performance across all channels.
•Data-driven decision-maker? If you're experienced with incrementality testing and MMM modeling at scale, we’re excited to hear how you apply it!
•If you’ve managed a budget over PHP 25 million, you're the perfect fit!
•Familiarity with the fashion industry or DTC marketing is a big plus!
•Able to write captivating ad copy tailored to each platform.
•Open to working key campaigns beyond standard hours, including weekends, as needed.

The Perks:

•Competitive Salary: 100k - 200k PHP
•PTO & Holiday Pay
•Quarterly Bonuses
•Health Insurance
•Deep Product Discounts
•Company Parties and Lunches
•Career Growth & Development
•Fully Remote Role

Why Join The Emazing Group?

Since 2010, The Emazing Group has been the comprehensive e-commerce solution for passion-driven consumer lifestyle brands. With unique and innovative brands such as iHeartRaves and INTO THE AM, The Emazing Group has successfully created and scaled market-leading companies, empowering a lifestyle of self-expression one individual at a time. 

To learn more about us, visit our company website: https://emazinggroup.com/

The Emazing Group is an equal opportunity employer. Learn more on our Careers Page: 
https://emazinggroup.applytojob.com/apply/

ole Description

The Freelance Software Automation QA Tester involves conducting testing activities, identifying defects, and ensuring quality standards are met to deliver reliable software products.

title: Junior Full-Stack Developer
description:
DAP Brands is seeking a dynamic and highly skilled professional to join our team as a Junior Fullstack Developer.

Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with senior developers to design and develop scalable and high-performance web applications.
- Implement user-friendly interfaces using modern web technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
- Develop backend services and APIs using Node.js and integrate them with frontend components.

- Solid understanding of web development fundamentals, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

- Proficiency in server-side development using Node.js, or Express.js.

title: Full Stack Python Developer
description:
Full Stack Python Developer (React/TypeScript + Python)

What We're Looking For

- Full Stack Expertise: You excel in both backend and frontend development, proficient in Python as well as React and TypeScript.
- Passion for Python: You are an expert in Python and its frameworks, with a knack for backend development.
- Frontend Mastery: You have strong experience with React and TypeScript, building intuitive and responsive user interfaces.
- Data Analytics Expertise: You have a proven track record in data analytics, able to turn data into insights.
- AI Enthusiast: You are intrigued by AI technologies and eager to apply them in practical scenarios.

Responsibilities

- Backend Development: Build and maintain robust backend systems using Python.
- Frontend Development: Create and enhance user interfaces using React and TypeScript.
- Data Handling: Design and manage data models and databases.
- Collaboration: Work alongside cross-functional teams to integrate backend services with front-end platforms.
- Code Quality: Write clean, efficient code and participate in code reviews to uphold high standards.
- Data Pipelines: Develop and optimize pipelines for efficient data analytics.
- ETL Processes: Manage the extraction, transformation, and loading of large data sets.
- Insight Generation: Utilize statistical analysis and data visualization for actionable insights.
- AI Integration: Implement machine learning algorithms and embrace data science methods.

Qualifications

- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
- 3-5 years of experience in full stack development with a focus on Python, React, and TypeScript.
- Strong knowledge of Python and its frameworks (e.g., Django, FastAPI).
- Proficiency in React and TypeScript for frontend development.
- Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MongoDB).
- Proficiency in data modeling, ETL processes, and data warehousing.
- Familiarity with RESTful APIs and server-side logic.
- Experience with pandas.
- (Bonus) Knowledge of machine learning libraries (e.g., PyTorch) and data science methodologies.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work independently or as part of a team.
- Strong communication skills and fluency in English.


What is the Compensation Details?
This is a full-time position. The salary based on your experience.

Are you open to part-time or hourly contracts?
Yes, we do.

How much programming experience do I need to have?
This is a mid to senior position focusing on full stack development. You should have at least 3-5 years of experience in creating and sustaining data-oriented initiatives, improving our data systems' efficiency, and enhancing our backend and frontend services.

title: Associate QA Developer
description:
Bug Squisher Wanted: 

You’re an expert at making sure websites work smoothly across all devices and browsers before they go live. You catch bugs others miss, and your test cases are precise and easy to follow. When it comes to troubleshooting, you’re relentless—and you’re a great team player too.
If this sounds like you and you’re excited about a workday that’s fun, collaborative, and full of purpose, let’s chat!
AlgaeCal is on the lookout for an Associate QA Developer to bring their skills to our lively Dev team and help transform lives, one bug-free experience at a time.
Small print here ? We’re an eCommerce company. So, we want you to have eCommerce experience. Lots of it. So if you don’t love digital marketing the way Elon loves Elon, you probably shouldn’t read any further. 

Still here? Okay then…

This job will give you ALL the feels:

At AlgaeCal, we’re driven by a single idea. To end the fear of bone loss. In the United States, an estimated 54 million people have low bone density. 

The good news? AlgaeCal has the world’s only clinically-backed natural solution to this problem. We give hope to everyone worried about bone loss. If that excites you, you’ll find no better place to continue your career than at AlgaeCal. 

You’ll love it here:

You’ll be working with a great team. The developers at AlgaeCal have been there, done that, and got the t-shirt. They’ve written more code than Alan Turing. They’ve learned more programming languages than C3PO. They’ve immersed themselves in so many development tasks that they’ve had to be pulled out of the Matrix by their ankles on a Friday evening. And the best part? They're friendly, funny, and easy to work with.
You’ll use your powers for good. This isn’t one of those jobs that crush your soul with mindless tasks. On the contrary! You’ll be working on a wide range of applications that helps spread a powerful message – bone loss is beatable. 
You won’t be micromanaged. We’ll give you a simple set of KPIs with crystal clear expectations.
We don’t have mattresses at the office (Seriously Elon, what’s up with that?!?). You’ll be relieved to know this isn’t one of those Silicon Valley gigs that expects you to work ridiculously long hours and frowns upon family time. We’re not like that! We enjoy our life, and we want you to enjoy yours too. 

This job might be for you if you’ve got…

1+ years of experience in a QA or software testing role and be ready to share examples of your work across diverse testing techniques.
A solid understanding of test documentation, planning, and execution across multiple platforms.
If you’ve ever been called ‘next level at automation, we’d love to meet you! 
A yoda-like knowledge of javascript and a basic knowledge of node.js.
We’d also be impressed if you’ve worked with jest & python. 
A portfolio that demonstrates your mastery of all-things dev. Sorry, but if you have to Google ‘Bitbucket’; or you’ve never heard of ‘AWS’, this isn’t the position for you. 
Next level bug spotting skills. In fact, you’re so good at dealing with bugs you should probably be deployed on a mission to Klendathu. 

Now, time to be honest: is this really you? If you’re nodding your head and feeling that flutter of excitement, then we can’t wait to meet you.
Other Qualities You’ll Need
At AlgaeCal we’re going to insist that you have these 3 qualities:
You’re humble--you put the team and others’ needs ahead of your own
You’re hungry to learn more
You’re people smart--in the sense that you’re a great teammate
The truth is, if you don’t have these qualities you won’t last long at AlgaeCal. So if you’re missing one of them, be honest. Save yourself a lot of headaches and skip to a job posting that is a better fit for you.

What Will You Earn? 
We believe in rewarding top talent. Let’s talk about salary once we’ve had the chance to get to know you better. Rest assured, we’re generous and offer above-market pay for the right person. If you bring the skills and experience, we’ll make sure the compensation reflects that.

You’ll also enjoy the following benefits:
A generous healthcare package
Monthly team events and activities
Flexible Stat Holidays with the option to bank days for later use
Weekly team lunches
Casual dress code
Incredible dog friendly, Yaletown office one block from SkyTrain
If you prefer to work remotely, that’s fine with us too! 
And above all, you’ll join a team that you’ll never want to leave. Culture is everything to us. Yes, we work extremely hard to change as many people’s lives as possible. But we know how to have fun and reward ourselves too.

How To Apply
So, do you have what it takes to become the next member of team AlgaeCal?
Job opportunities like this don’t come along often, and we’ve got a lot to offer our successful applicant. So, to make sure our future Associate QA Developer is the real-deal, will be a great fit, and will thrive at AlgaeCal, we ask a little more than your run-of-the-mill job application:
If this sounds like a position for you, please respond to this advertisement with your resume and cover letter. Please, read carefully:
1. Write a cover letter addressing:
Why are you the best Associate QA Developer for this role? Give quantifiable examples of related achievements.
Describe why you fit perfectly with our values. Read them here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1deCCJZ6tiDiOSlr_W0UdCuM_V_ahzPBs/view
What's the toughest challenge you’ve ever overcome in your life? How did you overcome it?
What are the last three books you’ve read?
What do you do for fun?
2. Explain what you’re doing now for a job:
 If you don’t have one, explain why.
 If you have one, explain why you’re looking elsewhere.
3. Upload your cover letter and resume
Ensure that your cover letter and resume are saved and sent as one file.
Yes, our hiring process is challenging, but it’s our way of selecting the best--and your way of ensuring your AlgaeCal teammates are tops.

Follow THIS LINK:  https://apply.workable.com/j/47A6B38E79 and upload your cover letter and resume.
***Note: Please include your cover letter WITH your resume in one document. Applications without a cover letter will not be read!***
We are looking to hire as soon as we find the right person, so act quickly and you can also expect a prompt response.

title: DEVOPS / Infrastructure Engineer (Remote)
description:
Job Summary:
We are seeking an experienced Infrastructure Engineer with specialized knowledge in Adobe Commerce (formerly Magento) to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining scalable infrastructure solutions tailored to support Adobe Commerce environments. This role requires deep expertise in cloud technologies, infrastructure automation, and a strong understanding of Adobe Commerce architecture.


Duties and Responsibilities:
- Design, deploy, and maintain Adobe Commerce infrastructure on cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP).
- Implement infrastructure as code (IaC) using tools such as Terraform, CloudFormation, or Ansible to automate provisioning and configuration management.
- Optimize Adobe Commerce performance and ensure high availability through fault-tolerant design and continuous monitoring.
- Collaborate closely with development teams to understand application requirements and optimize infrastructure accordingly.
- Manage containerized applications using Docker and orchestration tools like Kubernetes.
- Implement and maintain CI/CD pipelines to automate software delivery and deployment processes.
- Ensure security best practices are followed throughout the infrastructure, including data encryption, access controls, and vulnerability management.
- Monitor system performance and troubleshoot issues to ensure Adobe Commerce applications meet SLAs and performance targets.
- Conduct regular infrastructure audits and capacity planning to anticipate future needs and scale infrastructure accordingly.
- Document infrastructure configurations, procedures, and policies.

Prerequisite Skills and Qualifications:
- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field; or equivalent work experience.
- Proven experience as an Infrastructure Engineer or similar role with a focus on Adobe Commerce (Magento).
- In-depth knowledge of Adobe Commerce architecture, including cloud deployment models (Cloud, Commerce, B2B Commerce).
- Strong proficiency in cloud computing platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP.
- Hands-on experience with infrastructure automation tools like Terraform, CloudFormation, or Ansible.
- Familiarity with containerization technologies and orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes).
- Experience with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices.
- Solid understanding of networking concepts and protocols (TCP/IP, DNS, HTTP/S).
- Ability to troubleshoot complex issues related to infrastructure, performance, and scalability.
- Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
- Certifications such as AWS Certified Solutions Architect or similar are a plus.

Preferred Additional Skills:
- Experience with other eCommerce platforms and systems integration.
- Knowledge of relational and SQL databases commonly used with Adobe Commerce.
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and project management tools.

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and performance-based incentives.
- Comprehensive health benefits package.
- Opportunities for professional development and certification reimbursement.
- Flexible work hours and remote work options.

Application Process:
Interested candidates should submit a resume and cover letter outlining their Adobe Commerce infrastructure experience, along with any relevant certifications. We look forward to reviewing your application and discussing how you can contribute to our team’s success.

title: Executive Virtual Assistant
description:
Job Title: Executive Virtual Assistant (VA)
Location: Remote
Hours: Full-Time: 8 hours per day, 5 days a week, UK Hours
Length: Long term
Pay: £300 per month + Benefits
Reports To: Kaval Shah, CEO
Technology: MAC/iOS user
Starting:  Early January 2025


About Us
Resie Mortgages and Protection is driven by a vision to streamline the mortgage advice journey for UK clients. We are committed to a high-growth, entrepreneurial environment where every team member is expected to bring creativity, strategic thinking, and a relentless drive to accomplish our shared goals.

Role
We are looking for a talented Executive Virtual Assistant (VA), who will act as an extension of Kaval, managing diverse tasks with precision, anticipating needs, and proactively identifying ways to make his life easier. This role requires a detail-oriented individual who thrives in a dynamic environment, allowing him to focus on high-priority tasks and strategic growth.

Mission/Purpose
The primary mission of this role is to make his life more productive and less stressful in both his personal and business environments. You will effectively manage daily activities, ensuring that he has the support needed to excel and thrive in all areas.

If it doesn’t have to do with generating revenue, saving costs or developing the team, Kaval shouldn’t be doing it. Anything that can be taken off his plate, should be.
This frees up Kaval’s time to work on high leverage activities that drive the company forward, creating growth, jobs, and opportunities for everyone involved.



Role Competencies

• Organisation and Planning: Ability to efficiently prioritise and manage multiple tasks, ensuring all deadlines are met.
• Integrity with Commitment: Maintain a high level of honesty and integrity while being dedicated to fulfilling responsibilities.
• High Standards: Consistently produce quality work and uphold a commitment to excellence in all tasks.
• Fast Response Times: Ability to respond quickly and efficiently to communications and urgent requests.
• Proactive: Anticipate the needs of the executive and take initiative without waiting for direction.
• Attention to Detail: Meticulous focus on details, ensuring accuracy in all tasks and communications.
• Drive and Hustle: Demonstrate a strong drive to accomplish goals and tackle challenges head-on.
• Persistence: Maintain determination and resilience in the face of obstacles or setbacks.
• Analytical Skills: Ability to assess situations, identify key insights, and propose effective solutions based on data. 
• People Skills: Strong interpersonal skills, fostering positive relationships with colleagues, clients, and stakeholders. Able to communicate effectively, manage conflicts, and build rapport with diverse teams. Empathetic and collaborative, with a focus on teamwork and supporting others to achieve shared goals.



Technical Knowledge
• Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (including Teams), Google Workspace, and other relevant software tools (e.g., Asana, Slack, Notion).
• Familiar with Mac and Apple related software.
• Familiarity with digital project management tools and CRM systems.
• Comfortable using technology to streamline processes and improve productivity.



Culture Fit
We are a high-growth, entrepreneurial team that values creativity, strategic thinking, and a relentless drive to accomplish our goals. The ideal candidate should embody a proactive attitude, an eagerness to learn, and a commitment to contributing to a positive and collaborative work culture. Our core values are:

• Be honest, transparent and operate with integrity
• Under promise and over deliver
• Fail fast, fail forward, share, learn, improve, iterate
• Look to continuously improve, both yourself and the business
• Everyone is responsible for facilitating change
• Teamwork is the dreamwork.
• Being good is not ok. Being the best is the standard benchmark



Native Genius
• Planning and organising
• Caring and nurturing
• Communication, verbal and written



Qualifications and Experience
• Proven experience as a Virtual Assistant or in an executive support role within a fast-paced, high-growth environment.
• Strong organisational and multitasking skills, with impeccable attention to detail.
• A self-starter with the ability to anticipate needs and take initiative.
• Experience supporting senior-level executives or founders in a remote or entrepreneurial setting is a plus.
• Fluent in reading, writing and speaking British (UK) English



Key Responsibilities

Personal Assistant
• Provide personal assistance with a wide range of tasks to ensure smooth day-to-day operations.
• Assist with personal travel arrangements and holiday planning.
• Ensure a high level of confidentiality and discretion in managing personal matters. 
• Coordinate the executive's calendar, ensuring all scheduled meetings are organised and efficient.
• Manage the executive's calendar to prevent scheduling conflicts and optimise time.
• Send reminders and follow up on pending appointments or commitments.
Work Emails
• Filter and prioritise emails, responding to routine enquiries on behalf of the executive.
• Manage the executive’s email inbox, flagging urgent matters for immediate attention.
• Organise and streamline email correspondence for quick access and efficient management.
Work Meetings
• Schedule, organise, and manage internal and external meetings.
• Prepare meeting agendas, take minutes, and ensure action items are followed up on.
• Handle all logistics for virtual or in-person meetings (room bookings, video conferencing links, etc.).
Project Management
• Manage ongoing projects by tracking deadlines, deliverables, and dependencies.
• Use project management tools (e.g., Asana, Trello, Monday.com) to assign tasks, monitor progress, and ensure timely completion.
• Coordinate with various team members to ensure efficient collaboration and project completion.
Management of Staff
• Oversee team members' schedules to ensure efficient collaboration and workflow.
• Provide administrative support to staff, including document management and facilitating internal communication.
• Assist with team coordination, ensuring clarity on tasks, deadlines, and responsibilities.
Recruitment
• Assist in sourcing and screening candidates for open positions.
• Coordinate interviews and manage communications with potential hires.
• Support the onboarding process for new staff, including documentation and organising initial training sessions.
Business Planning
• Support the development and tracking of long-term business strategies and goals.
• Assist in organising meetings for strategic planning and ensure all logistics are arranged.
• Monitor and report on the progress of key business projects and initiatives.
Research
• Conduct research on various business-related topics, providing summaries and recommendations as needed.
• Collect competitive intelligence, market trends, and other relevant information to support strategic decision-making.
Tools and Templates
• Develop and implement tools and templates to streamline processes across the various areas of responsibility.
• Create and maintain standard operating procedures (SOPs) to ensure consistency and efficiency in tasks.
• Design automation systems to optimise workflow, reducing repetitive tasks and increasing productivity.
• Ensure all tools and templates are user-friendly, up to date, and aligned with business objectives.
• Continuously evaluate and improve existing tools and templates to adapt to changing needs and workflows.
Strategic Research & Analysis
• Conduct market research, competitor analysis, and compile actionable data to support strategic decision-making.
• Summarise insights, provide high-level takeaways, and suggest action steps based on research findings.
• Stay on top of industry trends and identify opportunities for growth that align with the company’s mission. 
• Assist in preparing research reports or presentations.
High-Level Communication & Branding
• Draft, edit, and proofread emails, presentations, reports, and social media content to maintain brand voice and professionalism.
• Handle incoming calls, managing and directing enquiries as appropriate.
• Act as a liaison, facilitating communication between the executive, team members, and external partners.
Other Responsibilities
• Handle personal and miscellaneous tasks to streamline the executive’s daily schedule.
• Continuously seek and suggest ways to improve internal processes and enhance productivity.
• Take on additional projects and tasks as required, always prioritising the most critical and impactful work.



Expected Outcomes
Increased Productivity:
Achieve a minimum of 80% of high-priority tasks completed each week, allowing the executive to focus on strategic growth initiatives.
Improved Time Management:
Ensure that at least 95% of scheduled appointments and meetings are held as planned, with less than 5% needing to be rescheduled or cancelled due to scheduling errors.
Effective Communication:
Maintain an average response time of under 24 hours for all email correspondence, with a target of 90% of communications addressed within this timeframe.
High-Quality Work:
Deliver research and reports with at least 85% positive feedback from the executive, ensuring that insights are actionable and relevant.
Streamlined Operations:
Implement at least one new process improvement initiative each quarter, with the aim of reducing task completion times by 20% for recurring tasks.


KPIs
• Email Management Efficiency: Respond to 90% of email correspondence within 24 hours.
• Meeting Coordination Success Rate: Maintain at least 95?curacy in scheduling meetings.
• Task Completion Rate: Ensure 100% of tasks on priority lists are completed on time.
• Research Quality: Deliver research reports with at least 85% positive feedback from the executive.
• Process Improvement Initiatives: Implement at least one new process improvement each quarter.



Benefits after 6 months
• Paid holidays
• Discretionary performance related bonus
• Training and development


Application Instructions:
Round 1:

To apply, please use FHH59 in subject. You will be sent a link to a Google form to complete.

Round 2:

Answer the questions in the Google form:

You will need to submit your CV along with a video recording (max 5 mins) with thoughtful responses to the following questions:

1. Showcase your work area, computer and broadband speed.
2. What excites you about the role of Executive Virtual Assistant?
3. Can you provide an example of a time when you successfully managed competing priorities?
4. How do you ensure clear and effective communication in a remote work environment?
5. What specific tools or methods do you use to stay organised and manage tasks efficiently?
6. How can you save me time (provide specific examples)?
7. What support would you need in your role?
8. What is your broadband speed?
9. Why should we hire you?

If you have been shortlisted you will be invited to a second round of selection

Round 3: 

1. Complete competency questionnaires
2. You will be asked to prepare a presentation and present at interview on a specific subject matter
3. A formal interview

Note: You will be paid £10 for your time post interview, even if not successful.

Round 4: 

1. ID verification
2. Offer and contract signing
3. Agree a start date

title: Litigation Paralegal
description:
About the Firm

Focus Law is a dynamic and rapidly expanding business law firm based in Anaheim, California. We specialize in business litigation, with a strong focus on partnership, corporate, and shareholder disputes. Our services extend to transactional matters, enabling us to provide a full suite of legal solutions for our clients.

We pride ourselves on tackling complex business legal issues while understanding and addressing the human side of our clients’ challenges. At Focus Law, our team is the backbone of our success. We foster a supportive environment where energy, enthusiasm, and a positive "can-do" attitude are celebrated daily.

If you’re seeking a role where your contributions truly matter, we offer a flexible, performance-driven work environment, with benefits and bonuses tailored to reward exceptional performance.

Join our entrepreneurial team—a firm small enough for your efforts to be recognized and impactful, yet large enough to offer job security and growth opportunities. At Focus Law, you’ll work directly with the owner, engage daily with clients, and play an essential role in helping business owners protect their hard-earned assets.

About the Role
We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Paralegal with a minimum of 5 years of litigation experience to join our growing team. This is a full-time, remote position designed for a motivated and experienced professional who can contribute immediately. You will collaborate closely with the firm’s attorneys and owner to support our clients and advance our mission.

This role is ideal for someone who thrives in a fast-paced environment, has strong organizational skills, and is passionate about providing top-tier support for business clients. We particularly welcome candidates experienced in business, partnership, or shareholder disputes who can manage a caseload independently and efficiently.

Key Responsibilities

Organize, index, and manage legal documents and evidence for cases.

Utilize electronic document management systems for efficient storage, retrieval, and tracking.
Discovery Assistance

Manage the discovery process, including coordinating document collection, review, and production.
Assist in drafting discovery requests and responses.

Conduct legal research on precedents, laws, and regulations relevant to cases.
Summarize research findings and provide reports to attorneys.

Prepare preliminary drafts of pleadings, motions, affidavits, and subpoenas for attorney review.
Client Interaction

Monitor case deadlines and maintain a detailed case calendar.

Coordinate with staff, experts, and opposing counsel on case logistics.
Qualifications

Experience:  5–10 years of litigation experience in U.S. law firms.

title: Finance and Accounting Associate
description:
DAP Brands is looking for a skilled Finance and Accounting Associate to join our team, responsible for maintaining accurate financial records using the accrual method, managing AP/AR processes, and performing reconciliations. The role involves assisting with financial reporting, supporting budget preparation, optimizing financial operations, and collaborating with internal teams and external clients. Experience with accounting software (e.g., QBO), financial reporting tools, and knowledge of US tax laws are essential for success in this role.

Key Responsibilities:
General Accounting and Bookkeeping:
Maintain accurate and up-to-date internal financial records (Acrrual Method).
Record journal entries, including accruals, prepayments, and adjusting entries.
Manage accounts payable (AP) and accounts receivable (AR) processes.

Reconciliations:
Perform bank, credit card, and general ledger reconciliations.
Reconcile intercompany transactions and balances.
Ensure consistency between internal financial reports and external systems (e.g., payroll providers, payment gateways).
Perform Cash to Accrual reconciliations. 

Financial Reporting & Analysis:
Assist in the preparation of monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements.
Support budget preparation and variance analysis.
Provide insights and recommendations based on financial performance.

Process Improvement:
Identify areas for process optimization to enhance financial operations.
Implement internal controls to ensure data integrity and mitigate risks.

Collaboration & Communication:
Coordinate with other departments to gather information for financial processes.
Provide support to management for special projects and ad-hoc financial requests.

External Client Support
Coordinate with clients regarding accounting and reconciliation need
Create financial reports for external bookkeeping clients
Review the work of the bookkeepers and ensure the quality of deliverables to the clients. 


Required Skills:
Experience with financial reporting tools or ERP systems.
Experience with accounting software and platforms such as QBO
Knowledge of  US tax laws and payroll regulations.
Familiarity with Google Suite tools such as Gsheets, Forms, etc.
Familiarity with the reconciliation of payment platforms (e.g., Stripe) is a plus.
Good communication skills 


Apply today and take the next step in your career with DAP Brands by submitting your application using the online form below. Use the Job Code: Finance: forms.gle/R9BV91DbNfRHsZtJ6

title: General Virtual Administrative Assistant
description:
General Virtual Administrative Assistant

How to Apply:

If you believe you have the skills and qualities to excel in this role, we'd love to hear from you! We will only acknowledge applicants who have submitted their information through the form:

form.jotform.com/232494170701148

title: Client Success Coordinator
description:
Please apply for this job here:
https://sourcepass.careers/job-openings/?gh_jid=4492034005

We are Sourcepass, an IT consulting company (MSP) with a rich history of providing network support and innovative solutions since 2001. Our expertise spans IT services, cloud computing, and security, that tailor the right technologies to specific industries and business strategies. Sourcepass aims to be different. It is owned and operated by technology, security, and managed services experts who are passionate about delivering an IT experience that clients love.

Sourcepass has acquired and continues to acquire companies across all avenues of technology bringing more than 40 years of expertise to all of our service areas.

Today, Sourcepass comprises over six hundred employees serving more than two thousand clients across twenty unique vertical markets. And the best is yet to be.

Our achievements speak for themselves: named to the Inc. 2022 Best in Business list, honored with two 2023 Stevie® Awards, listed on CRN’s 2023 Solution Provider 500, and recognized in Gartner’s 2024 Magic Quadrant™. Most recently, we were awarded PAX8's 2024 Partner of the Year and designated as Microsoft CoPilot MVP. We take pride in these accolades and continue to push boundaries in the IT consulting industry.

Join us and be part of our journey toward even greater accomplishments.

POSITION SUMMARY

The Client Success Coordinator (CSC) is on the Client Strategy Team and acts as the clients' advocate within Sourcepass. The CSC will work closely with other Sourcepass teams to quarterback client requests, manage client relationships, and help facilitate an experience that clients love. The schedule for this position is Monday through Friday 9am - 6pm EST.

RESPONSIBILITIES

Schedule, conduct, and participate in Client Touch Base Meetings
Prepare and deliver Client Business Reviews
Perform initial data collection to prepare for Strategic Technology Assessments.
Publish meeting notes for Client Touch Base Meetings, Business Reviews, and Strategic Technology Assessments
Develop strong relationship with key client contacts
Assist with client interaction and facilitating value-add experiences
Collaborate with other Sourcepass functions to resolve client strategy inquiries
Perform documentation updates within internal Sourcepass business systems
Raise red flags with regards to at risk clients

DESIRED SKILLSET/EXPERIENCE 

3+ years of work experience, working within a technology services business or as part of an internal IT department, preferably an MSP.
IT Knowledge (knowledge of firewalls, switches, servers, wireless access points, Azure, etc)
Strong Communication Skills– The CSC will act as a liaison between Sourcepass and their assigned clients. They will also coordinate with internal Sourcepass teams to facilitate client requests when serving as an escalation point. The CSC must have excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Relationship Management – The CSC will monitor and manage client satisfaction; along with being responsible for building and maintaining a strong relationship. The CSC will raise red flags with regards to at risk clients.
Time Management – The CSC will manage, prioritize and execute assigned client success tasks, initiatives, and tickets. The CSC will also be responsible for tracking their time.
Professional and Service Oriented – The CSC will serve as a primary point of contact and an advocate for the client.

title: Administrative Assistant
description:
We are seeking a highly organized, motivated, and versatile Administrative and Project Assistant to join our team. In this role, you will play a critical part in managing diverse administrative tasks, coordinating projects, and ensuring effective communication within our team and with our clients. Your role will be pivotal in supporting our team's efficiency and our clients' satisfaction.

The tasks include:

- Conduct thorough research on industry trends and news updates, promptly informing the team about relevant developments.
- Research contact information utilizing different tools
- Handle customer service inquiries with promptness and professionalism, ensuring client satisfaction.
- Maintain and organize a system for managing customer requests and follow-up tasks, ensuring timely response.
- Verify and perform quality control on the data in our database
- Assistance with updating data in our system, and maintaining its accuracy
- Identify issues or delays in projects and communicate with team
- Perform general administrative tasks including data entry, preparing reports, and maintaining documentation.

You'll Love This Role If:

- You strive for excellence: You're not just looking for a job; you're seeking a craft. You take pride in your work and are committed to delivering quality results. You see every task as an opportunity to excel and contribute to our shared goal of having the best product in the market.
- You're detail-oriented: You believe that the devil is in the details. You’re meticulous and thorough, ensuring nothing slips through the cracks. Your keen eye for detail means you’re constantly on the lookout for ways to improve processes and outcomes.
- You're a hard worker: You're no stranger to rolling up your sleeves and getting the job done, even if it means burning the midnight oil. Long hours don't phase you because you're focused on achieving exceptional results.
- You thrive on performance-based rewards: You're driven by success and motivated by the prospect of being rewarded for your hard work and achievements. You love setting ambitious goals and smashing them.
- You value teamwork and collaboration: You're a team player who thrives in an environment of like-minded professionals. You appreciate the synergy of working with others who are just as passionate about their work as you are.
- You view your work as art: You approach your tasks with creativity and passion, seeing beyond the mundane to the masterpiece you can create. You're not just completing tasks; you're crafting experiences and solutions that make a difference.

title: Risk Analyst for Online Gambling
description:
*** PLEASE DO NOT APPLY FOR THIS POSITION IF YOU DO NOT HAVE PREVIOUS WORK EXPERIENCE IN CONDUCTING KYC CHECKS WITHIN THE ONLINE GAMBLING INDUSTRY ***


We are a leading online sweepstakes casino offering an exciting array of games, including slots, table games, and more, exclusively to players in the USA. Our platform is designed to offer a thrilling gaming experience in a secure and responsible environment. We are committed to delivering exceptional customer service and a seamless gaming experience to all our players.

We are seeking a diligent and detail-oriented Risk Analyst to join the team. The Risk Analyst Specialist will play a crucial role in ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements and maintaining the integrity of our customer verification processes. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of KYC principles and regulations, along with excellent communication and analytical skills.

Responsibilities:
• Conduct thorough customer due diligence checks to verify the identity of new and existing customers.
• Review and analyze customer documentation, including identification documents and proof of address, to ensure compliance with regulatory requirements.
• Collaborate with internal teams to resolve KYC-related issues and escalate any compliance concerns.
• Stay up-to-date with changes in regulatory requirements and industry best practices related to KYC and AML (Anti-Money Laundering) regulations.
• Maintain accurate records of KYC checks and related documentation in accordance with company policies and procedures.

Requirements:
• Excellent English communication skills: verbal, written, and reading is a MUST
• Proven KYC experience, ideally in the online gambling industry is a MUST
• Strong understanding of KYC principles, AML regulations, and industry best practices
• Excellent attention to detail and analytical skills
• Must be able to work in a fast-paced environment and handle multiple tasks simultaneously.
• A commitment to upholding the highest standards of privacy and confidentiality

Work Schedule:
• This is a full-time position in a work-from-home setup. You will be working 8 hours a day, 5 days a week.

TO APPLY FOR THIS POSITION, FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS BELOW:
1. Include the phrase "KYC" in your SUBJECT.
2. Send a COVER LETTER with a LINK to your CV/Resume.

***APPLICATIONS WITHOUT CVS/RESUMES WILL NOT BE CONSIDERED***

title: E-Commerce Product Manager
description:
We are a growing company with 3 E-commerce stores seeking an experienced and tech-savvy Product Manager to join our dynamic team and contribute to our growing businesses. This is a full-time position.

PLEASE READ THE ENTIRE JOB DESCRIPTION AND ANSWER ALL QUESTIONS FOR YOUR APPLICATION TO BE CONSIDERED.

This role demands extremely high attention to detail, a patient demeanor, and a meticulous approach. The ideal candidate must also have proficient English writing and speaking skills as occasional communication with vendors via email, chat, or phone will be required.

Work hours will align with U.S. business hours. Training is provided and compensated. There will be an initial 1-month trial period.

The candidate will be expected to handle the following tasks:

• Manage and Maintain Product Information:
- Uploading new products
- Updating existing product listings with accurate information
- Coordinating with new and existing vendors for product details, ordering processes, lead times, etc.
-Maintaining accurate product and vendor databases

• Analysis and Optimization:
- Monitoring product performance, sales metrics, and customer feedback
- Using data insights to make recommendations for listing optimizations and business strategies

• Technical Expertise and Enhancement:
- Making mass uploads and changes to products on Shopify (e.g., pricing, descriptions)
- Optimize listings for product rankings, conversion rates, and sales growth.
- Quality-checking images, titles, and descriptions for accuracy
- Website coding experience (advantageous)

• Collaboration and Communication:
- Manage 3 stores, and lead a team of 1-2 VAs.
- Collaborate with the team to resolve product and website issues.
- Work directly with manufacturers/vendors for product issues/questions

• Inventory Management and Operations:
- Overseeing inventory reconciliation and efficient tracking of stock levels
- Documentation and Record-Keeping:
- Creating and maintaining up-to-date records of SOPs, listing performance, and product details

• Other basic operations and administrative tasks

Qualifications:
• Work experience as a Product Manager
• Minimum of 2 years’ Product Management experience in an E-commerce company
• Proven expertise in Shopify. Being a Shopify Certified Developer will be an advantage.
• Advanced knowledge of MS Excel and Google Suite software (Google Sheets, Google Docs, etc.)
• Write mushroom in your application to show your attention to detail
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English
• Highly organized, detail-oriented, and good analytical skills with an ability to meet deadlines

Other preferred experience includes:
• Airtable
• ClickUp
• Website scraping tools

Communication and meetings will be primarily conducted through voice chat (Google Meet) and Slack.

Before we proceed, here are a few things we'd like to confirm:
• Payments will be made weekly for the first four weeks starting from the third week of employment, and then bi-monthly every other Tuesday.
• Your work schedule will consist of 40 hours per week
• Your working hours will be from 9 PM to 6 AM (or 10 PM to 7 PM), PHT, with a 1-hour break, five days a week
• You’ll need to send an End of Shift (EOS) report every day, covering the following:
a. What did you do today? (detailed description)
b. What issues did you run into?
c. Is there anything I can help you with?

If you're okay with the above, please reply with "I AGREE TO ALL TERMS" and answer the following questions in complete sentences, using proper grammar and punctuation (please answer in number format instead of in paragraphs):

1. What is your previous experience with managing products for E-commerce companies?
2. Please provide a list of tools or software you have utilized in previous roles for product management. For each tool, include details on its specific functions (such as web scraping or bulk upload) and briefly describe how you applied it in your work.
3. How large of a team have you managed before?
4. Have you worked with Shopify before?
5. Are you currently engaged in another job or commitment?
6. How fast is your internet?
7. Do you have a reliable computer?
8. How often do you experience power outages and internet issues?
9. What backups do you have in case of power outages?
10. What backups do you have in case of internet outages?

Please carefully review the entire job description and also use this format as your subject line when replying to this post: “Your First Name + I Am Your Product Manager" (e.g. Kevin - I Am Your Product Manager). Please also include your resume.

AI-generated responses will not be considered.

title: Digital Marketing Assistant
description:
Job Title: Digital Marketing Assistant

Job Description:

We are looking for a versatile and detail-oriented Digital Marketing Specialist/Assistant to help manage and optimize digital marketing campaigns, client accounts, and reporting. This role is ideal for someone who can effectively analyze campaign performance, troubleshoot technical issues, and contribute to website and data integration projects. Candidates with a background or interest in IT and technical troubleshooting are highly preferred, as these skills can enhance our team’s efficiency in managing client needs.

Key Responsibilities:
1. Ads Campaign Management & Optimization
    - Monitor Google and Meta ad campaigns to ensure they meet performance goals and align with strategic objectives.
    - Provide insights and recommendations to optimize campaigns based on data analysis and industry trends.
2. Client Reporting & Analytics
    - Compile, analyze, and deliver performance reports, highlighting key metrics and actionable insights.
    - Maintain data accuracy by setting up and troubleshooting tracking solutions in analytics platforms as needed.
3. Technical Support & Troubleshooting
    - Respond to client inquiries related to campaign performance, website functionality, and analytics.
    - Address and resolve technical issues affecting digital campaigns or client accounts to ensure seamless operation.
4. Website Optimization & Data Integration
    - Assist in website optimization efforts to improve user experience, speed, and SEO.
    - Help implement and manage integrations between websites, apps, and CRM systems to streamline tracking and automation.
5. Project Management & Client Collaboration
    - Support client proposal development, strategic documentation, and presentations.
    - Organize project timelines and ensure that deliverables are met on schedule.
Qualifications:
• Bachelor’s degree in IT, Marketing or a related field.
• 1-3 years of experience in digital marketing, specifically with Google and Meta Ads.
• Strong analytical skills and experience with data reporting.
• Familiarity with website builders (e.g., WordPress, Shopify) and CRM platforms.
• Excellent problem-solving, organizational, and communication skills.
• Ability to manage multiple projects in a fast-paced environment.
Preferred Skills:
• Background or experience in IT or technical troubleshooting is a plus.
• Knowledge of HTML, CSS, or basic coding to support website-related troubleshooting.
• Familiarity with analytics and data visualization tools.

Why Join Us?

This role provides the opportunity to work across multiple facets of digital marketing, with exposure to both campaign management and technical support. You’ll join a collaborative team where your contributions are valued, and there’s room to grow your skills in a dynamic work environment.

Application Instructions:
All applicants must complete the following test: [https://docs.google.com/document/d/1QKlCd7FIdobwex7ZlerOatRl3n7-L-j0d1jtsh_pSOM/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.r5j52gpzkapa]. Once done, email the completed test to hello@digitaldifferencemakers.com, with jerald@digitaldifferencemakers.com and david@digitaldifferencemakers.com CC'd. Please use the subject line: "DDM Operations Assistant Test Completed".

Note: Applicants who do not follow these instructions will not be considered.

title: Company Support and Executive Assistant (Remote)
description:
PLEASE FOLLOW INSTRUCTIONS AND TO APPLY, PLEASE CLICK ON THE FOLLOWING LINK: APPLY HERE: cubecare.bamboohr.com/careers/32

We are a US-based custom manufacturing company and we are looking for dedicated and loyal individuals that can contribute to our goals. We are looking for self-motivated, self-starters with excellent customer service skills for our Executive Assistant to the CEO (REMOTE). 

The Executive Assistant serves as the primary point of contact for internal and external constituencies on all matters pertaining to the CEO. The Executive Assistant serves as a liaison to the management and department; organizes and coordinates executive meetings. He /She also provides assistance to high-level executives within a company and is often trusted with complex duties and sensitive information. In addition to general administrative work, Executive Assistants may be in charge of scheduling meetings, taking minutes during sessions, maintaining databases, and producing reports or presentations for their executive leadership. Finally, as an EA, he or she should develop and maintain effective relationships with colleagues, collaborate on matters, exchange information, provide and seek feedback to facilitate high-quality services.

We are seeking a C-Suite Executive Assistant to the CEO who will be responsible for providing comprehensive support. The ideal candidate will have at least two year experience as an Executive Assistant, Personal Assistant or similar role with a positive attitude.

RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Provide sophisticated calendar management for all levels of activities: business, personal and local. Prioritize inquiries and requests while troubleshooting conflicts; make judgments and recommendations to ensure smooth day-to-day engagements.
- Arrange and handle all logistics for meetings and events for all levels of activities: business, personal and local. This includes schedule meetings; draft agendas; develop, compile, and distribute presentation materials.
- Complete a broad variety of administrative tasks that facilitate the CEO’s ability to effectively lead the organization, including: assisting with special projects; designing and producing complex documents, reports, and presentations; collecting and preparing information for meetings with staff and outside parties; composing and preparing correspondence; maintaining contact lists; making travel arrangements; and completing expense and mileage reports.
- Serve as the primary point of contact for activities business, personal and local matters pertaining to the CEO, including those of a highly confidential or critical nature.
- Prioritize and determine appropriate course of action, referral, or response, exercising judgment to reflect CEO’s style and organization policy.
- Work closely with the CEO to keep them well informed of upcoming commitments and responsibilities, following up appropriately. Anticipate CEO’s needs in advance of meetings, conferences, etc.
- Maintain open communications with General Managers, including providing information and documents as needed.
- Coordinate all Executive Team meetings and retreats and assist with staff meetings and events as needed.
- Provide "gatekeeper" and "gateway" role, providing a bridge for smooth communication between the CEO and staff, demonstrating leadership to maintain credibility, trust, and support with the Executive Team.
- Complete projects by assigning work to appropriate staff, including the Executive Team, on behalf of the CEO.
- Manage all aspects of organization’s office services. Evaluate and assist in developing office policies and procedures for improved work flow and anticipate future needs as organization grows.
- Answer CEO’s phone calls and respond to inquiries.
- Other projects/duties as assigned for the overall benefit of the organization.

QUALIFICATIONS:
- Bachelor’s Degree Contract and/or 2+ year of experience supporting administrative functions at the executive level
- Independent performer highly responsive and works well with fast paced changing environment
- Excellent communication skills, word, excel, social media, power point
- Interpersonal skills
- Problem solver, results oriented,
- Understanding of auto business appreciated
- Respectful, discrete, loyal
- Ability to manage multiple assignments, set priorities, and adapt to changing conditions
- Handle pressure well

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:
Computer Processor: Minimum 5th generation Intel i5 processor or equivalent
Computer Memory/RAM: Minimum 4.00 GB
Computer Operating System: Windows 10 or Mac OSX - No Linux, Unix, or any operating system other than what is required.
Internet Speed: Running on a 5.0 MBPS plan or higher (Both primary and backup) - If your backup connection cannot serve as your primary connection, that does not qualify as a backup connection
REQUIRED Headset: Noise-cancelling headset connected via USB port
REQUIRED WebCam: At least 3 megapixels capable of 720p recording

Note: The computer system you will be using should not be shared with anyone else and should be dedicated for work only.

APPLY HERE: cubecare.bamboohr.com/careers/32

title: Podcast Management Virtual Assistant
description:
Job Description: Podcast Management Virtual Assistant

About Us:
We are a dynamic and growing team dedicated to empowering entrepreneurs to achieve their goals and enhance their visibility through strategic content creation. Our mission includes producing high-quality podcast content that resonates with our audience and drives engagement.

Job Summary:
We are seeking an experienced Administrative/Management Virtual Assistant with a strong background in podcast management. The ideal candidate will assist with various administrative tasks and management duties for multiple podcasts, ensuring smooth operations and high-quality production. A verifiable portfolio detailing prior work is required. Candidates must submit a resume, portfolio, work samples, and a short video explaining why they should be chosen for this role and detailing any relevant experience. Please include a link to your video introduction in your application.

Key Responsibilities:

 • Calendar Management: Coordinate and manage schedules, appointments, and meetings related to podcast production.
 • Email Management: Monitor and manage email accounts, respond to inquiries, and maintain organized inboxes.
 • Customer Service: Handle client phone calls, interviews, and emails, ensuring excellent customer service.
 • Automation: Implement and manage automation tools to streamline tasks and improve efficiency.
 • Community Engagement: Engage with the community through the CRM, fostering positive relationships and addressing any issues or questions.
 • Project Management: Assist in planning, coordinating, and managing projects to ensure they are completed on time and within scope.
 • Administrative Tasks: Perform various administrative tasks, including document preparation, filing, and data organization.
 • Research: Conduct research on various topics, including content research for podcast episodes, providing detailed and accurate information.
 • Data Entry: Accurately enter and update data in relevant systems and databases.
 • Scheduling & Coordinating: Schedule and coordinate podcast episodes, including contact with team members and guests.
 • Podcast Distribution: Manage the distribution of podcast episodes across multiple platforms.
