 • Strong organizational and time management skills.
 • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
 • Proficiency in using calendar and email management tools.
 • Experience with customer service, including phone calls and emails.
 • Familiarity with automation tools and CRM systems.
 • Strong project management skills and the ability to multitask.
 • Attention to detail and a commitment to accuracy.
 • Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and Google Workspace.
 • Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
 • Experience with podcast distribution platforms and analytics tools.
 • Basic understanding of social media platforms and content creation.

Preferred Qualifications:
 • Experience with project management tools (e.g., Trello, Asana).
 • Familiarity with data entry and database management.
 • Basic knowledge of research methodologies and data analysis.
 • Experience in advertising and sponsorship outreach.

Application Requirements:

3. Record a short VIDEO explaining why you should be chosen for this role and detailing any relevant experience. Include a link to the video in your application.

To apply for this position, candidates MUST complete all three of the following steps:

	1.	Submit a RESUME outlining your experience.
	2.	Provide a PORTFOLIO showcasing video editing projects for various platforms (YouTube, Reels, TikTok, etc.).
	3.	Submit a link to a newly created VIDEO introduction where you:
	•	State the current date (to verify it’s a new video).
	•	Explain why you are the perfect fit for this role.
	•	Summarize different projects you have completed, including at least one for YouTube.
	•	Showcase your work in the video using screen share or clips in the video.

The video should be concise, no longer than 2-3 minutes.

Please Note:
	•	Do not apply if you do not complete ALL THREE requirements as described above.
	•	Old video introductions or videos that do not include all the required components will NOT be considered.


What We Offer:
 • Flexible remote working environment.
 • Opportunities for professional growth and development.
 • Collaborative and supportive team culture.
 • Competitive compensation based on experience.

How to Apply:
If you are an organized and detail-oriented individual with a passion for podcast management and administrative support, we would love to hear from you! Please submit your resume, portfolio, work samples, and a short video detailing your experience and why you believe you should be hired for the job. If you are interested please apply through the application link below.

Applications submitted directly through OnlineJobsPh will not be considered.

title: Customer Service Manager
description:
Job Summary:

The Customer Service Manager is responsible for leading and optimizing the customer service team to ensure high-quality support and efficient operations across all customer-facing channels. This role is pivotal in driving team productivity, maintaining organized and updated documentation, and collaborating with other departments to enhance the overall customer experience. The ideal candidate will possess strong leadership skills, a knack for process automation, and an analytical mindset to continually improve customer service processes.

Responsibilities:
- Lead, mentor, and develop a high-performing customer service team across various channels (phone, email, chat, SMS, social media).
- Implement strategic growth plans, including recruitment, training, and performance management.
- Forecast resource needs to support customer demands and product expansion initiatives.
- Oversee and streamline daily operations, ensuring all processes are efficient, well-documented, and aligned with company objectives.
- Regularly update knowledge bases and customer-facing resources to maintain accuracy and relevance.
- Manage automation projects to minimize manual tasks and enhance operational efficiency.
- Define, monitor, and report on KPIs such as ticket resolution time, customer satisfaction, and retention metrics.
- Prepare and present weekly, monthly, and quarterly performance reports to leadership.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to streamline escalation processes and optimize workflows.
- Gather and analyze customer feedback, implementing changes for continuous service improvement.
- Monitor market trends and competitor activities to ensure service quality remains competitive.
- Prepare the team for new product launches by coordinating training sessions and updating resources.

Requirements:
- 5+ years of experience in customer service operations, preferably within the e-commerce or retail sectors.
- Proven experience in leading teams, driving performance improvements, and meeting KPIs.
- Strong analytical skills with experience using customer service platforms (e.g., Zendesk, Gorgias).
- Familiarity with e-commerce platforms such as Shopify and WooCommerce.
- Excellent leadership, communication, and problem-solving abilities.
- A proactive approach to adopting new technologies and driving continuous improvement in processes.
- Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams to enhance overall customer experience.

title: Sales Admin with HubSpot Expertise
description:
About Offshore Launch

At Offshore Launch, we empower trades and home service businesses by connecting them with the top 1% of global remote talent. We believe in improving every business—and every person—we touch.

Why Join Offshore Launch?

- Be instrumental in growing small and medium-sized businesses.
- Thrive in a people-first remote culture focused on collaboration and development.
- Access competitive benefits like HMO, PTO, professional development, and a growth-driven team.
- Join a high-growth startup poised for a major 2025.

Your Role: Consultative Project Management Meets Sales Excellence

At Offshore Launch, we don’t just thrive in chaos—we manage it with excellence. We’re looking for a tech-savvy, sales-driven, and highly organized Sales Admin who can take a fast-moving sales environment and turn it into a smooth, well-oiled machine. You’ll partner directly with our Founder, playing a critical role in organizing the sales process, managing the pipeline, and ensuring nothing slips through the cracks.

Manage each prospect in HubSpot like a project:
We’re looking for a Sales Admin who can channel a project management mindset to manage the chaos of a fast-moving sales environment, ensuring that every touchpoint feels strategic, consultative, and purposeful. You’ll be the glue between prospects, the sales process, and our internal team.

You’ll split your work into two modes: **Project Formation** (aligning stakeholders, clarifying goals, and setting foundations for deals) and **Project Management** (tracking progress against key milestones and driving forward action). This structured approach will ensure every lead becomes a well-managed opportunity.

What You’ll Do:

- Sales Proposal Architect: You’ll listen to client conversations and synthesize their needs into powerful, precise proposals. These proposals will set the stage for smooth sales and seamless client onboarding. These proposals are more than documents—they are the foundation of success for a long-term client.
- CRM Commander: You live and breathe HubSpot, managing incoming leads, tracking conversations, and ensuring nothing falls through the cracks. You bring order and structure to every interaction, keeping the sales process tight. HubSpot will be your playground. Keep everything organized, follow up methodically, and manage touch points with clarity.
- Task Manager: You’ll help our Founder, who thrives in a fast-paced environment, stay on track by managing follow-ups, tracking client progress through the pipeline, and ensuring deadlines are met.
- Communication Expert: You’ll transform scattered voice notes, emails, and conversations into clear, compelling communications that drive clients to close. You know how to craft the right message at the right time.
- Sales Process Optimizer: You’re always thinking about how to make things smoother, faster, and better. Whether it’s setting up automations in HubSpot or streamlining processes, you’re always improving.
- Milestone & Value-Driven Follow-ups: Every follow-up is an opportunity to add value, and will include a progress update with next steps. You will listen and re-listen to call recordings, comb through deal records and prospect websites, to ensure that our prospects gain value in every touchpoint and always know where they stand and what’s coming next.
- Daily Reporting: Provide daily reports that offer insight into sales pipeline status, bottlenecks, and recommendations for keeping the momentum strong, and where prospects need extra attention.

Requirements:

- 7+ years of experience in administrative or virtual assistant roles, particularly in sales.
- HubSpot proficiency is required.
- A consultative mindset with strong project management capabilities.
- You can handle the chaos of a busy sales pipeline with grace, turning potential confusion into clarity.
- Extraordinary written and verbal communication skills.
- A problem-solver who’s always thinking a step ahead and implements process improvements.
- You take ownership of your role, with high integrity and the confidence to provide honest feedback.
- Ability to manage multiple tasks and high-pressure deadlines with ease.

Compensation & Benefits:

- Competitive base salary of $1200 (depending on experience).
- $50 per closed contract.
- Recurring commission of $5/month per closed contract.
- 13th month pay.
- Performance-based bonuses.
- Comprehensive HMO for you and your dependents.
- Unlimited PTO.
- Annual education budget to support your growth.

title: Automation Expert (AI Guru) – Join Our Marketing Team
description:

What We’re Looking For:

Proven experience with automation tools like ManyChat, EL Messenger Pro, Sell by Chat, and AI platforms like ChatGPT.
Strong ability to learn and implement new systems quickly.
Experience in training and mentoring team members, with excellent communication skills.
Detail-oriented with a knack for troubleshooting and problem-solving.
Familiarity with marketing workflows and client relationship management.

Why Join The OE Agency?

Opportunity to work with diverse clients and impactful automation strategies.

Access to training and development opportunities to expand your skill set.

title: Web Scraper/Lead Generation Specialist for Credit Repair Company
description:
We are a Credit Repair company looking for a motivated and skilled Lead Generation Specialist/Web Scraper to join our team. In this role, you will play a crucial part in identifying potential clients who are seeking credit repair services and gathering valuable data to fuel our sales efforts. Your work will directly support our mission to help individuals improve their credit scores and access better financial opportunities.

Responsibilities:

- Lead Generation: Identify and qualify potential clients who may benefit from credit repair services using online resources, social media platforms, and industry databases. Execute targeted outreach campaigns through email, cold calls, and social media to build a strong pipeline of leads for our credit repair solutions.
- Web Scraping: Utilize web scraping tools such as Python, BeautifulSoup, Scrapy, or any web scraping software to extract and organize valuable data from websites, forums, and online directories to discover and analyze potential clients.
- Data Management: Maintain and update our CRM system with accurate lead information. Ensure data quality, conduct regular follow-ups, and nurture relationships with potential clients interested in credit repair.
- Collaboration: Work closely with the sales and marketing teams to align lead generation efforts with our overall company objectives, helping individuals and businesses improve their credit standing.

Qualifications:

- Proven experience in lead generation, sales, or marketing, ideally in a B2B environment, with a focus on credit repair services preferred.
- Proficiency in web scraping tools and techniques.
- Strong analytical skills with attention to detail, particularly when identifying credit repair opportunities for potential clients.
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to reach out to potential clients through various channels.
- Ability to work independently, manage multiple projects simultaneously, and deliver high-quality results.


If you are confident that you meet the qualifications and want to help people improve their financial futures, please complete the form:

title: Backend Engineer (Contract-to-Hire)
description:
Who We Are:
At Conexus Technology, we are a dynamic digital agency dedicated to delivering enterprise-class solutions. Specializing in backend development and AI-driven technologies, we focus on building scalable, secure, and impactful digital experiences across industries such as retail, higher education, and beyond. We collaborate closely with clients to address their unique challenges, leveraging cutting-edge technologies to provide strategic, tailored solutions.

What We’re Looking For:
We are seeking an experienced Backend Engineer with a strong passion for server-side development, API design, and scalable architecture. In this role, you will lead the backend efforts of our digital solutions, working closely with AI technologies to create intelligent, secure, and high-performance applications. If you have a problem-solving mindset and thrive in fast-paced, innovative environments, we would love to have you on our team.

Key Responsibilities:
Backend API Development: Design and build robust, scalable APIs using Node.js, Go, and Python, integrating with complex AI systems and external data sources. Provide server-side logic for user-facing elements.
Cloud Solutions & Architecture: Architect and develop cloud-based solutions using AWS offerings like API Gateway, Lambda, DynamoDB, Cognito, and experience with AWS SAM for building and deploying APIs. Ensure high availability and fault tolerance.
AI Workflow Integration: Implement AI-driven workflows to enhance backend processes using tools like LangChain, LangGraph, Hugging Face, or similar frameworks.
Database Management: Create and manage database schemas to support business processes, ensuring seamless integration between multiple data sources and backend systems.
Security & Compliance: Implement user authentication and authorization across distributed systems using industry standards such as OAuth 2.0 and OpenID Connect. Ensure accessibility and web security compliance.
API Standards & Documentation: Design well-documented APIs following best practices, utilizing standards such as Swagger or RAML for clear and consistent documentation.
Automated Testing & CI/CD: Develop and maintain automated testing platforms, including unit and integration tests. Lead efforts in continuous integration and delivery pipelines for reliable deployments.
Collaborative Development: Work closely with frontend engineers, product managers, and other stakeholders to align backend solutions with project goals.

Preferred Skills and Experience:
Backend & Cloud Expertise: Proven experience with backend development using Node.js and Go, with a strong understanding of asynchronous programming and related design patterns. Experience in deploying and managing services on AWS or similar cloud platforms.
AI & Data Integration: Experience working with AI frameworks such as LangChain, LangGraph, Hugging Face, and integrating AI workflows into backend systems.
Security & Scalability: Solid understanding of security compliance and scalable architecture design principles for building high-performance services.
Database Design: Experience with designing and managing database schemas using SQL and NoSQL databases to support complex business processes.
Version Control & DevOps: Proficiency in using code versioning tools like Git and Bitbucket. Familiarity with container technology (e.g., Docker), Linux distributions, and Agile or DevOps methodologies.
Infrastructure & Networking: Familiarity with basic networking principles and infrastructure design to support the development of scalable services and APIs.
Problem-Solving Mindset: Strong analytical skills and a proactive approach to solving backend challenges with creative and scalable solutions.

Additional Qualifications:
Minimum of 4 years of backend development experience, with a focus on API design and scalability.
Experience with automated testing, unit testing, integration testing, and monitoring of backend systems.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously with a focus on innovation and client needs.
Strong communication skills and a collaborative approach to cross-functional teamwork.
Why Join Us?

Career Growth:
Opportunities to advance and grow quickly as a leader in a dynamic, fast-paced environment.
Competitive Salary & Benefits: Competitive salary based on experience, flexible time off, remote work opportunities, and bonus eligibility.
Innovative Projects: Work on impactful backend projects that leverage AI-driven solutions, with the opportunity to shape the future of enterprise digital experiences.
Job Types: Full-time

If you are ready to be part of a growing team, passionate about backend development, and eager to take on innovative challenges, apply today!

title: Office Manager (Trainee Operations Manager)
description:
About Us:
At The OE Agency, we’re passionate about building lasting connections, optimizing operations, and driving impactful marketing strategies. With a commitment to excellence and innovation, we’re seeking an Office Manager ready to grow into a Trainee Operations Manager role. This is a rare opportunity for a self-motivated leader who excels in managing people, systems, and processes, and who is eager to grow into a key leadership position.

The Opportunity:
In this role, you’ll start by mastering office management tasks while taking charge of customer service, marketing oversight, and stock control. With your dedication and skills, you’ll transition into the Operations Manager role, implementing systems and processes that drive growth and efficiency.

What You’ll Do:

Customer Service Leadership
Oversee customer support across email, social media (Facebook, Instagram, and Shopify), and other communication channels.
Act as a brand ambassador, ensuring every client interaction reflects our values of integrity, transparency, and kindness.
Manage wholesale and retail customer queries, onboarding new clients, and providing solutions for order issues.
Coordinate with logistics providers to maintain accurate stock and order processing.

Marketing Oversight
Supervise the marketing team, ensuring the execution of social media strategies, content creation, and campaign coordination.
Manage community engagement by responding to comments, fostering relationships, and coordinating with influencers and ambassadors.
Track marketing performance metrics, including social media analytics, ambassador commissions, and campaign outcomes.
Collaborate with the creative team to plan and execute promotional activities, events, and product launches.

Stock & Inventory Management
Liaise with suppliers, logistics providers, and warehouses to maintain accurate stock levels in Shopify.
Monitor inventory thresholds, reorder supplies, and track shipments to ensure business continuity.
Maintain detailed stock tracking systems and report weekly updates.
Ensure proper documentation of stock manifests, packing slips, and logistics records.

Operations Management
Develop and implement Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for customer service, stock management, and marketing workflows.
Identify inefficiencies and lead process improvement initiatives, leveraging (or training in) Six Sigma methodologies.
Utilize automation tools to streamline operations and reduce manual workloads.
Prepare for the transition to Operations Manager by taking ownership of team leadership, project coordination, and budget oversight.

Team Leadership & Development
Hire, train, and mentor team members, ensuring their alignment with company values and objectives.
Foster a collaborative, growth-oriented team culture that emphasizes accountability and continuous improvement.
Delegate tasks effectively and manage workflows to meet deadlines and maintain quality standards.

General Administration
Oversee the organization of emails, inquiries, and content creation pipelines.
Conduct regular health checks on e-commerce platforms, ensuring smooth functionality and user experience.
Update and maintain operational tools, including content calendars, order processing systems, and marketing schedules.

What We’re Looking For:

Experience in office or operations management, customer service, or marketing coordination.
Strong organizational and problem-solving skills, with a focus on cost control and operational efficiency.
Proficiency with Shopify, social media tools (e.g., Planoly), and automation platforms (e.g., Manychat or Clavio).
A background in e-commerce and inventory management is highly preferred.
Willingness to undergo Six Sigma training and apply it to streamline processes.
A growth-oriented mindset, with the humility to learn and the drive to lead.
Exceptional communication skills and a passion for delivering exceptional client and team experiences.

Why Join The OE Agency?

Be part of a forward-thinking agency committed to innovation and excellence.
Gain hands-on experience and mentorship to evolve into an Operations Manager role.
Access to ongoing training, including Six Sigma certification and marketing skill development.
Collaborate with a supportive and ambitious team dedicated to making an impact.

How to Apply:
If you’re ready to lead, innovate, and grow with us, we’d love to hear from you! Please submit:

Your resume and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience.

A short video (2-3 minutes) outlining your 30-, 60-, and 90-day plan to succeed in this role.

Please include the followers for the Instagram account @lezlykaye with your application.

Take the next step in your career with The OE Agency and help us shape the future of operations and marketing.

title: Digital Marketing Project Manager (Meta)
description:
!!! PLEASE READ THE WHOLE JOB POSTING BEFORE APPLYING !!!

Position Overview:

We are seeking a highly skilled and proactive Marketing Project Manager - Meta Operations to oversee and improve processes for Meta ad campaigns, including naming structure, optimization tracking, and creative development. This role is essential for ensuring our marketing teams execute campaigns efficiently, with clear accountability, and aligned with our performance goals. The Marketing Project Manager will also be responsible for developing and managing performance reports, providing critical insights to guide optimization efforts.

Key Responsibilities:

Process Improvement for Meta Campaigns:
-Refine Meta Ads processes related to naming structures, ensuring consistency between Meta Ads Manager and internal Notion databases.
-Develop and implement tracking systems for campaign optimization and creative performance.
-Oversee the creative development process, ensuring all assets are properly categorized and tracked.

Performance Reporting and Metrics:
-Design, build, and manage performance reports, highlighting key metrics, trends, and opportunities for improvement across Meta campaigns.
-Create and send the PSM Meta Report on a weekly basis, ensuring consistency and accuracy in all data points.
-Implement a system for weekly Meta Notion reports for PSMs, documenting procedures in a formal SOP for long-term efficiency.
-Update and maintain accurate campaign names in Notion to align with active Meta campaigns, simplifying report generation and improving automation.

Creative Development Support:
-Work with internal teams to define SOPs and processes for conducting competitor research by service/treatment, and analyze creative performance (best and worst images, videos, and copy).
-Execute research processes weekly to support creative development and provide insights into competitor trends.

Notion Database Management:
-Oversee daily/weekly updates to the Notion databases that help the Meta team, ensuring the accuracy and accountability of all entries.
-Optimization database - This includes the process to get the weekly stats into the database.
-Provider database - This includes managing entries for new preferences from Personalized Marketing Strategy forms and ensuring data integrity.
-Ensure campaign names are consistently updated in the database to reflect active campaigns in Meta Ads Manager.

Account Management and Naming Structures:
-Manage the Meta Ads account naming system, ensuring correct and consistent naming practices across all accounts and campaigns.
-Collaborate with team members to update ad account names when account assignments change. Ensure clear documentation of account assignments, following the naming convention (initials + Moxie) as set by leadership.

Meta Requests Process Management:
-Define and manage the SOP for Meta requests, ensuring all requests are handled in a timely and organized manner.

Omni Reporting Management:
-Develop and execute omni-channel reporting processes to provide a comprehensive view of campaign performance across platforms, with a focus on improving Meta optimization.

Meta Traffic Management & Overdue Task Accountability:
-Monitor and manage overdue tasks, ensuring deadlines are met for Meta-related activities.
-Collaborate with team members to ensure that consultation and investigation requests are handled efficiently.
-Set up notifications and adjust rules as needed for seamless collaboration.

Meta Access Coordination:
-Coordinate with the onboarding team to ensure Meta access is granted to new Meta Specialists and PSMs as needed; leads permission, phone verification, credit card.
-Regularly review access permissions to ensure Meta Specialists have full access to their accounts and PSMs have View Only permissions.

Campaign Launch Access Protocol:
-Ensure all Facebook pages used in new campaigns have granted necessary Lead Permissions in the business portfolio.
-Verify that all users have the appropriate access and permissions. Update permissions as needed and notify the onboarding team if issues are found.
-Coordinate with Anne to re-integrate Meta and GHL accounts when user permissions are updated, ensuring smooth functionality and access for all users.

Qualifications:

-Proven experience in project management, particularly within a marketing or advertising environment.
-Strong knowledge of Meta Ads Manager, including campaign tracking, optimization, and reporting.
-Proficiency with Notion or other project management tools; experience managing databases and maintaining SOPs is a plus.
-Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and present actionable insights.
-Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
-Strong organizational skills, with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
-This role is critical to ensuring the smooth execution of our Meta ad campaigns and creative processes. The Marketing Project --Manager will work closely with cross-functional teams, ensuring alignment between marketing strategy, execution, and performance tracking.

TO APPLY, PLEASE CLICK ON THE LINK BELOW:
https://jobs.ashbyhq.com/Moxie/a2ae4493-544b-4b6e-a9f2-612b027b610b

title: Hiring A Copywriter
description:
Ecommerce Marketing Agency looking to bring a new Copywriter to the team.
We specialize in Email Marketing and SMS Marketing for eCommerce brands.
Full-time & long-term position.

Must have:
- 6 months or more of experience writing copywriting and content for e-commerce brands, email marketing, social media posts, blog content, web content, etc.
- Basic email marketing knowledge with email platforms like Klaviyo or Mailchimp
- Basic knowledge of Shopify and e-commerce
- Fluent in spoken & written English

If you join our team you will be a part of the Email & SMS Marketing branch where you will be working inside:

title: Digital Marketing Project Manager (Meta)
description:
!!! PLEASE READ THE WHOLE JOB POSTING BEFORE APPLYING !!!

Position Overview:

We are seeking a highly skilled and proactive Marketing Project Manager - Meta Operations to oversee and improve processes for Meta ad campaigns, including naming structure, optimization tracking, and creative development. This role is essential for ensuring our marketing teams execute campaigns efficiently, with clear accountability, and aligned with our performance goals. The Marketing Project Manager will also be responsible for developing and managing performance reports, providing critical insights to guide optimization efforts.

Key Responsibilities:

Process Improvement for Meta Campaigns:
-Refine Meta Ads processes related to naming structures, ensuring consistency between Meta Ads Manager and internal Notion databases.
-Develop and implement tracking systems for campaign optimization and creative performance.
-Oversee the creative development process, ensuring all assets are properly categorized and tracked.

Performance Reporting and Metrics:
-Design, build, and manage performance reports, highlighting key metrics, trends, and opportunities for improvement across Meta campaigns.
-Create and send the PSM Meta Report on a weekly basis, ensuring consistency and accuracy in all data points.
-Implement a system for weekly Meta Notion reports for PSMs, documenting procedures in a formal SOP for long-term efficiency.
-Update and maintain accurate campaign names in Notion to align with active Meta campaigns, simplifying report generation and improving automation.

Creative Development Support:
-Work with internal teams to define SOPs and processes for conducting competitor research by service/treatment, and analyze creative performance (best and worst images, videos, and copy).
-Execute research processes weekly to support creative development and provide insights into competitor trends.

Notion Database Management:
-Oversee daily/weekly updates to the Notion databases that help the Meta team, ensuring the accuracy and accountability of all entries. 
-Optimization database - This includes the process to get the weekly stats into the database.
-Provider database - This includes managing entries for new preferences from Personalized Marketing Strategy forms and ensuring data integrity.
-Ensure campaign names are consistently updated in the database to reflect active campaigns in Meta Ads Manager.

Account Management and Naming Structures:
-Manage the Meta Ads account naming system, ensuring correct and consistent naming practices across all accounts and campaigns.
-Collaborate with team members to update ad account names when account assignments change. Ensure clear documentation of account assignments, following the naming convention (initials + Moxie) as set by leadership.

Meta Requests Process Management:
-Define and manage the SOP for Meta requests, ensuring all requests are handled in a timely and organized manner.

Omni Reporting Management:
-Develop and execute omni-channel reporting processes to provide a comprehensive view of campaign performance across platforms, with a focus on improving Meta optimization.

Meta Traffic Management & Overdue Task Accountability:
-Monitor and manage overdue tasks, ensuring deadlines are met for Meta-related activities. 
-Collaborate with team members to ensure that consultation and investigation requests are handled efficiently. 
-Set up notifications and adjust rules as needed for seamless collaboration.

Meta Access Coordination:
-Coordinate with the onboarding team to ensure Meta access is granted to new Meta Specialists and PSMs as needed; leads permission, phone verification, credit card. 
-Regularly review access permissions to ensure Meta Specialists have full access to their accounts and PSMs have View Only permissions.

Campaign Launch Access Protocol:
-Ensure all Facebook pages used in new campaigns have granted necessary Lead Permissions in the business portfolio.
-Verify that all users have the appropriate access and permissions. Update permissions as needed and notify the onboarding team if issues are found.
-Coordinate with Anne to re-integrate Meta and GHL accounts when user permissions are updated, ensuring smooth functionality and access for all users.

Qualifications:

-Proven experience in project management, particularly within a marketing or advertising environment.
-Strong knowledge of Meta Ads Manager, including campaign tracking, optimization, and reporting.
-Proficiency with Notion or other project management tools; experience managing databases and maintaining SOPs is a plus.
-Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and present actionable insights.
-Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
-Strong organizational skills, with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
-This role is critical to ensuring the smooth execution of our Meta ad campaigns and creative processes. The Marketing Project --Manager will work closely with cross-functional teams, ensuring alignment between marketing strategy, execution, and performance tracking.

TO APPLY, PLEASE CLICK ON THE LINK BELOW:
https://jobs.ashbyhq.com/Moxie/a2ae4493-544b-4b6e-a9f2-612b027b610b

title: Experienced Crypto/Forex Technical Analyst (Work From Home, Long-Term Opportunity)
description:
We are looking for a dedicated and experienced Technical Analyst specializing in crypto and forex markets to join our team. This is a work-from-home position with a long-term opportunity for the right candidate.

Responsibilities:
Conduct in-depth technical analysis of crypto and forex markets.
Identify market trends, patterns, and opportunities using advanced tools and techniques.
Provide actionable insights and strategies to enhance trading performance.
Prepare detailed reports and summaries of market findings.
Collaborate with the team to develop and implement effective trading strategies.
Requirements:
Proven experience in crypto and/or forex technical analysis.
Proficiency in using technical tools like TradingView, MetaTrader, or similar platforms.
Strong understanding of chart patterns, indicators, and market dynamics.
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
Reliable and dedicated to meeting deadlines and delivering quality work.
Ability to work independently in a remote environment.
Preferred Qualifications:
Previous experience working in a similar role.
Certifications or completed courses in technical analysis (proof required).
A portfolio showcasing your analytical skills and past projects.
How to Apply:
Please submit the following:

Your updated resume.
A brief summary of your experience in crypto/forex analysis.
Links to certifications or completed courses.
Your portfolio or relevant case studies showcasing your expertise.

title: Digital Design Coordinator / Graphic Designer & Video Editor (Full-time & Remote/WFH)
description:
We, a US mobile marketing agency, are hiring for 1 full-time Graphic & Video Editor with at least 3 years of experience in relevant roles.

HOW TO APPLY

Please only apply if you have read this job ad from start to finish. Read through to know more.

JOB SUMMARY

This role is not your typical graphic & video editor position because you will be collaborating internally with teams across the company who are all pursuing lofty goals and groundbreaking initiatives. This is not a place where you're better off strategizing and working alone like a freelancer; it's the opposite. Prompt, daily communication on a daily basis is the key to excellence in our projects, so if you're a communicator, you're already one step ahead of the applicants.

At our company, we foster a very supportive, fun, and diverse culture rooted in exceptional competence, adept problem-solving, and sheer aptitude.

Yet again, this position isn't for the lazy or timid.

They're crafted for resilient problem solvers who excel amidst intense pressure, confronting challenges as monumental as the combined peaks of Mount Fuji, Mount Merapi, and Mount Kinabalu.

We're talking about creative, tech-savvy people who embrace the opportunity to tackle problems day in and day out, with teamwork, speed, and accuracy in mind as the top priority. If you're one of us, we encourage you to apply.

The ideal candidate will need to be fully available from 7 pm - 3 am PHT so it's highly preferable that he/she isn't currently engaged with any company/client during the said hours. Additionally, you will be trained on everything you need to know to excel in this role.

HIRING PROCESS

1. Screening call
2. Test project
3. Second interview
4. Final interview
5. Full-time job offer under 3-month probationary period
6. Permanent position

WHO ARE WE?

Intrinsic Digital, Inc. (intrinsicdigital.com) is at the forefront of digital marketing. Our service lines include ApartmentGeofencing.com, HotelGeofencing.com and RestaurantGeofencing.com, offering pinpoint mobile advertising to the multifamily, hospitality, and restaurant industries.

Intrinsic Digital is a fully remote company and our employees are spread out across the U.S., and now globally. Our culture is based around our Core Focus, “We love the journey” and six Core Values: Accountability, Authenticity, Caring, Surprise & Delight, X-Ray Vision and Neutralevity. We may be remote, but no one is isolated in their work. Our initial onboarding and ongoing collaboration efforts have formed a cohesive team. We were voted No. 1 Best Place to Work in Multifamily and certified Great Places to Work in 2023 (USA). Employees also consistently score us above 9 out of 10 on two key satisfaction categories: “Intrinsic Digital cares about my well-being” and “I would recommend Intrinsic Digital as a great place to work.”

- Employment Type: Full-Time
- Work hours: 7 pm - 3 am PH time for Onboarding, and then Choice of scheduled hours after, Starting at 5 pm PH time.
- Required hours: 40 hours per week, 8 hours per day
- Work Schedule: Monday to Friday
- Work Set-up: Remote (Laptop and external monitor will be provided). The ideal applicants should reside within Metro Manila and aren’t presently engaged with any company/client
- Start Date: Immediately (ASAP)

WHO ARE YOU?

The Digital Design Coordinator candidate will be a self-motivated individual who is passionate about driving results. Qualified candidates will possess/have:

- Strong portfolio showcasing graphic design projects; big plus if you feature animated banners or video projects
- Proficiency in graphic design or animation software and tools such as Canva, Creatopy, Adobe Photoshop, After Effects or similar editing tools.
- 3+ years of digital marketing and/or graphic design related experience?
- A bachelor's degree in a relevant field, or equivalent working experience
- Proficiency in creating and editing videos using industry-standard software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar video editing tools.
- A strong understanding of English copywriting to handle headline & script writing with no grammar errors, clear sentence structure and proper pronunciation for video voice overs.
- Strong written and verbal communication skills, not afraid to speak up in meetings and ask questions when necessary.
- A keen eye for aesthetics, high degree of autonomy, strong sense of accountability, attention to details and problem solving
- The utmost of integrity, both with clients and with colleagues?
- A goal-oriented mindset with a track record of exceeding expectations
- Exceptional teamwork skills: you support the success of those around you
- Excellent organization with the ability to work independently and multitask with minimal supervision
- Experience within task management platforms such as Asana, Monday.com or an equivalent platform is greatly beneficial.

WHAT WILL YOU DO?

As a Digital Design Coordinator, you will act as the creative genius that transforms the client’s ideas into stunning visual stories and immerse yourself in the creative strategies for each client. You will:

- Develop creative concepts, visual designs, and layouts for a wide range of ad projects based on client requests
- Create eye-catching banner and video ads using specific design software and tools
- Ensure visual materials align with brand guidelines and maintain a consistent brand identity
- Edit and retouch images, including color correction, cropping, and optimization for various platforms
- Select appropriate fonts and typography styles to enhance readability and aesthetics
- Incorporate feedback and make revisions to designs based on client or team input
- Manage multiple design projects simultaneously, meeting deadlines and delivering high-quality work
- Work closely with internal teams to understand design objectives and project requirements
- Stay updated on design trends, emerging technologies, and industry best practices
- Fulfill up to 130 creative assignments per month


BENEFITS + PERKS

At Intrinsic Digital, you’ll have a front row seat at an early-stage small business that is driving innovation in multiple industries, as well as a chance to make a real impact on the growth of our business.

Intrinsic Digital offers a fast-paced, supportive, and diverse culture.

Permanent full-time employees receive:

- Full remote setup include company laptop, keyboard and external monitor
- A health and wellness stipend for the employee and 50% for their children
- An innovative Minimum PTO Policy that requires every employee to take at least two weeks of PTO but encourages up to four
- Paid holidays
- Annual cash bonuses based on company and personal performance (13th month paycheck)
- A choice of five 8-hour schedules with start times between 5 am and 9 am EST, after initial onboarding period

HOW TO APPLY

Use "OLJ Digital Design Coordinator" as the subject, attach both links to your resume and portfolio, and summarize in ONLY 3 sentences why you should be hired for this role. A strong applicant will have met these simple instructions from the get-go.=

title: VA - BILLING, MEDICAL CUSTOMER SERVICE & CLINICAL LAB IT SPECIALIST
description:
Join Our Team!
We are seeking for qualified individuals for the following positions:

1). V I R T U A L A S S I S T A N T - B I L L I N G
JOB TYPE - full time, VA role is 100% Work-from-Home
Required hours: 40 hours per week | Eastern Standard Time | Mon-Fri 9:00 AM-6:00 PM EST (can be scheduled to cover weekends, total is still 40 hours per week)

DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
In-charge/ will be trained in all aspects of billing cycle:
- Data entry on patient demographic and insurance information
- Collect missed information from order physicians
- Verify insurance and benefits
- Obtain pre-authorizations as required for procedures
- Review claims for accuracy before billing
- Electronic billing, paper billing, and rebill claims
- Posting payments
- Keep in contact with the responsible parties involved as to payments due and the status of their accounts.
- Interpret EOB and correct denials of claims
- Research on denied claims
- Appeal or modify claims according to insurance guidelines
- Customer Service skills to answer clients’ billing questions
- Write narrative comment/report on account
- Call insurance companies regarding any discrepancy in payments if necessary
*Focus on one or the above responsibilities after training
- Backup cover for other staff if necessary
- May switch to be responsible for the whole billing cycle on one specific client
- Participate in specific billing project assigned

SKILLS and QUALIFICATIONS
- Minimum 3+ years of experience as a virtual assistant in the healthcare industry/BPO Healthcare accounts
- Solid experience in cold calling
- Has basic knowledge of medical devices
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills | High English Proficiency
- A high attention to detail due to the volume of contacts across platforms
- Strong Interpersonal Skills with the ability to communicate effectively and professionally with patients, teammates, healthcare professionals, and sales team
- Consistently meet and attain required Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)
- Outstanding customer service skills with the ability to resolve patient concerns
- Proficient with MS Office and the ability to navigate multiple platforms
- Ability to adapt quickly and learn Company's services provided to the customers

2). VA - M E D I C A L C U S T O M E R S E R V I C E
Preferably with a background in medical assistance and an understanding of laboratory work orders and reports. Knowledge of US phlebotomy practices is highly desirable. The ideal candidate must be proficient in computer-based medical skills, capable of efficiently managing administrative tasks, and adaptable to new technologies.

Key Responsibilities:
Customer Interaction:
- Provide exceptional customer service via phone, email, and other platforms.
- Address and resolve customer inquiries and concerns promptly and professionally.
- Maintain immaculate phone etiquette and thorough interpersonal skills.
Administrative Support:
- Manage and organize lab work orders and reports.
- Ensure accurate data entry and record-keeping.
- Balance multiple tasks efficiently while staying organized.
Technical Proficiency:
- Utilize computer-based medical systems for various administrative tasks.
- Adapt to new software and technologies as needed.
- Assist with other duties as assigned to support the team.

Qualifications:
- Background as a Medical Assistant, with a solid understanding of lab work orders and reports.
- Proficiency in computer-based medical skills and administrative task management.
- Strong attention to detail and organizational skills.
- Excellent interpersonal and communication skills.
- Immaculate phone etiquette.
- Ability to balance multiple tasks effectively.

3). VA - C L I N I C A L L A B I T S P E C I A L I S T
Position Overview: The ideal candidate should have a strong background in both IT and clinical laboratory science, ensuring seamless operation and integration of the Laboratory Information System (LIS) and associated technologies.

JOB TYPE - full time, 100% Work-from-Home ( Contract - 6 months)
Required hours: 40 hours per week | Eastern Standard Time

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:

• LIS Administration and Management:
o Administer and maintain the Laboratory Information System (LIS).
o Understand and manage clinical lab terminologies, test menus, and lab report formats.
o Oversee LIS internal data workflows, including data generation, translation, setup, and administration.
o Manage LIS interfaces with lab equipment and other data sources.
o Facilitate LIS data exchange with external sources and destinations, with a strong grasp of HL7 standards.
o Utilize commercial tools (e.g., Mirth) and scripting languages (JavaScript, Python) to manage data workflows.

• Network System Administration:
o Set up and administer internet/intranet systems.
o Implement and manage security systems.
• Office Software and Automation:
o Set up and administer PC systems.
o Manage Google Suite and Microsoft Office applications.
o Oversee office print/scan/fax/email applications.

Education Requirements:
• Bachelor’s degree or higher in IT, Computer Science, Clinical Lab Science, or a related field.

Key Skills:
• Proficiency in PC/Data/Clinical Lab management
• Strong understanding of LIS applications and administration
• Expertise in network system setup and administration
• Competency with office software and automation

Qualifications:
• In-depth knowledge of laboratory information systems and clinical laboratory workflows.
• Proficiency in network and security system administration.
• Advanced skills in office software and automation, including macros.
• Excellent problem-solving abilities and attention to detail.
• Strong communication and teamwork skills.

RESOURCES NEEDED :
- Minimum PC specification (at least core i4)
- Should have stable internet
- with Webcam
- Headset and microphone


ABOUT OUR CLIENT:

DDL is a US based company engaged in full-service laboratory providing hematology, chemistry, toxicology, immunology, and virology testing. They provide personalized, efficient, quality-oriented laboratory services.

DDL is a growing force in the healthcare industry and have been providing customized service to a wide array of clientele, including Physicians’ Offices, Pain management Clinics, Urgent Cares, and more.

Why Join DDL?
• Be a part of a growing company in the healthcare industry.
• Professional development and growth opportunities.

title: Data Analyst
description:
Position Title: Virtual Assistant - Data Analyst for EC 

 Location: Remote (Philippines) 

 Employment Type: Full-time, Contractor 

 Reporting To: Director of Operations/Head of Analytics 

 Job Summary 

 The Virtual Data Analyst is responsible for remotely analyzing and interpreting data to support data-driven decision-making across departments. This role involves collecting, cleaning, and organizing data, creating insightful reports, visualizing trends, and providing actionable insights to support business operations and enhance efficiency. The Virtual Data Analyst works closely with cross-functional teams, identifying data needs and generating analysis in a fully remote setting. 

Duties and Responsibilities for Virtual Assistant - Data Analyst 

Collect, clean, and organize data to ensure accuracy and completeness. 

Data Quality Rate (Target: 98?curacy in data entries) 

Analyze data to identify trends and generate actionable insights for business improvements. 

Insight Generation Accuracy (Target: 95% of insights aligned with business needs) 

Create and maintain dashboards and reports to support operations and decision-making. 

Report Timeliness (Target: 100% of reports delivered on schedule) 

Collaborate with stakeholders to identify data needs and support data-driven projects. 

Stakeholder Satisfaction (Target: 90% satisfaction rating from stakeholders) 

Recommend and implement data process improvements to enhance analysis accuracy and efficiency. 

Process Improvement Implementation (Target: 2 data process improvements per year) 

Qualifications 

Experience: Minimum 2-4 years of experience in data analysis, business intelligence, or a similar role, with experience in remote data analysis. 

Technical Skills: Proficiency in data analysis tools and software (e.g., SQL, Python, R), data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI), and familiarity with databases. 

Knowledge: Strong understanding of data analytics, statistical analysis, and business intelligence methodologies. 

Key Competencies 

Analytical Thinking: Ability to analyze complex data sets and derive actionable insights. 

Attention to Detail: Ensures accuracy in data collection, entry, and reporting. 

Communication: Strong written and verbal communication skills to effectively share insights with non-technical stakeholders. 

Independence and Initiative: Capable of working independently and proactively identifying ways to improve data processes. 

Collaboration: Works well with cross-functional teams, understanding and meeting remote data needs for various departments. 

30/60/90-Day Targets for Virtual Assistant - Data Analyst 

30 Days: 

Complete onboarding and become familiar with data sources, tools, and remote analysis processes. 

Achieve 90?curacy in initial data cleaning and reporting tasks. 

Begin collaborating with key stakeholders to understand data requirements. 

60 Days: 

Take ownership of data analysis for specific projects, generating actionable insights with 95?curacy. 

Develop initial dashboards and reports that align with stakeholder needs. 

Identify and propose one process improvement for data accuracy. 

90 Days: 

Consistently deliver reports on time with high data accuracy and actionable insights. 

Implement at least one process improvement for data analysis. 

Establish regular feedback sessions with stakeholders to ensure data needs are being met. 

How to Apply

Interested candidates are invited to Fill out the form to proceed with the application: wkf.ms/3AYDD9e

title: Social Media and Marketing Manager
description:
Are you a dynamic leader with a passion for marketing, team development, and process optimization? 

The OE Agency is on the hunt for a Social Media & Marketing Manager to lead our marketing efforts and elevate our team’s performance.

About The Role: As our Social Media & Marketing Manager, you will play a pivotal role in overseeing and developing our marketing strategy, building high-performing teams, and ensuring client satisfaction. Your responsibilities will include leading, hiring, training, and upskilling team members while fostering a positive culture. You’ll also manage workflows, implement automation tools, and oversee social media, content creation, and e-commerce strategies.

Key Responsibilities:

Leadership & Team Management: Lead, mentor, and grow a talented marketing team. Hire, train, and upskill staff to deliver exceptional results.
Marketing Strategy: Design and execute cutting-edge social media and content strategies that drive engagement and ROI.
Process & Systems Optimization: Develop workflows, automation systems, and scalable processes to enhance team efficiency.
Client Management: Act as a key liaison for clients, ensuring satisfaction and maintaining quality control across projects.
E-commerce & Clavio Expertise: Leverage your knowledge of e-commerce and email marketing (preferably with Clavio) to deliver measurable outcomes.
Delegation & Oversight: Effectively delegate tasks, monitor performance, and support team members to meet project deadlines.

What We’re Looking For:

Experience: Proven track record in marketing leadership roles, with strong social media, content creation, and e-commerce experience.
Automation Skills: Proficiency in setting up and managing automation tools to streamline workflows.
Leadership Qualities: A natural mentor who can inspire, support, and develop a high-performing team.
Client-Focused: Exceptional client relationship skills, with the ability to ensure satisfaction and deliver on expectations.
Strategic Vision: Ability to develop and communicate clear 30-, 60-, and 90-day plans for success.
Culture Champion: A leader who fosters collaboration, innovation, and a positive work environment.

Why Join Us?

Be part of an innovative agency shaping the future of marketing and social media.
Work with a talented team in a supportive and growth-oriented environment.
Drive meaningful impact for clients while advancing your career in marketing and leadership.
How to Apply: If this sounds like the perfect opportunity for you, we’d love to hear from you! Please submit:

Your resume.
A cover letter detailing your relevant experience.
A short video (2-3 minutes) outlining your 30-, 60-, and 90-day plan for success in this role.
Applications close [insert closing date].

Join The OE Agency and take the next step in your career as a marketing leader! ????

title: Start ASAP! Email Marketer
description:
We’re on the lookout for an Email Marketer to join our expanding team and drive our company’s growth!

The Challenge
The company is aiming to boost sales and enhance customer engagement through driving targeted campaigns, and to actualize this vision, we are looking forward to bringing an Email Marketer to the team who is capable of utilizing data analytics to optimize strategies, ensuring higher conversion rates and better ROI. Additionally, the Email Marketer’s efforts in automation and segmentation is expected to improve efficiency and relevance, ultimately leading to sustained growth and profitability.

Day in the Life of an Email Marketer at GT Ecom
• Design, execute, and oversee email campaigns, ensuring they are targeted and effective.
• Manage email marketing for all stores, both automated flows and single campaigns.
• Build, maintain, and segment an email subscriber list to maximize engagement and compliance with regulations.
• Craft compelling email content, including promotional messages, product highlights, and visuals that resonate with the audience.
• Set-up automated workflows for various customer interactions, such as welcome emails and cart abandonment reminders.
• Monitor and analyze key metrics to evaluate campaign effectiveness and inform future strategies
• Conduct experiments on subject lines, content, and sending times to identify what drives better engagement and results.

Important Number for this Role
Increase revenue from email by 20% this coming quarter 

Your Team When You Join Us
In this role, you will be reporting to the Bulk Store Manager and work alongside an eight-member global team to develop and implement marketing strategies aimed at increasing bulk product visibility and sales through effective campaigns and engaging content.

We would love to hear from you if…
• You have at least 1 to 2 years of experience in email marketing specifically working with an e-commerce client in fashion niche
• You have an experience running BFCM campaigns 
• You have a working knowledge in Shopify
• You have the ability to create compelling and engaging content that captures the audience’s attention
• You are proficient in analyzing data and metrics to assess campaign performance and inform strategy
• You are experienced with email marketing tools like Klaviyo, Mailchimp, etc. and with technical knowledge in connecting Klaviyo to Google and Meta ads. 
• You are knowledgeable of how email marketing fits into broader digital marketing strategies and SEO practices
• If you speak German, that would be an advantage- but not required.

Salary: $10/hr.

If you are excited about the opportunity and feel like you are a good fit, we encourage you to apply today and talk to one of our recruiters. We look forward to seeing how your skills and experiences align with our vision. If unsure, we still welcome your application and would be happy to discuss other potential roles that may be a good fit for you.

Apply here:
https://gtecombv.teamtailor.com/jobs/5079084-email-marketer

title: Social Media and Marketing Assistant
description:
We are a Coaching Company based in Hong Kong currently looking for a rockstar Social Media and Marketing Assistant


We specialize in providing top tier solutions for established business owners to achieve more with less. Providing an integration of productivity, business and leverage modalities designed to generate an abundance of profit and freedom simultaneously.


As the Social Media and Marketing Assistant, your goal is to assist in growing the company through increasing its social media performance, editing & refining content, and build relationships with our audience through outreaches. You may also be appointed to service our clients' accounts depending on demand. 


In addition to content production, it is expected that you’ll display a high level of proactiveness toward responding to new engagements in the company’s social media accounts, and reaching out to leads and potential clients in a timely manner.


The main objectives of this role involve:

> Content management and redistribution across platforms - such as Facebook, Instagram, Threads, Twitter, LinkedIn and Blog


> Social media management - Monitor, respond to, and engage with comments, messages, and mentions on our social media platforms to build meaningful connections and foster a positive brand image.


> Understand features in GoHighLevel and assist in implementing sub-account setups for the company and its clients (i.e. Workflows, automations, email campaigns, billing setup...etc)


> Content editing - reformatting text and video content to fit it’s specific platforms


> Organic Content analytics and reporting - Tracking and analyzing social media metrics such as audience growth, reactions, comments, leads generated, calls booked…etc.


> Paid media analytics and reporting - Tracking and analyzing metrics such as CPM, CPL, Leads generated, CPA …etc


> Prospecting - Sending connection requests, outreach messages, follow ups and responding to replies from leads & prospects generated through social media engagement and social community growth.


> Manage the sales pipeline and keep track of sales performance data accurately on CRM


> Market research - Compile data collected from comments, conversations and calls received from audience and potential clients.


Skills required:

> Amazing written and spoken english


> Excellent communication skills with clients and prospects


> Proficient in operating Facebook and Instagram accounts


> Proficient in operating LinkedIn accounts and Sales Navigator accounts


> Understand the algorithm of Facebook, Instagram and LinkedIn


> Experience with CRMs such as GoHighLevel and Clickfunnels


> Experience in Google Drive, Docs, Sheets


> Prior experience managing leads and social accounts of online businesses


> Displaying traits of a detail oriented, responsible, and consistent, team player


> Experience with software such as Canva, Descript, Capcut, ChatGPT and Captions.


Shift times:
4 hours per day Monday to Friday, 
with opportunity to transition to 8 hours per day Monday to Friday after 60 days following satisfactory performance. 
Exact shift times negotiable and to be determined.

Compensation Structure and Perks:

> Hourly rate starting from 4 USD / hour
> Pay rise potential according to experience and performance
> Quarterly performance bonuses up to $800 USD per satisfactory performance
> Opportunity to be hired for projects at higher one-off fees on top of standard salary
> Work from home privilege
> Opportunity to work with a high performing team of Virtual Assistants


Travel: Not required


Change residence: Not required

title: Independent Medical Opinion (IMO) Copywriter
description:
Attain Med Group is a leading provider of independent medical opinions (IMOs) for veterans filing VA disability claims. We specialize in assisting veterans in navigating the complexities of the VA claims process by providing comprehensive medical assessments and expert opinions.

Job Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced healthcare professional to join our team as a Medical Consultant. The ideal candidate will be responsible for reviewing medical records and drafting the first draft of a independent medical opinions (IMOs) for veterans filing VA disability claims. The candidate should be comfortable with medical terminology and have excellent writing skills.

Key Responsibilities:

• Create the first draft of a requested independent medical option (IMO) that will be reviewed and signed off by the US medical professional. Communicate with the US medical professional for any change requests to the document.
• Responsible for drafting, revising, and finalizing professional documents, ensuring they are clear, concise, and free of grammar and spelling errors. This role requires exceptional writing skills with a keen attention to detail to effectively communicate complex information succinctly and accurately across various platforms and to diverse audiences. The individual must consistently produce high-quality documentation that meets organizational standards and effectively supports business objectives.
• Reviewing medical records of veterans to assess their medical history and conditions.
• Develop an understanding of the VA disability program and the importance of medical evidence in winning a veteran’s claim.
• Compiling and analyzing medical studies and literature to support the independent medical opinions (IMOs) being drafted.
• Reviewing previous Board of Veteran Appeals (BVA) court cases to identify precedents and establish "case law" that support the opinions being drafted.
• Communicating with veteran clients via email or phone as needed to gather additional information or clarify medical details.
• Updating the Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system with progress updates regarding the orders and communications with clients.

Requirements:

• Medical degree or degree holder in a healthcare field such as nursing, physical therapy, etc.
• Experience in a clinical setting, preferably in a specialty relevant to veterans' health (e.g., internal medicine, psychiatry, orthopedics, etc.).
• Excellent writing skills and ability to write clear and concise arguments utilizing sound scientific research and related VA case law.
• Familiarity with VA disability claims process and medical-legal terminology preferred but not required.
• Excellent analytical and critical thinking skills.
• Strong communication skills.
• Ability to work independently and efficiently in a remote setting.
• Strong IT skills and an ability to leverage AI technology such as ChatGPT.

title: Senior Data Scientist – Clean Energy Sector
description:
Your Dream Job awaits with Concertina!

Ready to fast-track your career? Concertina is the ethical BPO of choice. We offer the right candidates an instant 40% pay increase! Plus, you’ll get HMO coverage for both you and your family, all while enjoying 100% work-from-home flexibility. Plus we invest in our candidates so they continue to prosper and grow including mental AI Training Academy,  fitness programs, group mentoring from our founders, charity events, and amazing socials.

Jumpstart your dream career with a better salary now!

Here’s a checklist to see if you’re a fit:
- 5+ years of experience in the industry
- Great English and communication skills
- Open to a bonus to work USA hours (or a blend)

For quick apply click this link: https://www.concertina.team/available-jobs/senior-data-scientist-clean-energy-sector


SENIOR DATA SCIENTIST- CLEAN ENERGY SECTOR


Position Summary:
The Senior Data Scientist will lead the development of predictive models and analytics that optimize clean energy consumption, enhance grid efficiency, and provide actionable forecasts for renewable energy generation. With a minimum of 10 years of experience in data science and a deep background in clean energy, you will play a pivotal role in shaping our data strategy and empowering our teams to achieve sustainable energy outcomes.

Key Responsibilities:
-Design and implement predictive models that provide insights into clean energy consumption patterns, demand forecasting, and load balancing.
-Develop algorithms for optimizing grid efficiency, reducing energy loss, and improving system stability in a clean energy context.
-Create forecasting models for renewable energy sources (e.g., wind, solar) to enhance planning, integration, and grid management.
-Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure data-driven solutions are integrated with our renewable energy and sustainability initiatives.
-Analyze data trends to identify and recommend energy efficiency improvements and potential optimization opportunities.
-Communicate findings and recommendations to stakeholders through clear, data-focused reports and presentations.
-Stay informed on clean energy trends, regulatory developments, and advancements in data science relevant to renewable energy.

Job Requirements:
-Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (Ph.D. preferred).
-Minimum of 10 years of experience in data science, with substantial experience in the clean energy sector.
-Proficient in predictive modeling, machine learning algorithms, and statistical analysis.
-Experience with energy-related data sources, such as SCADA systems, IoT for energy, and smart grid technologies.
-Expertise in Python, R, SQL, and data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI).
-Knowledge of renewable energy forecasting and meteorological data analysis.
-Strong problem-solving skills, with the ability to interpret complex data and translate it into actionable insights for sustainable energy solutions.
-Excellent communication skills for presenting technical information to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

Preferred Skills:
-Experience with cloud computing platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) for handling large-scale data analysis.
-Familiarity with clean energy industry standards and regulatory requirements.
-Experience deploying machine learning models in production environments.

title: Monitoring and Alert Tech Support
description:
Working Schedule: Monday to Friday, 9AM-5:30PM Pacific Standard Time

Role Overview: The Monitoring and Alert Technician is responsible for the continuous monitoring of our clients IT infrastructure, ensuring the health, performance, and reliability of systems and applications. This role involves overseeing backup processes, managing Remote Monitoring and Management (RMM) tool alerts, and scrutinizing the ticketing system for potential issues related to servers, networking, and other critical components. The technician will also play a key role in configuring automation tools to streamline alert management and reduce noise. 

Primary Duties and Responsibilities: 
-Monitoring and Analysis: Regularly monitor dashboards for system backups, RMM tool alerts, and the ticketing system to detect and respond to potential issues in real-time. 
-Alert Management: Analyze and prioritize alerts, categorize their severity, and resolve or escalate to relevant teams or personnel for further action. 
-Backup Oversight: Ensure all scheduled backups are successfully completed and troubleshoot any backup failures. 
-Automation and Configuration: Develop and configure automation scripts and tools to minimize false positives and irrelevant alerts, enhancing the efficiency of the monitoring process. 
-Incident Response: Participate in the incident response process by providing timely and accurate information about detected issues. 
-Documentation and Reporting: Maintain detailed records of monitoring activities and incidents, generating reports for the leadership team to support decision-making. 
-System Health Checks: Conduct routine checks on the health and performance of client IT infrastructure to prevent potential outages or disruptions. 
-Collaboration: Work closely with internal teams and clients to refine monitoring strategies and implement best practices for IT operations. 
-Continuous Improvement: Stay informed about the latest trends in monitoring and alert methodology, recommending improvements to tools and processes. 

Required Skills and Qualifications: 
-Proven experience in IT monitoring and alert management, with a strong understanding of RMM tools, ticketing systems, and backup solutions. 
-Experience in automating IT processes and workflows to reduce manual intervention and alert noise is an asset. 
-Ability to analyze complex data and make informed decisions under pressure. 
-Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. 
-Excellent communication and collaboration abilities. 
-Familiarity with network infrastructure and server management. 
-A relevant IT certification (e.g., CompTIA Network+, CCNA) is an asset. Working Conditions: 
-This position may require working in shifts, including nights and weekends, to provide 24/7 monitoring coverage. 
-Occasional on-call availability for urgent incidents and support 

Benefits: 
13th Month Pay 
HMO on top of the salary (After a 90-day probationary period) 
Personal Time Off (After a 90-day probationary period) 

To proceed, please send your resume to recruitment@hire.archi and specify the position you are applying for.

We appreciate your time and wish you the best of luck!

Apply now!

title: Level 3 - Support Technician
description:
Working Schedule: Monday to Friday, 8AM-5PM, Pacific Standard Time

General Summary:
Support Technician III’s are strong in all the most common and popular networking and server technologies as well as some of the more mature ones.  In addition to strong technical aptitudes, backed by at least five years of hard core in the trenches experience, this person is a powerful communicator and a person who can manage well when the client is struggling and needs strong guidance.  The pace and demands in this environment are usually much greater than an "in-house" or “enterprise” position.  

This person should be highly skilled with Windows Server, Exchange, cloud infrastructure (M365 or Google Workspace), networking, VPN's, firewalls, backup systems and more.  Further, this technician should be able to be considered a subject matter expert in multiple areas such as Networking, Security, Server Infrastructure, Cloud Infrastructure, or Email infrastructure and security. This role requires an individual who is a subject matter expert in multiple specialties, who can combine that knowledge to see the big picture where all that knowledge comes together and is applied. 

Position Responsibilities: 
• Understand and perform ticket triage when required
• Provide front line and escalated user support for Windows/iOS, Office, Email, VPN, and Filesharing requests/incidents.
• Assist with the execution of project tasks based on established SoPs and SoW.
• Complete recurring tasks accurately and completely based on established SoP’s
• Create SoP’s for other techs to be able to complete known work, or newly deployed solutions. 
• Document client systems based on discovered information per company standards. 
• Configure, update, and Troubleshoot network equipment and servers.
• Execution and conclusion of projects on-time and/or successful management of client expectations when targets cannot be met
• Communicate with Account Managers, Team Leaders, and Project Managers with regards to events and changes transpiring at client sites and projects. 
• Communicate with clients at all levels from end users, IT personnel and C-Levels, and understand business issues in context of IT issues
• Work directly with vendors to resolve highly technical issues.

Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities: 
Technical Skills
• Solid Troubleshooting methodology and process
• Solid Experience required with Windows desktop operating systems, MS Office, Printers, and common applications.
• Active Directory: AD-related services, AD-related DNS, AD replication
• Entra ID: dynamic groups, applications, service principals, tokens, secret keys, certificates
• Impeccable understanding of TCP/IP, DNS, and troubleshooting client networks.  
• Clear Understanding of multiuser technology environments (Remote Desktop Services, AVD, virtual desktop infrastructure)
• Expert with VPN setup for end users and troubleshooting, including firewall settings, and initial configuration.
• Intrinsic understanding of client networks including routers, switches, patch panels and connecting nodes to a network, and ability to troubleshoot. 
• Working knowledge of wireless technologies 
• Understanding and experience in configuring and troubleshooting DNS services 
• Ability to configure and troubleshoot email infrastructure (DNS records involved, Services, DKIM, DMARC, SPF, Spam Filters)
• Experience configuring and troubleshooting firewall technologies – Sophos and Unify ideal. 
• Clear understanding and experience in security concepts and implementations – endpoint protection, MFA, phishing, threat management etc.
• PowerShell: Ability to write/maintain PowerShell scripts that can take input data, process it in loops and produce output data or actions at scale
• Ability to act as a subject matter expert on multiple of the following
  o Networking (All OSI layers)
  o Server infrastructure, troubleshooting and maintenance.
  o Office 365\Entra backend systems 
  o Security (all levels and layers)
  o Email infrastructure, security, including all aspects of DNS and email security. 
  o Windows desktop environment and deployment
  o Apple desktop environment and deployment
  o Azure infrastructure
• Expert at managing existing Azure infrastructures, including troubleshoot VMs and VM performances, networking, Azure services, Azure costs
• Clear written and verbal English skills.

Soft Skills
• Attention to Detail and ability to accurately complete prescribed work.
• Ability to take escalations from frontline technicians, consult on ongoing issues, and take life transfers of clients. 
• Takes a personal interest in, and responsibility for, quality of work they perform or are associated with 
• Ability to pay close attention to detail while performing technically detailed tasks 
• Ability to deal effectively with stressful situations 
• Ability and willingness to recognize when it is necessary to ask for technical expertise from other team members. 
• Ability to provide accurate time estimates for how long a task will take 
• Understands that the success of individuals is measured by the success of their teams 
• Ability to quickly learn new technologies using self-study materials and experience.
• Ability to articulate technical information clearly and simply to non-technical people 
• Enjoys helping people
• Is self-motivated and can be self-directed when necessary
