title: Talent Acquisition Specialist *Superstar Only*
description:
Are you a skilled and resourceful Talent Acquisition recruiter with a proven track record in talent acquisition?

Can you effectively coordinate the full recruitment lifecycle, ensuring that every step is executed with precision, even under high-pressure conditions?

We are deeply committed to identifying top talent who possess not only the necessary skills but also well-rounded, holistic qualities. Our objective is to find individuals who bring value to the organization in every aspect, from professional expertise to cultural fit.

If you are passionate about discovering exceptional candidates and dedicated to achieving recruitment excellence, we welcome your application.

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES

A talent acquisition role typically encompasses the full-cycle recruitment and hiring process to secure qualified candidates for an organization. The primary responsibilities often include:

- Leverage job boards, social media, networking, and other recruiting tools to find and connect with potential candidates.
- Perform initial screenings, coordinate interviews, and assess candidates’ skills and alignment with the company culture.
- Create and revise job descriptions, and publish open positions on various job sites.
- Oversee job postings across multiple recruitment channels, maintaining consistent branding and messaging.
- Collaborate with the Talent Acquisition Manager to design and implement recruitment strategies that support business objectives.

JOB QUALIFICATIONS

- Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related discipline.
- Previous experience in recruitment, HR, or talent acquisition, ideally with 2-3 years in a comparable position.
- Recognized for exceptional achievements, such as attaining Latin honors (Summa Cum Laude, Magna Cum Laude, Cum Laude).
- Distinguished for outstanding accomplishments: recognized for achievements including awards such as "Top Team Leader of the Year" and "Employee of the Year," and demonstrating rapid career progression into higher roles.
- Exceptional communication and interpersonal abilities.
- Proficiency in using tools such as Asana, Slack, Outlook, and ClickUp is a plus.
- Expertise in sourcing candidates through platforms like LinkedIn, Online Jobs, Jobstreet, and Upwork.
- Ability to manage multiple recruitment projects simultaneously.
- Solid understanding and capability to oversee inclusive hiring practices.

JOB REQUIREMENTS

- Reliable Computer/Laptop
- High-Speed Internet Connection (+backup)
- Conducive Work Environment

WORKING SCHEDULE

- Full-time Employment Opportunity

BENEFITS

- Competitive Salary
- Training and Development Opportunities
- Opportunity to contribute to a rapidly expanding company dedicated to promoting holistic beauty
- Great potential for career advancement into various leadership positions

APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS

Since this is a long-term position, there will be an in-depth qualification process. If you believe you have what it takes, here's what to do next:

Please apply to this job ad with the phrase “I’m a Talent Acquisition Superstar” and answer the following questions:

1.) Why are you specifically interested in this Talent Acquisition Specialist position?
2.) How do you prioritize tasks when managing multiple assignments or deadlines?
3.) Can you describe a proud moment in your career, the actions you took to achieve it, how it showcased your strengths, and the values you learned from it that you still apply today?
4.) What are the names of your last three supervisors, mentors, or instructors, and how would they rate your performance on a scale of 1 to 10?
5.) Schedule Availability:
5.1) Are you available to work weekends?
6.) On an English Proficiency Scale (from A1-C2), how would you rate your level of English proficiency and your ability to adapt your language to the target audience?
7.) Please complete the following tests and attach the screenshots of the results in a Google Drive link (set to open access):
7.1.) Go to www.typing.com/student/typing-test/1-minute, complete the test and take a screenshot of your results. You don't need to sign in, just close any requests to sign in.
7.2.) Go to www.grammaring.com/english-grammar-test and take the test. Please take a screenshot of the final result.
7.3.) Go to www.speedtest.net/ and take a screenshot of the final result.
7.4.) Go to speed.cloudflare.com/ and take a screenshot of the final result.
8.) Please attach your updated CV in a Google Drive link (set to open access).

If you believe you meet our qualifications and requirements, we encourage you to apply now and become a valuable part of our rapidly expanding company.

title: Full Stack Programmer CRM
description:
I am looking for a skilled developer to assist with an ongoing full-stack project I have been working on for the last four years. The tasks will include:

 **Debugging and Fixing Existing Code**: Resolving glitches and ensuring smooth functionality across both the front-end and back-end.
 **Implementing New Features**: Adding new functionality, including API integrations, database schema updates, and UI/UX improvements.
 **Improving User Experience (UX)**: Making the application more user-friendly by simplifying workflows, optimizing navigation, and enhancing accessibility features.
 **Incorporating AI Features**: Exploring and integrating AI-powered functionalities to enhance user experience, such as recommendation systems, chatbots, or personalized content, to make the app more intuitive and efficient.
 **Optimizing UI/UX Design**: Revamping the user interface to make the display more visually appealing, responsive, and intuitive. Ensuring that the design aligns with modern design principles for both mobile and desktop experiences.
 **Cross-Browser Compatibility & Performance Optimization**: Ensuring that the application works seamlessly across different browsers and devices, and optimizing performance for speed and scalability.
 **Testing & Code Reviews**: Writing unit tests, conducting code reviews, and improving the overall codebase to follow best practices and industry standards.
 **Setting Up & Managing the Full-Stack Environment**: Providing guidance on how to set up and run the project across different environments (development, staging, production).
 **Optimizing AWS Infrastructure**: Reviewing and optimizing AWS resources (e.g., EC2 instances, S3 storage, RDS databases) to ensure cost efficiency, prevent over-provisioning, and reduce unnecessary costs. Implementing auto-scaling, cost monitoring, and recommendations for more cost-effective services.
 **Version Control & Collaboration**: Managing version control using Git, including handling branches, merges, and pull requests.
 **Project Management Support**: Assisting in managing day-to-day tasks, ensuring deadlines are met, and coordinating effectively with team members.




This revision includes specific mention of optimizing AWS infrastructure to reduce costs, which is a common concern for ongoing projects using cloud services. Let me know if you'd like further refinements!

title: Join My Team as a Personal Assistant
description:
I'm looking for a highly resourceful and proactive Personal Assistant who can help streamline my busy life. I balance a full-time job, family responsibilities, and a business. You’ll play a vital role in managing various tasks, freeing up my time to focus on the big picture.

About You

You are tech-savvy and fluent in English, with a knack for organization and an innate ability to get things done. Communication is critical; if you can’t understand what I need quickly and accurately, this role won’t be a fit. You’re comfortable not just supporting but taking initiative, using AI tools like ChatGPT and Perplexity daily—not just for basic tasks but to bring real insights and efficiency to my day. Excel, Google Sheets, and Canva are part of your skill set, and you can prepare reports, presentations, and any materials I need to keep things moving.

What You’ll Do

1. Administrative Support:
Manage my calendar, arrange appointments, and handle correspondence.
Draft responses to emails and prioritize key communications.
Keep my digital workspace and files organized.

2. Research & Reporting:
Conduct research on various topics, summarize findings, and present clear information.
Compile data and insights for projects, including product research and vendor communication.
Create reports, presentations, and visual content as needed.

3. AI & Technology Utilization:
Use AI tools for intelligent research and task management.
Set up productivity tools and automation for better efficiency.
Implement solutions to streamline repetitive tasks.

4. Personal Tasks & Errands:
Assist with personal errands and day-to-day tasks.
Handle travel arrangements and manage itineraries.

5. Project Coordination:
Oversee special projects, monitor progress, and keep me updated.
Coordinate with freelancers or vendors when necessary.

6. Flexibility for Ad-Hoc Tasks:
Adapt to new priorities and tackle tasks as they arise.

Ideal Skills & Traits

Strong written and spoken English.
Experience with Excel, Google Sheets, Slides, and Canva.
Comfortable making calls to vendors and service providers for tasks like booking, gathering information, and resolving issues.
Discreet and professional, with the ability to handle confidential information responsibly.
Bonus Skills: Familiarity with any of the following is a bonus but not necessary Premier/Davinci, product sourcing, familiarity with Amazon business, and sales/negotiation skills.

Hours: 5-10 per week, based on workload

Hourly Rate: $3 - $4 USD based on experience

If this sounds like you, apply with a video interview here: https://app.willotalent.com/invite/Lw3PXi/

IMPORTANT: Only applications through the above link will be considered.

title: Software Quality Analyst
description:
We are seeking a detail-oriented and proactive Software Quality Analyst to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for ensuring the quality and reliability of our software products by designing and executing test plans, identifying issues, and collaborating with the development team to resolve them.

title: Virtual Personal Assistant to CEO
description:
Job Title: Virtual Personal Assistant to CEO

*Job Overview:*

We are seeking a highly organized and proactive Virtual Personal Assistant to support our CEO in managing their day-to-day activities and ensuring seamless operations within the company. As a tech-forward organization specializing in interactive kiosks, custom software solutions, and robotics, we require an assistant who is not only adept at administrative tasks but also comfortable with the digital landscape we operate in.

*Key Responsibilities:*

- *Calendar Management:* Schedule, coordinate, and manage the CEO’s appointments and meetings to optimize their time efficiently.

- *Communication Handling:* Manage incoming and outgoing communication for the CEO, including emails, phone calls, and social media inquiries, ensuring professional and timely responses.

- *Staff Coordination:* Liaise with staff members to delegate tasks as directed by the CEO, follow up on progress, and ensure accountability for their completion.

- *Document and Presentation Preparation:* Assist in preparing and reviewing documents, reports, and presentations, ensuring they meet company standards and CEO's expectations.

- *Meeting Preparation:* Organize and prepare materials for meetings, including agendas, reports, and follow-up action items.

- *Travel Arrangements:* Plan and organize travel itineraries, including flights, accommodations, and transportation as needed.

- *Project Assistance:* Support the CEO with various projects by conducting research, summarizing findings, and presenting insights to aid decision-making.

- *Expense Management:* Track and manage expenses for the CEO, ensuring accurate and timely reporting.


*Qualifications:*

- Proven experience as a Virtual Assistant or similar role supporting C-level executives.
- Proficient in office and productivity software, with the ability to learn new tools and platforms quickly.
- Exceptional organizational skills and the ability to prioritize tasks effectively.
- Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.
- Ability to maintain discretion with confidential information.
- High level of initiative and the ability to work independently.
- Familiarity with the tech industry, especially in areas related to interactive kiosks and robotics, is a plus.

*Working Conditions:*

- This is a full-time remote position with flexible hours to accommodate the CEO’s schedule, including the possibility of working across different time zones.
*** Main Hours 9-5pm EST Time Canada
- Must have a dedicated reliable internet connection and own computer equipment.
- Availability to respond to urgent requests outside of standard working hours when necessary.

*What We Offer:*

- Competitive salary with performance bonuses.
- Opportunity to work in a dynamic, fast-paced tech environment.
- A role with significant responsibility and room for growth.
- Exposure to innovative technology projects.

*Application Process:*

Interested candidates are invited to submit a resume detailing their relevant experience and a cover letter explaining why they are the best fit for the role. Please include references and any relevant work samples or portfolios.

* Brand M3dia is an equal opportunity employer and welcomes candidates from all backgrounds to apply.*

www.BrandM3dia.com

title: Remote Personal Assistant *Superstar Only*
description:
Are you highly organized and detail-oriented with a proven track record as an executive assistant?

Can you effectively manage responsibilities, ensuring no tasks are overlooked even in high-pressure situations?

We're seeking someone capable of handling complex tasks seamlessly, demonstrating proactive problem-solving skills and a commitment to continuous improvement.

If you're driven by delivering excellence and eager to take on new challenges, we encourage you to apply.

ABOUT US
· We're a fast-growing holistic beauty company that is looking for the brightest, most talented minds to work from home. More details will be shared during the interview, but you’ll have the opportunity to work with one of the fastest-growing holistic beauty creators, boasting over 2,000,000 followers.

JOB QUALIFICATIONS:
An executive assistant requires a diverse set of qualities beyond being detail-oriented to excel in their role. Here are the qualifications for the executive assistant role:

• Demonstrated outstanding achievements, such as earning Latin Honors (Summa Cum Laude, Magna Cum Laude, Cum Laude), receiving various excellence awards (e.g., "Agent of the Year", “Employee of the Year”), and showcasing rapid career advancement in previous roles.

• Minimum of 2 years of experience working as an executive assistant.

• Excellent communication skills, both oral and written, characterized by professionalism in tone and manner, clarity in conveying messages, and active listening.

• Strong attention to detail, ensuring accuracy and precision in all aspects of work.

• Proven ability to prioritize tasks effectively and manage time efficiently.

• Successful track record of managing projects.

• Proficient problem-solving skills, with the ability to address challenges effectively.

• Demonstrated excellent decision-making abilities, exhibiting sound judgment and discernment in various situations.

• Adaptability to changing environments, with a flexible approach to handle unforeseen circumstances and adjust plans accordingly.

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES INCLUDE:
Here are the primary duties of an Executive Assistant:

• Support Services: Provide comprehensive administrative support to the executive, including managing calendars, scheduling appointments, and coordinating meetings and events.
• Information Management: Handle correspondence, emails, and phone calls on behalf of the executive, screening, and prioritizing messages as necessary.
• Relationship Facilitation: Serve as the primary point of contact between the executive and internal and external stakeholders, including staff, clients, vendors, and partners. Facilitate communication and maintain positive relationships on behalf of the executive.
• Project Support: Assist with project management tasks, such as tracking project timelines, milestones, and deliverables. Coordinate project-related activities and communications among team members.
• Confidentiality Management: Maintain strict confidentiality and discretion when handling sensitive information, documents, and communications. Safeguard confidential data and ensure compliance with privacy policies and regulations.
• Problem-Solving: Identify and resolve administrative issues and challenges as they arise, exercising sound judgment and problem-solving skills. Anticipate potential problems and take proactive steps to mitigate risks.
• Time Management: Manage the executive's schedule efficiently, prioritizing tasks and activities to maximize productivity and optimize time usage. Anticipate conflicting commitments and resolve scheduling conflicts as needed.

REQUIREMENTS FOR EFFECTIVE REMOTE WORK
· Reliable Computer/Laptop
· High-Speed Internet Connection (+backup)
· Conducive Work Environment

WORKING SCHEDULE
· Full-time Employment Opportunity

BENEFITS
· Competitive Salary
· Training and Development Opportunities
· Opportunity to contribute to a rapidly expanding company dedicated to promoting holistic beauty
· Great potential for career advancement into various leadership positions

APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS
Since this is a long-term position, there will be an in-depth qualification process. If you believe you have what it takes, here's what to do next:

Please apply to this job ad with the phrase “I’m an Executive Assistant Superstar” and answer the following questions:

1.) Why are you specifically interested in this position?
2.) Can you share a situation where you had to solve a problem or address a challenging situation on behalf of an executive? How did you handle it?
3.) How do you handle stressful situations or high-pressure environments while maintaining a high level of professionalism and attention to detail?
4.) What are the names of your last three boss/ supervisors, and how would they rate you on a scale of 1-10? (you may need to arrange calls/email contact with them)
5.) Schedule Availability:
5.1.) What are your preferred work hours? (in PHT)
5.2.) Are you available to work weekends?
6.) On an English Proficiency Scale (from A1-C2), how would you rate your level of English proficiency and your ability to adjust your language to the target audience?
7.) Take the following tests and attach the 3 screenshots of the results in a Google Drive link (set to open access).
7.1.) Go to www.typing.com/student/typing-test/1-minute, complete the test and take a screenshot of your results. You don't need to sign in, just close any requests to sign in.
7.2.) Go to www.grammaring.com/english-grammar-test and take the test. Please take a screenshot of the final result.
7.3.) Go to www.speedtest.net/ and take a screenshot of the final result.
8.) Attach your CV in a Google Drive link (set to open access).

If you believe you meet our qualifications and requirements, we encourage you to apply now and become a valuable part of our rapidly expanding company.

title: General Admin Virtual Assistant at JI Media Group
description:
Are you passionate and eager to join an agency where your growth and impact truly matter?

We are looking for a talented, organized, and driven individual who thrives in fast-paced environments and has a CAN DO attitude. We are looking for someone to join our team long term, who is interested in growing with us as a company and taking on more responsibility in the future!
If you have a sharp eye for detail, exceptional organizational skills, and excellent verbal and written communication skills, we want you on our team! The ideal teammate we are looking for must be hungry for growth - handles criticism well and welcomes feedback, constantly seeking to improve, and initiates leadership when needed.
We are looking for someone who has a positive attitude and would be excited about joining a very close team that loves and respects each other. We care about everyone as an individual and are looking to have someone join our team who loves being part of our journey and community!
ABOUT US
JI Media Group is a dynamic, family-owned real estate media agency experiencing rapid growth in Houston, Texas. Our mission is to provide realtors with top-notch photo and video marketing solutions that boost their visibility and drive business success. We pride ourselves on our commitment to going above and beyond for our clients, offering friendly and personalized service, dependable and fast turnaround times, and flexibility to meet their unique needs. We’re dedicated to fostering a positive and collaborative workplace culture.
Discover more about us on our website and follow our journey on Instagram.
ABOUT THE ROLE
We are looking for a General Admin Virtual Assistant to play a crucial role in ensuring the smooth operation of media deliveries, client relationships, and administrative tasks. This position requires excellent communication skills, strong organizational abilities, and a keen eye for detail. You will also have the opportunity to assist with basic photo and video editing, helping to ensure that our clients receive top-quality content on time.
Key Responsibilities: 
Media Deliveries and Orders:
Coordinate and manage the delivery of photo and video content to clients, ensuring timely and accurate distribution.
Process and track client orders, maintaining detailed records of all transactions.
Communicate with clients to confirm delivery schedules and address any questions or concerns. Managing social media platforms by creating, scheduling, and engaging with content to enhance brand visibility. Additional duties involve scraping data for potential leads and assisting in client acquisition efforts to grow the business.
Attention to Detail:
Review media content for accuracy and quality before delivery to clients.
Ensure that all client orders and deliveries are processed without errors.
Double-check all communications and records for accuracy and completeness.
Create Social Media posts, reels, maintain a daily post and help grow the account.
Organizational Skills:
Maintain organized records of client orders, delivery schedules, and media content.
Manage multiple tasks and projects simultaneously, prioritizing workload to meet deadlines.
Support the team with general administrative duties, data entry, and office organization.
Client Relationship Management:
Address client inquiries, resolve issues, and ensure satisfaction with our services.
Assist in gathering feedback from clients to continuously improve our offerings.
Communication Skills:
Effectively communicate with clients and team members through email, texting on our shared phone program, and virtual interactions.
Provide correspondence, including order confirmations, delivery updates, and follow-up messages. Collaborate with the team to ensure clear and consistent communication across all projects.
Photo and Video Editing:
Assist with basic photo and video editing tasks to enhance the quality of media content before delivery. Ensure that all content aligns with the client's vision and meets our company’s high standards for quality. 

Qualifications:
Strong organizational and time management skills.
Excellent written and verbal communication abilities.
Basic knowledge of photo and video editing software is a plus.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
A proactive and detail-oriented approach to tasks.
Reliable high-speed internet connection to ensure smooth communication and timely delivery of media content.
A working laptop capable of handling photo and video editing tasks efficiently.
Backup internet and power solutions to maintain productivity during outages or connectivity issues.
This role is ideal for someone who thrives in a fast-paced environment and is passionate about delivering exceptional service and high-quality content to clients.
Excited to be part of a team that values creativity and outstanding client service?
HERE IS HOW TO APPLY:
1. Record a video of yourself answering the below three questions:
Please share with us your career goals and what you are looking for long term in a job opportunity and career!
Why do you feel you would be a great candidate for this position at JI Media Group?
What made you want to apply for this position?
You can record this on your phone, loom, computer screen record etc.
2. Complete this personality assessment here, DO NOT pay for the results, simply screenshot the graph of the final results to share with us.
3. Finally, please email the VIDEO RECORDING and RESULTS of personality assessment to info@jimediagroup.com


No candidates will be considered if they do NOT complete the above requirements!
We look forward to welcoming a new team member who shares our dedication to excellence and creativity at JI Media Group!
Job Type: Part-time, with room for growth in future!
Pay: $4-$5 per hr
Starting hours: 15-20 hrs per week.
Working hours: Mon-Fri for the first 1-2 months of training, Tue-Sat after the training. Year end bonus eligible.

title: Customer Service Support *Superstar Only*
description:
Do you love putting a smile on people's faces or hearing "you just made my day"?

Love connecting with our customers and fans of a holistic beauty creator with 2 million+ followers?

Do you want to be part of a fast-growing company and collaborate with the brightest, most talented minds?

Then this might be your dream job.

Before you read on, this is NOT a typical customer support job where you just copy paste standard responses or choose a canned response from the help desk software...if that's what you are looking for then you should stop reading right now, because this job is NOT for you.

We are looking for a Customer Service Specialist to help create an amazing customer experience that turns customers into raving fans.

From the Upgrade to see actual infont a person clicks "Follow" or joins our community, the customer needs to feel like she has a special friend who is there to help and support her along the way....and that's exactly your job as a Customer Service Specialist.

As our Customer Service Specialist, you’re the essence of an extraordinary customer service. You love people and love to enrich their lives through dialogue about our products as well. Having a detailed knowledge, you’re not just serving information, but are also making recommendations and play an advisory role.

You are the heart of our reputation, and ensure feedback flows to all teams in order to improve and innovate our services. And you spark customers with new ways to make their experience continuously better.

We are aiming to be the gold standard for customer support in the beauty industry. Customer support is extremely important to us, and we only hire the warmest and the most positive, genuine and dedicated people to represent our company.

ABOUT US
• We're a fast-growing holistic beauty company that is looking for the brightest, most talented minds to work from home. More details will be shared during the interview, but you’ll have the opportunity to work with one of the fastest-growing holistic beauty creators, boasting over 2,000,000 followers.

• Distinguished for outstanding accomplishments, including receiving awards like "Top Team Leader of the Year", "Employee of the Year", and demonstrating swift career progression into higher roles.

• Recognized for exceptional achievements, such as attaining Latin Honors (Summa Cum Laude, Magna Cum Laude, Cum Laude).
• Excellent communication skills, both oral and written. As an email support representative, you will likely interact with US clients whose first language is English. • Enabling an empathy-driven approach by providing exceptional customer service and fostering positive relationships with customers through email communication.
• Fast and accurate typing skills to respond to emails promptly, great attention to detail and reliability are essential qualities for success in this role.
• Highly organized with the ability to efficiently manage multiple tasks and meet deadlines.
• Adeptness at working in a fast-paced environment where others rely on you to deliver is essential. It is expected that you have an innovative mind and are a self-starter.


JOB RESPONSIBILITIES INCLUDE
• Customer Care: Provide excellent customer service through various channels, including email, chat, social media and phone. Address customer inquiries, concerns, and requests with empathy and professionalism.
• Product Knowledge: Develop an in-depth understanding of our holistic beauty programs, their benefits, and the exercises in it.
• Problem Resolution: Troubleshoot and resolve customer complaints and issues promptly and effectively, ensuring customer satisfaction.
• Educational Support: Provide product recommendations, usage guidance, and holistic beauty advice to customers.
• Feedback Collection: Collect and document customer feedback and suggestions to help improve products and services.
• Organizational Skills: Maintain organized records of customer interactions and orders, ensuring accurate and up-to-date customer profiles.
• Cross-functional Collaboration: Collaborate with other departments, such as marketing and product development, to relay customer insights and feedback.
• Process Enhancement: Document the process and create/adapt SOPs to improve the system.

REQUIREMENTS FOR EFFECTIVE REMOTE WORK
• Reliable Computer/Laptop
• High-Speed Internet Connection (+backup)
• Conducive Work Environment

WORKING SCHEDULE
• Full-time Employment Opportunity

BENEFITS
• Competitive Salary
• Training and Development Opportunities
• Opportunity to contribute to a rapidly expanding company dedicated to promoting holistic beauty
• Great potential for career advancement into various leadership positions

APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS
Since this is a long-term position, there will be an in-depth qualification process. If you believe you have what it takes, here's what to do next:

Please apply to this job ad with the phrase “I’m a Customer Service Superstar” and answer the following questions:

1.) Why are you specifically interested in this position?

title: Onboarding Specialist
description:
Job Overview:
As an Onboarding Specialist, you will play a critical role in setting up new clients on various software platforms, creating automations, and ensuring a seamless onboarding process. Your work will lay the foundation for our team to effectively manage and optimize client accounts.

What you will do:
- Manage comprehensive client onboarding across multiple digital platforms
- Set up and configure client accounts on the following platforms:
- Google Suite (Analytics, Search Console, Google Ads, Drive)
- Social Media Platforms (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram)
- Project Management: ClickUp
- Website Platform: WordPress
- Manage accounts in Agency Analytics, BrightLocal, and Local Falcon
- Create and implement automation processes to enhance onboarding efficiency
- Develop standardized onboarding procedures from client intake forms
- Ensure consistent account setup and configuration for smooth team handoff

About Us

Ylopo, LLC is a rapidly growing marketing and technology company providing internet marketing services and proprietary lead generation and engagement software to successful real estate agents across the country. We are seeking an outgoing, tech savvy individual to join our growing team.

a commitment to personal development,

title: Loan Processor
description:
The Loan Processor is responsible for managing all aspects of the loan application process, ensuring timely and accurate processing from document collection to loan approval. This role requires strong organizational skills, attention to detail, and clear communication to maintain smooth operations and meet closing deadlines.

Key Responsibilities:
Documentation & Processing:
    Request and verify appraisals, title documents, and insurance for each file.
    Input accurate details into the loan system, ensuring correct mortgage clauses, loan numbers, and amounts.
    Review and qualify all submitted documents (e.g., loan applications, financial statements), correcting errors and updating records in real-time.
    Ensure documents are uploaded and tracked accurately in the loan portal.

Communication & Coordination:
    Maintain open and clear communication with borrowers, underwriters, intake coordinators, and team members to move files efficiently through the process.
    Address all emails and borrower communications within 24 hours, ensuring no missed or flagged messages.
    Answer general and borrower calls, assisting or directing inquiries as needed.

Appraisal & Title Management:
    Monitor the appraisal process through the AMC portal; review, save, and upload appraisals without discrepancies.
    Ensure all title and insurance requests are accurate, complete, and sent promptly.

Compliance & Quality Control:
    Assemble and complete loan files, ensuring all underwriting conditions are met for approval without conditions.
    Perform due diligence on all documents to maintain compliance and accuracy.
    Update backer portals daily and work with account executives to resolve any processing issues.

Ad hoc:
    Perform ad hoc tasks as needed.

Requirements & Qualifications:
    Minimum of 2-3 years of experience in loan processing or a related role.
    Strong attention to detail and organizational skills.
    Proficiency in loan processing systems and document management software.
    Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
    Ability to handle sensitive information with confidentiality and professionalism.
    Working hours: Monday to Friday between 8:30 AM to 5 PM Central Standard Time (CST)

Preferred Qualifications:
    Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Business, or a related field.
    Experience with hard money lending or mortgage processing.
    Familiarity with platforms like DocuSign and various backer portals.
    Knowledge of AMC systems and loan underwriting guidelines.

Next steps:
As part of our hiring process, we kindly request you to complete a DISC personality test before your scheduled interview. This test will help us better understand your personality and ensure alignment with the requirements of the position.

Please take the test using the following link: www.123test.com/disc-personality-test/

Please submit the result of the DISC personality test and an updated copy of your RESUME to this email: beth@lawcoaching.com
Subject line: Loan Processor
Also, kindly share your proficiency or years of experience with the following:
- Loan processing
- Hard Money Loan
- Communication skills

Ensure that the resume is in PDF format.
Do not forget to provide a link to your profile on Onlinejobs.ph

title: Part-Time PHP + JS + WP Wizard for Hire (Cape Optional)
description:
Are you a WordPress wizard with a knack for WordPress, PHP, and JavaScript troubleshooting? Do you love building features and refactoring code like a champ? Well, good news! The Mighty Mo! is on the hunt for an experienced developer to join our team and help us deliver top-notch solutions to our clients.


What You’ll Be Doing
* Troubleshoot existing WordPress, JavaScript, and PHP bugs. Understanding the WordPress template hierarchy and core WordPress coding concepts is a critical part of the role.
* Refactor custom WordPress plugin code using PHP and JavaScript (sometimes rewriting from scratch!).
* Troubleshoot, fix, and update our clients’ WordPress websites. (Don't worry, you’ll work with us, not directly with clients.)  Sometimes this troubleshooting will be simple: "Add a new section via Elementor." Other times, it'll be complex troubleshooting such as, "Our calendar isn't loading the correct posts" or "Why isn't our form submitting properly?".
* Collaborate with our internal dev team using GitHub for version control—stash, pull, push, branches, pull requests... you know the drill.
* Scope and tackle small tasks with a quick turnaround (1.5 business days).
* Communicate blockers to our internal team and project manager early and often.
* Learn and adapt to new WordPress technologies. (Because change is the only constant!)
* Understand conceptually how Gutenberg, Full-site editing, and WordPress builders (Elementor, Beaver Builder, etc.) work.  You don't need to know all these tools inside and out, but you'll need to be able to explain them at a high level.


What You Need to Bring
* Advanced WordPress plugin development skills using PHP and JavaScript. You’ll be integrating your code into existing systems and sometimes building from scratch.
* GitHub savvy. We’re talking branches, pull requests, and collaborative coding.
* Reliability and responsiveness. Be ready to tackle small tasks within 1.5 business days. 
* 10-15 hours/week availability with flexible scheduling. You'll be able to define your timelines for delivering work.  Communication daily is required.
* Desire to grow and learn. The WordPress ecosystem evolves constantly, and we’re all about staying ahead of the curve.


Bonus Points For:
* Experience with AI coding tools such as ChatGPT, Claude, Co-Pilot, etc.  FYI: We encourage effective use of AI tools, however, you'll fail if you don't understand WordPress templating, Intermediate javascript, and Intermediate PHP.


Why Work With Us?
The Mighty Mo! is an established WordPress design & SEO agency based in Minneapolis, MN. We’re all about delivering results while keeping things light and calm both internally and client-facing. Plus:
* Flexible hours—work when it’s best for you.
* Asynchronous communication via our project management tool.
* Opportunities to grow—this contract gig could evolve into part-time or full-time for the right person.
Learn more about how we work here: themightymo.com/why/


Ready to Apply?
If this sounds like the perfect gig for you, apply here at OnlineJobs.ph. Make sure to include a link to WP + PHP + JS code samples on your GitHub (or similar) account.

We can’t wait to see what you’ve got!

title: Support Agent - Virtual
description:
Sky View Suites launched in 2004, when the founders of the company were reviewing the performance of their first investment property and realized that a traditional unfurnished lease was leaving them with negative monthly cash flows. The founders decided to invest in the furnished apartment concept. This idea was a success, the company started to acquire investment properties and win long term rental contracts from large conglomerates. After acquiring a key competitor (torontofurnishedapartments.com) in 2017, Sky View Suites earned a spot amongst one of the largest furnished rentals companies in Toronto. Over the years, we have become one of the leading providers of furnished apartments and short term rentals in Toronto and GROWING.

- Optimize website performance and ensure smooth user experience.
- Conduct regular backups and ensure website security.

title: Ecommerce Marketing Manager
description:
Take your career to the next level by joining a leading eCommerce company that's redefining the industry for a greener and happier planet. With an extensive array of stores across diverse niches and countries, we offer limitless opportunities where ambition fuels success.

Discover your path to eCommerce freedom with us!

The Company in a Nutshell

GTEcom BV (https://gtecombv.com/) was established in 2018 and headquartered in The Netherlands. Our mission is to continue scaling our operations and opening & sustaining more successful global brands to achieve our target of $500M revenue and more than 50 stores worldwide by 2027. Our diverse team of 70 and growing remote e-commerce experts in their own niches from different parts of the world is helping us transform our vision of growing the company to a reality.

We are committed to cultivating a culture of hard work, freedom and responsibility, constant improvement, and positivity in our team.

The Upsides of Working with Us

Thrive in a results-driven environment with the autonomy to shape your own approach
Achieve a great work-life balance with remote work and flexible schedule
Enjoy a competitive salary that reflects your skills and contributions
Collaborate with a dynamic remote team
Be a key player in our rapidly growing company
We’re on the lookout for a Marketing Manager to join our expanding team and drive our company’s growth!

The Challenge

You’ll be at the helm of our marketing strategy, managing everything from product research to store optimization, driving innovation and strategic growth. Partnering with the CEO and COO, you'll develop and implement cutting-edge strategies that drive our business forward. We’re looking for a dynamic, team-oriented professional with a strong e-commerce background who is eager to achieve remarkable results and advance our brand.

Day in the Life of a Marketing Manager at GT Ecom

-Manage and lead the marketing team responsible for conversion rate optimization (CRO), average order value (AOV) optimization, email marketing, and media buying.
-Lead and train the marketing team, providing strategic direction and support for each store’s success.
-Oversee designers and developers who assist with implementing marketing strategies and optimizing performance.
-Monitor store performance, analyze metrics, and provide actionable feedback for continuous improvement.
-Drive the success of advertising efforts, email campaigns, and conversion strategies, ensuring the team collaborates effectively to meet business goals.
-Refine and develop marketing strategies based on performance data and industry trends.

title: IT & Automation Specialist
description:

title: Financial Analyst
description:
About Us

We are a consulting firm dedicated to supporting entrepreneurs and business owners in acquiring small and mid-sized businesses with operations in North America and Europe. Our focus is on deals under $10 million. We deliver comprehensive advisory services, designed to streamline the acquisition process and provide clients with the clarity and confidence needed to achieve their strategic goals

Job Overview

We are seeking a Financial Analyst to play a pivotal role in supporting small business acquisitions in the U.S. This position involves analyzing financial statements, organizing and preparing financial data for due diligence, and collaborating with accountants and other professionals to ensure accurate and actionable evaluations.
You will be responsible for structuring and presenting key financial information to support decision-making, aligning financial data with lender and investor requirements, and helping streamline the acquisition process for our clients. This is a highly collaborative role requiring strong analytical skills, attention to detail, and an ability to work closely with cross-functional teams involved in financial due diligence.

Key Responsibilities

- Financial Analysis: Examine and interpret financial statements to calculate and evaluate key metrics, including Seller's Discretionary Earnings (SDE), cash flow, and profitability.
- Documentation Management: Organize, prepare, and structure financial data and reports required for due diligence, ensuring accuracy and completeness for lenders, investors, and stakeholders.
- Collaboration: Work closely with accountants and other financial professionals during the due diligence process to validate data and ensure thorough evaluations.
- Risk Assessment: Analyze business performance, identify potential risks, and provide actionable insights to support informed decision-making.
- Client Support: Assist the advisory team in preparing concise financial summaries and tailored recommendations to align with client objectives.
- Deal Structuring: Support the design of acquisition structures by aligning financial data with the requirements of lenders and investors.

Qualifications

-Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, Business Administration, or a related field.
-At least 2 years of experience in financial analysis, preferably with exposure to small business transactions or acquisitions in the U.S. market.
-Strong understanding of U.S. financial reporting standards, with a focus on Seller's Discretionary Earnings (SDE) and other small business metrics.
-Familiarity with SBA financing structures and processes, including the preparation of financial documentation for lenders.
-Proven ability to collaborate with accountants and other professionals during financial due diligence.
-Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with strong attention to detail and accuracy.
-Excellent communication skills in English, both written and verbal, with the ability to present financial data in a clear and concise manner.
-Proficiency in Microsoft Excel, Google Sheet and financial modeling tools.
-Self-motivated and able to work independently in a remote environment while adhering to deadlines.
-Fluent in English, with excellent written and verbal communication skills, capable of presenting complex financial data clearly and concisely.

What We Offer

-Opportunity to work on meaningful small business acquisition projects in the U.S.
-Flexible remote work arrangement.
-Collaboration with a dynamic and experienced advisory team.
-Potential for professional growth within a growing firm.

title: Flutter Developer
description:
Join Us to Shape the Future of Personalized Nutrition

We’re seeking a Flutter developer to join our global team and contribute to our user-facing mobile app. This is an excellent opportunity for someone looking to grow their skills while working on a mission-driven startup empowering smarter food choices.

Our mobile app connects consumer panelists with wearable data to test food products and validate nutrition claims, crowdsourcing insights into how different foods impact health. If building meaningful tools at an innovative early-stage startup excites you, we want to hear from you!

# Role Overview

As our new Flutter developer, you'll work closely with our senior developer, who will provide guidance and mentorship. The workload will be gradually introduced, allowing you to become familiar with our codebase and development practices at a comfortable pace.

# Working environment

As our team is spread in different time zones, Pacific Standard Time (US) and Central Europe Time and now *yours,* we try to find some overlap at least once a week for a face-to-face check-in and at least 1~2h overlap daily for communication over slack.

Tasks and timelines will be discussed weekly, and you are expected to plan your work outside of that during your own set office hours. Commits are kept small and documented in GitHub and merged one by one as they are getting reviewed and approved.


# What We Offer

- Long-term remote position with flexible working hours
- Mentorship from experienced developers
- Opportunity to grow and enhance your Flutter development skills
- Work on a real-world application with active users

# Requirements

- Experience with Flutter development
- Familiarity with Riverpod or Provider state management
- Active GitHub account with at least one Flutter app or package
- Experience with Firebase Authentication
- Experience with on-device databases (SQLite or Hive)
- Enthusiasm for learning and growing as a developer

# Interview process

1. Suitable applications will be asked to fill out a short form of additional pre-screening questions
2. We schedule a short video call to talk through your experience with a technical angle
3. As a final step, we do a pair programming exercise


We welcome applications from junior developers who demonstrate a strong willingness to learn and grow with our team.

title: SEO Manager (Technical SEO Specialist, Off-page & On-page)
description:
Full-time home-based job, with a salary from 50,000 to 125,000+ (based on skills & experience). Why should you join us? Here is what our team members say: carelulu-team-testimonials.crd.co

** PLEASE read "How to apply". Incomplete applications will not be considered. **

========
About Us
========
CareLuLu is on a mission to help improve access to safe, affordable, quality child care and early education. We help parents find the right child care or preschool program, by providing all the information in one place. We also help child care programs grow their business while saving time for what truly matters: children!

=============
Job Description
=============
We are on a mission to help improve access to high-quality, affordable child care and we are looking for an SEO Manager / Technical SEO specialist / Growth marketer to help us accelerate our organic user acquisition! This is an amazing opportunity to make a real impact on our company, but also on our customers: families, and children’s early education. You will be responsible for optimizing website architecture and implementing technical strategies to improve our site performance and search engine rankings.

We operate in a highly autonomous environment, and you’ll be the first SEO hire, so this channel is yours to own and grow (there’s room for career growth, by hiring other SEO team members: link building outreach specialists, content writers and more!) You’ll be responsible for everything SEO-related: Site Audit & Analysis, Keyword Analysis, Content, Link Building, Website Architecture (XML sitemap, robots.txt files, canonical tags), Technical Troubleshooting and On-page Optimization (Page load speeds, Schema markup, Tags, Featured Snippets, etc.)

===================
What You will Be Doing
===================
You must be comfortable getting your hands dirty and doing everything (at least initially, until we hire other SEO team members that you can delegate work to):
• Site audit: conduct thorough technical SEO audits of our website to provide recommendations for optimization.
• Analytics: monitor and analyze website traffic, keyword rankings, and other metrics to identify opportunities.
• Reporting: provide regular, clear, and detailed reporting on important metrics and performance.
• Keyword research: identify valuable search terms to grow our user acquisition and traffic.
• Technical SEO & On-page Optimization: optimizing website structure, improving speed and mobile friendliness.
• Content Strategy: develop content strategy to rank for valuable search terms, and collaborate with content team.
• Technical Troubleshooting: find and fix all errors (duplicate content, crawling & indexing errors, etc.
• SEO Tools Management: be responsible for Google Search Console, Google Analytics GA4, SEMrush.
• Link Building: develop and implement strategy to acquire backlinks to increase website authority.
• Work closely with our engineering & web development team to implement technical SEO changes.
• Create and maintain technical SEO documentation and guidelines for internal team.
• Stay up to date with the latest trends and best practices in technical SEO and search engine algorithms.

===========
Qualifications
===========
• 5+ years of direct experience working in SEO (we’ll consider less, if you can show you’re amazing!)
• Strong knowledge of HTML, CCS, JavaScript.
• Hands-on experience with Google Search Console, Google Analytics GA4, SEMrush.
• Deep understanding of search engine algorithms to determine what governs crawlers’ behavior and page ranking.
• Strong knowledge of site architecture, schema markup, URL structure, redirect management.
• Expertise in troubleshooting and debugging SEO issues, as well as optimizing site speed and performance.
• Strong communication skills to collaborate with developers, content creators, and marketers.
• Data-driven, analytical mindset and excellent attention to detail.
• Owner mentality: you are self-motivated, use data to evaluate success and deliver results working independently.

====================
Compensation / Benefits
====================
• 13th month & possibility of HMO with tenure
• Learning/education budget, to continue learning and stay up to date with best practices
• Flexible work-from-home setting (no more commute!), possibility of flexible hours/schedule.
• Flexible and understanding team when it comes to time-off, family emergencies, etc.
• Team gatherings/events (e.g. buffet dinners) + occasional team retreat in a nice villa!
• Competitive salary (50,000 to 125,000+, negotiable based on skills and experience)

We are a small team with a big mission. We are looking for long-term team members and if you consistently contribute to the team & company, you will have room for growth (including hiring other team members to manage, if you wish). However, we have high expectations of ourselves and of team members. So, you should not apply if you are looking for a “comfy” work-from-home job; but if you are up for the challenge and opportunity, there is no better place for you!

===========
How to apply
===========
Incomplete applications will not be considered. Send an email to jobs @ carelulu.com with the email subject: "Your Next SEO Specialist (Your Name)". In your email, include your resume in PDF, and explain:
1) how you heard about us and why you want to join CareLuLu instead of another company.
2) why you will be awesome in this role and why we absolutely need YOU over everybody else.
3) include links to **ALL** your profiles (Onlinejobs.ph, LinkedIn, Facebook, and if available: Twitter).
4) answer this question (using personal experience, not a Google answer!): Explain how you have used structured data to enhance search engine visibility and user experience. Provide a specific example.
5) bonus: like and follow us: www.>facebook.com/Carelulu - www.twitter.com/mycarelulu - www.instagram.com/mycarelulu

Looking forward to hearing from you :)

title: Tech Virtual Assistant
description:
We’re looking for a tech-savvy virtual assistant to join our team part-time (20 hours per week).

Requirements
Excellent communication skills in English.
Tech-savvy, with the ability to quickly grasp new systems and tools.
Interest in setting up opt-in pages and sales pages using Kajabi.
An eye for website and graphics design.
Stable internet connection (minimum 5 Mbps).
Background in tech or a related field.
Availability to work in the CEST/CET time zone, ideally between 9 AM and 5 PM.

We’re Looking for Someone Who Is:
Especially skilled in technical tasks and troubleshooting small problems.
Resourceful and proactive, confident in taking on responsibility. You focus on solutions, not problems, and enjoy figuring things out.
Open and honest in communication.
Passionate about learning and growing, both professionally and personally.
Enthusiastic, with a positive attitude even in changing or challenging situations.
Highly organized, with strong time-management skills.
Able to thrive in a high-pressure environment.
Detail-oriented, ensuring accuracy and consistency in all tasks.

You will be working on a variety of tasks, including but not limited to:
Creating landing pages in Kajabi (e.g., opt-in pages, sales pages, value pages).
Managing email delivery and automations.
Providing support during product launches.
Preparing and uploading podcast content.
Handling graphics and light design tasks.
Administering Facebook groups and pages.
Developing and maintaining processes and workflows.

Software Stack
Kajabi, Zapier, Slack, Monday.com, Canva, Stripe, PayPal, FB Ads, Google Workspace, Dropbox, Zoom.

Application Process
Free Task: Applicants must complete a task (estimated time: 30-40 minutes) to be considered for the position.
Zoom Interviews: Applicants will be selected for a Zoom video interview before the final decision is made.

Hours
This is a part-time position requiring 20 hours per week.

Compensation
Starting salary: $400 per month, depending on qualifications.
Opportunity for salary growth based on performance and experience

About Us
We’re a small, ambitious team that works hard and plays hard. Continuous self-improvement and dreaming big are at the heart of everything we do. We value being open and honest—with our customers, ourselves, and each other. And we believe in having fun, even when there’s a lot to do!
This is not a casual role—we’re looking for someone truly invested in the success of our community. When they win, we win. And as our company grows, we aim to make an even greater impact in the areas that matter most to us.

How to Apply
Apply with only “VATechNorway2025” in the subject line/header
Please send us your resume in PDF format and answer the following questions:
Share three words that represent your working style and a sentence for each.
Why would you like to work for us as a Norwegian company?
What is one thing that we need to know about you?

title: HubSpot Data Custodian
description:
**Job Overview:**

We are seeking a meticulous and proactive Data Manager to oversee the accuracy, cleanliness, and consistency of our data across multiple accounts. This role will work closely with our internal teams, including the HubSpot team, to develop and maintain a robust data structure that aligns with our business objectives. The ideal candidate will bring expertise in data management, particularly within HubSpot, to ensure our data is well-organised, accessible, and optimised for effective decision-making.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- **Data Quality Assurance**: Establish and enforce data entry protocols to maintain high standards of accuracy, consistency, and up-to-date information across all accounts. Implement validation rules within HubSpot to minimise inconsistencies.
- **Data Structure Development and Maintenance**: Collaborate with the HubSpot team to create and refine a scalable data structure, including field definitions, property settings, and naming conventions that support the company’s CRM and marketing objectives.
- **Data Governance**: Design and enforce data governance policies, such as deduplication processes, data segmentation, and standardisation, to maintain a cohesive and reliable dataset.
- **Collaboration Across Teams**: Work closely with cross-functional teams, providing guidance on data management best practices and ensuring that data needs are met.
- **Data Integration and Automation**: Leverage HubSpot APIs and other tools as needed to integrate external data sources, ensuring seamless data flows and minimising manual entry.
- **Reporting and Analysis**: Support reporting and analytics by ensuring data is organised and readily accessible, facilitating insights that drive informed business decisions.

**Essential Skills and Qualifications:**

- **Experience with CRM Systems**: Proficiency with HubSpot’s data management capabilities is essential. Familiarity with other CRM or marketing platforms is a plus.
- **Data Cleaning and Transformation**: Demonstrated experience in data quality assurance, including deduplication, data standardisation, and validation processes.
- **Technical Aptitude**: Understanding of data structures and APIs, with the ability to work with HubSpot API and integrate third-party data sources as required.
- **Strong Analytical Skills**: Ability to identify and solve data issues proactively and apply best practices for long-term data quality.
- **Excellent Communication Skills**: Capability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, communicate data management processes, and train users on data integrity practices.

**Preferred Qualifications:**
- Bachelor’s degree in Data Science, Information Management, or a related field.
- Certification in HubSpot, CRM administration, or data management is advantageous.
- Prior experience in a data management role within a marketing or sales environment.

**Why Join Us?**
This is an exciting opportunity to join a dynamic team focused on leveraging data to drive business growth. We offer a supportive environment where your skills and expertise in data management will be valued, and you’ll have the chance to influence data-driven strategies across the business.

Application Process:
This role requires full-time commitment. To apply, please fill out the form using this link: https://gigcmo.typeform.com/HSDataCustodian

Note: Only successful candidates will be contacted for interviews.

title: DM Appointment Setter
description:
Position: DM Setter

The Company: Delegate To Elevate LLC is a fast-growing Virtual Assistant company helping fitness professionals, gym owners, and business coaches scale their businesses.

Our team is full of top-notch, A-players! We move fast, are bold, have crazy high standards, are hungry and addicted to growth and learning, and enjoy what we do. We thrive on growth, learning, and love the opportunity to serve this mission together and make an impact. We believe in realizing our own potential through the meaningful work we do.

We are now growing faster than ever at Delegate To Elevate LLC, and need a full-time Appointment Setter. As a Social Media Appointment Setter, you will be responsible for generating leads, engaging with prospects, and scheduling sales appointments for our clients using different social media platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, etc.
This is a full-time opportunity, and you can work from the comfort of your own home (our Team is remote all over the world).

This is your Dream Role if you:
- Are an action taker!
- Are self-motivated, high-energy, and passionate about your work.
- Are an excellent team player and willing to be A+ in client support.
- Have a strong written and communication skills. Hence, why you’re able to anticipate the needs of others and provide
solutions without even being asked.
- Have a keen eye for detail and can maintain high standards of work quality
- Are passionate about connecting with people and building relationships
- Have a genuine passion for sales and enjoy the art selling
- Strive to make a significant impact on lead generation and conversion through your efforts.
- Are driven by the opportunity to be recognized and rewarded for your sales achievements.
- Are motivated by the opportunity to exceed sales targets and drive business growth.
- Strive to continuously improve your sales skills and stay updated on industry trends.
- Are a quick learner and can rapidly pick up and implement a specific communication style
- Must have flexible availability to work on weekends, evenings, and mornings
- Proactive in giving solutions and feedback
- And you want to be a part of a fast-growing startup.

Responsibilities:
1. Use social media platforms (such as Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram, etc.) to message leads, qualify them and book
them for a sales call.
2. Meet or exceed the target for the number of calls booked/ set appointments.
3. Proactively search and generate leads by following our lead-generation strategies
4. Qualify leads if they fit the client’s target market to book an appointment.
5. Initiate conversations with prospects, effectively communicate the value proposition of the client’s products or services,
and schedule qualified appointments.
6. Maintain accurate and up-to-date tracking of all interactions, appointments scheduled, and activities in the company's and
client’s CRM system or tracking sheet.
7. Collaborate closely with the sales team to align on lead quality, appointment objectives, and strategies for converting
appointments into sales.
8. Answer inquiries and requests from team members and clients promptly and professionally.
9. Providing insightful feedback to continually improve the process and implement new ideas effectively and efficiently as per the direction of leadership.

Results:
- Performance will be gauged on metrics like the number of calls booked, sign-ups, messages, friend requests, and follow--
ups. Here are the results we expect out of this role.
- Ability to understand and adapt to different SOPs of clients.
- Hitting Deadlines: All deliverables should be completed on time.

Include the word “DREAM TEAM” when you apply.

DO NOT APPLY IF:

X You are lazy
X “What’s in it for me” mentality
X Flaky or not dependable
X Lack's passion for helping others and the company
X Are not willing to continuously learn and develop your skills
X Do not see yourself contributing to the growth and success of a company
X Lack adaptability and struggle to adjust to new situations or changing circumstances
X You’re not a team player
X Negative, do not accept constructive feedback

If you or anyone you know is potentially a good fit, please fill out this form, forms.gle/i27PeYqD8TtzuEs88 (10 mins to complete).

40hrs per week, willing to render night shift and weekend shift
Php 18,000 - 22,000 starting
Sales bonus up to 25k when metrics are hit
2-week trial if passed, will go on 3-month probation

This is going to be a fun and fulfilling role. We look forward to seeing your application come in!
Message or email dreamteam@delegatetoelevate.io with any questions.
Super excited to collaborate!
