title: EXECUTIVE ASSISTANT (SOCIAL MEDIA MANAGER)
description:
We are AIRASSISTANT.io, an award-winning virtual assistant agency that is passionate about helping our clients grow their businesses and processes to new heights using social media automation and sales funnels! We help professional women from the Philippines by training them to be master Executive Assistants to our clients through Social Media Management, Sales Funnel Creation, Executive Assistant Task/Calendar Management, Digital Marketing, as well as Sales & Lead Generation (yea, all that and a bag of chips ????).

Become a certified AirAssistant for FREE, then get guaranteed part-time or full-time job placement with one of our vetted clients within 30 days of certification - with opportunity for raises and full time employment. Before you read any farther - this role is not for the lazy person, freeloader, inexperienced or incompetent. You’ll probably get fired as soon as you start, so save yourself the embarrassment. If you are a detail-oriented, OVERCOMMUNICATING go-getter who loves the idea of helping change lives through entrepreneurship, then read on…

Details below:

EXPERIENCE:
1+ years of experience in Social Media Marketing, Sales Funnels, Shopify, or Digital Marketing: We're looking for a professional woman who is passionate about helping changemakers simplify their lives by setting up systems that will allow them to operate their businesses with more ease and less overwhelm. You have experience with sales funnel and CRM software
1+ years of experience advertising on platforms like Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, within a Marketing team consisting of Paid Acquisition, Organic Marketing, Customer Retention, & Product Marketing: We’re looking for an emerging leader who has the potential to head a team in the future that will report directly to you. Having leadership experience is a MAJOR plus
1+ years of experience as a Virtual Assistant or Executive Assistant with track record of company success.: You've done it all from managing schedules to email & calendar management. You have a meticulous eye for detail where Prioritization and Organization are your love language
Creating SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures): You’ll ensure each business function has detailed documentation for repeatable and scalable growth if it isn't already in place. If you see gaps, you take the initiative to fill them and produce results without anyone knowing there was an issue (yea, we did say all that and a bag of chips :-)
Experience working at a digital/online product/platform: You’re familiar with online courses, digital products & platforms and popular tools in the business space ranging from landing page builders and email service providers to CRMs, and course hosting platforms aren’t foreign to you (We teach tools like Shopify, Convertkit, Kajabi, Teachable, Learnworlds, Calendly, etc)

ABOUT YOU:
“You down with SOP? Yeah you know me!”—You’re an advocate for SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures) to make our systems repeatable & scalable.
Your love language is processes & predictable, meteoric growth. We never question company progress towards the quarterly and yearly goals because you keep real-time metrics for all projects.
You’re aware of new software and can look at current systems and identify how to automate tasks a company has been doing manually for months.
You’re addicted to digital processes & automation in the world of social media because you love building connections in the digital space and you’ve seen how powerful it can be in business growth
You’re driven by metrics & tracking. You know that you can’t improve something unless you measure it, so you develop ways to measure performance so your company is always predictably improving.
Timeliness and deadlines are your jam. When we have a team call at 10:00am, you show up at 9:55am. When the deadline is Tuesday at 5:30pm, you have it done Monday before you clock out.
You overcommunicate clearly and confidently. If you agree/disagree with something, you communicate that without hesitation or overthinking. You’re no stranger to asking why we do things a certain way to ensure we’re intentional with our resources. You send regular updates without having to be asked, and always make sure to treat the company you work for as if it was your own brainchild.
You’re a leader and team player. Ego? What ego? If something needs to be done, you dive in to make sure all critical tasks are accounted and cared for.

*because we care about detail-oriented applicants, mention the secret word “PINEAPPLE” in your application so we know you read this in its entirety*

If you’re nodding your head “Yes” to the above, proceed below to apply.

PERKS:
We're committed to setting you up for success as a certified Air Assistant that is equipped to take on any role your employer assigns you to. Upon acceptance as a candidate, you get exclusive access to trainings that will certify your skills in:

Task & Calendar Management
Launch/Sales Strategy Planning
Sales Funnel Tech Setup (For E-Commerce or Service Based Businesses)
Social Media Management
Digital Media Marketing (Including Email and SMS Marketing)
Lead Generation
After one week of training and assessment, you're officially a certified Air Assistant, which means we work to guarantee a part-time remote job with a woman-owned business dedicated to long term success of her company's team and clients/customers. Before signing an employee agreement under our umbrella, you get to meet them in a virtual Executive Assistant Mixer to make sure there is a connection between brand and AA.

Apply and we'll be in touch soon to invite you to next steps in the application/candidate process! Again - don't apply unless you are ready to hit the ground running with your current digital marketing/automation experience


Part time work hours (minimum 25 hours per week required)
Work from anywhere in the world (as long as your internet signal is strong and computer is fast)
Starting Salary at $350 USD a month ($4200 USD annual)
Free certification program to enhance your professional skills in your career
Guaranteed job placement after certification. Typical time between getting certified and getting placed = 30 days. If it takes longer, your profile will remain in our database and we reach out to all available AA's every week to potentially get matched with a Founder. Be ready!

title: Medical Receptionist at Mental Health Practice
description:
Are you an experienced medical receptionist? Do you love speaking with patients on the phone? Are you excited to join a fast growing, growth oriented mental healthcare practice?

Zeeva is a psychotherapy practice based in California and Nevada, and we are now hiring a medical receptionist to join our team! The medical receptionist would work alongside our client care coordinator, billing team, and operations coordinator.

The right candidate will have excellent verbal and written communication. The medical receptionist must have excellent customer service skills and lots of kindness and patience. Excellent cross-functional experience working with customer service and creating workflows and efficiencies. Must have excellent attention to detail.

Responsibilities include: 

Schedule appointments for new patients
Responding to emails and voicemails
Managing therapists' schedules
Manage patient EHR profiles
Process client records requests and data
Track weekly KPIs
Assist with medical billing tasks, including verification of insurance coverage
Handle client complaints
Basic knowledge and understanding of therapy practices, including EMDR, IFS, DBT, etc.


Requirements: 

2-3+ years of experience as a medical receptonist
Experience in healthcare setting required
Must be very resourceful
Very strong verbal and written communications skills (in English) a must
Technology proficient
Excellent organization and communication skills required
Thrive on being busy and enjoy working in a busy and face paced environment
Proven ability to juggle multiple projects at a time, while maintaining sharp attention to detail
Must align with our mission and core values
~Our Purpose~

Zeeva Community Foundation was created by a group of psychotherapists banded together with a shared purpose. Zeeva's purpose is to improve the quality of mental health care for people of all walks of life. We believe in empowering one another and cultivating positive growth and development. We strive for excellence through investing in quality, accessible, and personalized behavioral care. Our approach to therapy is trauma-informed and client-centered.

Does our purpose resonate with you? We would love to review your application and learn why!

This is an hourly full-time position, with 10 paid days off a year. This is a remote, work from home position, that requires that you work 9 AM - 5 PM Pacific Standard Time. All employees also receive a monthly self-care initiative and annual anniversary recognition stipend.

~Our 4 Core Values~

Lifelong learning (growth-oriented, personal learning)
Reflective (humility, open to feedback, coachable)
Ethics (honesty, integrity)
Supportive engagement (teamwork, engagement in learning, teach, and growing)

We will not read or respond on onlinejobs.ph. Please apply at: https://zeevabehavioralhealth.applytojob.com/apply/v3vvL454fO/Medical-Receptionist-At-Mental-Health-Practice

title: Entry Level UX/UI Website Designer
description:
WHO WE ARE
An innovative startup based on the east coast of the United States focused on developing automation solutions. Our technology is designed to organize and simplify business practices, offering companies effective and reliable ways to enhance efficiency and productivity. 

WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR
We are looking for a talented and driven entry level UX/UI Designer to help design efficient and intuitive user interfaces for our document management platform and other projects. The right individual will have a desire to learn and ability to work independently, while providing constant communications and updates on project status. 

The most important skill for this job is your aesthetic style and the ability to identify and articulate why a user interface is effective in achieving its purpose. The rest of the skills required for this position can be learned over time, and we can direct you on what to study.

With this in mind, it would be helpful for us to understand your thought process.  As part of your application, please provide us with examples of user interfaces you find compelling and descriptions as to why.  Screenshots of UI/UX’s from video games, websites, etc. are all acceptable examples.

We would also like to see your sense of style.  We have provided our color palette below in the DESIGN AESTHETIC section.  As part of your application, please provide us with a few examples of imagery that shows automation or technology with this color scheme in mind.

The position is fully remote., but the individual must be available to attend remote meetings a few days a week.

DESIGN AESTHETIC
Our company draws inspiration from the immersive and engaging world of video game design, embracing a style that is both futuristic and refined. We aim to create a user experience that feels sleek and professional, balanced with a clean, sci-fi aesthetic. We’re looking for a designer who can blend engaging, game-inspired visuals with functional, intuitive interfaces, aligning with our brand’s vision to make automation accessible and visually compelling. This role requires a designer with a strong sense of aesthetic who can bring fresh ideas to create a distinctive, yet professional, user experience.

Color Palette: #234059, #49728C, #6DCCF2, #88DFF2, #27F2F2

RESPONSIBILITIES 
Research and Analysis: Conduct thorough research on current industry methods and trends to ensure that designs align with the latest UX/UI best practices. Report findings to the team and suggest improvements or new approaches based on this research.

Feature Analysis and Implementation Planning: Analyze potential features to identify the most effective methods for implementation. Propose and document these methods, ensuring they align with the design methodology of providing immediate access to related features and minimizing user steps.

Wireframing and Prototyping: Create detailed wireframes and interactive prototypes using Figma that clearly demonstrate UX/UI flow. Ensure that designs are intuitive, user-friendly, and allow users to perform tasks with minimal effort.

UX/UI Flow Optimization: Focus on designing user interfaces that limit the number of steps needed for task completion, promoting an efficient and seamless user experience. Iterate designs based on user feedback and testing to continuously refine and improve the user journey.

Collaboration and Communication: Excellent communication skills, capable of succinctly reporting project status, current issues, and forthcoming steps. Communicate design decisions clearly and effectively. Strong command of the English language is essential for effective communication.

User Testing and Feedback Integration: Testing prototypes and live designs to evaluate functionality. Provide and analyze feedback and integrate necessary changes to optimize the user experience.

Graphic and Video Editing: Assist with graphic editing tasks such as the creation of icon sets and other graphics necessary for the functionality of the site. Additionally, contribute to video editing and the creation of feature videos that demonstrate the usability of new feature releases, ensuring they effectively communicate the design's intent and functionality.

Documentation: Maintain comprehensive documentation of design processes, methodologies, and changes in the company’s Gitlab. Ensure that all design decisions are well-documented for future reference and alignment with project goals.

Continuous Learning: Stay updated with the latest UX/UI design tools, techniques, and methodologies.


JOB QUALIFICATIONS AND SKILL SETS
UX/UI Principles: Strong understanding of UX/UI design principles, with a focus on user-centered design and creating intuitive user flows.

Figma: Proficiency in Figma, including creating complex wireframes, interactive prototypes, and design systems.
Information Architecture: Ability to organize and structure content to create clear and effective navigation systems.
Graphic Design: Skilled in creating visual elements like icon sets and other graphics necessary for the functionality of the site using open-source tools.

Prototyping: Expertise in creating interactive prototypes that demonstrate the flow and functionality of the design.
Responsive Design: Experience designing for various devices and screen sizes, ensuring a seamless experience across platforms.

Ability to Learn and Grow: We value continuous learning. We are looking for candidates who show enthusiasm for expanding their knowledge, proactively seeking out learning opportunities, and who are ready to apply fresh insights to improve projects and processes.

Strong command of the English language, essential for effective communication in a professional setting. 


USEFUL SKILLS 
Video Editing: Proficiency in video editing, particularly using DaVinci Resolve, to assist in the creation of feature videos that demonstrate the usability of new feature releases. 


HARDWARE REQUIREMENTS
The individual must have their own computer and internet access.


APPLICATION PROCESS 
When applying, it is essential that you provide examples of prior work (especially examples that you feel align with our design aesthetic), and your resume.  Please also follow the instructions outlined in the WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR section.

We are looking to hire the right individual fairly quickly.

title: Lead Generation / Clay Expert
description:
Job Description: Lead Generation and Cold Outbound Expert

We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Lead Generation and Cold Outbound Expert to join our team. The ideal candidate has advanced expertise in lead extraction, outreach infrastructure, and automation, with a strong emphasis on proficiency in Clay/Claygent. This role focuses on building efficient systems, setting up infrastructure, and automating outreach campaigns to scale effectively.
Responsibilities:

Lead Generation & Outreach

    - Extract and build high-quality lead lists using Apollo, LinkedIn Sales Navigator, and other tools.
    - Conduct targeted research to identify and qualify leads based on industry, role, and company needs.
    - Create personalized, scalable outreach strategies through Clay/Claygent and other automation tools.

Cold Email Infrastructure

    - Set up and manage cold email domains, ensuring optimized email deliverability through proper configurations.
    - Monitor and troubleshoot deliverability issues to maintain the effectiveness of outreach campaigns.

Clay/Claygent Automation

    - Design, implement, and optimize advanced automation workflows in Clay/Claygent to improve scalability and personalization.
    - Utilize the full capabilities of Clay/Claygent for data enrichment, personalized dynamic content, and outreach sequencing.
   -  Continuously analyze and refine workflows to maximize efficiency and conversion rates.

Data Management & Reporting

    - Maintain a well-organized database of leads, ensuring data integrity and accuracy.
    - Track key metrics and generate reports to assess outreach performance and highlight improvement opportunities.

Collaboration

    - Partner with the sales and marketing teams to align lead generation efforts with overall business goals.
    - Provide insights on campaign outcomes to inform future strategies.

Qualifications:

    - Proven experience working with Clay/Claygent is mandatory (applications without this experience will not be considered).
    - Expertise in lead generation tools such as Apollo and LinkedIn Sales Navigator.
    - Strong knowledge of cold email infrastructure, including domain setup, deliverability, and email platform management.
    - Technical skills to create, manage, and optimize Clay/Claygent workflows.
    - Analytical mindset with experience in tracking and optimizing outreach performance metrics.
    - Ability to work independently and prioritize tasks effectively.
    - Availability to work full-time, US Eastern Hours (no other jobs, clients, or freelance commitments).

What We Offer:

    - Full-time work (40 hours per week), US Eastern Hours.
   -  A work laptop, webcam, green screen (optional), courses to upskill, US phone number, VPN, and more.
   -  Paid trial project for final round candidates to assess fit and showcase skills.
    - Competitive pay, up to $1,500 per month depending on experience, with an opportunity to work with a reputable US company.

To Apply:

    - Submit a 1 minute Loom video introducing yourself and your experience, specifically highlighting your expertise with Clay/Claygent.
    - Include a link to your resume, portfolio, and relevant work showcasing your Clay/Claygent projects.
    - List of software tools and AI tools you are proficient in.

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Job Description:

As a DevOps Engineer at the Republic of Palau's Digital Residency Program (RNS.ID), you will be a crucial part of our team, responsible for managing and optimizing our cloud infrastructure. Your expertise in AWS, GCP, and Terraform will be pivotal in ensuring the reliability, scalability, and security of our Web3 ID platform.

Key Qualifications:

    Proficiency in Amazon Web Services (AWS) and Google Cloud Platform (GCP).

    Strong expertise in Terraform for infrastructure as code.

    Proven experience in maintaining and optimizing cloud-based infrastructure.

    Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.

    Ability to work collaboratively in a dynamic environment.

    Familiarity with DevOps best practices.

Responsibilities:

-Infrastructure Management: Design, deploy, and maintain AWS and GCP infrastructure to support the Web3 ID platform. Utilize Terraform for infrastructure provisioning and configuration. Monitor and optimize cloud resources for performance and cost-efficiency.

-Automation and CI/CD: Develop and maintain automation scripts and pipelines for continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD). Implement containerization and orchestration technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes) to streamline deployment processes.

-Security and Compliance: Collaborate with the security team to implement and maintain security best practices. Conduct regular security assessments and ensure compliance with relevant regulations and standards.

-Monitoring and Incident Response: Set up and manage monitoring and alerting systems to proactively identify and address issues. Investigate and resolve infrastructure-related incidents, conducting root cause analysis.

-Documentation: Create and update infrastructure documentation and procedures. Document incident reports and resolutions for knowledge sharing.

Qualifications:

-Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (or equivalent   work experience).
-Minimum of 3 years of experience as a DevOps Engineer, Cloud Engineer, or similar role.
-AWS and GCP certifications are a plus.
-Strong understanding of cloud architecture and best practices.
-Familiarity with Web3 and blockchain technologies is advantageous.

Join RNS.ID and contribute to our mission of revolutionizing digital identity through Web3 technology.

title: High-Performance Sales Representative for Rent Relax
description:
Position: Sales Representative (Remote)
Company: Rent Relax
Compensation: Base Pay + Unlimited Commission
Location: Remote

Who We Are
Rent Relax is revolutionizing the short-term rental industry by helping Airbnb hosts maximize their earnings through expert optimization, automation, and marketing. We’ve helped hundreds of hosts increase bookings and streamline operations. Now, we’re looking for a motivated Sales Representatives to join our team and help us grow even faster!

Why You’ll Love This Job
- Unlimited Earning Potential: Base pay + uncapped commission means the harder you work, the more you earn.
- Make a Difference: Help Airbnb hosts solve their biggest challenges and achieve success.
- Comprehensive Training: Learn proven sales techniques to close deals and advance your skills.
- Work Anywhere: Fully remote position with the flexibility to create your ideal work-life balance.
- Be Part of a Winning Team: Join a supportive, fast-paced team that celebrates your success.

Who You Are
- Closer: You’re confident, persuasive, and love turning conversations into closed deals.
- Empathetic Communicator: You listen to understand and address client concerns effectively.
- Goal-Oriented: You thrive on meeting and exceeding sales targets.
- Resilient: Rejection doesn’t phase you—you’re driven to keep going and win the next deal.
- Organized: You manage leads and follow-ups like a pro, staying on top of your pipeline.
- Quick Learner: You’re ready to dive into training, absorb knowledge, and apply it fast.
- Strong English communication skills are a must.

What You’ll Do
- Engage Leads: Work with warm, pre-qualified leads to identify their needs and present Rent Relax’s solutions.
- Close Sales: Confidently guide leads to opt into Rent Relax’s full-service offerings, including optimization, automation, and marketing.
- Follow Up: Build relationships through consistent and strategic follow-ups to nurture leads and overcome objections.
- Collaborate: Work closely with the Rent Relax team to refine strategies and hit team goals.
- Track Success: Meet and exceed monthly revenue and conversion goals.

What Success Looks Like
- The more deals you close the more revenue you make
- Your clients rave about how you’ve helped them transform their Airbnb listings.
- You’re growing your skills and climbing the ranks within Rent Relax.

How to Apply
Ready to join a growing company and make a real impact?

Apply now by submitting your resume and a short cover letter explaining why you’re the perfect fit for this role. To improve your chances, include a video showcasing how you handle sales objections and examples of any calls you’ve successfully closed in the past.

Let’s simplify success for Airbnb hosts—one call at a time!

title: L2 Tech Support Engineer
description:
Dear Technology Lover!
We're a small (but VERY efficient) 20-year-old MSP based in Arizona.
As a small company. we're VERY employee-focused, and believe that our team members are our MOST IMPORTANT ASSET!

Here are some of the things you can expect from working with us:
• Ongoing (monthly) manager review and feedback- you should never guess where you are "standing" and what you, AND THE COMPANY, can do better!
• Paid certifications- we will pay for your courses, and tests and allocate time during business hours to help you achieve your desired goals
• Paid Time Off- it's important to us that you are happy, healthy, and have a work-life balance!
• Bonuses- when the company wins- you win!
• Raises- As we grow, we believe you should as well. We have to stay competitive as an employer to retain our awesome employees!
• Opportunities to grow- In our industry, we can't be on "cruise control"... We need to push our team members to stay ahead of the technology curve. Help you continually to sharpen your skills with a focus on your career aspirations.
• Paid sick days- We understand life happens. We don't want you to feel that you have to drag yourself to work sick if your body tells you to relax...

You're the right fit if you:
• LOVE learning, working with, and experimenting with new technology
• Get excited when you save someone's day and provide great service
• Are a hard-working fun person, and see yourself being in the IT industry for the foreseeable future
• Want to work in a GROWING environment, with STABLE income, Bonuses, and a great attitude!
• Want the opportunity to advance and learn more!

Some of the responsibilities that your position will include are:
Helpdesk (mostly escalations, but some basic if needed), cyber security related tasks/ audits, cloud hosting and virtualization (HyperV, SonicWall, VPN), MS365 management and automation, BCDR (Axcient), networking (Unifi, Sonicwall), IT projects, Servers maintenance (Windows only), scripts creation, testing new technology and other tasks related to IT.

IMPORTANT:
This position requires AT LEAST 3 years of MSP experience, 100% clean background check, highly organized, technologically savvy, and can work diligently with little supervision.
Several hiring steps will take place to verify the above requirements, including reference checking, employment verification, technical testing, and more.

Minimum technical level that you will need to be able to pass a test on:
• Explaining to a non-technical person what the "cloud" is
• Consulting with a new client on what BCDR solution you would recommend to an SMB, and why
• Explaining what the differences are between traditional anti-virus and XDR
• Creating a new Virtual Machine on Hyper-V host, from an ISO file located on a different computer on the network.
• Explaining the differences and commonalities between SharePoint and OneDrive.
• Creating an Intune policy that will install Firefox on an Azure-joined VM, and make Firefox the default browser, with the specific home page we'll provide to you during the test.
• Several other situational and technical questions.
• CCNA certificate candidates preferred but not required.

MORE DETAILS:
• A PRE-EMPLOYMENT BACKGROUND CHECK is performed (at our expense). You must have 100% clean background check. Please do not apply if you don't have 100% clean background check.
• Personality is KEY for us. We are looking for an easy-going, yet professional, friendly and HONEST person.
• You will be working from home. This means you must have a quiet work environment and no excessive background noise.
• FAST AND RELIABLE INTERNET SERVICE IS REQUIRED
• You must have a Computer/Laptop with at least i5 minimum 8th gen (preferably a newer one) with 16 GB RAM or more.
• Your device should be solely dedicated only for work. The provided device by the company will be arranged based on your tenure. Of course, you can still use it for personal, but downloading other stuff unless work-related is prohibited since we are an IT company, security is our priority.
• We evaluate/ review employees monthly and provide consistent feedback.
• We offer raises and bonuses according to performance, certifications, attitude, and customer reviews twice/ year.
• Your manager (our IT director) will create a roadmap for your "KPIs" and certifications track. We always push our team to earn certifications and additional knowledge – even allowing “disconnect study time” during business hours!
• On-call rotation (after-hours) for a week at a time, once every 4-5 weeks. It's VERY rare that we get calls after-hours (the average is only twice/ year!).
• We're closed on major US holidays, and at the completion of the first 3 months of employment, you'll qualify for paid holidays.
• Work hours are Mon-Fri at 8 am till 5:30 pm (UTC-07:00 , MST, Arizona time zone)
• Every 4 to 5 weeks, you'll be working 1/2 day on a Saturday (project work/catch-up work) and get 1/2 day off the week after
• Mandatory 1-hour lunch and additional breaks (as you need those) throughout the day.
• Further details and information will be discussed with qualified candidates.

EXPERIENCE REQUIRED:
• REQUIRED: Relevant minimum 3 YEARS experience working for an MSP
• REQUIRED: Microsoft Azure AD/ M365 experience
• REQUIRED: Experience working with an RMM and PSA software (DATTO preferred)
• Preferred: Cyber Security education/experience
• Preferred: Hyper-V experience

Other tools we use:
Barracuda DNS filter, AutoElevate, Cylance, Infocyte, Syxsense, IT Glue, SonicWall, Unifi, and more

HOW TO APPLY?

send an Email to customerservice+L2TS-Nov2024@galloptechgroup.com with the subject line "L2 Tech Support - November 2024".

In your email body, you MUST include the following, and ONLY the following please:
- An attachment of your resume in PDF format
- A confirmation (simple written statement) that you have a 100% clean background with no criminal history.
- A confirmation (simple written statement) that you understand the business hours (MST\ Arizona time zone.

Answer the following questions:
1. How many years of experience do you have working in an MSP company? Name of the MSP company/s you worked with.
2. Do you have experience working with RMM and PSA software? What applications did you use?
3. Do you have experience working with Virtualization, servers, GPO, TCP/IP, hyper-v/vmware, conditional access, Intune, and Scripting such as PowerShell?

- No other information/cover letter or attachments should be included, besides a simple salutation and signature if so desired.

NOTE- Please do NOT apply using other methods besides the above. Any applicants who reach out to us via phone, social media, or any method other than the instructions above will automatically be disqualified.
Only those who followed the above instructions will be contacted within up to 2 business days, with further instructions.


We're looking forward to having you join our family!



Gallop Technology Group

title: Senior Full Stack Developer
description:
Elevate Your Career as a Senior Full Stack Developer

Are you a seasoned developer with a passion for crafting exceptional digital experiences? We’re seeking a Senior Full Stack Developer to join our dynamic remote team and lead the development of an innovative platform for private investment tracking. Your expertise will be instrumental in redefining the financial technology landscape.

What You’ll Do:
- Architect and Develop: Lead the full stack development of responsive, accessible, and secure user interfaces, seamlessly integrating modern backend technologies to deliver a superior user experience.
- Optimize Databases: Design, implement, and fine-tune SQL databases to ensure efficient, high-performance data storage and retrieval, maintaining the integrity and reliability of our platform.
- Cloud Architecture: Utilize AWS services to create a scalable, secure cloud infrastructure. You’ll oversee cloud deployments, automate workflows, and ensure optimal application performance in a cloud-based environment.
- Innovate User Experience: Tackle complex UI/UX challenges to create an intuitive, engaging user journey. Implement cutting-edge features, such as a browser-based notification system, to enhance user interaction.
- Lead and Mentor: Provide guidance and mentorship to junior developers, promoting best practices and maintaining high standards in coding, testing, and deployment.

What We’re Looking For:
- Extensive Experience: 8+ years of full stack development experience with a robust understanding of both frontend and backend technologies, driving projects from concept to completion.
-Technical Proficiency:
    - Frontend: Advanced knowledge of TypeScript for building dynamic and scalable user interfaces.
    - Backend: Deep expertise in TypeScript and Python for creating efficient, maintainable codebases.
    - Database Management: Strong capabilities in SQL, including the design, execution, and optimization of complex queries and relational databases.
- Cloud Mastery: Proficiency in AWS services such as EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, and CloudFormation for architecting, deploying, and managing cloud-based applications.
- Tool Familiarity: Experience with Supabase, Firebase, and Vercel is a plus.

title: Independent Contractor: Sales Setter & Closer – Tech & Digital Marketing Services (Commission + Bonus)
description:
We’re looking for a dedicated and results-oriented Independent Contractor to join our team as a Part-Time Sales Setter & Closer. Your primary responsibility will be to connect with inbound leads via calls and texts, follow up with prospects, and guide them to book a call or meeting. Once engaged, you will work to close the deal, helping clients access our cutting-edge website development, artificial intelligence bots, and digital marketing services such as SEO and marketing automation.

This role offers a low base rate combined with commission for every sale and performance bonuses, making it perfect for individuals with excellent communication skills who thrive in a flexible, contractor-based environment. It's an ideal opportunity for someone motivated to earn and grow. However, please only apply if you are confident in your sales abilities and have the skills needed to successfully close deals. We offer a base rate of $400 plus a 10-15% commission on all sales. Our product prices range from $300 to $5,000+, meaning a 10-15% commission can quickly bring your earnings to $1,000+. We also provide bonuses for recurring products, giving you additional earning opportunities as you build client relationships.

Responsibilities:
Prospecting & Outreach: Engage with warm leads provided by the company via calls to introduce our services.
Appointment Setting: Qualify leads and schedule discovery calls for detailed consultations.
Closing Sales: Present tailored solutions to clients, address their needs, handle objections, and close deals.
Client Relationship Management: Build and maintain relationships with prospects to encourage repeat business and referrals.
CRM Updates: Record all lead interactions in the CRM to ensure organized follow-up and tracking.
Sales Targets: Meet or exceed monthly sales goals to qualify for bonuses.

Requirements:
Proven Sales Experience: Background in selling services like website development, AI bots, SEO, or digital marketing solutions.
Strong Communication Skills: Ability to convey technical or marketing concepts clearly to potential clients.
Independent Work Ethic: Self-motivated, able to work independently as a contractor while managing time effectively.
CRM Proficiency: Familiarity with lead management tools (training available).
Availability: Part-time commitment of 20-30 hours per week with a flexible schedule.

*** Fluent english is a requirement****

Why Join Us?
As an independent contractor, you’ll have the freedom to work on your terms while earning substantial commissions in a thriving industry. If you’re passionate about sales and want to help businesses grow through cutting-edge solutions like AI bots, website development, and marketing automation, we’d love to partner with you.

If you're interested, please send your resume with the subject line: "Let's Convert and Make Money Together!" to our email evergendigital@gmail.com

title: Senior Accountant
description:
Job Summary: 

We are currently seeking a dynamic, self-motivated, CPA designated Senior Accountant to support the day-to-day accounting function. The Senior Accountant is responsible for overseeing and managing the monthly financial reporting process, creating and maintaining an accrual accounting system, preparing accurate financial statements, handling intercompany transactions, and contributing to budgeting and forecasting efforts. This role requires a strong understanding of Canadian accounting principles and excellent analytical skills to ensure the financial health of the organization. 

Key Responsibilities: 

Monthly Reporting and Financial Reporting: 

Prepare and review monthly financial reports, ensuring accuracy and compliance with Canadian GAAP. 

Analyze financial data and variances, providing detailed explanations and insights to management. 

Coordinate with various departments to gather necessary information for financial reporting. 

Prepare detailed cash flow reports with 30/60/90-day forecasts. 

Generate market segments reports for each reporting unit.  

Calculate EBITDA and net income while tracking trends.  

Support financial planning and management for grants, bursaries, and requests for proposals (RFPs) 

Accrual Accounting System: 

Develop and implement an accrual accounting system to accurately record revenues and expenses. 

Maintain and update accrual schedules, ensuring timely recognition of financial transactions. 

Monitor and reconcile accrual accounts to ensure accuracy and completeness. 

Financial Statements Preparation: 

Prepare and review monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements, including balance sheets, income statements, and cash flow statements. 

Ensure financial statements are accurate, timely, and in compliance with regulatory requirements and company policies. 

Assist with the preparation of consolidated financial statements for multiple entities. 

Intercompany Transactions: 

Manage and reconcile intercompany transactions, ensuring accurate recording and reporting. 

Coordinate with various entities to resolve discrepancies and ensure proper documentation. 

Prepare and review intercompany balance reconciliations and eliminations. 

Budgeting and Forecasting: 

Assist in the development of annual budgets and financial forecasts. 

Monitor actual performance against budgets and forecasts, providing variance analysis and explanations. 

Support strategic planning initiatives by providing financial insights and projections. 

General Accounting and Compliance: 

Oversee general ledger activities, including journal entries, account reconciliations, and month-end close processes. 

Ensure compliance with internal controls, company policies, lender financial covenants, and regulatory requirements. 

Assist with external audits, providing necessary documentation and explanations. 

Qualifications: 

Education: 

Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field. 

CPA certification. 

Experience: 

Minimum of 5 years of experience in accounting or finance, with a focus on financial reporting and analysis. 

Experience with intercompany transactions and consolidated financial statements is preferred. 

Skills: 

Strong knowledge of Canadian GAAP and accrual accounting principles. 

Proficiency in accounting software (e.g., QuickBooks). 

Advanced Excel skills and familiarity with data analysis tools. 

Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making abilities. 

Strong attention to detail and organizational skills. 

Effective communication and interpersonal skills. 

Ability to work independently and as part of a team. 

Application Process: 

To apply for the Senior Accountant position, please submit your resume to hrteam@thefvg.com

The Foreign Venture Group is an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace where all employees feel valued, respected, and supported. We believe that our differences make us stronger and drive our success.

title: Automation Contractor
description:
Job Overview: We are looking for an experienced Automation Contractor to design, implement, and optimize automation solutions that enhance operational efficiency and drive business growth. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in process automation, data analysis, and business optimization, and will be responsible for developing automated workflows, integrating systems, and leveraging technology to streamline business processes.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Automation Design and Implementation:

Develop and implement automation solutions to streamline business processes and improve operational efficiency.
Utilize low-code platforms such as GoHighLevel (GHL) or equivalent to build and customize automation workflows.
Analyze existing workflows and identify opportunities for automation.
Design, configure, and deploy automated workflows using tools like Zapier, Integromat, or custom scripts.
2. System Integration:

Integrate automation solutions with existing systems, including CRM, ERP, and other business applications.
Ensure seamless data flow between systems and maintain data integrity.
3. Process Optimization:

Conduct in-depth analysis of business processes to identify areas for improvement and automation.
Collaborate with stakeholders to understand business needs and translate them into effective automation solutions.
4.Data Analytics and Reporting:

Utilize data analytics to monitor the performance of automated processes and identify areas for further optimization.
Generate reports and provide insights on the effectiveness of automation solutions.
5. Technical Support and Troubleshooting:

Provide technical support for automation solutions and troubleshoot issues as they arise.
Continuously monitor and maintain automation systems to ensure optimal performance.
6. Documentation and Training:

Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for automation processes and solutions.
Train team members and stakeholders on the use of automation tools, including low-code platforms like GHL, and best practices.
Qualifications:

Proven experience in designing and implementing automation solutions.
Proficiency in low-code platforms such as GoHighLevel (GHL) or equivalent.
Experience with automation tools and platforms (e.g., Zapier, Integromat, custom scripts).
Strong understanding of business processes and data analysis.
Experience with system integration and API usage.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Strong communication skills and ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects effectively.
Familiarity with business optimization methodologies and best practices.
Experience in a consulting or contractor role.
Knowledge of additional programming languages or automation tools.
Application Process:

To apply for this position, submit your resume and a brief cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and skills to hrteam@thefvg.com. We appreciate all applications; however, only selected candidates will be contacted for an interview.

Please use this format for sending your applications: Subject: Position Applied for_First Name_Last Name (e.g. Automation Contractor_John_Doe) Attached resume format: First name and Last Name (e.g. John Doe)

The Foreign Venture Group is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage candidates from diverse backgrounds to apply.

title: Team Lead: AI / Machine Learning
description:
Team Lead: AI / Machine Learning

Company Overview:

The Foreign Venture Group is a Digital transformation company specializing in helping SMEs (Small and Medium Enterprises) scale quickly and cost-effectively. We have various divisions including the AI Division.

AI Division Overview:

The AI division is responsible for maintaining and evolving our newly launched, custom-built AI Assistant (ChatBot) powered by OpenAI.  The AI assistant has been designed to support the unique needs of our SME clients coming from various industries.  As the AI field continues to grow, this division will be responsible for following industry trends and ensuring our AI/ML solutions leverage the best and newest technologies.

We are seeking a talented and experienced Full-Stack Developer (Python/Flask) to:

Lead and grow our Artificial Intelligence division
Help grow and shape the division by bringing in other skilled team members
Mentor junior team members
Maintain and enhance our AI Assistant code
Identify and implement customizations to the AI Assistant to support a wider range of SMEs and customer needs.

 Job Overview:

We seek a talented Full-Stack Developer with a strong foundation in Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning (ML), and Python programming to design, implement, and maintain cutting-edge solutions.  Expertise in OpenAI, Gen AI, machine learning algorithms (including regression and linear models), and prompt engineering is essential.  This individual will play a pivotal role in driving innovation within the AI/ML field by developing solutions that address complex problems.


Responsibilities:
1.  AI/ML Model Design & Development:
·   Collaborate with data science and AI engineering teams to translate project requirements into robust and scalable Python code, leveraging machine learning libraries like TensorFlow, PyTorch, or scikit-learn.
·   Design and implement a diverse range of machine learning algorithms (supervised, unsupervised, reinforcement learning, deep learning) to achieve optimal solutions for complex problems.
·  Develop and implement comprehensive evaluation metrics to assess algorithm performance and prompt effectiveness in delivering desired outcomes.
·   Integrate functionalities from OpenAI and Gen AI APIs to enhance AI solutions.
·   Perform data preprocessing, feature engineering, and data augmentation to prepare datasets for robust model training and evaluation.
·   Conduct rigorous model evaluation, hyperparameter tuning, and performance optimization to achieve state-of-the-art results.
2.  Prompt Engineering & User Interaction Analysis:
·    Develop and optimize prompts for AI language models, considering diverse use cases and user requirements.
·    Conduct in-depth analysis of user interactions and feedback to refine prompts and enhance model performance iteratively.
3.  Technical Documentation & Best Practices:
·   Create and maintain clear, well-structured documentation for code, algorithms, and models to ensure ongoing maintainability.
·   Adhere to industry best practices and established code review processes to guarantee code quality, maintainability, and scalability.
4.  Continuous Learning & Innovation:
·   Proactively stay abreast of the latest advancements in AI, machine learning, related technologies/applications, and emerging trends. (Experience with Azure Cloud and Azure Cognitive Services is a plus)
·   Use A/B testing to select and optimize new features.  

Qualification and Skills:

Must Have
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
7 years of experience in Full-Stack development with a focus on Python, & Flask
3+ years of experience leading development teams
Proficiency in front-end (client-side) development technologies such as JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
Proficiency in back-end (server-side) development technologies such as Flask, and Django
Solid grasp of software development best practices and version control systems
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Demonstrated experience in designing and maintaining scalable web applications including chatbots.
Ability to work independently and meet project deadlines.

Good to have
Knowledge of vector databases, particularly PostgreSQL pgvector
Heroku, Gunicorn, and Nginx.
Experience with prompt engineering and natural language processing (NLP).
Knowledge of deployment automation tools and techniques.
Familiarity with tools and libraries commonly used in natural language processing (NLP) tasks.
Understanding of RESTful API design principles.



Compensation:
(1) This position offers compensation exclusively through equity ownership in our AI Division, providing a unique opportunity to share in the success of a quickly growing multinational company

How to Apply:
If you meet these qualifications and are excited about the opportunity to support a dynamic executive team in a client-oriented environment, we want to hear from you! Please send your resume, along with a cover letter detailing your pertinent experience as a Team Lead: AI / Machine Learning to hrteam@thefvg.com.

Application Process: 
To apply for this position, please fill out the form using the link below, and submit your resume and a brief cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and skills. We appreciate all applications; however, only selected candidates will be contacted for an interview.

https://forms.gle/apQpy8PdutRygGhe9

The Foreign Venture Group is an equal-opportunity employer. We encourage candidates from diverse backgrounds to apply.
For more details about the company and role, visit Foreign Venture Group.

title: Power BI Developer
description:

title: Are you an experienced E-commerce Product Specialist? Showcase your skills in Automation and Web Scraping with us!
description:
We are a fast-growing company with three E-commerce stores seeking a tech-savvy, detail-focused E-commerce Product Lead Specialist skilled in Automation, Web Scraping, and Vendor Relations. This full-time role involves managing and automating product data, ensuring that our thousands of SKUs stay accurate and up-to-date.

PLEASE READ THE ENTIRE JOB DESCRIPTION AND ANSWER ALL QUESTIONS FOR YOUR APPLICATION TO BE CONSIDERED.

This role requires a high level of attention to detail, patience, and a methodical approach. Strong English writing and speaking skills are essential for occasional communication with vendors via email, chat, or phone to ensure accurate and timely product information. Additionally, expertise in web scraping and automation is critical to streamline data management and product updates.

Work hours will align with U.S. business hours. There will be an initial 1-month trial period.

Key Responsibilities

• Product Management & Data Integration:
- Oversee product listings, managing and updating SKUs.
- Coordinate with vendors for accurate product details, including pricing, specifications, and lead times.
- Maintain and update databases with product and vendor information.

• Automation & Web Scraping
- Develop, configure, and implement web scraping processes to monitor partner sites for product updates, including new additions or discontinued items.
- Automate and streamline Shopify integrations, enabling efficient import/export processes to update product data in bulk.
- Utilize pre-existing systems and tools for automated updates, ensuring future scalability and providing clear documentation for team reference.

• Inventory & Operational Oversight
- Track and reconcile inventory levels.
- Create and maintain Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for data management, product listing optimization, and team workflows.

• Optimization & Analysis
- Analyze product performance data and implement listing optimizations to enhance visibility, rankings, and conversion rates.
- Utilize insights from customer feedback, sales metrics, and data analytics to refine product and business strategies.

• Collaboration & Support
- Lead a team of 1-2 VAs in managing day-to-day operations and addressing product-related issues.
- Train and support team members on using automation tools and implementing SOPs.

• Other basic operations and administrative tasks

Qualifications:
• Work experience as a Product Manager
• Minimum of 2 years’ experience in E-commerce Product Management
• Proficiency in web scraping tools and techniques
• Experience in custom solution development is a plus
• Proven expertise in Shopify. Being a Shopify Certified Developer will be an advantage.
• Advanced skills in MS Excel, Google Suite, and familiarity with Airtable and ClickUp
• Write mushroom in your application to show your attention to detail
• Strong verbal and written communication skills, with high attention to detail
• Highly organized, detail-oriented, and good analytical skills with an ability to meet deadlines

Communication and meetings will be primarily conducted through voice chat (Google Meet) and Slack.

Before we proceed, here are a few things we'd like to confirm:
• Payments will be made weekly for the first four weeks starting from the third week of employment, and then bi-monthly every other Tuesday.
• Your work schedule will consist of 40 hours per week
• Your working hours will be from 9 PM to 6 AM (or 10 PM to 7 PM), PHT, with a 1-hour break, five days a week
• You’ll need to send an End of Shift (EOS) report every day, covering the following:
a. What did you do today? (detailed description)
b. What issues did you run into?
c. Is there anything I can help you with?

If you're okay with the above, please reply with "I AGREE TO ALL TERMS" and answer the following questions in complete sentences, using proper grammar and punctuation (please answer in number format instead of in paragraphs):

1. What is your previous experience with managing products for E-commerce companies?
2. Which automation and web scraping tools have you used in past product management roles? Please share examples of how you've used them to improve product accuracy or streamline processes.
3. Please also provide a list of other tools/software you have utilized in previous roles for product management. For each tool, include details on its specific function and briefly describe how you applied it in your work.
4. How large of a team have you managed before?
5. Have you worked with Shopify before?
6. Are you currently engaged in another job or commitment?
7. How fast is your internet?
8. Do you have a reliable computer?
9. How often do you experience power outages and internet issues?
10. What backups do you have in case of power outages?
11. What backups do you have in case of internet outages?

Please carefully review the entire job description and also use this format as your subject line when replying to this post: “Your First Name + I Am Your Product Lead Specialist" (e.g. Kevin - I Am Your Product Lead Specialist)

AI-generated responses will not be considered.

title: Junior Account Executive/Customer Success Manager (Bilingual - Spanish)
description:
Job Title: Junior Account Executive/Customer Success Manager (Bilingual - Spanish)
Reports to: Head of Owner Experience and Compliance
Supervises: Owner Relations Administrative Assistant

Job Summary:
 The Junior Account Executive/Customer Success Manager is responsible for maintaining effective communication with property owners and company stakeholders to ensure the highest level of satisfaction. They will proactively engage with clients, establish strong relationships, and identify opportunities for improvement. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of financial reports, an ability to delegate tasks effectively, and excellent communication skills.

- Collaborate with other departments to address owner requests and achieve the highest level of satisfaction.
- Proactively reach out to clients to understand their goals and establish how our company can meet them.
- Cultivate trust and personal connections with clients to further understand their needs and identify opportunities.
- Continuously optimize department processes to increase efficiency.
- Understand and address concerns in monthly profit and loss reports during 1-on-1 meetings with property owners.
- Delegate tasks and assignments effectively to direct reports and conduct frequent 1-on-1 meetings for guidance and development.
- Manage and develop the performance of direct reports.
- Actively communicate with internal team members and cultivate resources to support owner success.
- Respond to communications from current and prospective clients to develop strong, personal rapport and resolve concerns.
- Manage client-related tasks in our project management tool, ensuring timely progress and prioritization of pending tasks.
- Stay aware of company goals and strategies to ensure projects align with business priorities.
- Provide creative insights and solutions to address client/organizational challenges.
- Perform additional duties as assigned.

OH&S:
- Actively participate and contribute to the improvement of company procedures and processes.
- Follow all Upstay’s procedures and guidelines and applicable laws and regulations.
- Promote a professional and cooperative working environment, based on mutual respect and trust.
- Promote safe behavior in the workplace.

Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
- Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in client relationship management or a similar role.
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and negotiation skills.
- Strong problem-solving and analytical abilities.
- Ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks and projects simultaneously.
- Proficiency in using project management tools and software.
- Adept at building and maintaining strong relationships with clients and stakeholders.
- Familiarity with financial reports and an understanding of profit and loss statements.
- Language: English

Soft Skills:
- Demonstrated proficiency in verbal and written communication in English, Spanish, or Portuguese, enabling effective communication with property owners, company stakeholders, and team members.
- Self-motivated and capable of multitasking in a fast-paced environment, ensuring timely progress on client-related tasks and project management.
- Adaptability and responsiveness to changing conditions, priorities, technologies, and requirements to maintain the highest level of client satisfaction and support department efficiency.
- Professional demeanor and strong time management skills, allowing for effective delegation, guidance, and collaboration with Account Executives and other departments.
- This role will require you to work up to 48 hours a week. The candidate needs to demonstrate a resilient and get-it-done attitude and be able to work under high pressure.
- Proficiency in creative problem-solving and the ability to address client and organizational challenges using innovative, indirect approaches.

Job Type: Full-time

Schedule:

title: Recruitment VA (with Experience in Hiring)
description:
Overview:

We are seeking a highly organized and proactive Recruitment Virtual Assistant (VA) to support our hiring process. The VA will manage applicant databases, coordinate candidate interview schedules, keep hiring managers informed on high-priority candidates, and generate leads through social media and job boards. The ideal candidate is tech-savvy, responsive, and detail-oriented, with experience in recruitment or HR support.
Key Responsibilities:
Database Management:
Organize and maintain the applicant tracking system (ATS) to ensure accurate and up-to-date candidate information.
Track and categorize candidates based on qualifications, job role suitability, and status in the recruitment process.
Generate and share regular reports on applicant statuses and recruitment KPIs.
Interview Scheduling:
Schedule interviews, coordinating availability between candidates and hiring managers.
Send out reminders and confirmations to candidates.
Handle rescheduling requests promptly and professionally.
Communication with Hiring Managers:
Regularly update hiring managers on priority candidates and urgent recruitment needs.
Provide feedback summaries, interview notes, and insights gathered from candidate interactions.
Suggest high-potential candidates for immediate consideration based on manager preferences.
Lead Generation and Sourcing:
Use social media platforms (LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter) to source and attract potential candidates.
Post job openings on various job boards and track responses.
Proactively search for qualified candidates on job boards, networking groups, and industry-specific forums.
Applicant Outreach:
Conduct outreach to potential candidates and screen responses to identify interest and qualifications.
Assist in writing and posting job descriptions and engaging with applicants via email or chat.
Support Administrative Recruitment Tasks:
Prepare offer letters, rejection emails, and other communication templates.
Organize and update job listings as required.
Collaborate with other team members to ensure smooth operations across all recruitment phases.
Qualifications:
Proven experience as a Virtual Assistant, preferably within recruitment, HR, or administrative support.
Proficiency in using ATS and scheduling software (e.g., Calendly, Google Calendar).
Familiarity with social media recruiting and job boards.
Strong organizational skills with a high level of attention to detail.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to handle sensitive information with confidentiality.
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and prioritize tasks effectively.
Preferred Skills:
Knowledge of CRM or HR software.
Experience with LinkedIn Recruiter or other professional social networking tools.
Familiarity with lead generation techniques.

title: Back-End Office Operations
description:
We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Back-End Operations and Dispatch Coordinator to join our team. This individual will oversee the daily dispatch operations and ensure smooth coordination of back-end activities to maintain high service standards. The ideal candidate is proficient in managing logistics, adept with technology, and has a customer-first mindset.

Key Responsibilities:

Dispatch Coordination:

Assign and schedule drivers to customer requests efficiently.
Monitor and adjust driver schedules based on real-time updates.
Provide clear and concise instructions to drivers.
Address and resolve dispatch-related issues promptly.
Back-End Operations:

Maintain records of trips, driver performance, and vehicle usage.
Assist in the onboarding process for new drivers, ensuring all documentation is complete and accurate.
Monitor app-based operations for accuracy and troubleshoot any discrepancies.
Coordinate with the tech team to resolve software or app issues.
Customer Service:

Act as a point of contact for customers to address inquiries or complaints related to dispatch services.
Ensure timely and accurate communication with both drivers and customers.
Administrative Tasks:

Generate and review reports on key metrics such as trip counts, efficiency, and revenue.
Update and manage the scheduling system and back-end databases.
Collaborate with the management team to identify operational improvements.
Compliance:

Ensure adherence to company policies and local regulations.
Maintain confidentiality of sensitive information, including driver and customer data.
Required Skills and Qualifications:

Education: High school diploma or equivalent; a degree in logistics, operations management, or a related field is a plus.
Experience: Minimum of 2 years of experience in dispatching, logistics, or back-end operations.
Technical Skills:
Proficiency with dispatch software and apps.
Strong computer skills, including Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, Word, Outlook).
Ability to learn and adapt to new technologies quickly.
Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Organizational Skills: Strong multitasking, time management, and problem-solving abilities.
Teamwork: Ability to work collaboratively in a team-oriented environment.
Customer Service: Exceptional customer service skills with a focus on resolving issues efficiently.
Flexibility: Willingness to work in shifts, including weekends and holidays if necessary.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience with ride-sharing or transportation network companies (TNCs).
Familiarity with GPS tracking systems and map applications.
Knowledge of local geography or dispatch territories.
Key Attributes:

Detail-oriented with a proactive approach to problem-solving.
Ability to thrive in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.
Calm and composed under pressure.
Working Conditions: This role may require sitting for extended periods, working at a computer, and interacting with drivers and customers via phone or app-based platforms. Flexibility to adjust to varying work schedules is essential.

Application Process: Interested candidates should submit their resumes along with a brief cover letter highlighting relevant experience. We look forward to welcoming a dedicated professional to our team!

title: Supply Chain Analyst
description:
Job Title: Supply Chain Analyst
Job Type: Full-time
Work Hours: Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM to 4:30 PM Pacific Time
Work Experience: 
2-5 years of experience in supply chain analysis, logistics, procurement, or a related field.

TO APPLY, FILL OUT THIS FORM: https://forms.clickup.com/9011062867/f/8chku2k-41091/VVBQIBE2OMYKA84O6K

Job Overview: 
The Supply Chain Analyst is responsible for ensuring the efficiency and effectiveness of the supply chain operations within an organization. The role involves analyzing data, identifying trends, and optimizing processes to support business goals. The ideal candidate has strong analytical skills, attention to detail, and a solid understanding of supply chain principles.

Key Responsibilities:
Collect and analyze data related to supply chain activities, including procurement, production, inventory management, and logistics.
Develop reports and dashboards to track key supply chain performance metrics (KPIs).
Identify opportunities for cost savings, process improvements, and risk mitigation across the supply chain.
Monitor inventory levels, lead times, and supplier performance to ensure optimal supply chain efficiency.
Work closely with procurement, production, logistics, and finance teams to coordinate and optimize supply chain activities.
Develop and maintain supply chain models, forecasts, and simulations to aid in decision-making.
Assist in the identification and evaluation of new suppliers, logistics partners, and inventory strategies.
Ensure compliance with company policies and relevant regulations throughout the supply chain process.
Provide support for supply chain-related projects, such as system implementations, new product launches, or process improvement initiatives.
Communicate findings and recommendations to management and stakeholders.

Key Qualifications:
Bachelor’s degree in Supply Chain Management, Business, Logistics, or a related field.
2-5 years of experience in supply chain analysis, logistics, procurement, or a related field.

Strong analytical skills and proficiency in data analysis tools (e.g., Excel, SQL, Tableau, or other BI tools).
Knowledge of supply chain processes, including procurement, production, inventory, and logistics.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
Ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams.
Experience with supply chain management software (e.g., SAP, Oracle, or similar systems) is a plus.

Preferred Skills:
APICS CPIM or CSCP certification.
Experience with statistical analysis or data modeling.
Project management experience.

TO APPLY, FILL OUT THIS FORM: https://forms.clickup.com/9011062867/f/8chku2k-41091/VVBQIBE2OMYKA84O6K

title: GoHighLevel (GHL) Specialist with Wordpress Background
description:
We are a dynamic company dedicated to helping clients optimize their digital marketing and web presence. We work with a range of tools, including GoHighLevel (GHL) and WordPress, to build high-converting websites, streamline CRM processes, and automate marketing workflows. We are looking for a skilled and passionate GHL Specialist focused on workflows and automation, with a strong WordPress background, to join our team.1

Position Overview:

The GHL Specialist will be responsible for setting up, customizing, and optimizing workflows and automation within GoHighLevel for our clients. This role requires utilizing automation tools like Zapier to enhance marketing and operational efficiency. The ideal candidate will be technically skilled, solution-oriented, and driven to create high-impact marketing systems.

Key Responsibilities:

- GHL Workflow Management: Design, set up, and optimize workflows and automation sequences within GoHighLevel to improve client engagement and conversion rates.
- Integration with WordPress: Integrate GoHighLevel with WordPress sites, ensuring seamless functionality, including embedding forms, calendars, and other GHL elements.
- Utilization of Automation Tools: Leverage tools like Zapier to connect GHL with other applications, creating a streamlined and efficient workflow for marketing and operational processes.
- Campaign Setup: Create and manage email, SMS, and other marketing campaigns within GHL, ensuring effective delivery and tracking of performance metrics.
- Data Management: Organize and maintain CRM data, implementing lead scoring, tagging, and segmentation to enhance targeted marketing efforts.
- Performance Monitoring: Analyze and report on workflow and campaign performance, identifying areas for improvement and optimizing for better results.
- Client Support: Work with clients to understand their needs, troubleshoot issues, and provide guidance on maximizing GHL, WordPress, and automation tools.

Requirements:

- Experience with GoHighLevel (GHL): Proven experience in using GHL for workflow automation, campaign setup, and lead management.
- Automation Tool Knowledge: Familiarity with using automation tools like Zapier to connect various applications and enhance workflows.
- Marketing Automation Knowledge: Experience designing email sequences, SMS campaigns, and automation workflows within GHL.
- WordPress Skills
- Analytical Skills: Ability to measure and report on campaign performance, identify areas for improvement, and optimize for better results.
- Problem-Solving Ability: Strong troubleshooting skills and the ability to handle technical issues related to GHL and WordPress integrations.
- Communication Skills: Clear and effective communicator, able to work with clients and team members to deliver project goals.

Nice to Have:

- Knowledge of HTML, CSS, and basic JavaScript for custom coding solutions.
- Familiarity with other digital marketing tools and plugins such as Zapier.
- Experience with SEO and web performance optimization.

How to Apply:

If you’re passionate about building effective digital marketing systems and have experience with GoHighLevel, workflows, automation, and WordPress, we’d love to hear from you! Please send your resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter outlining your relevant experience.

title: User Experience Analyst & QA Specialist
description:
Overview
We are looking for a proactive and detail-oriented User Experience Analyst & QA Specialist to oversee the daily functionality, usability, and performance of our app and website. The primary goal is to ensure a seamless, intuitive, and enjoyable user experience while identifying areas for improvement. This role will involve daily testing, data analysis, and collaboration with design and development teams to optimise user satisfaction and engagement.
This role can be filled internally or externally by a professional with strong analytical skills, creative problem-solving abilities, and a passion for enhancing digital experiences.

Key Responsibilities

Daily Tasks:

Test and review the app and website daily for bugs, inconsistencies, and functionality gaps. Make sure all features are working
Analyse high-usage and low-usage features to determine patterns and user preferences.what do users want and need 
Identify disparities in design, grammar, and functionality and propose actionable fixes.
Document findings clearly for developers, designers, and other stakeholders.

User Feedback Analysis:

Collect and analyse what users love, dislike, and struggle with.
Translate feedback into practical recommendations to improve user experience.
Collaborate with the AI and design teams to integrate innovative problem-solving solutions.

Performance & Innovation:

Suggest and implement design adjustments to make the app and website more intuitive and efficient.
Explore how AI tools and intuitive design can simplify common tasks for users.

Collaboration:

Work closely with Product Team and Developers 
Work closely with CS and Users to understand there needs (use a data analytics too ‘Full Story’ to watch users experience)

Skills & Qualifications

Behavioural Traits:
Problem-solver with a user-first mindset.
Attention to detail and passion for quality.
Strong analytical and communication skills to convey complex findings simply.
Complete finisher 
Adaptable and open to continuous learning.
Preferred Experience:
2+ years in QA testing, user experience analysis, or a related field.
Creative mindset 
Familiarity with AI-powered tools or processes.

Performance Metrics
Success in this role will be measured by:
Reduction in user-reported bugs and issues.
Increased revenue in features for changes 
Increase Positive feedback trends from user analytics.
Increased engagement with high-value app and website features.
Reduced inconsistency in the app and remove the bloat and the excess 
Effective collaboration with design and development teams to deliver solutions.

Ideal Candidate Persona:
A tech-savvy individual with a knack for identifying usability issues and proposing elegant solutions.
Loves Apps and Phones with an analytical and creative mind 
Someone passionate about creating impactful digital experiences.
A professional who thrives on continuous feedback loops and iterative improvements.

title: Event Admin Executive
description:
Job Type: Full-Time, Remote

About Us: Event Strategies produces and owns a range of B2B event properties across a number of industry sectors in Ireland and the UK.

We specialize in planning and executing a wide range of events, from corporate conferences to social gatherings. As we continue to grow, we are seeking a talented and detail-oriented Event Admin Executive to join our team and contribute to the success of our events.

Job Description:

Position Overview: As an Event Admin Executive, you will play a crucial role in the planning and execution of events remotely by providing administrative support and ensuring the smooth coordination of all event-related activities. You will work closely with our event management team to ensure that every event we organize is a resounding success.

Key Responsibilities:
1. Event Coordination:
• Reports directly to the Senior/Junior Event Leads and assist other members of the team if necessary.

2. Administrative Support:
• Maintain accurate event records, including attendee lists and finalists
• Handle incoming inquiries and communications related to events.
• Entry Processing
• Data Entry
• Proofing of materials

3. Attendee Services:
• Provide online support to event attendees, including, guestlist management, registration assistance and information dissemination.
• Handle special requests and basic online customer support for attendees.

4. Media Coordination:
• Liaise with Senior/Junior Event Leads to ensure the production of event promotional materials.
• Manage the integration of multimedia elements into event presentations.

5. Post-Event Evaluation:
• Collect feedback from attendees and vendors to evaluate event success.
• Assist in the creation of post-event reports and analysis.

Qualifications:
• Previous experience in event planning or administration is a plus.
• Strong organisational and multitasking skills.
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
• Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite, GSuite and event management software.
• Ability to work effectively under pressure and meet tight deadlines.
• Attention to detail and problem-solving abilities.

Benefits:
• Opportunities for career growth and development.
• Friendly and collaborative work environment.
• Exciting and diverse range of events to work on.

How to Apply: Interested candidates are encouraged to submit their resume and a cover letter detailing their relevant experience to laurence@businessriver.com. Please include "Event Admin Executive Application" in the subject line of your email.

Event Strategies is an equal-opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

We look forward to receiving your application and finding the right candidate to join our team and help us continue to deliver exceptional events!

title: ISA CRM Specialist - Zoho Expert #4694
description:

About Us:

Manage, streamline, and automate workflows within Zoho CRM and Zoho Books to enhance productivity.
