Create custom functions using Zoho Deluge scripting and integrate third-party apps via API connections.
Oversee data import/export, ensuring accurate data migration across Zoho applications.
Design and maintain dashboards and reports to track key metrics in Zoho Analytics.
Train team members on Zoho best practices, document workflows, and provide troubleshooting support.
Ensure data compliance and security within Zoho, adhering to GDPR and HIPAA standards.

Qualifications:
2+ years of experience working extensively with Zoho CRM, Zoho Books, and related applications.
Proficiency in Zoho Deluge scripting and API integration.
Strong skills in data management, workflow automation, and process optimization.
Ability to create training documentation and communicate effectively on various platforms.
Comfortable working both independently and as part of a team.

Tools You Will Use:
Zoho Suite: Zoho CRM, Zoho Books, Zoho Projects, Zoho Desk, Zoho Analytics
Zoho Deluge and REST API for custom scripting and integrations
Zoho Flow for cross-app workflow automation
Reporting Tools: Zoho Analytics, Google Data Studio, Power BI
Communication Tools: Zoho Cliq, Slack, Loom

Working Hours:
Full-time, 40 hours per week
Monday-Friday, 8am-4pm PST (Paid lunch included)
Graveyard Shift

Preferred Traits:
Self-starter with excellent problem-solving abilities
Organized and detail-oriented
Able to work both collaboratively and independently
Creative thinker who can identify and fill process gaps
Comfortable communicating via text, email, phone, and video calls
Fluent in English, with an American-style accent preferred

Non-Negotiables:
Screenshot and productivity tracker required.
Time of work hours (Graveyard Shift).

Benefits:
Paid 30 business days of training (covering mindset and skillset).
Work-from-home opportunity.
7th-month, anniversary, and performance bonuses.
Access to ongoing training resources.
Collaborate with an exceptional community of VAs.
Weekly payment.

How to Apply:
Please answer the following questions to help us determine if you’re a good fit for the role:

1.Who is the most influential person in your life and how did he/she impact you?
2.What is the toughest obstacle you have encountered in life? Did you overcome it? How?
3.How would you define success in your personal & business life?
4.Can you tell me about a time when you made a mistake at work? How did you handle it?
5.Describe a situation where you faced significant challenges or setbacks. How did you stay motivated and persevere through them?
6.Can you give an example of a time when you had to come up with a creative solution to solve a problem with limited resources?

Why Join Us?

Join Phyllis Song Consulting and be part of a community that values growth, innovation, and support. Our VAs enjoy a structured, rewarding environment that fosters professional development and work-life balance.

title: Senior Data Engineer / Analyst
description:
Overview 
We are seeking a highly skilled and data-driven Data Analyst with experience in Amazon API integrations and advanced data visualization tools like Power BI and Google BigQuery. This role involves gathering, analyzing, and interpreting large datasets to uncover insights that will drive business strategies and improve performance. This role is pivotal in shaping data-driven decisions that fuel our businesses growth. Join us to leverage your expertise and make a measurable impact. 

About us
We are  a company dedicated to delivering exceptional customer experiences. We firmly believe that it's not just about the products; it's about the connections customers establish with our brand and the overall experience they have. Our approach goes beyond pricing and features; it's centered on creating meaningful interactions and lasting relationships with our valued customers.
Our team consists of thirteen dedicated members, each contributing their expertise to various aspects of our business. Our roles span across different departments including Finance, Marketing, Supply Chain, Human Resources and Research and Development. 
Looking ahead, our aspirations for the year include improving our operations, launching new brands, and expanding our business footprint. To facilitate this growth, we are actively seeking a Data Analyst who can take the lead with our 


Responsibilities
Data Collection & Integration:Work with Amazon APIs to extract and manage sales, inventory, and customer data. Integrate data from multiple sources into centralized platforms like BigQuery and Google Sheets into reports. 
Reporting & Visualization:Automate and create dashboards and reports in Power BI, BigQuery, or similar tools to present findings to stakeholders.
Process Improvement: Develop and implement data models to support decision-making and automate repetitive data processes for efficiency.

Skills and Experience 
Strong expertise in Amazon API integrations and querying Amazon datasets. 
Advanced skills in Power BI, Google BigQuery, SQL, SQ Lite (Coding) and Python (or R).
Familiarity with data warehousing concepts and tools.
Experience in statistical analysis, data modeling, and predictive analytics
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Bachelor’s degree in Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, or related field.
3+ years of experience as a Data Analyst, preferably in e-commerce or a similar domain.

Preferred Qualifications
Experience with Amazon Seller Central or Vendor Central reporting.
Familiarity with machine learning frameworks is a plus.
Strong understanding of e-commerce metrics and customer behavior analysis

Note : This is a project based role and ranges from 4 - 20 hours per month.

title: Project Manager Lead for CEO and COO
description:
Company Overview:
We are a fast-growing and dynamic organization dedicated to operational excellence and growth. We are seeking a skilled Project Manager Lead to provide essential support to the CEO and COO. This is a key leadership role that focuses on overseeing projects, driving task completion, and maintaining seamless coordination, with a strong emphasis on organization, communication, and problem-solving.

Job Description:
The Project Manager Lead will play a pivotal role in managing projects, coordinating with teams, and ensuring smooth operations for the leadership team. This position requires strong organizational skills, proactive problem-solving, and the ability to oversee multiple initiatives while ensuring effective communication and follow-up. About half of your time will be spent participating in or leading meetings, taking detailed notes, and organizing action points for seamless execution.

Key Responsibilities:

Project Management:
*Plan, execute, and oversee projects to ensure timely completion and alignment with company goals.
*Monitor progress on team tasks and provide regular updates to leadership.
*Use tools like Asana or Trello to manage, organize, and track project workflows.
*Proactively identify and resolve potential challenges and risks in project timelines.

Meeting Coordination and Follow-Up:
*Participate in or lead meetings (internal and external) for approximately 50% of your time.
*Prepare detailed agendas and take accurate notes, including decisions, deadlines, and action items.
*Ensure post-meeting action points are effectively communicated and tracked to completion.

Leadership Support:
*Serve as a bridge between leadership and teams, ensuring clarity and alignment on objectives.
*Organize and maintain comprehensive documentation of projects and meeting outcomes.
*Prioritize and manage incoming requests to optimize workflows for the CEO and COO.

Skills and Qualifications:

Communication:
*Exceptional verbal and written communication skills for internal and external interactions.
*Ability to summarize and articulate project details, action points, and updates clearly.
Organization:
*Outstanding organizational skills for managing schedules, tasks, and deliverables effectively.
*High attention to detail, ensuring nothing falls through the cracks.
Proactivity and Problem-Solving:
*Self-motivated to identify challenges and propose actionable solutions.
*Strong ability to streamline processes and improve efficiency across teams.
Adaptability:
*Comfortable learning and integrating new tools, systems, and methodologies independently.

Technical Skills:
*Proficiency in project management tools like Asana or Trello.
*Familiarity with Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Drive) is a plus.

Behavioral Traits
*Organized: Maintains exceptional organization in managing tasks, schedules, and documentation.
*Proactive: Takes initiative to anticipate and address challenges without prompting.
*Solution-Oriented: Focuses on resolving problems with efficiency and resourcefulness.
*Reliable: Demonstrates dependability and accountability in delivering results.
*Adaptable: Quick to learn and implement new processes or tools to enhance performance.

Additional Information:

*Timely completion of project deliverables and tasks.
*Accuracy and clarity of meeting agendas, notes, and follow-ups.

title: Full Stack Software Developer in an Exciting New AI Startup (Manila-based Candidates)
description:

Our client is looking for their first developer in an AI startup that’s creating a revolutionary app designed to help leaders uncover problems and solve them before they become issues - all powered by cutting-edge AI. Work alongside a founding team with a track record of successful exits, collaborating directly with the CEO, CPO, and CTO.

Company Overview

LevelUp is a specialist agency that provides outsourcing solutions to agencies, software vendors and website owners. For over seven years, we have successfully collaborated with a variety of companies, providing valuable technical, operational and back-office support. We have a large team of skilled and passionate professionals who are committed to delivering high-quality work for our clients.

Position Overview

We’re seeking a Full-Stack Software Developer with a versatile skill set across frontend, backend, DevOps, and mobile app development. With expertise in Python, Next.js, React Native, AWS services, and an aptitude for databases and DevOps, you’ll play a key role in building and optimizing our client’s tech platform. This role is perfect for a dynamic developer who thrives in a startup environment and is passionate about integrating AI to enhance user experiences.

Key Responsibilities

*Full-Stack Development, Platform Optimization, and Testing

Develop and maintain scalable and efficient backend services using Python and AWS.
Design, implement, and refine frontend interfaces using Next.js, ensuring a seamless user experience across devices.
Create and optimize mobile applications with React Native.
Establish and maintain effective DevOps practices, integrating automated testing within CI/CD pipelines to ensure performance, security, and reliability.

*AI Integration & Product Enhancement

Identify and implement AI solutions to enhance platform functionality and personalize user interactions.
Work directly with the CTO and product team to embed the latest AI models and data analytics.

*Database Management & Data Flow

Design, maintain, and optimize databases for high availability, scalability, and data integrity.
Collaborate with data and AI teams to integrate data insights into applications, enabling personalized user experiences.

*Cross-functional Collaboration

Work closely with our client’s UK-based leadership team, including the CEO, CTO, and CPO, to align development efforts with our product vision.
Coordinate with content and community teams to deliver an integrated, tech-driven community experience.

Skills & Experience

The ideal candidate has experience with DynamoDB and working with graph databases such as Amazon Neptune.

*Full Stack Software Development Experience:

5+ years of experience in full-stack development, with demonstrated skills in Python, Next.js, React Native, and AWS.
Proficiency in databases (e.g., SQL, NoSQL) and experience with DevOps tools (e.g.,
Docker, CI/CD pipelines).
Experience working in an Agile Scrum environment.
Experience integrating with data-driven applications.

*AI Expertise:

You have a passion for Artificial Intelligence and know how to integrate AI solutions with applications.

Soft Skills

Strong communication and collaboration skills, with a proven ability to work effectively in remote & in-person, cross-functional teams.
Innovative, creative problem-solving and analytical thinking to identify solutions that improve performance and enhance functionality.
Adaptable and agile, capable of meeting the evolving needs of a growing startup.

More Information

Based in Metro Manila, Philippines
Hybrid work setup - 2-3 days per week in the Makati office.
Full-time, 8-hour shifts (40 hours/week)
Monday to Friday, 1pm - 10pm (Philippines Standard Time)

What we Offer

A collaborative, innovative team culture that values integrity, impact, and creative problem-solving.
HMO

title: Business Intelligence Developer
description:
With more than three decades of research as its solid foundation, and a flourishing global community of practitioners, Energy4Life leads the world in bioenergetics.

Energy4Life provides a complete system to restore health and energy at its source. By looking at the physics underlying the biochemical nature of the body, we can now analyze and correct the body-field, which 30+ years of research has been shown as the master control system for the body’s health and functioning.

We approach health from the key perspective that energy and information control biology.
Cutting-edge science has proven that there is a regulating field of energy and information that operates in the physical body at the subcellular level. At Energy4Life, we call this the human body-field.

In over three decades of research, we have discovered that distortions and blockages in the
body-field can lead to physical problems and deteriorating health.
We are a technology and data rich organisation that needs a dedicated business intelligence developer to be focused on building business intelligence and business processes into our systems. This will range from further development/enhancement of our existing Power BI setup, reporting on marketing, sales and manufacturing data and developing affiliate/referral/commission programmes with reporting. 
You will be providing the eyes for our organisation to ensure we exceed our targets of rapid growth. 

Key Responsibilities:
-Design and implement Power BI dashboards to visualize data from our bespoke SQL server based platform, Hubspot, phone systems and marketing ad systems transforming raw data into actionable insights for the leadership team.
-Develop automated reports for the leadership team, enabling the tracking of trends, and key performance indicators across the environment.
-Use APIs and data connectors to integrate external systems into Power BI, ensuring real-time and historical data visualization for comprehensive monitoring.
-Optimise Power BI dashboards to handle large volumes of data efficiently, ensuring fast query performance and seamless data interaction.
-Work closely with the leadership team to design data visualisations and develop reports.

Required Skills and Qualifications:
-Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, IT, Engineering, or related field is a must
-3+ years of proven experience as a Business Intelligence Developer or similar role.
-Experience with SQL and ETL is a must
-Excellent knowledge of PowerBI & DAX
-Experience with Azure devops
-Experience with API connectivity is required
-Strong communication skills, both written and verbal (English).
-Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and independently when required.
-A passion for quality and a commitment to continuous improvement with an eye for detail to check data accuracy

Schedule:   9am-5pm Monday to Friday (MST timezone)
          12am-8am Monday to Friday - Philippine Time

For interested applicants, kindly send your CV to hr.energy4life2@gmail.com with the subject line: I am excited to apply for the Business Intelligence Developer role with Energy 4 Life.

title: Software QA Tester
description:
With more than three decades of research as its solid foundation, and a flourishing global community of practitioners, Energy4Life leads the world in bioenergetics.

Energy4Life provides a complete system to restore health and energy at its source. By looking at the physics underlying the biochemical nature of the body, we can now analyze and correct the body-field, which 30+ years of research has been shown as the master control system for the body’s health and functioning.

We approach health from the key perspective that energy and information control biology.
Cutting-edge science has proven that there is a regulating field of energy and information that operates in the physical body at the subcellular level. At Energy4Life, we call this the human body-field.

In over three decades of research, we have discovered that distortions and blockages in the
body-field can lead to physical problems and deteriorating health.
We are seeking a detail-oriented and motivated Software QA Tester to join our dynamic team. 
In this role, you will be responsible for ensuring the quality and performance of our software products through rigorous testing and quality assurance practices. You will collaborate closely with development teams to create and implement effective testing strategies that enhance our software quality.

Key Responsibilities:
-Attend sprint refinement sessions to ensure all aspects of upcoming work are considered from a testing perspective and documented in DevOps/Confluence.
-Test software changes to a high standard and appropriate scope, ensuring functionality meets requirements.
-Create comprehensive test plans and test cases tailored to various software applications.
-Conduct user acceptance testing and functional testing to validate software performance.
-Perform testing on web applications, mobile apps, and various devices to ensure compatibility and functionality.
-Utilize suitable tools such as Postman for API testing.
-Execute load and performance testing to assess software scalability and reliability.
-Investigate and replicate issues reported from customer implementations, providing detailed feedback to development teams.
-Implement automated testing using tools like Cypress, contributing to the efficiency of our testing processes.
-Maintain a curious mindset with an eye for detail, confidently questioning processes and outcomes to drive improvements.
-Self-motivate and engage in continuous learning to stay updated with industry trends and best practices.
-Communicate effectively, both verbally and in writing, to convey testing results and quality insights.
-Take accountability for the creation and execution of the team’s quality strategy.
-Provide expert advice and guidance to enable teams to embed good quality principles throughout the development lifecycle.
-Develop and monitor metrics to measure quality, using analysis of these metrics to inform future quality strategies and targeted quality initiatives.

Required Skills and Qualifications:
-Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, IT, Engineering, or related field, or equivalent work experience.
-3+ years of proven experience as a Software QA Tester or similar role.
-Strong understanding of software testing methodologies and best practices.
-Experience with testing frameworks such as Cypress, Selenium, or similar is required. Experience with Cypress is strongly preferred
-Experience with API testing tools such as Postman.
-Knowledge of web technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and HTTP protocols. 
-Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
-Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.
-Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and independently when required.
-A passion for quality and a commitment to continuous improvement.

Schedule:   9am-1pm Monday to Friday (GMT)
          5pm-9pm Monday to Friday (Philippine Time)

For interested applicants, kindly send your CV to hr.energy4life2@gmail.com with the subject line: I am excited to apply for the Software QA Tester role with Energy 4 Life.

title: Email Marketing Specialist (Klaviyo & Shopify Experience)
description:
Job Type: Full-Time 
About Us:
We are an e-commerce brand selling Men’s Height Increase footwear. We are looking for a talented Email Marketing Specialist with great graphic design skills, and savvy with Klaviyo and email flows and the different types of emails. Build a Strong Email Marketing and SMS List

title: Property Management Trainee Program
description:
Position Overview
Are you ready to embark on an exciting journey of personal and professional growth in the dynamic world of property management? Join us as a Property Management Trainee at GPS Renting, where you’ll start with full-time employment and spend the first six months rotating through key roles in maintenance, leasing, customer service, and operations.

This immersive rotation is designed to develop skills in prioritization, problem-solving, critical thinking, and customer delight, providing you with a well-rounded foundation in property management. After the initial six months, you’ll transition into a specialized role—such as leasing, maintenance coordination, or customer service—based on your strengths and interests.

This program is your gateway to a fulfilling career as a future leader at GPS Renting.

*************************************************************************************************
About GPS Renting
At GPS Renting, we’re not just managing properties; we’re building a culture of growth, integrity, and excellence.

Our Mission: Help our team develop professionally and personally while giving back to the community by delivering a 5-star customer service experience to owners and residents.
Our Niche: Providing simple, data-driven, low-cost yet high-value property management services for single-family homes with an average rent of $3,000/month.

We are a family-owned business in Seattle with a 7-year history of cultivating long-term relationships with our employees and clients. Professional, Honest, and Kind are not just words to us—they’re the foundation of everything we do.

We live intentionally at GPS Renting, creating an environment where every team member is aligned with our vision and values. We want to share this vision with candidates who are inspired by our mission and eager to grow with us on this journey. Learn more about our vivid vision here: GPS Renting Vivid Vision- https://docs.google.com/document/d/1OObeN1mgwgJuHR6IIGYoD4CjpQOBv53d3Kokggecihk/edit?usp=sharing

*************************************************************************************************
What You’ll Do
As a Property Management Trainee, your journey includes:

First Six Months:
*Rotate through Maintenance: Coordinate vendor services, troubleshoot tenant requests, and ensure prompt, high-quality repairs.
*Rotate through Leasing: Market properties, screen tenants, and finalize lease agreements.
*Rotate through Customer Service: Build relationships with residents and owners, ensuring their satisfaction and trust.
*Rotate through Operations: Understand the data-driven backbone of property management, from financial reports to compliance.

After Six Months: Transition to a long-term role in one functional area, such as leasing, maintenance coordination, or customer service, where you’ll continue to grow and make an impact.

*************************************************************************************************
Key Skills We Focus On
*Prioritization: Manage competing tasks effectively to deliver timely results.
*Problem-Solving & Critical Thinking: Tackle challenges head-on with innovative solutions.
*Customer Delight: Build trust and deliver exceptional service experiences for residents and property owners.

*************************************************************************************************
What We’re Looking For
*A mindset focused on growth and a willingness to step out of your comfort zone.
*An eagerness to deliver exceptional customer service and contribute to our team’s success.
*Enthusiasm for embracing challenges, learning new skills, and aligning with our vivid vision of intentional living and growth.
Position Details

Employment Type: Full-time position.
Compensation: $650–$1,050/month.
Work Schedule: Monday–Friday, starting at 8:00 AM PST; on-call responsibilities may be required.
Requirements

High English proficiency (written and spoken).
Strong computer skills and a stable internet connection.
Self-starter with attention to detail.

*************************************************************************************************
Why Join GPS Renting?
*A Career, Not Just a Job: We value long-term relationships with our employees, many of whom have been with us for 5+ years.
*Family Culture: We believe in mutual respect, professional growth, and work-life balance.
*Intentional Living: Be part of a team aligned with a shared vision of professional and personal development.
*Impact: Be part of a team that values giving back and creating meaningful experiences for owners and residents.

*************************************************************************************************
How to Apply
*Create a 30–60 second video introducing yourself and explaining why you’re interested in the program.
*Submit your resume.
*Share your desired compensation range.
*Email your application to talent@gpsrenting.com with the subject line: "Property Management Trainee Application - [Your Name]."

title: Job Title: Business Operations Specialist (Short-Term/Gig Job)
description:

Compensation:
Pay is negotiable based on experience.

Application Process:
To apply for this position, candidates MUST complete all three of the following steps:
 1. Submit a resume outlining relevant experience.

 • State the current date (to verify it’s a new video).
 • Explain your approach to improving business operations and managing virtual teams.
 • Highlight your experience with implementing workflows, automations, and accountability systems.

Important Application Instructions:

We look forward to reviewing your application and seeing how your expertise in business operations can support our team’s success!

title: [HIRING ASAP] Clix Dental is Hiring an Elite Facebook Ad Manager/Media Buyer [APPLY NOW]

How to Apply: We’re Only Interested in A-Players

P.S. If you’re not confident in your ability to drive transformative results, this isn’t the role for you. But if you’re up for the challenge, we can’t wait to see what you can do.

title: Mid-Senior Graphic Designer
description:
About Us:

Desygner is proud to be one of the leading tech companies globally, ranking among the top startups in Australia and worldwide, all without any external investment. Our journey is unique, built solely on determination, resourcefulness, and a strong commitment to bootstrapping. From the very beginning, we have grown the company from the ground up, embracing challenges and driving innovation.

As an innovative company, we are dedicated to establishing a powerful visual identity and providing exceptional design solutions for both our internal teams and external clients. We thrive on creativity, collaboration, and delivering outstanding user experiences at every turn.

Additionally, you will engage in hands-on design projects to ensure our brand's visual standards are met. title: Medical Virtual Assistant [ FarSha_NYU ]
description:
*Note:  Interested applicants, should submit an application through the link below:

https://forms.gle/8Qym9fv46EKbcYaH9

Position: Medical Virtual Assistant [ FarSha_NYU ]
Type: Full time
Work Time Duration: 9:00am - 5:00pm EST
Days to Work: Monday - Friday
Salary: $5 - $6 / hour (depending on experience)

About Us:
Dr. Farshad’s clinic is committed to providing exceptional patient care through clear communication, efficient operations, and personalized service. We are seeking a Bilingual Virtual Assistant fluent in both English and Spanish to manage appointments, patient communications, and administrative tasks.

Job Overview:
The ideal candidate will be highly organized, proactive, and responsive, with a proven ability to handle a variety of tasks efficiently. This role requires a strong focus on managing appointments, communicating with patients, and following detailed protocols to ensure smooth clinic operations.

Responsibilities:

Appointment Management:
- Schedule and reschedule patient appointments.
- Call patients to remind them of upcoming appointments.
- Review the schedule daily to identify missed appointments and contact patients to reschedule.

Patient Communication:
- Provide pre-procedure instructions over the phone, ensuring patients fully understand the requirements, even if they have received written instructions.
- Handle patient requests for medication refills and create messages for the doctor to follow up.

System Management:
- Use a voice-over-IP (VoIP) phone system with an auto-attendant to manage patient calls.
- Ensure all new patients seen the previous day are activated on the patient portal for seamless communication.

Daily Tasks:
- Send requests for patient reviews after appointments using the Patient Review app.
- Follow specific patient management and communication protocols as outlined by Dr. Shafizadeh.

General Administrative Tasks:
- Appointment Scheduling and Reminders: Coordinate and manage appointments efficiently.
- Patient Records Management: Maintain and update accurate patient records using eClinicalWorks.
- Handling Patient Inquiries and Correspondence: Respond to patient calls, emails, and texts promptly.
- Email or Text Management: Sort, prioritize, and respond to communications, including newsletters.

Software Proficiency:
- eClinicalWorks (EHR/EMR) for patient record management.
- 8x8 Telephone App for managing calls.
- ZocDoc App for online appointment scheduling and patient management.
- Patient Review App for managing and sending review requests.

Key Performance Indicators (KPIs):
- Punctuality: Be on time for tasks and communications.
- Task Completion: All assigned tasks must be completed by the end of the business day.
- Responsiveness: Respond promptly to emails, voice messages, and other communications.

Deal Breakers:
- Frequent negative feedback from callers.
- Failure to respond to emails and messages.
- Poorly managed schedule or missed appointments.

Qualifications:
- Language Skills: Fluent in both English and Spanish.
- Experience: Previous experience in appointment scheduling, patient communication, and healthcare administration is preferred.
- Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills in both languages.
- Organizational Skills: Detail-oriented with the ability to manage multiple tasks efficiently.
- Customer Service: Friendly and professional demeanor, with a patient-centered approach.
- Proficient in Google Docs, Google Sheets / Microsoft Office

Basic Requirements:
- Ability to submit NBI clearance 
- Must be able to communicate clearly and effectively.
- Reliable computer and internet connection (at least 10mbps via cable modem, DSL/Fiber only).
- Reliable mic and headset (earphones are fine) /  (noise-canceling headset) and a webcam. 
- Minimal environmental noise (preferably zero if on camera frequently).
- Availability to meet the required hours.
- Submission of a short video introduction.
- Possession of a valid ID.
- Not currently working with any other clients during the required work time.

—-

title: Wordpress Web Developer
description:
Job Title: Full-Time Web Developer (WordPress, PHP, HTML, WooCommerce)

Location: Remote 
Position: Full-Time

About Us:
We are a dynamic and growing team looking for an experienced and talented Web Developer to join our team. If you're passionate about building beautiful, high-performing websites with a strong focus on WordPress, HTML, and WooCommerce, we want to hear from you!

As a Web Developer, you will be responsible for creating, maintaining, and optimizing WordPress websites, ensuring they meet client needs and exceed expectations. You will work closely with our design, project management, and client teams to deliver cutting-edge web experiences that drive results.

Key Responsibilities:
WordPress Development:
Build, customize, and maintain WordPress websites from scratch, including theme and plugin customization.
Show expertise in developing user-friendly, fast-loading, and secure WordPress sites.

HTML & CSS Expertise:
Write clean, well-structured, and semantic HTML and CSS. You should have a strong eye for detail when it comes to design, layout, and structure.

Plugin Management & Updates:
Update WordPress plugins, handle security vulnerabilities, and manage plugin configurations.
Research and integrate new plugins to add functionality and meet client needs.

WooCommerce Development:
Build and optimize WooCommerce stores, including product pages, checkout flows, and integrations.
Implement payment gateways and advanced eCommerce features.

Client Communication:
Work closely with clients and our project managers to understand project requirements and provide expert advice.
Help translate client requests into functional, scalable, and visually appealing solutions.

Graphics Creation:
Design and implement website graphics, banners, and visual elements. Basic experience with design tools (such as Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, or Figma) is required to complement development work.

Continuous Improvement:
Stay up to date with the latest web trends, best practices, and technologies.
Proactively identify and fix issues to ensure the highest standards of web performance and security.

Key Qualifications:
Strong WordPress Development Experience:
Demonstrable experience in WordPress development with a portfolio that showcases your work.

Proficiency in HTML & CSS:
Strong knowledge of HTML5 and CSS3 with the ability to create responsive, pixel-perfect layouts.

WooCommerce Expertise:
Experience setting up, customizing, and optimizing WooCommerce stores, including integrating payment gateways, shipping methods, and advanced eCommerce functionality.

Plugin Management & Research:
Proven ability to troubleshoot, update, and enhance WordPress plugins. Capable of researching and integrating third-party plugins to meet client-specific needs.

Graphics & Design Skills:
Ability to create custom graphics for websites, including banners, icons, and imagery. Proficiency with design software like Adobe Photoshop or similar tools.

Excellent Communication Skills:
Ability to communicate effectively with clients, project managers, and team members. Strong attention to detail and the ability to translate client requests into functional code.

Experience with PHP:
A solid understanding of PHP for theme and plugin customization, along with debugging and performance optimization.

Bonus Skills (Nice to Have):
Experience with JavaScript/jQuery, SEO best practices, and web performance optimization techniques.

RATE : $8 USD PER HOUR 
US TIMEZONE

title: Supply Chain Analyst
description:
Job Type: Full-time
Work Hours: Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM to 4:30 PM Pacific Time


Work Experience: 
2-5 years of experience in supply chain analysis, logistics, procurement, or a related field.


Job Overview: 
The Supply Chain Analyst is responsible for ensuring the efficiency and effectiveness of the supply chain operations within an organization. The role involves analyzing data, identifying trends, and optimizing processes to support business goals. The ideal candidate has strong analytical skills, attention to detail, and a solid understanding of supply chain principles.


Key Responsibilities:
Collect and analyze data related to supply chain activities, including procurement, production, inventory management, and logistics.

Develop reports and dashboards to track key supply chain performance metrics (KPIs).

Identify opportunities for cost savings, process improvements, and risk mitigation across the supply chain.

Monitor inventory levels, lead times, and supplier performance to ensure optimal supply chain efficiency.

Work closely with procurement, production, logistics, and finance teams to coordinate and optimize supply chain activities.

Develop and maintain supply chain models, forecasts, and simulations to aid in decision-making.

Assist in the identification and evaluation of new suppliers, logistics partners, and inventory strategies.

Ensure compliance with company policies and relevant regulations throughout the supply chain process.

Provide support for supply chain-related projects, such as system implementations, new product launches, or process improvement initiatives.

Communicate findings and recommendations to management and stakeholders.

Key Qualifications:

Bachelor’s degree in Supply Chain Management, Business, Logistics, or a related field.

2-5 years of experience in supply chain analysis, logistics, procurement, or a related field.

Strong analytical skills and proficiency in data analysis tools (e.g., Excel, SQL, Tableau, or other BI tools).

Knowledge of supply chain processes, including procurement, production, inventory, and logistics.

Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

Strong communication and interpersonal skills.

Ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams.

Experience with supply chain management software (e.g., SAP, Oracle, or similar systems) is a plus.

Preferred Skills:
APICS CPIM or CSCP certification.
Experience with statistical analysis or data modeling.
Project management experience.

To apply, please fill out this form - https://forms.clickup.com/9011062867/f/8chku2k-41151/J2RW2ZGLC16ZPH0I68

title: Lead Generation Specialist (Cold Outbound Expert)
description:
Are you a Lead Generation superstar with expertise in cold outbound strategies and advanced automation tools? We are on the hunt for a highly skilled professional to join our team and deliver top-notch results in a niche role. If you thrive on extracting high-quality leads and optimizing outreach processes, this is the perfect opportunity for you!

Lead Extraction & Automation
 • Utilize tools like Apollo, Clay/Claygent, and LinkedIn Sales Navigator to source and manage high-value leads effectively.
 • Set up advanced cold email infrastructures, including domain setup and ensuring email deliverability best practices.
Outbound Strategy Implementation
 • Focus on lead extraction, setup, and automation processes to ensure maximum efficiency and ROI.
 • Build and maintain Clay automation workflows, ensuring campaigns run smoothly and deliver measurable results.
Collaboration & Communication
 • Partner with internal teams to align lead-generation strategies with overarching goals.

Qualifications
 • 3+ years of proven experience in lead generation and cold outbound strategies.

 • Excellent communication skills and ability to work in a fast-paced environment.
What We Offer
 • Competitive pay range based on experience and expertise.
 • Opportunity to work on high-impact projects with a talented team.

How to Apply

 • Attach a link to your resume, portfolio, and a brief case study of previous lead-generation projects.
 • Include a list of tools and platforms you are proficient in.

title: Tableau Data Analyst
description:
Company
Kathy Kuo Home is a luxury online home furnishings destination on a mission to help everyone #lovewhereyoulive. Kathy Kuo Home carries a highly curated collection of home furnishings while offering clients premium interior design services and easy-to-shop look books. Kathy Kuo Home believes that shopping for great design should be fun, easy, and inspiring, so it provides everything from design inspiration to flawless execution in one vertically integrated platform, allowing customers to create a space they will cherish for years to come.

Curated Collection and Ecommerce
Under the direction of celebrated designer Kathy Kuo, the company serves as the premier online boutique for luxury furniture, lighting, and home decor. The assortment is curated with a design-first approach that offers exclusive access to impeccably-crafted designer pieces from top manufacturers and artisans around the world.

Full Service Interior Design Studio
In addition to its aspirational collection, Kathy Kuo Home is also a full-service interior design studio with a robust menu of Design Services. Kathy Kuo Home’s roster of professional interior designers combine a high-touch, personalized approach with the latest in design technology to help customers with all of their design needs—from small updates and refreshes, to gut renovations and building entirely new homes.

Trade Business
Kathy Kuo Home is proud to offer a top-tier Trade business that provides the interior design and architecture communities with an inspiring selection of luxe homewares and furnishings at competitive trade prices. Additionally, Kathy Kuo Home provides its Trade customers with a dedicated concierge team to ensure a best-in-class customer service experience throughout the entire design process. Combining service, commerce, and technology, Kathy Kuo Home is the ultimate one-stop home and design destination.

Culture and Values
The Kathy Kuo Home team members are design-obsessed, entrepreneurial-minded, and empathy-oriented individuals that seek to create more impact and beauty in the world of interiors. As one of the fastest growing online companies in the home and garden space, it is a fantastic time to join Kathy Kuo Home’s fast-paced, nimble, and creative team.
Core Values
We Employ Design Thinking #DesignWins | Design is how one approaches everything. Employing design thinking is employing first principles thinking. This applies not only to product or space design, but how we design our day, our work processes, and our organization
We are Limitless Learners | We are curious by nature and aim to be 1?tter every day by learning 1 new thing a day.
We Strive To Be Self-Aware | We are self-reflective and deeply curious about ourselves. We believe with a deep awareness of oneself, can one develop awareness for others.
We Play the Long Game | We have an infinite horizon for growth and lean into business decisions that have a long-lasting impact on brand growth
Core Principles
We have Deep Kindness and Respect for All | Our business model is supported by the relationships that we have with our customers, vendors, and shippers. We treat our team members, shippers, and vendors with the same spirit of kindness, willingness to collaborate, and respect for their needs.
We Lead with Empathy | When faced with hard choices, we lean into empathy and compassion first as our primary decision drivers. We proactively reach out to celebrate each other's success and buoy those that need us.
We Require Feedback | Giving and receiving feedback promotes a culture of self-awareness, growth, and humility, the foundations of strong inter-department connection.
We are Humble and Hungry | We operate with a startup mentality, scrappy and intentional with how we use our human and financial resources no matter what scale of business we are in.
We Audit the Details - Design and Service | We deeply audit all details and have hyper-awareness of process, cause, and effect and how this relates to our design and service quality output.
We Keep Calm / Grace Under Fire | We solve problems by being self-aware, open-minded, and accepting of different ideas and opinions and strive to be calm, reflective, and not defensive.
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Description

The Tableau Data Analyst is responsible for designing, developing, and managing insightful Tableau dashboards and reports, conducting cohort analysis, and calculating customer retention metrics. The ideal candidate will have strong analytical skills, a sharp attention to detail, and proven experience creating impactful data visualizations and reports that drive business decision-making. The candidate will also have strong communication skills and the ability to work with different departments and crossfunctional teams to understand, refine and implement various reporting needs.

Responsibilities

•Architect and design data dashboards for internal department stakeholders, to enable understanding and insights into business problems.
•Create intuitive, visually compelling, and accurate reports in Tableau that enable data-driven decisions.
•Conduct deep-dive analysis on user behavior, customer segments, and product engagement using cohort analysis and other relevant metrics.
•Calculate and report on customer retention metrics, providing insights into retention rates across customer segments and product categories.
•Prepare and automate scheduled and ad-hoc reports, ensuring data quality and accuracy.
•Work with cross-functional teams (Sales, Product, Marketing, Finance, etc.) to understand data requirements and develop reports that provide actionable insights.
•Clean, validate, and prepare data from multiple sources for analysis and reporting.
•Ensuring fast dashboards and reports by optimizing data flow and Tableau extracts to enhance performance and reduce load times.
•Maintain documentation for data sources, methodologies, and Tableau dashboard functionalities to ensure knowledge sharing within the team.
•Maintain an organized library of dashboards and reports in a structure that is easy for users to understand and navigate.
•Manage and support Tableau Cloud users including training, account management, and assistance with using Tableau Cloud. 

Qualifications

•Bachelor's degree in Data Science, Business Analytics, Statistics, or a related field.
•Minimum of 2-4 years of experience in data analysis and reporting, with strong proficiency in Tableau for creating dashboards.
•Proficient in cohort analysis, customer retention analysis, trend analysis, and user segmentation.
•Advanced Tableau skills with proven experience creating and managing complex dashboards.
•Experience with Tableau Desktop, Tableau Cloud and Tableau Prep Builder.
•Strong SQL knowledge for data extraction and manipulation.
•Basic statistical knowledge (e.g., A/B testing, regression analysis).
•Ability to translate business questions into data insights, analyze root causes, and provide recommendations.
•Ability to focus on data accuracy and report clarity.
•Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to present findings to non-technical stakeholders.

title: Account Manager
description:
Company/Client Overview:

Purplefish is well-funded by top VCs and is currently 5 people based in NYC.

We are building powerful voice AI agents for recruiting that transform how companies discover and vet top talent, and how people find jobs and grow their careers. We’re currently 5 people based in NYC.

Purplefish was founded by Adam Sirois and Martin Kess, two experienced entrepreneurs and technologists with a track record of success in the tech industry. At Fractal Software, they worked together to launch 145 venture-backed vertical B2B SaaS companies out of a $650M fund.


Adam Sirois: Former CBO at Fractal Software, where he was responsible for Fractal's high scale recruiting engine. Previously CRO at Wunderkind, where he grew revenue from $1M to over $100M. Adam brings extensive experience in scaling businesses and driving growth.

Martin Kess: Former Head of Engineering at Fractal Software and Staff Engineer at Lyft, with experience at top tech companies like Google, Amazon, and Namely. Martin brings deep technical expertise to the team.

Join Purplefish as account manager / customer performance analyst and help drive value for our customers by maximizing the potential of our AI agents through customization and experimentation.

Duties and Responsibilities:

As the first account management / customer performance analyst, you'll wear many hats, but your core mission will be to drive value and performance for our customers. Common tasks will include: building out and configuring jobs in our platform for clients, reviewing AI recruiting phone screens, monitoring performance, and running experiments. There could also be some sales development or recruiting work with the CEO when time allows (no prior experience needed).

This is a very unique role. Internally we will call it Customer Performance, but it is best described as an internal account management role that blends customer success, solutions engineering, recruiting and quality assurance. This is an opportunity to get in on the ground floor of a cutting edge AI startup and work closely with the founders to define and shape a brand new category.

Help clients launch and scale AI agents that help hire people for all kinds of roles at top companies
Review and optimize phone screens to improve performance
Find ways to increase the speed and scale of hiring using our AI software
Become a deep product expert and work directly with founders to shape product direction

Minimum Requirements:

-Bachelor’s degree strongly preferred but not required (preferably one of the top schools in Philippines)
-Elite written and verbal English skills: C2/Mastery
-Ability to work EST, 10:00AM to 6:00PM EST
-5-10 years of relevant work experience in an analytical role (could be in customer success, account management, solutions engineering), including 3+ years of experience in tech (preferably at a startup)
-Entrepreneurial DNA - history of being resourceful, curious, and coachable. You're a builder-type that loves to figure things out.
-Tech-savvy. Able to learn new software quickly
-Gritty drive and someone who thrives in intense, high-speed environments
-Very coachable with a willingness to continuously improve and adapt to evolving processes

title: Superstar Specializing in GHL and Google Ads Integration
description:
WHAT WE’RE LOOKING FOR

Are you someone who takes pride in creating seamless integrations that make clients’ lives easier? We’re looking for a highly skilled and detail-oriented Virtual Assistant who can bridge the gap between Google Ads and GoHighLevel (GHL) dashboards. Your mission will be to ensure that leads generated through Google Ads flow effortlessly into GHL workflows, particularly for WordPress websites. You’ll play a pivotal role in helping our clients access all their leads in one organized place, empowering them to make better business decisions.

If you’re passionate about marketing automation, thrive on solving technical challenges, and love making an impact, we want you to be part of our journey.

WHY WORK WITH US
At our company, we believe that the right team member can make all the difference. Here’s why you’ll love working with us:
• Bi-Annual Bonuses: Your hard work and dedication will never go unnoticed. We offer performance-based bonuses twice a year to show our appreciation.
• Respectful Culture: We prioritize clear and open communication, ensuring every team member feels valued and heard.
• Commitment to Growth: We are deeply invested in your professional development. From learning opportunities to collaborative projects, we’re here to support your career journey.
• Room for Advancement: This is a part-time position with the potential to grow into something more. If you excel at this project, we’d love to explore a long-term partnership.
• Competitive Compensation: We offer compensation that reflects your skills, experience, and the value you bring to our team.
We’re more than just a company—we’re a team that believes in celebrating wins together and helping each other succeed.

QUALIFICATIONS AND SKILLS

To thrive in this role, you should have:
• Experience: At least 2 years of proven expertise in integrating Google Ads with GoHighLevel.
• Technical Knowledge: A deep understanding of setting up workflows and linking Google Ads conversions to GHL, particularly for WordPress websites.
• Problem-Solving Ability: An eye for detail and a knack for troubleshooting technical issues.
• Excellent Communication: Clear, professional, and responsive communication skills to work effectively with our team and clients.

APPLICATION PROCESS

Here’s how to join us:
1. Portfolio/Resume: Share a portfolio and/or resume highlighting your experience with GHL and Google Ads integration. (send to ankurchandra@prmntsolutions.com)
2. Initial Screening Interview: We’ll conduct a brief 10-15 minute interview to discuss your experience, communication style, and overall fit for the role.
3. Skills Assessment: If the initial interview goes well, you’ll receive a short 5-minute video explaining the project. You’ll answer a few specific questions to demonstrate your technical expertise.
4. Final Interview: Successful candidates will have a more in-depth discussion about their skills assessment, expectations, and cultural fit.

If this sounds like the opportunity you’ve been waiting for, we encourage you to apply today. Join a team where your skills will be valued, your ideas will be heard, and your growth will be supported. We can’t wait to meet you and see the impact you’ll make!

Visit our website to learn more about our company and mission. https://prmntsolutions.com/index.html#/

title: Real Estate CRM & Automation Specialist

title: Go High Level Expert/Tracking Specialist
description:
We’re looking for a tracking specialist that is an expert in Go High Level. Someone who excels at implementing, managing, and optimizing Google Analytics 4 (GA4) and advanced tracking systems. If you’re passionate about data-driven decision-making and have a proven track record of delivering measurable results, we want you on our team!  

Key Responsibilities
1. GoHighLevel Platform Management- Design, set up, and optimize automation workflows, pipelines, and campaigns. Manage CRM data integration and reporting for client accounts. Ensure seamless communication between GoHighLevel and other tools through integrations.  
2. Google Analytics 4 Expertise- Set up and configure GA4 accounts, including tracking code and event implementation. Develop custom GA4 reports and dashboards tailored to business needs. Troubleshoot and refine data collection for accurate tracking and reporting.  
3. Advanced Tracking- Implement and maintain event tracking using tools like Google Tag Manager (GTM). Establish conversion goals, user behavior funnels, and multi-channel attribution models. Analyze user data to identify trends, opportunities, and areas for improvement.  
4. Collaboration & Communication- Work closely with marketing teams to align tracking strategies with campaign goals. Provide insights and recommendations based on tracking data and analytics reports.  

Qualifications
- Proven experience with GoHighLevel
- Advanced knowledge of Google Analytics 4 (GA4)
- Proficiency in Google Tag Manager (GTM) and custom event tracking.  
- Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret complex datasets and present actionable insights.  
- Experience integrating GA4 with other platforms like Google Ads, Facebook Ads, or Zapier.  
- Familiarity with attribution modeling, funnel tracking, and performance optimization.  
- Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.  

What We Offer
- Competitive compensation based on experience.  
- Flexible remote work environment.  
- Opportunities for ongoing learning and professional growth.  
- A collaborative and supportive team culture.  

If interested, please send your resume and a video introduction highlighting your related experiences to mp@orthomarketing.com

title: Klaviyo Email Marketing Designer and Copywriter
description:
Your Email Bae & Co. is a boutique email marketing agency specializing in Klaviyo. We help e-commerce brands build deeper customer relationships, drive sales, and tell their unique stories through strategic email marketing campaigns. Our team is passionate about delivering high-quality, results-driven work that aligns with our clients’ goals and brand aesthetics.

We’re looking for a talented Klaviyo Email Marketing Designer and Copywriter to join our team. If you’re a creative thinker with a knack for crafting compelling email campaigns and a designer’s eye for visuals, we want to hear from you!

What You’ll Do:

Design and build visually engaging email templates in Klaviyo that reflect clients' branding and drive engagement.
Write persuasive, on-brand email copy for campaigns, flows, and newsletters that converts.
Collaborate with the strategy team to interpret creative briefs and execute campaigns that align with clients’ goals.
Ensure all designs and copy follow email marketing best practices, including mobile optimization and accessibility.
Conduct A/B testing on subject lines, designs, and content to optimize performance.
Maintain a deep understanding of e-commerce trends and audience behavior to create campaigns that resonate.
Manage multiple projects simultaneously while meeting deadlines.

title: Short-Term Rental Cleaner Coordinator
description:
FIBI Vacation Rentals specializes in maximizing returns on short-term rental properties.
What sets us apart is our unwavering focus and ability to enhance rental revenue. Unlike
other property managers who charge high rates, FIBI begins each management partnership
with a strategic consultation, evaluating each property’s performance or potential and
devising plans to boost its profitability. We manage every aspect of the property operations,
including bookings, guest communication, cleaning/turnovers, supplies, repairs, and
maintenance. Our approach is hyper data-focused, ensuring that every decision we make is
driven by analytics to optimize investment returns.

Job Title: Vendor Coordinator
Job Type: Part-Time 10 hours/Day - Sunday & Monday

Job Summary: 
We are seeking an experienced Vendor Coordinator to join our team. In this
role, you will be responsible for managing all interactions with vendors, including cleaners
and maintenance providers, ensuring compliance and quality control, scheduling tasks,
reviewing reports, and gathering, organizing, and disseminating information to various
departments. This role requires strong communication skills, attention to detail, and the
ability to handle multiple tasks efficiently.

Key Responsibilities

Cleaning Management:
? Managing Cleaning Schedule: Ensuring cleans are properly scheduled, cleaners
arrive on time to the properties, clean is properly completed and timely before guest
check-in.
? Confirm Cleaning Tasks and Checklists are Properly Completed: The cleaner
coordinator will also be responsible for reviewing the photos and completed checklist
for each clean completed in BW to ensure that the cleaner did in fact complete the
checklist appropriately, and we have all documentation that we need.
? Review Cleaning & Damage Reports: Gather further information on reported issues,
damages, and supplies needed, as reported by cleaners, organize, and disseminate
the tasks and information to all appropriate departments.
? Communicate with the Cleaners: Confirm arrival and completion of cleans, provide
feedback from guests, and gather further information or clarification regarding
reported issues, damages, or needed supplies.
? Coordinate with Cleaners regarding Early Check-In, Late Check-Out, or Luggage
Drop Off
? Document any identified issues from a check-out in the guest booking so that the
guest does or DOESN'T get an automatic 5-star review or not.

Project Management:
? Obtain quotes from multiple vendors and make recommendations on the best-suited
providers for various tasks.
? Schedule and confirm vendor services, ensuring timely arrival and completion of
tasks.
? Coordinate and oversee the work of third-party vendors, contractors, cleaners, and
maintenance staff to ensure quality services and repairs
? Task Coordination:
? Manage the cleaning and maintenance schedules, ensuring tasks are
properly completed before guest check-ins.
? Confirm completion of cleaning tasks and checklists, and review photos and
documentation to ensure quality and compliance.
? Develop and implement preventive maintenance schedules to reduce
emergency repairs.
? Communication:
? Maintain clear and prompt communication with vendors and internal
departments.
? Provide feedback from guests to vendors and gather further information or
clarification regarding reported issues or needed supplies.
? Keep all relevant parties informed about the status of maintenance and repair
requests.

? Documentation and Reporting:
? Maintain accurate records of maintenance requests, work orders, cleaning
reports, and repair activities.
? Prepare and disseminate reports on maintenance and repair work for
management.
? Document any identified issues from check-outs in guest bookings to
determine the appropriateness of automatic reviews.

? Emergency Response:
? Respond promptly to emergency maintenance requests and coordinate
urgent repairs to minimize disruption for guests and property owners.

? Budget Management:
? Monitor maintenance budgets and control costs by sourcing cost-effective
solutions and negotiating rates with vendors.

Qualifications:
? Proven experience in vendor coordination, property maintenance, or a related field.
? Experience in short-term rentals or hospitality preferred.
? Proficiency in using property management software (OwnerRez, Breezeway),
maintenance tracking systems, and Google Workspace (Gmail, Spaces, Drive).
? Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, in English.
? Strong organizational and time-management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks
and handle multiple projects simultaneously.
? High level of attention to detail and commitment to quality.
? Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
? Problem-solving abilities and willingness to research unknown issues.
? Have back-up power and internet.

APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS

Please follow these application instructions carefully. Applications missing any of these components or not following these instructions will not be considered.

Video Application
1. Submit a 1-MINUTE MAX video introduction.
2. Must speak in very clear English with minimal accent.
3. Start the video by saying the word “PICKLES”.

Questions to Answer in Your Video
1. What is your relevant experience? Describe how it aligns with the responsibilities of this role.
2. How do you ensure vendors follow specific instructions, such as cleaning checklists or maintenance protocols?

Resume
Along with your Video submission, please include your resume which much detail relevant prior work experience and various software knowledge related to the Short Term Rental industry.

• Excellent communication, social and organization skills.
• Incredible ability to multi-task.
• A can-do, optimist attitude.
• Ability to adhere to the highest customer service standards at all times.
• Ability to communicate clearly, honestly and effectively with customers and staff in all situations.
• Ability to perceive and meet the needs of customers.
• Strong problem solving, customer service and interpersonal skills.
• Ability to maintain high standards in a fast-paced, constantly evolving environment.


Typical Physical Demands:

• Requires healthy vision (aided or unaided).

Cannabis experience highly desired***

title: SQL Specialist
description:
About You

- You are a meticulous professional with exceptional attention to detail, essential for achieving the highest standards of accuracy and precision in all tasks.
- You have strong numerical abilities, proven by your ability to manage and interpret large data sets to drive decision-making.
- You are hardworking and dedicated, known for going above and beyond to meet and exceed objectives.
- You are highly proficient in Excel and demonstrate comprehensive computer literacy, capable of utilising technology to enhance work efficiency and productivity.
- You are experienced in SQL, capable of writing complex queries vital for manipulating and extracting data effectively.
- You possess strong analytical thinking and problem-solving skills, critical for identifying trends and making strategic decisions.
- You have extensive experience in data analytics, skilled in uncovering insights that inform business strategies.
- You are well-versed in using data visualisation tools like Data Studio, Tableau, and Power BI, able to create impactful and understandable reports and dashboards.

Please note, before you apply, be sure to read the “About You” section carefully, and in your application, refer to each bullet point above to detail your experience.


The Company


Lavanda is a multi award-winning proptech scale-up on a mission to revolutionise the global real estate industry through compliant, sustainable and community-positive long, medium and short-term rental solutions. We work closely with some of the world's largest residential property investors and operators. Our clients include names like JLL, Greystar, Brookfield and Starwood amongst many others.


We are well capitalised, having raised $20m to-date and backed by leading venture capital investors. Our mission now is all around scaling our extremely successful products across Europe, the US and beyond.


Our people are at the heart of everything we do. We prize diversity in all its forms and particularly welcome applications from groups that are historically underrepresented.




The Role


We’re hiring a Data Analyst to support the growth and data-driven decision-making of our fast-paced startup. You’ll be someone with a strong aptitude for data analysis, capable of quickly mastering the nuances of our business and providing insights that shape our strategy.

You’ll work on a variety of projects focused on analysing and interpreting data to guide key business decisions. From day-to-day data reporting to solving complex analytical challenges, you’ll move swiftly between different tasks with ease.

Flexibility and problem-solving are crucial. If you thrive in a dynamic environment and enjoy working on multiple business areas at once, this role will excite you. You’re someone who can switch between diving deep into datasets and collaborating with different teams effortlessly.

A keen eye for detail is essential for this role, as you'll ensure the accuracy and quality of data outputs. You’re someone who’s not only comfortable with numbers but also possesses strong written communication skills, ensuring your reports and insights are clear and actionable.

You’ll need to prioritise your workload effectively in an environment where new challenges are always emerging. You have a passion for data and know that every problem has a solution, even if it requires digging into multiple sources. “Sorry, that’s not possible” is not in your vocabulary!

Your ability to analyse complex problems, break them down into actionable insights, and present data-driven solutions makes you the go-to person for tackling any data challenge. Your attention to detail is unmatched, and you take pride in the accuracy of your work. In fact, if you’re reading this job description thoroughly, you’ll start your application with the words “I’m data-driven,” because without that, your application won’t move forward.

Collaboration is key in this role, and you’ll need to build strong relationships with all teams to support data needs across the business. You’re a team player who thrives in a fast-paced environment and loves to contribute to the success of the organisation.

If this sounds like you, please get in touch.

title: Property Manager

Schedule:

• Hybrid schedule (mostly remote)

Experience:
• At least 1-2 years in real estate or hospitality management (including short term rental markets)

title: Full Stack Python Developer
description:
Full Stack Python Developer (React/TypeScript + Python)

What We're Looking For

- AI Enthusiast: You are intrigued by AI technologies and eager to apply them in practical scenarios.

Responsibilities

- Backend Development: Build and maintain robust backend systems using Python.
- Frontend Development: Create and enhance user interfaces using React and TypeScript.
- Data Handling: Design and manage data models and databases.
- Collaboration: Work alongside cross-functional teams to integrate backend services with front-end platforms.
- Code Quality: Write clean, efficient code and participate in code reviews to uphold high standards.
- Data Pipelines: Develop and optimize pipelines for efficient data analytics.
- ETL Processes: Manage the extraction, transformation, and loading of large data sets.
- Insight Generation: Utilize statistical analysis and data visualization for actionable insights.
- AI Integration: Implement machine learning algorithms and embrace data science methods.

Qualifications

- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
- 3-5 years of experience in full stack development with a focus on Python, React, and TypeScript.
- Strong knowledge of Python and its frameworks (e.g., Django, FastAPI).
- Proficiency in React and TypeScript for frontend development.
- Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MongoDB).
- Proficiency in data modeling, ETL processes, and data warehousing.
- Familiarity with RESTful APIs and server-side logic.
- Experience with pandas.
- (Bonus) Knowledge of machine learning libraries (e.g., PyTorch) and data science methodologies.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work independently or as part of a team.
- Strong communication skills and fluency in English.


What is the Compensation Details?
This is a full-time position. The salary based on your experience.

Are you open to part-time or hourly contracts?
Yes, we do.

How much programming experience do I need to have?
This is a mid to senior position focusing on full stack development. You should have at least 3-5 years of experience in creating and sustaining data-oriented initiatives, improving our data systems' efficiency, and enhancing our backend and frontend services.

title: Pricing Analyst / Revenue Manager
description:
ABOUT US:
MostlyBooked is a leading pricing agency specializing in maximizing revenue for our clients through strategic pricing decisions. We're a growing team of data-driven professionals passionate about helping short-term rental hosts succeed in an increasingly competitive market.

THE OPPORTUNITY:
We are seeking Pricing Analysts to join our team. This is a decision-making role, where you’ll analyze data and trends to make impactful pricing recommendations for our clients.

We’re not looking for technical data scientists or SQL specialists—instead, we’re searching for critical thinkers with strong analytical skills who can interpret data, identify patterns, and make informed, strategic decisions.

This role is perfect for those with backgrounds in data-heavy or decision-focused fields (e.g., economics, finance, teaching, or analytics) who are ready to apply their skills to pricing strategy. Experience with Airbnb or PriceLabs is not required—we’ll provide full training. What matters most is your ability to think critically, make confident decisions, and deliver results.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Data Interpretation & Pricing Decisions: Analyze property and market data to make strategic pricing recommendations.
- Revenue Optimization: Ensure clients’ listings are priced optimally to maximize revenue and occupancy.
- Trend Analysis: Identify trends in the short-term rental market and adjust pricing strategies accordingly.
- Competitor Insights: Use market data to benchmark and adjust against competitors.
- Regular Monitoring: Track listing performance and proactively refine strategies to stay competitive.

WHO WE’RE LOOKING FOR:
We want decision-makers who thrive on solving problems, analyzing trends, and applying their findings to deliver results. You don’t need technical skills like SQL or dashboard creation, but you must enjoy working with data and have the confidence to make decisions based on it.

Key Qualities We’re Looking For:
- Critical Thinker: Someone who can analyze a situation and confidently make decisions.
- Strong Analytical Skills: Comfort with numbers, data, and identifying patterns or trends.
- Problem-Solver: You’re driven to find solutions and adapt strategies to achieve the best outcomes.
- Attention to Detail: Precision and accuracy are essential in this role.
- Self-Motivated: Thrives in a remote work environment, manages time well, and can work independently.

DESIRED BACKGROUNDS (Examples):
While direct experience with Airbnb or PriceLabs is not required, we’re looking for candidates with transferable skills and experience:

- Math tutoring or teaching: Strong analytical thinking, pattern recognition, and attention to detail.
- Finance, accounting, or auditing: Skilled in interpreting numbers and making data-driven decisions.
- Economics, statistics, or quantitative fields: Experienced in analyzing trends, forecasting, and working with data.
- Other analytical or strategic roles: Business analysts, digital marketing analysts, or similar backgrounds where decision-making was key.

COMMITMENT & AVAILABILITY
This role requires focus, availability, and dedication to deliver results for our clients. We’re looking for candidates who can give this position the attention it deserves, not as a secondary commitment or part-time role.

If you are already working full-time or have significant other commitments, please reflect carefully on whether this role aligns with your availability and ability to commit fully to the position.

In the application process, we’ll ask about your current workload and availability to ensure this role is the right fit for you and us.

TRAINING PROGRAM:
We provide a comprehensive training program (5-6 hours) with video modules and short exams. This training is unpaid, and here’s why:

We ask for this upfront commitment to ensure you can grasp the concepts and skills necessary to succeed in this role. The training allows both you and us to assess whether this role is the right fit. We want to be confident that you’re ready to join the team and contribute meaningfully.

Once hired, you’ll start at $4/hr. After three months of consistent performance, demonstrated results, and a strong commitment to our clients, your rate will rise to $4.50/hr, with further growth opportunities as the company scales.

WHAT WE OFFER:
- Hands-on Training: Learn industry-leading platforms like PriceLabs and Airbnb.
- Remote Work: Work from the comfort of your home, with a team that supports you every step of the way.
- Opportunities for Growth: As the company scales, so will your opportunities for career progression.
- Mission-Driven Work: Be part of a team dedicated to helping short-term rental hosts achieve their goals while growing a cutting-edge business.

REQUIREMENTS:
- Willingness to complete the unpaid training program.
- Strong analytical and decision-making skills.
- Attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality work.
- Reliable internet connection and a comfortable remote working setup.

WHO THIS POSITION IS NOT FOR:
This role is not for people who:

- Specialize in SQL queries, dashboard creation, or technical data preparation roles.
- Focus on preparing or cleaning data for others to analyze rather than making decisions themselves.
- Have a background in pure data science, machine learning, or academic research that doesn’t involve real-world decision-making.
- Excel in building technical systems (e.g., APIs, data pipelines) but lack experience applying data to solve problems.
- Prefer creating dashboards or reports rather than interpreting data and acting on it.
- Struggle with making confident decisions based on data or thrive only in roles where tasks are highly structured and predictable.

HOW TO APPLY:
If you’re excited about this opportunity and believe you have the skills and mindset to excel in this role, we’d love to hear from you!

Please submit:

Your resume.
- A brief cover letter explaining why your background makes you the ideal candidate.
- Examples of how you’ve used data or analysis to make decisions or solve problems in previous roles (if applicable).
- We’re looking for individuals who are confident, detail-oriented, and excited to contribute to the success of our clients and company. Let us know why that’s you!

title: Business Analyst / Data Analyst for Ecommerce (Advanced Excel knowledge required) - Virtual Assistant - WFH
description:
KeyTiger, a US-based e-commerce business in the home décor/interior design industry, is seeking highly-motivated and competent individuals to join our remote team. If you have high attention-to-detail, possess excellent English communication skills, and are interested in a full time work from home / online position, apply now!

Position: Amazon Product Sourcing Specialist / Business Analyst (Advanced Excel knowledge required) - Virtual Assistant - WFH (20+ POSITIONS OPEN)
Work Schedule: 5AM-1PM Manila Time, Tue-Sat
Salary: $500 to $1,300* monthly

Benefits include:
- Holidays: Paid US Public Holidays
- Paid Time Off: 11 accrued personal days off per year
- Growth: Bonus and salary increase depending on performance

Primary Responsibilities
1. Supply chain and vendor support
2. Full product definition, inventory and price analysis
3. Creating purchase orders
4. Bookkeeping (quarterly reports, sales tax)
5. Digital advertising

Requirements
1. Excellent spoken and written English skills
2. Stable, high-speed internet connection
3. Willingness to be trained and work with us long-term (must have no other job obligations)

Just knowing SUM or IF formulas and pivot tables will not be enough. INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO APPLY
