IMPORTANT (You must reply to the email): You will receive an autoreply with a few questions immediately after sending your email application. If you don't get an autoreply within 1-2 minutes, check your spam/junk folder or message us at fb.com/KeyTigerRecruitmentPage.

Tell your friends about this job opening for a chance to receive a REFERRAL BONUS of $300! For more information, go to fb.com/KeyTigerRecruitmentPage/posts/3664062487153323.

title: Marketing Coordinator
description:
We are an Australian company that helps men and women lose weight and get in the best shape of their lives. We are looking for an excellent marketing coordinator that will help us manage, assist and optimise our marketing efforts, coordinate content creation, and ensure smooth performance of our campaigns. Our main objective is to post engaging content.
As marketing coordinator you will be responsible for lead generation tasks and engaging our clients with upcoming events. 
You must be fluent in speaking and writing in English, be proactive, be a quick learner and understand health & fitness.

Looking for:
Excellent English writing and speaking skills
Highly experienced in marketing 
Must be able to work autonomously and figure things out
Canva and excel knowledge and shortcuts ideal
Available to work 8am - 5pm AEST (Monday to Friday) and be available weekends 
HIGHLY organized and work well under pressure (even when things get a bit chaotic!)
Have ability to work in a fast pace team and be able to prioritize tasks 
Creative with ideas and look at ways to improve and get better results
Great communication skills - friendly and a team player
Advanced tech skills and willingness to learn new software - quick learner
With a just do it attitude! Can take the ball and run with initiative! You love to work things out! 

What You’ll Do:
Schedule CTA Stories, Reels, Reposting, Creating Client Wins, 
ManyChat automations and Contacts 
Execute Marketing Calendar and Campaigns 
Design graphics for challenges & recipe books
Organize and manage photos from shoots, including editing or saving screenshots
Track and analyze the performance of marketing efforts to suggest improvements

Qualifications
Experience with posting on social media - example: Instagram, TikTok, Facebook..
Familiarity with ManyChat Ideal
Photo editing skills
Highly experiences and can schedule content postings
Experienced in creating own CTA’s and posts

Hours 35-40 hours per week
Rate: this will be a monthly rate of $970 

If you would like to be considered for the interview please do the following steps:

The Application Process
Step One: Send us a brief introduction video using Loom, sharing a bit about yourself and why you're interested in the role answering these questions:
What experience do you have in marketing?
Are you confident in executing all the tasks in “what you’ll do” without being shown how to do it? 
What do you do for your health & fitness?
Why are you different? 

Step Two: send the link of the video to: team@vertocoaching.com

Step Three: If successful for the next stage, we'll give you a small task to complete so we can get a feel for your skills and approach.

title: QA Tester
description:
CrewCard is a dynamic and innovative company committed to delivering high-quality [products/services]. We take pride in creating exceptional user experiences and need a skilled QA Tester to ensure our products meet the highest standards of quality and performance.

Job Description: As a QA Tester at CrewCard, you will be responsible for assessing the functionality, usability, and reliability of our products. You will work closely with the development team to identify, report, and help resolve issues, ensuring that all products meet our rigorous quality standards before release.

Responsibilities:
Develop and execute detailed test plans and test cases based on product requirements and user stories.
Identify and report defects using a bug-tracking system, ensuring timely resolution.
Collaborate with developers and product managers to understand new features and gather requirements.
Perform functional, integration, system, regression, and performance testing.
Document test results and create clear, concise reports that highlight issues and improvements.
Conduct exploratory testing to uncover potential vulnerabilities or inefficiencies.
Assist in continuous improvement by providing feedback and suggestions based on test outcomes.
Maintain and update test documentation as needed.

Requirements:
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
Proven experience as a QA Tester or similar role, preferably 2 years.
Knowledge of programming languages such as Java, Python, or JavaScript is a plus.
Strong understanding of software development life cycle (SDLC) and software testing life cycle (STLC).
Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git).
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
Attention to detail and ability to work efficiently under tight deadlines.
Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.
Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively in a team environment.
Experience with agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban) is a plus.

Preferred Qualifications:
Certification in software testing (e.g., ISTQB).
Experience with performance and load testing tools (e.g., JMeter, LoadRunner).
Knowledge of continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes.
Experience in mobile app testing (iOS/Android).
Familiarity with API testing and tools like Postman or SoapUI.

Benefits:
Competitive salary.
Opportunities for professional growth and development.

title: Executive Assistant
description:
The executive assistant is a key support position on the Simply the Coolest team.  The main goal and objective is to move tasks and projects forward, taking the burden off of the CEO. You will be co creating with the CEO, and need to be confident and very experienced at EA support.  
You will be responsible for supporting the CEO across a variety of projects and reporting across a variety of channels for the company, to include:
Supporting the CEO in managing priorities across different companies under the Simply the Coolest brand.
Managing systems to ensure projects and deadlines are on track
Organizing files and folders in a predictable, documented system for the Operations team
Keeping the CEO focused on the goals and outcomes that will generate income and nurture relationships
Talking through the scope of projects and goals with the CEO for execution
Tracking follow-up tasks from meetings and phone calls for the CEO and team

The ideal candidate will:
-be a self-starter who thrives in a team environment and is wired to “mark things off the list” and get projects completed ahead of deadlines 
-Be a strategic thinker who is strong at prioritizing the calendar and deadlines in the context of revenue generation
-be a forward thinker who anticipates needs of the CEO and acts proactively to lighten his load and support the success of his projects
-Be tech-savvy and able to figure out new processes and tools without much hand-holding
-be strong at creating and documenting systems; experience with process mapping a huge plus
-Be  highly competent in verbal and written communication in English
-Be very organized, trainable and willing to learn 

Job responsibilities include:
-Manage professional and personal scheduling for CEO, including appointments, calls, events, dinners and more
-Maintain the CEO's calendar in a thoughtful and purposeful manner, ensuring meetings contain the appropriate attendees, agenda items as requested, there is enough space between meetings, travel time is accounted for, and there is efficiency in managing the schedule
-Manage, coordinate, and arrange travel-related activities, including hotel booking, transportation, and meal coordination as requested
-Managing CEO’s email inbox, answering when applicable and appropriate and gleaning pertinent information and relaying to CEO to ensure he replies in a timely fashion 
-Manage our Google Drive and Dropbox; implement and keep track of documentation and filing processes, and maintain updates of information and processes in the Google Drive, Slack and project management systems
-Join the CEO on meetings and tracking meeting notes / follow up tasks
-Meet daily with the CEO to review priorities, progress and concerns
-Follow up with team members and partners on things the CEO needs (updates, deliverables, etc)
-Miscellaneous tasks and actions that will move forward projects and goals for the CEO
-Manage follow up with leads and partnership opportunities to help the CEO close deals
-Handle customer service-type questions from people who are looking for details about various events
-Organizing incoming requests from partners to ensure David and the team follow through for them

Qualifications & Experience
-5-10 years of EA experience, with at least 3 years in the C-suite
-Typing speed of 75+ WPM is highly preferred (minimum 55 WPM)
-Experience creating process maps and working in a program like LucidChart highly preferred
-Strong competency in Google Drive, Doc, Spreadsheet required
-Intermediate to Advanced skills in Microsoft Excel or Google Spreadsheet is highly preferred
-Experience with bookkeeping and budgets is a huge plus
-Must have experience working graveyard shift in the Philippines

Salary range:  Php 50,000-65,000, depending on experience.  

Schedule: Monday - Friday, 9 am to 6 pm CST // Monday - Friday 10pm - 7am PHT


We pay 13th month.

To apply, please send your CV to simplythecoolest.hr@gmail.com, and ensure the subject line reads: “I want to be part of your team for the Executive Assistant position at Simply The Coolest” .

title: Zoho Expert

title: Sales Support VA
description:

title: Zoho Inventory Integration and API Specialist
description:
Job Description:
We are looking for a skilled and experienced Zoho Inventory Specialist to set up and integrate our inventory management system with multiple e-commerce platforms and marketplaces. This role is essential to ensure seamless inventory tracking, order management, and multi-warehouse operations across our business. Only apply if you have proven expertise in handling all the listed marketplaces.

Responsibilities:
Zoho Inventory Setup: Configure Zoho Inventory to meet our business needs, including multi-warehouse management, barcode tracking, and inventory workflows.
Marketplace Integration: Integrate Zoho Inventory with the following platforms:
WooCommerce
Amazon
eBay
OnBuy
The Range
B&Q
ManoMano

API Development: Use APIs or tools like Zapier to create custom integrations for platforms that do not offer direct connections.
Order and Stock Management: Automate processes to sync orders, update stock levels, and track inventory movement in real time across all platforms.

QuickBooks Integration: Ensure seamless financial reconciliation by integrating Zoho Inventory with QuickBooks.

Barcode System Implementation: Design and implement a barcode system for efficient inventory tracking across two warehouses.

Customization and Reporting: Create tailored reports in Zoho Inventory to monitor sales performance, stock levels, spare parts tracking, and profitability.

Support and Troubleshooting: Provide post-setup support, assist with any technical issues, and train staff as needed.

Requirements:
Extensive experience in Zoho Inventory setup and integrations.
Strong knowledge of API development and integrations with e-commerce platforms.
Proven expertise in working with WooCommerce, Amazon, eBay, OnBuy, The Range, B&Q, ManoMano, and similar marketplaces.
Familiarity with barcode systems and multi-warehouse inventory tracking.
Proficiency with automation tools like Zapier (preferred).
Experience integrating Zoho Inventory with QuickBooks or other accounting software.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Strong communication skills to explain technical concepts and provide guidance if needed.

Preferred Qualifications:
Knowledge of Zoho CRM, Zoho Books, or other Zoho apps.
Experience in custom coding (e.g., JavaScript or PHP) for handling complex workflows.
Familiarity with analytics and reporting tools for inventory optimization.

title: FreshService Front End Developer - PH
description:
ABOUT THE ROLE:
As a Freshdesk Front-end developer, you will be an essential member of our IT Service Management Team. You will be primarily responsible for the administration and development of the Freshservice platform for our clients. This role must build strong relationships with Information Technology departments and business partners and a full understanding of ITIL Foundations processes for incident, request, change, problem, knowledge, and management. This role will work on Freshservice and other Freshworks products, as well as other integrations such as Azure, AWS and various IT Operations and security products by implementing many of the client-side systems/code that generate the UIs our end-users will interact with. This role will work closely with the IT Service Management Teams, platform engineers, architects, designers, and product managers to develop scalable and maintainable UI systems/features/components.

RESPONSIBILITIES:
In this role you’ll get to..
-plan, estimate, do requirement analysis, the layout design of the assigned project and other ongoing projects in a team with Project Manager / Developer / Designer.
-work closely with design, product management, and development teams to create elegant, usable, responsive, and interactive interfaces. 
-maintain and audit code quality as per set guidelines and standards in assigned projects.
-test completed tasks in ongoing projects in a team before delivering to the team to ensure on-time delivery.
-train and mentor team members.
-perform people management to include client teams and technical management. 
-be responsible for the day-to-day management of the Freshservice platform, including administration, development, documentation, and process improvement within IT and with various business partners throughout the organization.
-ensure compliance with all company and client policies and procedures and federal and state laws.
-manage agent licenses, roles, and groups to ensure proper access levels.
-manage and troubleshoot workflows, integrations, and automations.
-develop analytical reports and dashboards for teams to provide meaningful data for Freshservice Implementations
-ensure the system is performance as designed.
-work with Freshservice Support to manage and troubleshoot issues through to resolution.
-produce well-written code using the best software development practices including creating user-friendly website layout by using HTML and CSS while working in collaboration with client teams.
-integrate various backend services like Azure AD, Microsoft Teams, remote support tools, and more.
-create elegant, usable, responsive, and interactive interfaces across multiple devices.
-actively participate in troubleshooting, debugging, and updating system in both production and sandboxes
-shepard/execute project plans for road maps and annual business goals.
-lead and hold weekly check-in calls with the team members in concert with the Director, IT Service Management
at times lead internal team meetings to ensure development is progressing to plan
-understand internal team member issues, provide sound recommendations, and follow through to resolution.
-Believe in systematic approach to developing the system through clear documentation (flowcharts, layouts, & etc.) of functionality, address every use case through creative solutions.
-create and maintain thorough documentation on all software changes, integrations with APIs, webhooks, workflows, business rules, roles, SLAs, and processes.
-develop and maintain training and associated documentation for agents and requesters.
-solve problems and make decisions relative to internal needs.
-find solutions for data management, process improvements, and automation to create lean efficient business processes throughout the organization.
-proactively manage team member relationships
-lead team member check-in calls with business partners.
-drive initiatives focused on customer satisfaction.
-perform other duties as assigned.

REQUIREMENTS:
On day one, we’ll expect you to..
-have certification in at least Microsoft Azure Fundamentals
-have a certification in at least Information Technology Infrastructure Library Foundation V3 or V4.
-have a minimum of 5 years of relevant professional experience with cloud and on-prem infrastructures, ITIL methodologies, and software development.
-have a 2+ years of experience as Software Engineer or Software Developer or in a relevant role
-be a customer success-focused individual with deep understanding and experience with all forms of IT
-have work experience in ITIL foundations and the execution of best practices as it relates to the IT Service Management
-be proficient/experienced in Microsoft cloud functions (O365)
-have high attention to detail
-maintain clear and efficient communication with internal staff and customers
-have the ability to set priorities and complete projects in a fast-paced environment.
-have the ability to work quickly, independently, and effectively with little direct supervision.
-be committed to the highest standards of quality.
-have a fully functional and up-to-date computer with which to perform duties
-be willing to install next-generation endpoint protection on the computer
-be a current resident of the Philippines and can perform work from there
-be willing to work in US Pacific Time (8:00am-5:00pm PST) corresponding to 00:00am -9:00am PH time)

Nice to have
-a bachelor’s degree in computer science, information systems, or related field.
-industry certifications (Microsoft, BetterCloud, Freshworks Certified App Developer, etc.)

Note:
This is a remote (work from home) position.

TO APPLY: ** DO NOT SEND HERE**
https://www.pandoblox.com/careers

1. COPY & PASTE this link to your browser:
https://3gcgroup.applytojob.com/apply/1Df8iSU0Sy/FreshService-Front-End-Developer-PH
2. Fill out the form and submit your resume to our system.

We will reach out to you via email using our system!
Thank you!

title: Full-Time WordPress & GHL Expert
description:
Are you passionate about creating seamless, high-performing websites and automations that drive success? We’re looking for a talented WordPress & GoHighLevel (GHL) Expert to join our dynamic team full-time!

Why Join Us?

At our company, we believe in empowering our team to grow and excel. You'll be working in an environment where creativity is valued, collaboration is encouraged, and your expertise can make a real impact. We provide the opportunity to take on exciting projects and make a difference while being part of a supportive team that values innovation and results.

What You'll Do:

- Design, develop, and maintain WordPress websites with a focus on optimization, security, and user experience.
- Manage and implement automations, funnels, and CRM integrations using GoHighLevel (GHL).

title: Full Stack Developer (WordPress, Plugin Development, Shopify)
description:
POSITION: Full Stack Developer (WordPress, Plugin Development, Shopify)
LOCATION REQUIREMENT: This position is open to Filipino candidates residing in the Philippines.


PURPOSE OF POSITION:
The Full Stack Developer will play a key role in building, maintaining, and optimizing web applications and websites for our mission-driven clients. This role requires expertise in WordPress development, custom plugin creation, Shopify customization, and building interactive websites with animations and fast loading speeds. As part of a collaborative team, you’ll write clean, scalable code across the front-end and back-end, ensuring seamless functionality, performance, and exceptional user experiences.

REPORTS TO:
Owner/Creative Lead

RELATES CLOSELY WITH:
Creative Lead, Designers, Project Managers, Web Development Team, Marketing Contractors

RESPONSIBLE FOR:
WordPress Development: Build, maintain, and optimize WordPress websites, including custom themes, plugins, and third-party integrations.
Plugin Development: Design and implement custom plugins and tools to enhance functionality for WordPress and Shopify sites.
Shopify Customization: Customize Shopify stores through theme development, Liquid programming, and API integrations to ensure seamless shopping experiences.
Interactive Websites: Build interactive websites with engaging animations while maintaining fast loading speeds.
Full Stack Development: Write clean, maintainable code using PHP, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, SQL, and Liquid.
Web Application Architecture: Ensure smooth operation, performance optimization, security, and SEO compliance across all web applications.
Continuous Improvement: Stay updated on the latest development trends and tools to improve processes and the tech stack.
Collaboration & Problem Solving: Work closely with designers, project managers, and other developers to build robust web solutions and troubleshoot technical issues efficiently.
Responsive Design: Ensure websites and applications are fully responsive and optimized for various devices and browsers.
PRIMARY STRENGTHS, GIFTS, TALENTS REQUIRED:
Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer with expertise in WordPress, Shopify, and plugin development.
Strong proficiency in PHP, JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, CSS3, SQL/MySQL, and Liquid for Shopify customization.
Expertise in building interactive websites with animations and maintaining fast loading speeds.
Knowledge of API development and integration (RESTful, GraphQL).
Familiarity with modern JavaScript frameworks (e.g., React, Vue.js) and version control tools like Git.
Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills, with high attention to detail for pixel-perfect implementations.
Strong knowledge of responsive design principles and web performance optimization.
ROLE PREFERENCE:
This role is ideal for a versatile developer who enjoys working across both front-end and back-end technologies, thrives in collaborative environments, and takes pride in creating scalable, high-performance web solutions.

TOP 3 MEASURABLE GOALS FOR THE COMING YEAR:
Improve Web Performance: Optimize websites to maintain 95% uptime and fast loading speeds through proactive monitoring and improvements.
Deliver Interactive Web Projects: Complete at least five interactive websites that feature engaging animations and seamless user experiences.

BUDGET AVAILABLE:
Defined per project, providing flexibility to implement the most effective tools and strategies.

APPROXIMATE SALARY:
$8-$14/hr, based on experience, for 30-40 hours per week.

APPROXIMATE TIME REQUIRED BY POSITION:
30-40 hours per week, with potential for growth based on client needs and project demands.

BENEFITS TO PERSON RESPONSIBLE:
An opportunity to work on diverse, challenging projects across various industries while helping mission-driven organizations succeed. This role offers professional growth, creative freedom, and the ability to work remotely within a supportive and collaborative team environment.

GENERAL INFORMATION:
Creative Nomads is committed to innovation, empathy, and collaboration. Our developers bridge technology and creativity to build scalable solutions that empower our clients. We foster long-term relationships and deliver high-quality work that makes an impact.

Authority Limits: Autonomy to manage development projects within defined budgets and timelines.
Special Requirements: Familiarity with API development, animation techniques, and performance optimization is essential.
Policies and Limitations: Adhere to client confidentiality and data protection policies.
Future Considerations: Potential for full-time employment and leadership opportunities as the company grows.

Include the word masipag in your subject line when applying via email at apply@creativenomads.com and submit your portfolio showcasing your best projects, including interactive websites and animations.

title: Hubspot Administrator
description:
Are you an organized and tech-savvy professional with a knack for optimizing CRM platforms through API’s and other integration methods? Do you have 3-5 years of experience managing HubSpot and leveraging its tools to enhance marketing, sales, and customer success processes? If so, we’re looking for you! 

About Us: Identity Architects is a dynamic architectural firm dedicated to creating innovative and sustainable designs that inspire and enrich communities. We believe in fostering a collaborative and supportive work environment where all team members' contributions are valued and respected. 

Position Overview:  The HubSpot Admin will be a critical contributor to our team, responsible for managing, customizing, and optimizing the HubSpot CRM to align with our business objectives. This role demands a detail oriented professional with deep technical expertise, strategic problem-solving abilities, and a proactive approach to enhancing CRM functionality and usability. 

Benefits:

• Competitive Salary
• PH Government Benefits
• HMO
• 15 PTO
• US and PH Holidays
• 13th Month

Qualifications: 

• Minimum 3-5 years of hands-on experience as a HubSpot Administrator, with a strong understanding of its tools and capabilities. 
• In-depth knowledge of HubSpot workflows, automation, pipelines, reporting, integrations, and CRM customization. 
• Ability to interpret data, generate actionable insights, and optimize CRM systems to meet business objectives. 
• Open to a project-based setup, with the ability to manage deliverables within defined timelines and budgets. 
• Comfortable working independently and collaborating with cross-functional teams to address specific project goals. 
• Willingness to work during a graveyard shift to support international teams and clients as required. 
• Strong verbal and written communication skills to provide training, updates, and troubleshooting support. 
• Proactive approach to identifying and addressing CRM challenges effectively and efficiently. 

HubSpot Administration and Optimization  
• Manage and customize the HubSpot CRM to align with project goals and business objectives. 
• Develop and maintain workflows, pipelines, automations, and integrations to streamline operations. 
• Monitor system performance, ensuring data accuracy, and addressing any technical issues promptly.  

Data Analysis and Reporting  
• Analyze CRM data to provide actionable insights that support marketing, sales, and customer success initiatives. 
• Create and manage dashboards and reports to track key metrics and project performance. 
• Identify trends and recommend system enhancements to improve overall efficiency.  

Training and Support  
• Train team members on HubSpot tools, best practices, and system functionalities. 
• Provide ongoing support to users, troubleshooting issues and ensuring optimal usage of the platform. 
• Act as a resource for technical guidance and strategic recommendations related to CRM usage.  Strategic Planning and Collaboration  
• Work with cross-functional teams to identify opportunities for CRM optimization. 
• Support strategic initiatives by implementing HubSpot solutions tailored to specific business needs. • Collaborate with internal and external teams to integrate HubSpot with other tools and systems.  

Quality Assurance and Compliance  
• Maintain system integrity by conducting regular audits and implementing best practices. 
• Ensure all data and processes comply with organizational policies and industry regulations. 
• Stay up to date with HubSpot updates and industry trends to continuously improve CRM capabilities.



Interested applicants should follow these steps to apply:

2. Send your updated resume to HR@identityarchitects.com

title: Investor Relations Analyst/Associate
description:
We are a dynamic and fast-growing lending company that focuses on providing innovative financial solutions to our clients. We are committed to fostering relationships with investors and partners, driving transparency, and delivering value. As part of our continued growth, we are seeking a detail-oriented and proactive Investor Relations Analyst or Associate to join our team.

About Stratus Financial

At Stratus, we believe in helping aspiring student pilots at all levels of experience and training achieve their dreams of flight. We do this by providing loans at reasonable rates and flexible payment plans to students who want to become pilots, flight instructors, etc. 

We believe in technology. We harness it to our advantage. Understanding how to manage, adapt, train, and utilize new technologies is an essential requirement for team members in our organization.

Position Summary:
The Investor Relations Analyst/Associate will support the Investor Relations (IR) team in managing communications with investors, ensuring accurate and timely reporting, and assisting in strategic initiatives. The ideal candidate is highly analytical, possesses strong communication skills, and has a solid understanding of the financial services industry, particularly lending.

Key Responsibilities:
• Investor Communication Support- Assist in preparing and updating investor presentations, pitch decks, and other communication materials such as; drafting investor letters, email updates, and newsletters to maintain regular communication with current and prospective investors. 

• Data Gathering and Analysis- Assist with collecting and analyzing financial market, and portfolio data to support any fundraising efforts. Assist with compiling performance reports, fund fact sheets, and other materials as needed.

• Due Diligence Coordination- Support the due diligence process by gathering necessary documentation and responding to investor inquiries if I am in meetings or unavailable - Ensure that all information provided to investors is accurate, timely, and compliant with Stratus standards. 

• Investor Reporting - Assist in preparing quarterly and annual reports for investors as needed . Work with internal teams to ensure accuracy in financial reporting and investor updates.  Maintain databases and records of investor interactions, commitments, and correspondence.

• Fundraising and admin support - Assist with the preparation of materials for capital raising events, including brochures/ presentations, coordinating schedules between investors and senior management.  

• Cross-Departmental Collaboration - Work closely with internal teams to ensure all investor relations activities align with the overall company strategy and  standards.  

• Market Research - Assist with research on industry trends, competitor performance, and investor behavior to inform fundraising strategies. 

Qualifications:
• Bachelor's degree in Finance, Economics, Accounting, or related field
• 2+ years of experience in investor relations, financial analysis, or a related role, preferably within the financial services industry or a lending company.
• Strong understanding of financial statements, accounting principles, and key financial metrics.
• Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to distill complex information for diverse audiences.
• Proficient in Microsoft Excel, PowerPoint, and financial reporting tools.
• Analytical mindset with attention to detail and accuracy.
• Ability to work independently and collaborate with cross-functional teams.
• Ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
• Demonstrated proficiency with computer systems and software programs, including Microsoft Word, Excel, and Outlook.

Work Hours:
8:00 am – 5:00 pm PST

Location: Remote

Next steps:
Please submit your resume in pdf version by email: cheryl@stratus.finance
Contact: Cheryl Linato
Subject line: Investor Relations Analyst/Associate

title: Web Hosting Systems Administrator
description:

This role focuses on maintaining smooth automation processes, troubleshooting API and payment-related issues, and ensuring an exceptional customer experience.

Monitor server performance and resolve technical issues promptly.
Ensure uptime and reliability for all hosted WordPress sites.

Integrate and monitor Stripe for secure and reliable payment processing.
Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to billing and payment gateways.

Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.

Familiarity with PHP, MySQL, and web development tools.
Experience with automation tools like Zapier or Integromat.
Prior experience in a similar hosting or SaaS-based environment.

title: Python Software Engineer | Front end/Backend Innovator
description:
** Candidate must have worked in the Financial Industry
** The company operates on EST (Eastern Time Zone) including all morning scrums
** Having worked on pricing engines is a bonus
**Remote in Manila, Cebu Onsite
**Onboarding January 2025

We are:
A well-funded and highly experienced FinTech startup composed of Wall Street and Silicon Valley veterans. Utilizing decades of experience from trading floors and global financial markets to the leading edge of artificial intelligence, we have created a new type of trading platform that opens investment opportunities to all investors, not just accredited.


You are:
 A highly skilled and experienced Python Engineer and love to go beyond the “known” capabilities to create what hasn’t been created before. You know how to build scalable distributed systems and you have deployed code to production environments. You have worked with data-streaming services and have incorporated ML/AI used in high throughput environments. The ideal candidate is creative in how they approach solutions (you will not boil the ocean to serve a warm cup of water). You are someone who thrives in a fast-paced environment, thinks outside the box, and is able to work with evolving requirements at times. The leadership of the company is technical, so it is critical that you are a good communicator (you listen just as well as you speak) and are able to collaborate across cross-functional teams.


The Job:
 As a Python Engineer, you will become an integral part of a dedicated team tasked with the development of automation pipelines to enhance our product offerings, as well as the creation of predictive models for precise asset valuation. We solve problems that have a direct impact on our core offering. You will collaborate with internal stakeholders across multiple organizations (leadership, engineering, product, business) to understand existing challenges and develop solutions to improve operational efficiency. This team is very hands-on, you will be directly involved in coding and have the unique opportunity to deploy your work into production. Ownership of these systems is a critical aspect of your role, including the development and maintenance of alerts and metrics to ensure operational continuity and the reliability of our services. This position calls for a high degree of professionalism, technical expertise, and a commitment to delivering innovative and sustainable solutions.


Responsibilities:
Design and develop robust Python applications and integrate them with our existing systems
Collaborate with the team to build and deploy predictive pricing models, ensuring accuracy, efficiency, and scalability
Work on the continuous improvement of our automation and predictive systems, incorporating the latest in technology and methodologies
Participate in code reviews, ensuring best practices and high coding standards
Troubleshoot, debug and upgrade existing systems to enhance performance and address evolving business needs
Conduct thorough testing and validation of systems and algorithms to ensure robustness, usability, and reliability
Mentor junior engineers and team members, fostering a culture of technical excellence and continuous learning
Design and develop robust Python applications and integrate them with our existing systems using message brokers such as RabbitMQ or Kafka
Implement various types of algorithms such as anomaly detection models, predictive analytics models, OCR, NLP



Required skills and qualifications:
TEAM PLAYER
BS/MS in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field, with at least 5 years of relevant experience in Python development
Proficient in Python programming, with a strong grasp of software engineering principles
Have worked and excelled in both startup and institutional environments
Strong experience in designing, building, and maintaining distributed systems at scale
Excellent communication and collaboration skills
Familiarity with machine learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch) and libraries (e.g., scikit-learn, Pandas).
Have implemented ml models in a production environment (OCR, NLP, Anomaly Detection...)
Strong analytical skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work effectively in a team environment
Excellent problem-solving abilities and a commitment to delivering high-quality software solutions
Resourceful, with a strong ability to develop solutions, build relationships, and see opportunities that others might miss

title: Ad Operations Specialist
description:
Job Description:
We are looking for a highly skilled Ad Operations Specialist to join our growing Media Strategy & Operations team. In this role, you will be responsible for implementing, managing, and troubleshooting JavaScript and image tags across various advertiser websites to support their digital advertising and marketing efforts. 
This role requires expertise in tag management systems (TMS) like Adobe Launch or Google Tag Manager, and hands-on experience with popular website platforms such as Shopify and WooCommerce. You will work closely with customer success and media buying teams to ensure that all tags are correctly implemented, functional, and effectively supporting digital marketing campaigns.
The ideal candidate has a strong background in digital advertising or ad operations, prides themselves on having strong attention to detail, and has a deep understanding of dynamic macros and their use cases.

Key Responsibilities:
Tag Implementation & Management:
Implement and manage JavaScript and image tags for digital marketing and advertising campaigns across advertiser website platforms (Shopify, WooCommerce, WordPress, etc.).
Utilize dynamic macros to optimize tracking and ensure accurate data collection.
Manage and troubleshoot tags using Google Tag Manager, Adobe Launch, and similar TMS tools.
Collaborate with customer success, media buying, and integrations teams to ensure seamless tag deployment and adherence to project timelines.
Ensure proper data collection and reporting through tags and pixels to support accurate campaign measurement and audience segmentation.
Troubleshooting & QA:
Diagnose and resolve issues related to tracking pixels, ad tags, and technical campaign problems.
Perform ongoing audits of tag configurations and data flows to ensure they meet industry standards and perform as intended.
Compliance & Best Practices:
Ensure adherence to privacy regulations (such as GDPR and CCPA) when collecting and handling user data through tags and pixels.
Stay up-to-date with industry standards, best practices, and emerging technologies in tag management and digital advertising.
Provide recommendations for improving tracking methodologies and campaign setup processes.

Qualifications:
Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Advertising, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
3+ years of experience in ad operations, with a solid understanding of ad technology, dynamic macros, and campaign management.
Expertise in tag management systems (i.e. Google Tag Manager, Adobe Launch).
Familiarity with tags from programmatic platforms such as Amobee and The Trade Desk.
Familiarity with tags from paid search platforms such as Google and Bing.
Familiarity with tags from paid social platforms such as Meta, Twitter and TikTok.
Familiarity with JavaScript, HTML, and other web technologies related to tracking and ad tag implementation.
Solid understanding of major website platforms such as Shopify, WooCommerce, and WordPress for integrating tags and tracking mechanisms.
Excellent troubleshooting skills and the ability to resolve complex technical issues related to tagging and tracking.
Exceptional attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality work.
Familiarity with digital marketing concepts such as conversion tracking, remarketing, and analytics.
Proficient in using Excel, SQL, or other data analysis tools for campaign analysis and reporting.

Preferred Skills:
Experience with programmatic advertising and working knowledge of DSPs and SSPs.
Experience with paid search and paid social advertising. 
Familiarity with Google Analytics and other reporting tools.
Knowledge of privacy regulations (GDPR, CCPA) and their impact on ad tracking and data collection.
Strong communication and collaboration skills to work with cross-functional teams (marketing, web development, data analytics, and external partners).

title: Social Media Manager/ Assistant
description:
Social Media Manager/Admin 

## About Us

At Your CFO Guy,  we help people learn about finance and accounting in simple ways. Our founder shares knowledge with over 400,000 LinkedIn followers and 100,000+ newsletter readers. 

## The Role

We're looking for an Assistant who's also good at social media. You'll start with basic tasks and can grow into bigger responsibilities as you learn more about our work.

## What You'll Do Every Day

You will help us distribute content everyday across various social media channels, and newsletters. You will also be managing a bunch of projects and ad hoc requests as they come up.

- Work with Excel spreadsheets
- Help set up newsletters in ConvertKit
- Keep files and documents organized
- Help with our new online community
- Work with team members on various tasks
- Post and manage social media content
- Help with other daily tasks as needed

## What You Need

- Good internet connection
- Strong Excel skill
- Good English speaking
- A computer with 16GB RAM (needed for our design tools)

## Work Hours

- Full-time (40 hours/week)
- Work in the American Hours (can be flexible by a few hours)
- Long-term position (more than 6 months)

## Pay

$3-10 per hour, based on your experience

## You're a Good Fit If You

- Like to keep things organized
- Pay attention to small details
- Can handle different tasks at the same time
- Work well in a fast-moving environment
- Want to learn and grow with our company

## Why Work With Us

You'll be part of a team that values your work. We'll help you learn new skills, and as you get better at your tasks, you can take on more interesting projects. You'll work directly with our Marketing Manager.

## Questions You Need to Answer

2. Tell us about your experience using these tools: ConvertKit, Figma, Notion, Slack, Excel
3. Can you work 40 hours a week, from 8a - 4pm EST?
4. Tell us about your experience with social media posts and management

## Basic Info

- Type: Complex project
- Length: More than 6 months
- Hours: More than 30 hrs/week
- Level: Entry level

title: AR/AP Associate
description:
Job Title: AR/AP Associate
Job Level: Associate
Department: Finance

Position Overview
 We are seeking a detail-oriented and proactive AR/AP Associate to join our finance team. This position will be vital in managing accounts receivable (AR) and accounts payable (AP) processes to ensure accurate and timely financial transactions. The ideal candidate will have strong organizational skills, a keen eye for detail, and a collaborative mindset to support the organization's financial operations. 


Key Responsibilities
Accounts Receivable (AR):
Generate and distribute invoices in a timely manner.
Monitor and track incoming payments, ensuring accuracy and alignment with accounts.
Perform regular account reconciliations and resolve discrepancies promptly.
Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of receivable transactions.
Collaborate with hiring managers and internal teams to address billing issues and payment delays.
Accounts Payable (AP):
Process invoices, ensuring accuracy, proper filing, and compliance with company policies.
Review and verify expense reports for accuracy and adherence to guidelines.
Prepare and schedule payments, including checks, ACH transfers, and wire payments.
Reconcile statements and resolve discrepancies.
Maintain organized records of payables and ensure timely responses to inquiries.
General:
Regularly monitor and manage the company’s accounts-related email inboxes to ensure all emails related to payments, invoices, and receivables are read, prioritized, and addressed promptly.
Reconcile daily, weekly, and monthly transactions in Xero to ensure accurate financial records.
Assist in bi-monthly, month-end, and year-end financial closings by providing necessary reports and reconciliations.
Support audits by preparing and providing required documentation.
Collaborate with other departments to address financial queries and concerns
Continuously improve processes and identify opportunities for automation or efficiency.
Qualifications
Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
2+ years of experience in AR/AP or a similar finance role.
Proficiency in accounting software (e.g., Xero, QuickBooks,) and Google Suite, especially Google Sheets.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills for working with vendors, clients, and internal teams.
High level of accuracy, attention to detail, and ability to manage multiple priorities.

Why Join Us?
A collaborative and inclusive work environment.
Opportunities for professional growth and development.
Fully remote set-up


If you are passionate about finance, thrive in a dynamic environment, and enjoy making a measurable impact, we encourage you to apply!

title: Web Developer: Wix Specialist
description:
We seek a skilled and detail-oriented virtual web developer to manage website development and maintenance tasks, with expertise in Wix and WordPress platforms. This role offers flexible hours and the opportunity to work remotely. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in web development, proficiency in Wix and WordPress customization, and experience with database creation and management.

**Responsibilities:**

1. **Website Development:**
   - Design and develop custom websites using Wix and WordPress platforms, adhering to client specifications and brand guidelines.
   - Customize website layouts, themes, and templates to create visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces.
   - Implement features such as contact forms, galleries, sliders, and e-commerce functionality as required.

2. **Website Maintenance:**
   - Perform regular updates and maintenance tasks to ensure website functionality and security.
   - Troubleshoot and resolve any technical issues or errors that may arise, including compatibility issues and performance optimizations.
   - Monitor website performance metrics and implement improvements to enhance user experience and search engine rankings.

3. **Database Creation and Management:**
   - Develop and implement databases to store and organize website content, user data, and other relevant information.
   - Design database schemas, tables, and relationships based on project requirements and data modeling best practices.
   - Manage database backups, migrations, and optimizations to ensure data integrity and performance.

4. **Content Management:**
   - Collaborate with content creators and stakeholders to upload and manage website content, including text, images, and multimedia files.
   - Ensure content is formatted correctly and optimized for SEO, accessibility, and mobile responsiveness.

5. **Client Communication:**
   - Communicate with clients to gather requirements, provide progress updates, and address any questions or concerns related to website development and maintenance.
   - Offer guidance and recommendations on best practices for website design, functionality, and performance optimization.

**Requirements:**

- Proven experience in website development and maintenance, with expertise in Wix and WordPress platforms.
- Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and other relevant web development languages and frameworks.
- Experience with database design and management, including SQL and relational database systems.
- Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot technical issues independently.
- Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with clients and team members.
- Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality work on time and within budget.
- Familiarity with SEO principles and best practices for website optimization.
- Self-motivated and proactive, with the ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines simultaneously.

title: Locksmith Dispatcher/Appointment Settler (PREFERRED MALE APPLICANT)
description:
Job Overview:
We are seeking a reliable and organized Locksmith Dispatcher to manage and coordinate locksmith services for our clients. This role involves scheduling appointments, assigning jobs to technicians, and ensuring efficient communication between clients and our team of locksmiths. As a dispatcher, you'll play a key role in providing seamless, timely assistance for clients needing locksmith services.

Key Responsibilities:

Job Scheduling: Efficiently schedule locksmith appointments and dispatch technicians based on availability and proximity to job sites.
Client Communication: Serve as the main point of contact for clients, confirming appointments, addressing inquiries, and providing real-time updates.
Technician Coordination: Relay job details to technicians, monitor job statuses, and communicate any changes or updates as needed.
Problem Solving: Handle any issues that arise during the dispatch process, including rescheduling or addressing emergency requests.
Data Entry: Maintain accurate records of appointments, client interactions, and job completions in the company’s CRM system.
Follow-Up: Ensure client satisfaction by following up post-service to confirm quality and address any remaining questions or concerns.
Requirements:

Experience: At least 1 year of experience as a dispatcher or in a similar customer service role, preferably within the locksmith or home service industry.
Skills: Strong communication, organization, and multitasking skills; ability to stay calm and focused under pressure.
Tools: Proficiency with scheduling or dispatch software and CRM systems (e.g., MONDAY.com).
Customer Service: A client-first attitude and professional demeanor.
Preferred Qualifications:

Familiarity with the locksmith industry or other service-based industries.
Previous experience working remotely in a fast-paced environment.
Join our DC Center team to help deliver prompt and reliable locksmith services to clients. Your role will be essential in ensuring each client receives professional and timely support.

title: Marketing Virtual Assistant
description:

Our mission is to Nourish, Protect, and Restore outdoor spaces while making a positive impact on the community. We are a family-oriented, hardworking team that values honesty, respect, and growth. Apply today to become a part of our mission!

title: IT Specialist
description:
Please read the entire post before applying.

Your Mission:
Are you a tech-savvy problem solver with a passion for optimizing digital ecosystems and ensuring cybersecurity? At The Plugs Digital Media, we’re looking for an IT Specialist who will ensure that our team’s technology runs like a well-oiled machine while safeguarding our systems and data. From building SEO-optimized WordPress websites to fortifying cybersecurity measures, your expertise will empower our team to thrive and serve our clients at the highest level.

How You’ll Help Us Succeed:
As our IT Specialist, your role is critical to our company’s success. You’ll streamline operations, enhance our digital presence, and keep our tools and systems running efficiently while maintaining the highest standards of data security. By managing technology with precision and innovation, you’ll create an environment where the team can focus on delivering value to our clients.

What You’ll Be Doing:
Build and maintain SEO-optimized websites, with a focus on WordPress development and keyword optimization to improve search rankings.
Set up, maintain, and troubleshoot Microsoft Office 365 environments, ensuring seamless operations and premium migrations to M365.
Implement and maintain cybersecurity measures, including firewalls, data encryption, and secure access protocols, to protect company and client information.
Conduct regular system and security audits, identifying and mitigating vulnerabilities proactively.
Manage automation workflows and funnel building to support our marketing and sales efforts.
Provide remote technical support to the team, resolving issues quickly and effectively.
Assist with any technology needs, including software updates, troubleshooting, and system integrations.
Optimize team productivity by implementing and maintaining efficient digital tools and processes.

Are You the One?
We’re seeking an innovative and adaptable IT Specialist who thrives in a fast-paced digital environment. 

You should have:
-Proven experience in WordPress website development, keyword optimization, and SEO best practices.
-Advanced expertise in Microsoft Office 365 setup, maintenance, troubleshooting, and premium migrations.
-Strong knowledge of cybersecurity practices, including network security, data encryption, and vulnerability management.
-Familiarity with cybersecurity compliance standards (e.g., GDPR, CCPA) is a plus.
-Experience with network security tools (e.g., firewalls, antivirus software, VPNs) is strongly preferred.
-Strong experience with automation tools and funnel-building platforms.
-Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to manage remote technical support effectively.
-A proactive mindset and excellent communication skills to assist team members with varying levels of technical proficiency.

How to Apply:
We’re looking for someone who is ready to grow with us and contribute their creativity to our mission. If you believe you’re the right fit, submit your resume, portfolio, references, and three available dates for an interview within the next 7 days using the application link: forms.monday.com/forms/f8f9afc6d9e1158f763c9ae4c045d66a?r=use1.

We’re hiring immediately, so apply now and show us how you can elevate our technology game and help us deliver exceptional results!

title: Lettings Agency Support Assistant
description:
Virtual Assistant Job Description
Position: Virtual Assistant – Lettings and Sales Support
Company: Best Nest
Hours: 40 hours per week (Monday to Friday, 8:30 AM - 5:30 PM, with a one-hour lunch break)
Salary: £1,300 per month

At Best Nest, we pride ourselves on delivering exceptional property management services, ensuring our tenants feel at home while helping landlords and investors achieve their goals. We're seeking a proactive and organized Virtual Assistant to support our lettings and sales operations.

title: Email Marketer (Ecommerce)
description:
Do you have a passion for crafting high-converting email flows and campaigns that drive sales? Are you a Klaviyo pro who loves strategy as much as execution? We’re on the lookout for a Klaviyo Expert to manage flows, signup forms, and campaigns across a portfolio of ecommerce brands. You’ll be at the forefront of creative email strategies, driving engagement, retention, and revenue.

What You’ll Do:
Own the Email Strategy: Design and execute automated email flows and campaigns for a range of ecommerce brands. From welcome sequences to abandoned cart flows, you’ll optimize every stage of the customer journey.
Creative Campaign Planning: Collaborate with the team on promotion and content pillar planning. You’ll help map out seasonal campaigns, product launches, and sales promotions, ensuring our messaging is always fresh and on-brand.
Manage Signup Forms & Segmentation: Build and optimize email signup forms to grow lists and improve conversion rates. Manage audience segmentation to ensure emails hit the right inbox at the right time.
A/B Testing & Iteration: Continuously A/B test flows, campaigns, subject lines, and creative assets to maximize performance. You’ll analyze results and tweak strategies for continuous improvement.
KPI Monitoring: Keep a close eye on key metrics like open rates, click-through rates, and conversion rates. You’ll generate reports to measure success and identify areas for optimization.
Stay on Trend: Stay up to date with the latest in email marketing, deliverability best practices, and remarketing strategies. We want you to keep us ahead of the curve!
Design Beautiful Emails: Create visually appealing emails and templates that align with brand aesthetics. You’ll have a good design eye and be comfortable working with graphic design tools to make emails that look as good as they convert.

Tools & Tech: 
Email Marketing Platform: Klaviyo (duh!) – you know it inside and out
Design Tools: Canva, Photoshop, or other design software to create great-looking emails
Data & Analytics: Google Analytics, Klaviyo’s built-in reporting, or similar tools for tracking performance
Bonus points if you’ve worked with other email platforms like Mailchimp, HubSpot, or Omnisend

Who You Are:
Klaviyo Pro: You know your way around Klaviyo, and you’re confident in building, testing, and optimizing automated flows and campaigns.
Strategic Thinker: You don’t just push buttons—you understand the “why” behind campaigns and can help shape the email marketing strategy for long-term success.
Creative & Design-Oriented: You’ve got a good eye for design and can create visually stunning emails that resonate with audiences.
Data-Driven: You love tracking results, testing new ideas, and iterating to improve. Numbers don’t scare you—they excite you!
Adaptable & Curious: You’re comfortable with the fast pace of ecommerce and can quickly adapt to new trends, tools, and strategies.
Self-Starter: You take ownership of your work and don’t need hand-holding. You see what needs to be done and get to it.

Why Join Us?
Flexible Working: Work when and where you want – fully remote with both part-time and full-time options available.
Diverse Portfolio: You’ll work on a variety of ecommerce brands, keeping things fresh and exciting.
Creative Freedom: Shape email marketing strategies and see your ideas come to life.
Stay Cutting-Edge: Be at the forefront of the latest in email marketing and automation technology. We’re always experimenting and staying ahead of trends.
Fun, Fast-Paced Team: Join a dynamic team that values innovation, creativity, and results.

If you’re ready to take charge of our email marketing efforts and create campaigns that drive real results, we’d love to hear from you!

Fluent in English, with the ability to work in EDT (New York) time zone.

This Job Isn't for You If:
You're not comfortable with communication or learning new tools.
You have trouble with deadlines and details.
You rely on AI-generated answers instead of bringing your unique ideas.

Tools We Use:
Slack, Infusionsoft, ActiveCampaign, Kajabi, ClickFunnels, Zapier, Google Drive, and more.

Our Values:
Dedication: Embrace challenges for achievement.
Compassion: Cheer on our clients.
Responsiveness: Address concerns quickly.
Impact: Attention to detail.
Fun: Love what you do!

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
About us

LRT eMobility is part of LRT Automotive, a German company that has a long and successful history manufacturing components for car engines. Over the last two years, we have focused on expanding our product range to meet the demands of environmentally sustainable electric vehicles. We have released a range of electric vehicle chargers into the marketplace, and offer market-leading software to support this technology.

Role

As a full stack developer in the user team, you will build the user facing components in our organization. By utilizing the internal api's, you will build together with the team multiple applications for multiple different users: Car owners, business owners, home users, solar panel owners, ...
There is no focus on one area of ??responsibility, there are both frontend and backend tasks. A focus on personal preferences and skills can be done after consultation with the team and in accordance with the project requirements.

Skills
- Good understanding of frontend development (Javascript, html , css)
- Experience with Python
- Good understanding of Linux/Docker
- A firm believer in TTD (Test Driven Development)
- Willingness to learn
- Nice to have
- Good understanding of system design
- Understanding of WebSockets
- Event-driven development
- Experience with FastApi
- Experience with relational databases
- Experience with Kubernetes/ helm
- Experience with Nest js
- Experience with No-SQL databases
- Experience with CI CD pipelines

title: Part-Time Maintenance Coordinator
description:
Part-Time Maintenance Coordinator

We are seeking a detail-oriented and efficient Maintenance Coordinator to work part-time on Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Monday from 8am - 5pm CST. In this role, you will be responsible for managing communication with tenants, contractors, and short-term rental guests, ensuring that maintenance issues are resolved promptly and effectively. The ideal candidate must excel in multitasking and thrive in a fast-paced environment.

Key Responsibilities:
- Coordinate and communicate with tenants, contractors, and guests.
- Manage maintenance requests and scheduling.
- Handle phone calls and written communication with clarity and professionalism.

Requirements:
- Strong multitasking skills.
- Excellent written and spoken English.
- Experience in a fast-paced environment.

The pay for this role is $285 USD on the 1st and the 15th of each month. 4 days of work each week, opportunity for more.
If you have experience in a similar role and feel like you would be a good fit please send our hiring manager an email directly with a short 1-3 minute selfie video introducing yourself and mention what your favorite meal to eat is. The email address to send the video to is:

Nexcelgm@gmail.com

title: Digital Marketing Operations Manager
description:
We are a boutique marketing agency specializing in helping Trading Educators and Brands grow and scale. We’re seeking a Digital Marketing Operations Specialist to play a key role in optimizing our processes and driving efficiency as we expand.

Preferred Qualifications (Not Required):
Familiarity with the trading industry or a strong willingness to learn.

Role Overview:

1. Process Observation:

Work closely with the CEO to observe daily operations, gaining a deep understanding of workflows, tools, and challenges.

2. Documentation:

Create detailed Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for recurring tasks and critical processes.
Develop SOPs for marketing activities such as ad creation, campaign tracking, and performance analysis.

3. Systems Design:

Identify inefficiencies and recommend tools, automation, or streamlined processes to enhance productivity and scalability.

4. Collaboration:

Partner with the CEO and team to ensure all processes align with business goals and team workflows.

5. Implementation:

Roll out new systems or procedures, provide team training, and ensure consistent adherence to updated workflows.

6. Continuous Improvement:

Regularly review and refine SOPs to adapt to evolving business needs.

Skills & Expertise:

Digital Marketing Expertise (preferred but not required):

-Knowledge of paid advertising strategies.
-Understanding of organic growth strategies, including SEO, content marketing, and social media.
-Experience with email marketing platforms and CRM systems.

Strategic Thinking:

-Ability to align marketing campaigns with broader business objectives.
-Proven experience in optimizing campaigns to maximize ROI and scalability.

If you’re passionate about digital marketing, love improving processes, and enjoy working in a dynamic environment, we’d love to hear from you!

title: Sr. System Administrator (MSP Experience)
description:
PLEASE DO NOT APPLY IF YOU DON'T HAVE MSP EXPERIENCE*

Job duties:

Experienced Systems Administrator & Infrastructure Engineer who will join the operations function.
Provide close liaison with project manager to ensure the smooth transition of new applications, systems and initiatives into the production environment
Manage production and maintenance of integration system documentation
Ensure delivery of tasks in a timely manner and report progress to line management and project teams
Review and recommend options to improve the effectiveness of infrastructure patching through automation. Provide escalation support for all Windows, Exchange and messaging, VMware and Citrix infrastructure in an enterprise Active Directory environment when undergoing patch and service pack updates.
Act as a visible point of contact for the Wintel Infrastructure (O/S and hardware)
Resolve and conduct root cause analysis of system performance / failure issues
Establish and maintain best practices, processes and procedures to underpin the operations of the business
Manage configuration, installation and release management for patches and service packs
Conduct performance monitoring and testing
Produce documentation and change management requests
Prepare and maintain technical, process and operations documentation
Support end to end patching process for Windows operating systems and products.
Will serve as escalation for L3 tickets.

KNOWLEDGE

A degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related disciplines.
Microsoft / VMware/ Cisco Certifications
PowerShell and VB Scripting
Knowledge of Microsoft Cloud Services o365, Azure, AWS
Switching & Routing

EXPERIENCE
Over 2 Years MSP (Managed Services Provider) Experience
Experience in working through technical challenges through acquisitions and mergers
7 years or more experience of working in a systems infrastructure role.
Experience of ITIL v3 standards or a certificate in ITIL v3 foundation skills beneficial
Ability to develop automation process using scripting languages such as PowerShell and batch.
The role requires an experienced Windows engineer with extensive experience of the core set of Microsoft Server products including O365 and AWS.
This role requires a skilled engineer with a strong delivery track record.
Financial institution experience in a trading environment is desirable but not essential.
Skills
Experience in Fortigate/Cisco/Sophos/Sonicwall Routers

The successful applicant will be one of the company's engineers on Windows related technologies and will have to demonstrate strong automation skills along with the technical experience needed to build high-performance, resilient solutions.
Technologies will include but not limited to, Windows Server, Exchange Server, O365, AWS, Active Directory, VMWare ESX, PowerShell, File and Print Services, DNS, DFS, ADFS and Windows Clustering
Working, detailed knowledge of the Ivanti Patch or Shavlik for Windows Servers product
Working, detailed knowledge of Windows operating system platforms (including Windows Server 2012/2012 R2, Windows Server 2016 and Windows Server 2019 client/workstation equivalents). Knowledge of legacy Windows operating systems an advantage.
Highly methodical and 'attention-to-detail' approach
Ability to diagnose and advise on any server issues.
Good technical understanding of IT infrastructure products, standards and configuration.
Knowledge of how to patch and test high availability systems.
Broad knowledge of IT Security and finding the best way to secure the IT infrastructure of an organisation

CERTIFICATES:

Microsoft Azure or Microsoft 365
Cisco/Fortinet Certificates

title: AWS Windows SecOps L2/L3
description:
FinTech Managed Services provider seeks full-time AWS Windows Network Architect for remote work on 6AM PHT (Philippines) shift, M-F. Excellent growth potential and opportunity to learn the next wave of groundbreaking technologies!


Description:
AWS Windows Network Engineer required for managed services NOC. You'll be responsible for remaining on-call on a full-time basis to monitor and respond to emergency issues with immediacy. Our SLA's range from 2-4 hour response times with expectation for emergency response within 30 minutes (you must have computer access consistently during work hours). This is a full-time responsibility.


You must have experience with maintaining patch levels and evidence for at least one of the following compliance methods: PCI-DSS, SOC1, SOC2, or HIPAA.


The ideal candidate is an AWS expert, capable of full network build-outs. Every candidate must have strong working knowledge of Windows servers and expert knowledge of IIS. The ideal candidate has experience with MySQL and Jenkins CI/CD as well.


We are in need of someone capable of taking on projects with growth and longevity for a strong long-term relationship. Candidates expecting to work a separate full time job should not apply as it will not be feasible.


Requirements:
The following a non-negotiable requirements.
> Minimum 3 years of relevant working experience
> Fluent written and spoken English
> Full-time availability Monday through Friday on the aforementioned shift(s)
> May not maintain a second full-time job. To perform this job you MUST be at your computer on a consistent basis during scheduled work hours to be performing real-time alert monitoring on available dashboards, actively (not passively), and responsive. As a cybersecurity employee, you will be handling sensitive company data, so honesty, trustworthiness, and maintaining an isolated environment are all paramount to the job.


Preferences:
> AWS certificate or minimum 5 years AWS networking experience. Please include your AWS certification in your application for verification, if applicable.


Responsibilities:
> Perform routine operating system updates on a monthly basis
> Daily log review of AVS, IDS, SEIM, Event logs, and other compliance related logs
> L1 & L2 Ticket response handling on a 2-4 hour SLA
> Emergency Response & Disaster Recovery handling on a 30 minute SLA
> Architect, create, and manage AWS VPC networking (vpc, subnets, route tables, nat gateway, internet gateway, transfer family services, s3, ec2, ebs, API gateway, security groups, application load balancers, web application firewalls, and more)
> Perform scheduled monthly application file updates (manual file copy or CI/CD such as Jenkins, Git, etc)
> Create and configure IIS applications and application pools
> Create and manage Windows EC2 instances
> Create and manage Ubuntu EC2 instances
> Create and manage VPN servers (IPSec or OpenVPN)


How To Apply:
Use more than 1AP.  Respond to this post with a cover letter and resume link.  Do not ask for an external email address, do not ask for a call to cover responsibilities.  Fulfill all requirements listed above in your application.


Why Work With Cloud Armory?
Cloud Armory is a subsidiary of Digital Payments pioneer, Arcane Strategies. Our founders combine 30+ years of hands-on financial and military cybersecurity experience in this quest to dominate AWS network security. As an organic upstart, our founders are hands-on in all aspects of networking and business development and will work directly with you, as a team, to secure our clients' networks, and develop new technologies.


We're looking for someone who wants to be part of a growing team, long-term. As we'll be establishing this NOC from the ground-up, early hires will have the benefit of early advancement to management as we grow. It's in our best interest to ensure that our top performers are properly compensated and as our budget is tied directly to our client success, your performance directly contributes to that. We maintain a culture of high efficiency, high bandwidth, strong work ethic, and primarily autonomous workflows, so we expect only the industry's best and brightest to accomplish that.

title: Web Developer
description:
Job Overview:

We are looking for a skilled web developer with experience in modern JavaScript technologies (such as Node. js and React. js) to join our growing development team. This role will involve building high-performance web applications from the back end (server-side logic) to the front end (UI experience). The ideal candidate will have a solid understanding of both front-end and back-end technologies, a passion for clean code, and a drive to provide innovative web experiences.

Key Responsibilities:
Collaboration:
-Work closely with the development team to turn project requirements into high-quality web applications.
-Contribute to brainstorming and architectural discussions to ensure scalable, maintainable, and performant code.
-Participate in code reviews to ensure quality and share best practices with the team.

Web Application Development:
-Design, develop, and maintain responsive and high-performance web applications using React.js and Node.js.
-Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code across the full stack, following best practices and ensuring cross-browser -compatibility.
-Develop and integrate RESTful APIs, WebSockets, and third-party services to enhance application functionality.

Front-End Development:
-Build and maintain dynamic user interfaces using, with a focus on reusable components, state management (Redux, Context API), and efficient rendering.
-Implement responsive design and ensure the application performs well across devices and browsers.

Back-End Development:
-Build and maintain server-side logic, databases, and APIs.
-Work with relational and NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB, MySQL, PostgreSQL).
-Integrate front-end applications with back-end systems and databases, ensuring smooth data flow and performance.

Optimization & Maintenance:
-Optimize application performance, identifying and fixing performance bottlenecks.
-Maintain high standards for application security and data integrity.
-Continuously monitor and improve existing applications.

Testing & Documentation:
-Write unit and integration tests to ensure the reliability and robustness of code.
-Document technical specifications, code, and APIs for internal teams and future development.

Required Skills & Qualifications:
-Proven experience in web development with expertise in Javascript frameworks and libraries such as React.js and Node.js.
-Strong understanding of JavaScript (ES6+) and modern JavaScript features.
-Experience with HTML5, CSS3, and responsive design principles.
-Proficiency with RESTful API design and integration.
-Experience using front-end state management libraries like Redux or Context API.
-Experience working with server-side technologies like Express.js (Node.js framework).
-Solid understanding of databases (relational and/or NoSQL databases such as MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MySQL).
-Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to debug complex issues.
-Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with both technical and non-technical teams.

Why Join Us?
-Competitive salary and benefits package.
-Flexible working hours and remote work options.
-Opportunities for professional growth and learning.
-A collaborative and innovative work environment.
-Access to cutting-edge technologies and projects.
-A supportive team focused on work-life balance and personal development.

Work Schedule: 12:00mn to 8:00am PH Time

The company uses a time tracker and maintains a virtual office setup via Google Meet.

For interested applicants kindly send your CV to https://forms.clickup.com/9011576358/f/8cj3fh6-431/EFZ86LRME9VWJ2CBMC and mention Jayquin as the recruiter.

Thank you!

(Note: DO NOT SEND YOUR APPLICATION through our websites or social media platforms. FAILURE TO COMPLY WITH THIS INSTRUCTION may result in DISQUALIFICATION)

title: Fund Accountant
description:
Please include your resume in your application via a Google Drive, OneDrive, or Dropbox link.

If we make an offer, we do not allow you to do work for another employer.

We are a fintech startup in the United States. We're looking to hire a fund accountant to help us manage our clients' day to day books for assigned investment funds. The accountant will be responsible for daily cash, account, and investments position reconciliations to ensure all transactions are properly captured.

In addition, the fund accountant will be required to escalate any issues to the US Head of Accounting and Finance on daily calls and updates.

Basic tasks will include:

--Reconcile cash, accounts, and investment positions then promptly researching and correcting any variances for subsequent review
--Completing NAV calculations for subsequent review
--Valuation reconciliations to ensure proper pricing for investments and communicating any problems to management
--Reviewing transactions, expenses, contributions, distributions and drawdowns of funds for accuracy
--Record accurately, and in accordance with the Department policies and procedures, such accounting records as securities positions, corporate actions related, and journal entries
--Upholding processes for external and internal communications/demands
--Assist, as assigned, in preparing audit schedules, compliance reports, tax returns, financial statements, or other reports
--Participate in regular rotation of trade processing and other accounting processes to prepare the fund accounting system for the next day
--Any ad hoc requests

A fund accountant will ideally have some of the following qualifications and skills:
--A professional who can meet deadlines and willing to work to get the job done.
--CPA\CMA qualification
--Bachelor’s degree in accounting or finance; Master's degree a bonus
--Prior audit or accounting experience at a Big 4 or large accounting firm
--Ideally, two to three years of accounting experience working in real estate, debt funds, hedge funds, crypto fund, or private equity.
--US GAAP experience
--Intermediate Excel/Google Sheets skills
--In order to be a good fit for the role, it’s important for professionals to have some or all of the following traits:
--Professional and take accountability for their work
--Good interpersonal skills
--Demonstrated organizational skills
--Good time management skills
--Excellent attention to detail
--Ability to multitask and work under pressure
