title: BI Developer
description:
Design, develop and optimise BI solutions, including data models, ETL processes and reporting frameworks.
Stay current with BI technologies and best practices, recommending tools and methodologies to enhance data analysis capabilities.
Maintain comprehensive documentation of BI processes, tools, and methodologies.
Working with cloud technologies such as Azure, Microsoft Fabric
Developing data pipelines. 

You will be reporting to the CFO.
You will be assisting internal stakeholders with corporate modelling and projects as required. 
Support the existing BI Infrastructure, health checks, and troubleshoot issues. This includes assets in Power BI, Excel Power Pivot, Power Automate, and SQL server scripts. 
You will be responsible for the management and ongoing development of the information in the business. 

8am to 6pm Monday to Friday (Sydney Time) and may require after hours work for projects.

Please send your CV.

title: Sr. Webflow Developer-PH (w/ WordPress experience)
description:
ABOUT THE ROLE: 

Looking for several Webflow developers specializing in Webflow and custom WordPress theme development.

This role is responsible for coding, designing, and maintaining various websites. This person strives to create visually appealing sites that feature user-friendly design and clear navigation.

The ideal candidate loves working with a variety of projects and people. He/she should have a creative and thoughtful approach to requests and collaborate with the team.

RESPONSIBILITIES: 

In this role, you'll get to...

create the website architecture (WordPress Dashboard, using but not limited to ACF, Gutenberg blocks)
design and build the website front-end by using standard HTML/CSS practices
create an immersive experience for the user using micro animations while maintaining excellent Lightspeed performance scores
design and manage the website back-end including database and server integration
integrate data from various front/back-end services and databases using REST-API
generate custom WordPress themes and plugins
navigate and utilize the WPEngine dashboard (including but not limited to updating, hosting and domain setup/integration)
monitor the performance of the live website (using tools such as Page Speed Insights, GTMetrix, and other related tools)
create and integrate quality assurance tests to ensure website success and security
collaborate with the development team to develop and maintain the website(s)
conduct WordPress training with the client (when needed)
stay up to date on technology
attend regular meetings/check-ins with the dev team, project managers and business stakeholders
perform other ad hoc duties related to the role as assigned
REQUIREMENTS: 

On day one, we'll expect you to...

have proven work experience as a WordPress developer using custom built themes
have at least 4+ years of experience working as a WordPress Developer
have at least 3 years of experience working with Webflow
have recent Webflow projects
have attention to detail
be an expert in CSS animations and have a portfolio of production websites with CSS animations 
have bachelor's degree in Computer Science or any related field
know the basics of WordPress Template Hierarchy
apply Basic SEO Integration to the WordPress project
have working knowledge in front-end technologies including SASS, CSS3, JavaScript, HTML5, AlpineJS, jQuery
have working knowledge in backend developments such as WordPress, PHP, MySQL, API integrations, JSON, and XML
have knowledge on CSS Frameworks such as Bootstrap, Foundation, or TailwindCSS
be experienced in code versioning tools such as Git, Github or Gitlab
have the ability to custom the WordPress development using the following:
o   ACF

o   Gutenberg

o   Custom components

o   Yoast SEO

o   Gravity Forms

o   Custom plugins

have basic knowledge of Web Apps for site maintenance such Google Analytics and Tag Manager
be adept in using SEO Figma, Sketch, Invision, GIT, WPEngine, Pardot and HubSpot, and various web compliance standards
have good experience working with debugging tools such as Chrome Inspector and Firebug
have good understanding of website architecture and aesthetics
exhibit a strong understanding of current web development standards, protocols, and processes
document and create user guide(s) for various websites using an existing template/format
have experience with Webflow
be a team player
have the ability to manage projects
have excellent in written and verbal communication skills (English) and able to collaborate and communicate effectively with business stakeholders and team members
have a fully functional and up-to-date computer with which to perform duties
be willing to install next-generation endpoint protection on the computer
be willing to work in US Pacific time zone (8:00am-5:00pm PST) corresponding to 12:00am -9:00am PH time
be a current resident of the Philippines and can perform work from there
What separates the best from the rest:

working knowledge in ReactJS, VueJS and GSAP
NOTES:

This is a remote (work from home) position.
Salary Range: $5.50 to $7 per hour

TO APPLY: ** DO NOT SEND HERE**

1. COPY & PASTE this link to your browser:
https://3gcgroup.applytojob.com/apply/1PyStY5JXl/Sr-Webflow-DeveloperPH-Part-Time-Project-Based?source=Onlinejobs.ph
2. Fill out the form and submit your resume to our system.

We will reach out to you via email using our system!
Thank you!

title: Fullstack Developer (WFH)
description:
We're on the lookout for someone to join our team full-time with skills in the following:

title: Browser Automation Specialist
description:
We are seeking a skilled Browser Automation Specialist to develop and maintain Python-based automation scripts using Selenium, JavaScript, and Tesseract OCR. The role involves automating tasks within Firefox, leveraging containers for tab management, and ensuring seamless mouse movements and navigation across multiple tabs.

Responsibilities:

• Develop automation scripts for Firefox using Selenium and Python.
•     Implement containerized tab management, ensuring tabs remain open and active throughout the session.
•     Automate mouse movements and link-clicking within browser tabs.
•     Utilize Tesseract OCR for text recognition tasks within the automation process.
•     Detect and integrate with active Firefox sessions to enhance efficiency.
•     Debug and optimize scripts to ensure stability and accuracy.

Requirements:

• Proficiency in Python and Selenium for browser automation.
•     Experience with JavaScript for dynamic browser interactions.
•     Familiarity with Tesseract OCR for text recognition.
•     Knowledge of Firefox containers and their application in automation.
•     Strong debugging and problem-solving skills.
•     Ability to maintain an active session without disrupting ongoing tasks in tabs.

This role is ideal for individuals who are detail-oriented and enjoy building innovative solutions for browser automation challenges.

title: Inside Sales Research Analyst
description:
Job Summary: 

Smoothstack IS our commercial sales team and, therefore, we are looking for enthusiastic and motivated individuals with strong business acumen and exceptional sales ability to join our sales team as an Inside Sales Research Analyst. To be successful in this role, you must have strong interpersonal and sales skills, be able to multi-task, and thrive on working in a fast-paced environment; as an Inside Sales Research Analyst, you will be responsible for determining who we prospect to, and what are the reasons we are reaching out. If you have proven experience prospecting and exceeding quota — we want you! 

Responsibilities: 
- Create key lists for us to prospect, consult, and sell business solutions and related services to prospective new commercial business customers. 
- Work with your sellers to understand our service offerings, and customer needs and determine how the Smoothstack solution can best address their issues, and with whom. 
- Create call plans and lists to engage with prospective clients to position solutions via customer meetings. 
- Assist in developing a strategic territory plan to sign new industry customers and hit your monthly, quarterly, and annual targets. You must be comfortable with working quickly 
- Work with marketing to develop and execute drip and fill ABM campaigns 

 Requirements: 
- 0-3 years of sales experience 
- Tenacious and extremely results-driven. You want to be at the top of the leader board and hate losing. 
- Demonstrated aptitude in acquiring/applying industry expertise successfully in sales cycles. 
- Research and communication skills. You know how to communicate what matters and ask the right questions to find the right solution for your customers. 
- You care about creating value for your customers and finding the ones who really need our help 

Physical Requirements: 
- Prolonged periods sitting at a desk and working on a computer.

title: C# Developer
description:
Job Title: C# Developer - POS Integrated Card Reader Integration

Location: Butuan City / Remote

Job Type: Project Based

Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled and experienced C# developer to join our team and assist in the integration of a card reader with our existing POS application. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience working with hardware integration, payment systems, and POS software development.

Key Responsibilities:
Work closely with the development team to integrate a card reader (EMV/NFC) with our POS software.
Write clean, maintainable, and efficient C# code to facilitate communication between the POS system and the card reader hardware.
Implement secure payment processing flows, including encryption and tokenization, to ensure PCI compliance.
Troubleshoot and debug integration issues, ensuring compatibility between different hardware and software environments.
Collaborate with QA engineers to create and execute test plans for card reader functionality and integration.
Provide ongoing support and updates to ensure smooth operation and security of the card reader integration.
Stay up to date with the latest industry standards for payment systems and card reader integration.

Required Skills & Qualifications:
Proficiency in C# and .NET Framework/Core.
Hands-on experience with hardware integration, particularly card readers, POS devices, or payment terminals.
Familiarity with payment protocols such as EMV, NFC, and card payment APIs.
Knowledge of security practices and standards (e.g., PCI DSS) for handling sensitive payment data.
Strong understanding of RESTful APIs and how to integrate them with third-party systems.
Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.
Ability to work collaboratively in a team-oriented environment.

Preferred Skills:
Experience with payment gateway APIs (e.g., Stripe, PayPal, Square, etc.).
Knowledge of Windows communication protocols (e.g., USB, COM ports) for interfacing with POS hardware.
Experience working with databases (SQL Server, MySQL) to store transaction data.
Familiarity with Agile development methodologies.
Previous experience in a POS or financial software environment.

Benefits:
Competitive salary based on experience.
Flexible working hours and remote work options.
Opportunities for career growth and advancement.
Health and wellness benefits.
Collaborative and supportive team environment.

How to Apply:
If you are excited about this opportunity and believe you have the skills we are looking for, please submit your resume, cover letter, and any relevant work samples (e.g., GitHub, portfolio) to it@fivepints.com. In your cover letter, be sure to highlight your experience with card reader integrations and payment systems.

We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Job Title: Business Operations Specialist (Short-Term/Gig Job)
description:
Company Overview:
We are an agency providing solutions in the business and education sectors. Our mission is to create streamlined operations, enhance team productivity, and achieve business growth through effective workflows and accountability systems.

Position Overview:
We are seeking a skilled Business Operations Specialist for a short-term or gig-based position. The ideal candidate will bring experience in managing business operations, implementing workflows, setting sales goals, building accountability systems, and managing virtual staff. The role involves working with a team based in the Philippines, and expertise in addressing the challenges of working across a 13-hour time difference is essential.

Key Responsibilities:
 • Design and implement workflows and automations to improve efficiency and team productivity
 • Develop accountability systems to track team performance and align with business goals
 • Assist in setting and monitoring sales goals and performance metrics
 • Provide guidance and strategies for managing virtual staff effectively
 • Identify operational challenges and propose actionable solutions
 • Document processes and workflows to ensure clarity and consistency
 • Support leadership in creating a cohesive and well-organized operational framework

Qualifications:
 • Proven experience in business operations, process improvement, or team management
 • Experience with workflow design, task management, and automations (e.g., Zapier, ClickUp, Asana, Trello)
 • Strong organizational and problem-solving skills
 • Familiarity with virtual team management, especially across multiple time zones
 • Excellent communication and leadership skills
 • Availability to work flexible hours to accommodate the time difference with the Philippines
 • Experience in sales goal setting and tracking is a plus

Compensation:
Pay is negotiable based on experience.

Application Process:
To apply for this position, candidates MUST complete all three of the following steps:
 1. Submit a resume outlining relevant experience.
 2. Submit a cover letter detailing your experience in business operations, managing virtual teams, and implementing workflows or automations.
 3. Submit a link to a newly created video introduction where you:
 • State the current date (to verify it’s a new video).
 • Explain your approach to improving business operations and managing virtual teams.
 • Highlight your experience with implementing workflows, automations, and accountability systems.

Important Application Instructions:
 • Applications must be submitted through the following link: https://bit.ly/4130RpL
 • Applications submitted directly on other platforms will not be considered.
 • Do not apply if you do not complete all requirements as described above.
 • Old video introductions or videos that do not include the required components will not be considered.

We look forward to reviewing your application and seeing how your expertise in business operations can support our team’s success!

title: Automation & Workflow Expert for Growing Moving Company  (CRM, Slack, Zapier Integration)
description:
We are a fast-growing moving company in Toronto with ambitious goals to scale and streamline our operations. To support our growth, we’re looking for an Automation & Workflow Strategist to help us lay the foundation for an efficient, automated workflow. This role starts as a part-time gig but has the potential to grow into a full-time position as we scale.

The initial phase will focus on brainstorming, research, and planning to recommend the best CRM for our business needs. We know MoveIt Pro could be a future CRM option, but due to its higher monthly costs, we want to start with a cost-effective solution and plan for an upgrade.

You’ll also help integrate tools like Slack, Zapier, and potentially Make.com, to automate tasks and streamline operations. If you love solving operational challenges and creating workflows that scale with growth, this is the role for you!

title: Airbnb Resolution Specialist
description:
We are seeking a detail-oriented and proactive Airbnb Resolution Specialist to join our team. This role focuses entirely on managing Airbnb resolutions to ensure accurate and timely payouts for Aircover requests for our properties. You will be responsible for reviewing cases, submitting evidence, and following up on claims to secure the best outcomes for our business. The role requires strong collaboration with other team members to gather evidence, ensure reports are accurate, and maintain thorough internal documentation and records.

Key Responsibilities:
- Handle all Airbnb resolution cases with precision and efficiency.
- Collect and organize evidence to support claims, including photos, receipts, and communication logs.
- Collaborate with other team members to ensure reports, cleaning logs, maintenance records, and other necessary documentation are completed and available.
- Maintain accurate and detailed internal records of all resolution cases, including documentation of claims, outcomes, and correspondence.
- Submit and monitor resolution requests through Airbnb's platform.
- Communicate professionally with Airbnb support teams to advocate for fair outcomes.
- Track and report on resolution success rates, payouts, and case trends.

Qualifications:
- Strong attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines.
- Excellent English communication skills, both written and verbal.
- Ability to work collaboratively with a remote team to gather required information.
- Highly organized with strong record-keeping and documentation skills.
- Familiarity with Airbnb policies and procedures is a plus. Likewise familiarity with Asana. 
- Self-motivated and capable of managing a dynamic workload.

Work Schedule:
This role requires a commitment of 40 hours per week, with a flexible roster that may shift depending on workload demands. There will also be opportunities for overtime if you wish to take on additional hours.

If you're interested please reply with a copy of your resume attached. We'll be in touch with next steps if we're interested.

title: Virtual Assistant for Lead Generation and Outreach
description:
Job Description
We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to manage and execute all lead generation and outreach activities across multiple business verticals. The ideal candidate will be responsible for identifying, engaging, and converting leads through various channels, including LinkedIn, email, cold calling, and digital marketing. This role requires a strategic thinker with excellent communication skills who can consistently deliver results.
________________________________________

1. Lead Generation & Management

? WFG (World Financial Group): Attract individuals interested in financial services and recruiting opportunities.
? Assisted Living Solutions: Generate leads for memory care and residential assisted living services.
? Medical Billing Services: Identify healthcare providers with revenue cycle management needs.
o Research, compile, and manage targeted lead lists.
2. LinkedIn Outreach
o Create and execute personalized LinkedIn connection requests and follow-ups.
o Develop and optimize LinkedIn campaigns to attract prospects in relevant industries, such as engineers, nurses, and healthcare professionals.
3. Cold Email Outreach
o Draft and manage email campaigns focused on engaging prospects and driving interest.
o A/B test subject lines, messaging, and formats for optimal response rates.
4. Cold Calling & Appointment Setting

o Maintain a professional and engaging phone presence to nurture leads.
5. Digital Marketing Lead Generation
o Design and implement online campaigns, including Facebook ads, Google ads, and retargeting strategies.
o Analyze campaign performance and suggest improvements to optimize ROI.
6. CRM Management & Reporting
o Maintain accurate records of all outreach efforts in CRM systems.
o Generate weekly reports to track KPIs and campaign success.

Qualifications

• Familiarity with CRM systems (e.g., GoHighLevel, HubSpot, Salesforce, or similar).
• Strong written and verbal communication skills.
• Self-starter with the ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
• Excellent organizational and multitasking abilities.
• Familiarity with financial services, healthcare, or assisted living industries is a plus.
________________________________________
Why Join Us?
• Work across diverse industries and hone your expertise in lead generation.
• Flexible working hours with a remote setup.
• Opportunity to contribute to innovative and impactful businesses.
• Competitive pay with performance-based bonuses.
________________________________________
How to Apply
Interested candidates should submit their resume and a cover letter outlining their experience and approach to lead generation. Please include "Virtual Assistant Application – Lead Generation" in the subject line. info@provimarketing.com

title: Customer Support Representative
description:
Note: This is a remote role, our team is based in Melbourne, Australia.

About Us:
Termina (formerly Threadlet) is a fast-growing energy consulting firm that partners with small and medium-sized businesses like Betty’s Burgers and Crest Dry Cleaners to help them secure the most competitive electricity and gas rates. We leverage our extensive knowledge of the energy market and group buying power to secure better-than-market deals for our clients, monitoring rates from over 37 energy retailers. For more about us, visit termina.io.

Role Overview:
We are looking for a Customer Support Representative to join our dynamic team. This role is perfect for someone who thrives in a fast-paced, start-up environment and enjoys taking ownership of diverse responsibilities. As part of a small, collaborative team, you’ll step in wherever needed, with a focus on clarifying invoices, addressing customer concerns, and delivering swift resolutions.
You will play a key role in managing invoice-related tickets, ensuring customers have a clear understanding of their invoices, and coordinating with internal and external stakeholders to address client concerns effectively.

Key Responsibilities:
- Ticket Management:
* Manage invoicing-related tickets, ensuring timely and accurate resolution of customer queries.
* Handle meter upgrade requests and coordinate with relevant teams to facilitate the process efficiently.
* Monitor and prioritize tickets, ensuring no customer concern is overlooked.
- Customer Engagement:
* Proactively engage with small business owners over the phone to resolve outstanding issues, clarify invoice details, and provide guidance on next steps.
* Maintain a customer-first approach by providing clear, empathetic, and professional communication.
* Direct clients to the appropriate teams or departments when additional expertise is required.
- Problem-Solving and Issue Resolution:
* Address and resolve internal issues that may impact customer satisfaction or operational efficiency.
* Collaborate with both internal and external stakeholders to investigate and resolve customer concerns.
- Process Improvement:
* Identify recurring issues and recommend solutions to improve the efficiency of support workflows.
*Contribute to refining customer support processes to enhance the overall client experience.
- Team Collaboration:
* Support the broader team by assisting with cross-functional tasks and projects as needed.
* Actively share insights and feedback to foster a culture of continuous improvement.

Key Requirements:
- Proven experience in a customer support role, preferably within a fast-paced or start-up environment.
- Strong problem-solving skills, with the ability to think critically and adapt to different situations.
- Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to explain complex information clearly to small business owners.
- Comfortable using customer support tools and ticketing systems (e.g., Zendesk, Freshdesk, or similar).
- Ability to analyze and interpret invoices or billing information accurately.
- Availability to make and take calls directly with small business owners as needed.
- Familiarity with invoicing, meter upgrades, or energy-related services is an plus but not mandatory.

Why Join Termina?
* Growth Opportunity: As a start-up, Termina offers plenty of opportunities to grow and take on new responsibilities across the business.
* Flexible Environment: We believe in work-life balance and provide a supportive, flexible work environment.
* Impact: Your work will have a direct impact on the success of the company, as we continue to expand and help businesses save on energy costs.

How to Apply:?Please send your resume and a cover letter outlining your experience and why you'd be a great fit for this role

description:
Clix Dental’s Mission: “To Empower Dental Practice Owners to Achieve Their Dream Goals.”

We’re not interested in average. We’re on the hunt for the best of the best. If you’re an experienced Facebook Ad Manager/Media Buyer with a proven track record of generating exceptional ROI, then this might just be the career move you’ve been waiting for.

At Clix Dental, we don’t just deliver results — we exceed expectations. Our goal is to be the long-term growth partner for dental practices across the UK, helping them build thriving businesses. If you’re obsessed with paid advertising and driven by seeing your strategies transform clients' businesses, read on.

Who We’re Looking For: Only Top Talent with Proven Results

We’re looking for someone who:

- Lives and breathes Meta ads: You’ve been in the trenches managing and scaling high-budget Facebook and Instagram campaigns, and you know the platform inside out.
- Delivers Results, Period: You have a track record of producing outstanding results for clients — not just once, but consistently.
- Thinks Strategically, Acts Decisively: You can diagnose a campaign’s weaknesses at a glance and know exactly what to do to fix it.
- Is Relentlessly Driven by Performance: Good isn’t good enough. You’re always striving for higher CTRs, lower CPLs, and ultimately, superior ROI.
- Is Self-Sufficient & Proactive: You don’t wait to be told what to do. You identify opportunities, anticipate challenges, and solve them independently.

Your Role: Drive High-Impact Results for Our Dental Clients

- Create, optimize, and scale paid advertising campaigns on Facebook and Instagram.
- Analyze campaign data daily to fine-tune performance and maximize ROI.
- Innovate new strategies to generate consistent, high-quality leads for our clients.
- Handle troubleshooting and fix any issues in campaigns and back-end systems without missing a beat.
- Collaborate with our tight-knit team to continuously optimize our client fulfillment process.
- Assist in automation using tools like Zapier and GoHighLevel to enhance efficiency.

What You’ll Bring to the Table:

- 3+ years of experience managing paid Meta advertising with a proven portfolio of successful campaigns.
- Expert-level knowledge of Facebook Ads Manager and advanced targeting strategies.
- Experience working with lead generation campaigns, particularly in high-ticket industries.
- Proven ability to scale ad accounts while maintaining profitable ROAS.
- Strong grasp of automation tools like Zapier, Slack, and GoHighLevel.
- Exceptional English communication skills, both written and spoken.
- Ability to work independently and thrive in a remote environment with minimal supervision.

What’s in It for You:

- Premium Compensation: Starting between $800-$1200 USD per month (based on experience), with quick performance-based raises.
- 100% Remote: Work from anywhere in the world.
- Opportunity to work with a fast-growing, results-driven agency where only top performers thrive.
- Access to advanced training and resources to sharpen your skills.
- A chance to be part of a company that values excellence, innovation, and results.

How to Apply: We’re Only Interested in A-Players

- If you have a proven track record of producing exceptional results with Meta ads and are ready to join a team that values your expertise, then we want to hear from you.
- Complete our application here: https://api.leadconnectorhq.com/widget/form/lJFJLuTXdIcAilGWzdcA
- Select Ads Manager/Media Buyer on the application form.
- Be ready to showcase your results. We want to see real metrics, real case studies, and real proof of your success.

???? This position is not for everyone. We’re only interested in the best. If that’s you, apply now and show us why you’re the A-player we’re looking for.

P.S. If you’re not confident in your ability to drive transformative results, this isn’t the role for you. But if you’re up for the challenge, we can’t wait to see what you can do.

title: Virtual Assistant for Growing Real Estate Media Company
description:
About Us:
Elevate is a real estate media company founded by Luke Andersen, providing photos, videos, and other media services to real estate agents in California. After over 11 years in the industry, Luke decided to start his own venture to gain more flexibility, especially to spend more time with his 2-year-old daughter. As the business continues to grow, we're looking to bring on a dedicated Virtual Assistant who can help manage key tasks. We need someone reliable, detail-oriented, and ready to grow with us.

Position Overview:
We are looking for a Virtual Assistant to begin by focusing on quality control from 8-10am PST Tuesday-Saturday, ensuring the final media products meet our standards before being delivered to clients. The VA will work closely with our editing team to communicate requests and submit media. As you become familiar with our workflow, you'll have the opportunity to take on additional responsibilities such as social media management, client communication, and general administrative support. The ideal candidate will be available during 8-10am PST to start, but also free to eventually expand their hours to 4pm PST. There is room for growth as the company expands so we’re seeking someone with patience who is willing to take on more responsibility over time.

Key Responsibilities:
- Perform quality control on photos and videos before client delivery
- Communicate editing requests to photo and video editors.
- Help with social media content planning and scheduling
- Manage client communication and assist with scheduling
- Provide general administrative support as needed
- Contribute ideas to improve workflow and client service

What We’re Looking For:
- First and foremost - someone with EXCELLENT and PROMPT communication.
- Someone able to work 8-10am PST to start. And ideally be able to expand into additional hours throughout the day until around 4pm PST.
- Someone available to work Tuesday through Saturday.
- Strong organizational and time management skills
- Attention to detail, especially for quality control
- Ability to adapt and take on new responsibilities as the company grows
- Proactive, reliable, and able to work independently
- Familiarity with social media management or real estate services is a plus, but not required

Important: Please send us a custom video recording *VIA GOOGLE DRIVE LINK* answering the following four questions:
1. Tell us about yourself. Who are you, and what do you enjoy doing?
2. Why do you want to work with Elevate? What stood out to you about this opportunity?
3. Tell us about your work experience.
4. What hours (Pacific Standard Time) and days of the week are you available?

Submissions without video recordings will NOT be considered.

In addition to the video, please submit your resume and to prove you've read this entire job posting, include the phrase "I love photography" in your application.

We look forward to hearing from you!

Thanks,
~ Luke
sdelevatemedia.com/

title: Virtual Assistant
description:
High Revs Marketing is seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to provide remote administrative and marketing support. You will wear many hats, assisting our team with a variety of tasks to help us grow our business and elevate our client's brands.

Responsibilities:
Administrative Support:
Manage email and assign tasks, responding professionally and efficiently.
Prepare documents (proposals, procedure manuals, etc.) using project management tools.

Marketing Support:
Assist with social media content creation and scheduling for various platforms (Facebook, Instagram, Google My Business, etc.) based on our brand strategy.  Includes Reels, Stories, Videos and Images. 
Administer Facebook and Instagram advertising (create, monitor, analyze and report, etc.)
Conduct research on industry trends and competitor analysis.
Monitor and manage online reviews and respond to customer feedback.
Assist with email marketing campaigns (design, scheduling, and reporting).
Build automation sequences (Website, ActiveCampaign, MailChimp and Google Drive platforms).
Manage and update website content (may require basic CMS knowledge).

Additional Responsibilities:
Proactively identify and suggest ways to streamline processes and improve efficiency.
Maintain a high level of confidentiality and professionalism with all client communications.
Stay up-to-date on the latest marketing tools and trends.

Qualifications:
Minimum 2 years of experience as a Virtual Assistant or similar role.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.
Strong organizational and time management skills with the ability to prioritize tasks effectively.
Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and Google Suite (Gmail, Docs, Sheets).
Familiarity with social media management platforms (Meta Business Manager - knowing PromoRepublic is a plus).
Strong attention to detail and a commitment to accuracy.
Ability to work independently with minimal supervision and manage multiple tasks at once.
Excellent internet connectivity and a dedicated workspace with minimal distractions.
Must have a high level of proficiency in Canva. 

Bonus Points:
Industry knowledge of ten-pin bowling.
Experience with marketing automation tools (ActiveCampaign, Mailchimp, ConstantContact, etc.).
Must have experience with graphic design software (Canva) Bonus if experience within the Adobe Creative Suite - Adobe Illustrator or Photoshop, etc.
Experience with Project-based software (Asana)
Knowledge of SEO best practices.
Understanding of the digital marketing landscape.

Benefits:
Competitive compensation (based on experience).
Flexible work schedule (full-time or part-time considered).
Opportunity to work for a growing and dynamic company.
Be part of a supportive and collaborative team.

To Apply:
Please submit your resume and a cover letter explaining why you're interested in this position and how your skills and experience can benefit High Revs Marketing.

title: Executive Assistant to Grace - Looking for a Unicorn!
description:
Here’s a quick video introducing the job and the client! https://www.loom.com/share/0c44788392b540e5ac7a4c7bac35aff8?sid=7570d270-c473-4faa-b2fc-602ed0bb7439 

I’m Rhino Julie, and I LOVE building super teams to service our clients' needs.

If you love a challenge, love problem solving, love working with others (and also love working by yourself LOL), and it makes you happy when you overdeliver for clients, I want you on my team!

My promise to you:
*I provide a FUN working environment.
*We are constantly learning new things.
*We are a team who wants to be the best at what we do, which means you have the BEST teammates.
*I ALWAYS pay on time.
*I treat all of my team members with respect and love.

Client Overview:
*Grace is an executive coach and a consummate professional. She is looking for a unicorn who can help her with administrative tasks so she can work on her zone of genius!

Client Requirements:
*Must be able to work any 2-hour block from 9am-5pm Eastern Time (US)
*Must be able to work 10 hours weekly, and if everything goes well, your hours will increase!
*Must have experience with executive/administrative assistance or any similar role
*Must have excellent verbal and written communication skills
*Must be super organized with high attention to detail
*Detail-oriented with a commitment to quality control
*Must be an independent thinker with strong problem-solving skills

Software tools used by the client:
*Google Suite
*Microsoft Suite
*DocuSign
*InvoiceHub.com
*Fathom
*Zoom
*Microsoft PowerPoint/Google Slides

Responsibilities/Tasks:
*Prepare and update engagement agreements using DocuSign, ensure each document reflects current dates and details
*Use Fathom to review transcripts of coaching sessions and organize session notes into client-specific folders in Google Drive and Docs.
*Manage Grace's calendar, schedule appointments, coordinate and organize dates for coaching sessions 
*Use AI tools to analyze session notes and identify recurring themes and insights that can guide future coaching sessions
*Research and implement automation tools 
*Create PowerPoint/Google Slide presentations
*Create social media content from Grace's articles, coaching sessions, and calls
*Identify opportunities to streamline administrative processes
*Brainstorm with Grace and suggest ideas for operational improvements


---------

If you know in your heart this job is for you, please apply on our super quick application system by clicking here: https://app.loxo.co/job/MjUwMTMtamhnN2U0Z2V5ZnQ4MHhyZw== 

You only have to apply for one job through our portal, and then you can email us if you want to be considered for additional positions.

We have many positions available, so even if this one isn't a perfect fit, if you are a hard worker who loves learning and pays attention to the details, we will probably have something else available for you!

----------------

Our super cool hiring process:

*We have real people communicating with you and looking at your application!
*We PAY you to take a Paid Test for the client you're applying for to make sure you like the job and you have the skills for it. 
*At any time, you can check out the other clients we have and ask to take Paid Tests for them, as well!

Please note that there is a 1-time Profile that you will help us fill out before the Paid Test. This profile will be sent to our clients, along with your Paid Test results. We value you as a person, and we value your time. Once you're in with Rhino Squad, you're IN, and you have lots of job opportunities available to you. So we appreciate your help in preparing your details to present to our clients.

IMPORTANT: Do not book on Rhino Julie's client booking page, this causes our potential clients to be unable to book sales calls with her. We love your enthusiasm, but Rhino Julie's job is to get clients for our virtual assistants to get their dream jobs. Our recruitment team’s job is to take care of our applicants and help them match with their dream job. So, please apply here for your dream job and we will invite you for an interview if your qualifications match the job you're interested in. We cannot stress how important it is to leave her calendar open for her client calls.

title: Financial Officer for Amazon FBA Ecommerce Store
description:
Key Responsibilities:
Financial Strategy and Planning:
• Develop and execute long-term financial plans to support company growth and mitigate risks.
• Provide actionable strategies for increasing profitability and achieving business objectives.

Budgeting and Forecasting:
• Create and manage budgets to maintain financial health and operational efficiency.
• Forecast future revenue, expenses, and cash flow to guide strategic decision-making.

Detailed Financial Analysis:
• Analyze all expenses, profit margins, and cost of goods sold (COGS).
• Break down and report key financial metrics, including gross and net profit margins.

Financial Reporting and Insights:
• Deliver clear, comprehensive financial reports on a regular basis.
• Translate complex financial data into actionable insight.

Customer Acquisition Cost Analysis:
• Accurately calculate the cost of acquiring customers on various platforms.
• Implement strategies to reduce acquisition costs while maintaining growth.

Profitability Optimization and Cost Management:
• Identify opportunities to improve profitability and reduce unnecessary costs.
• Provide recommendations for pricing strategies and product profitability optimization.

Comparative and Trend Analysis:
• Compare financial performance over time to identify trends and areas for improvement.
• Highlight actionable insights based on historical and current data.

Capital Planning and Fundraising:
• Advise on capital allocation for new projects and growth initiatives.
• Support efforts to secure funding or manage investor relations.

Process and System Optimization:
• Recommend and implement tools or software to enhance financial tracking and reporting.
• Improve financial processes to streamline operations and reduce inefficiencies.

Strategic Decision Support:
• Provide financial insights to guide major decisions, including product launches, pricing strategies, and market expansion.
• Offer data-driven advice on hiring, scaling, and operational adjustments.
________________________________________
Qualifications:
• Proven experience as a CFO, Financial Analyst, or similar role, preferably in eCommerce or Amazon FBA businesses.
• Strong understanding of eCommerce financial metrics, including advertising costs, COGS, and ROI.
• Expertise in financial modeling, forecasting, and budgeting.
• Proficiency with financial tools such as Microsoft Excel, QuickBooks, and business intelligence platforms.
• Exceptional analytical skills and the ability to interpret complex financial data.
• Strong communication skills to present financial insights effectively to team
________________________________________
Preferred Skills:
• Familiarity with Amazon tools like Seller Central, Helium 10, Sellerboard or other Saas Tools.
• Knowledge of advanced financial strategies for inventory and scaling eCommerce businesses.

title: Python Tutor
description:
[Python Tutor Positions Available - Online Coding Academy]

We are seeking qualified tutors to join our online coding academy based in the United States.
Our mission is to provide high-quality programming education to U.S. students aged 12-18, focusing on fundamental concepts of Python.


[Job Description]

- Position: Python Tutor
- Location/Working hours: Remote (Classes are conducted online, and we match tutors with students based on the tutor's availability.)
- Type: Any


[Qualifications]

- Strong command of English:
   Fluency required for effective communication with American students

- Proficiency in Python programming:
   Tutors should be able to teach Python to students according to the provided class materials. As all class materials are provided by the academy, the required level of Python knowledge for tutors need not be highly advanced.

- Competencies needed for tutoring services:
   - Experience in teaching or mentoring preferred
   - Patience and ability to explain complex concepts in simple terms
   - Excellent communication and interpersonal skills

- Reliable internet connection and comfortable with online teaching platforms


[Application Process]

- How to Apply
   - Interested candidates should reply to this posting with:
        A brief introduction highlighting your relevant skills and experience
        Your availability for a brief interview via Zoom call
        Any questions you may have about the position

   - Upon confirmation

        Initially, you'll have one or two students, with potential for more.

We look forward to hearing from passionate educators ready to inspire young minds in the world of programming.

title: Fund Accountant
description:
Please include your resume in your application via a Google Drive, OneDrive, or Dropbox link.

If we make an offer, we do not allow you to do work for another employer.

We are a fintech startup in the United States. We're looking to hire a fund accountant to help us manage our clients' day to day books for assigned investment funds. The accountant will be responsible for daily cash, account, and investments position reconciliations to ensure all transactions are properly captured.

In addition, the fund accountant will be required to escalate any issues to the US Head of Accounting and Finance on daily calls and updates.

Basic tasks will include:

--Reconcile cash, accounts, and investment positions then promptly researching and correcting any variances for subsequent review
--Completing NAV calculations for subsequent review
--Valuation reconciliations to ensure proper pricing for investments and communicating any problems to management
--Reviewing transactions, expenses, contributions, distributions and drawdowns of funds for accuracy
--Record accurately, and in accordance with the Department policies and procedures, such accounting records as securities positions, corporate actions related, and journal entries
--Upholding processes for external and internal communications/demands
--Assist, as assigned, in preparing audit schedules, compliance reports, tax returns, financial statements, or other reports
--Participate in regular rotation of trade processing and other accounting processes to prepare the fund accounting system for the next day
--Any ad hoc requests

A fund accountant will ideally have some of the following qualifications and skills:
--A professional who can meet deadlines and willing to work to get the job done.
--CPA\CMA qualification
--Bachelor’s degree in accounting or finance; Master's degree a bonus
--Prior audit or accounting experience at a Big 4 or large accounting firm
--Ideally, two to three years of accounting experience working in real estate, debt funds, hedge funds, crypto fund, or private equity.
--US GAAP experience
--Intermediate Excel/Google Sheets skills
--In order to be a good fit for the role, it’s important for professionals to have some or all of the following traits:
--Professional and take accountability for their work
--Good interpersonal skills
--Demonstrated organizational skills
--Good time management skills
--Excellent attention to detail
--Ability to multitask and work under pressure

title: Manage Instagram cold DM outbound campaign for business
description:

Set up and manage multiple Instagram accounts for cold DM outreach.
Implement bots or automation tools to send a high volume of DMs daily.
Help test openers and messaging sequences
Monitor conversations and manually respond to promising leads, as needed.
Keep track of progress and provide detailed updates and performance metrics.

Requirements:
Experience with Instagram cold DM campaigns and lead generation.
Strong knowledge of Instagram automation tools and best practices.
Self-motivated, detail-oriented, and able to work independently while taking feedback effectively.


Preferred Skills:
Familiarity with sequencing and lead nurturing through DMs.
Strong communication and organizational skills.

Tools and budget to support the campaign setup and management.

title: Spa Marketing & Client Coordinator

title: Assistant Property Manager
description:
EIG Property Management is based in Minneapolis, MN. We manage 1,400 apartment rental units in the Twin Cities. We are seeking a full-time remote Virtual Assistant Property Manager to join our great team! As a Virtual Assistant Property Manager, you will be the primary point of contact for our residents, answering calls, offering tenant support, supporting the on-the-ground property managers, and assisting with various administrative tasks.

The preferred candidate will be a go-getter, willing to work hard, learn new tasks, and be a dedicated and reliable team member. We are looking for one dedicated individual that can work 40-55 hours per week. Generally, the hours are Monday to Friday about 7AM to 5PM US Central, and would include some weekend work. We are not looking for an agency or someone working another job during our business hours.

Responsibilities:
- Coordinate move-ins and move-outs.
- Manage lease renewals
- Draft leases
- Administer electronic document signings
- Maintain property and tenant records.
- Receive and return phone calls and emails.
- Resolve tenant complaints or requests as appropriate and escalate them to the Property Manager.
- Communicate with 3rd party stakeholders
- Review inspection reports
- Call on delinquent tenants and prepare eviction filings.
- Prepare and review rental listings
- Download data and complete data entry tasks
- Communicate with caretakers and review their work
- Maintain parking records
The above is not an exhaustive list.

Job Requirements
- Excellent English speaking and writing ability.
- Technology Requirements: strong consistent internet and electricity, 2 screens, 10-key on your keyboard, headset.
- As this is a work-from-home setup, you must have a quiet working environment anytime you are clocked in for work.
- US Central Time hours as scheduled, generally an 8-10 hour day Monday to Friday between 7AM and 5PM, plus there will likely be a 4-6 hour shift on the weekend, or a general expectations that you will fulfill some work duties on the weekend..

Qualifications:
- Preferred 4-year university degree
- Preferred previous experience in property management
- Preferred experience with Google Workspace, particularly with Google Sheets and/or MS Excel,

Application Requirements
If you are interested in applying, please include the following in your job application submission:
1. A custom audio or video recording. Please take 1 to 4 minutes to share why you are interested in the position, or a quick summary of your experience and qualifications.
2. Confirmation that you are not an agency.
3. Attach a PDF of your resume.
4. Confirm that you plan to conduct the interview with the same quality of computer and equipment that you would bring to the job, including webcam, headset, strong computer. During the interview, you will need to be on video and you will need to share your desktop for a brief spreadsheet exercise.

title: Fundraising and Business Development Virtual Assistant (Full-Time)
description:
Job Description: Fundraising and Business Development Virtual Assistant (Full-Time)
Pay: $300 every two weeks, with commission opportunities for awarded grants and partnerships.

Type: Remote, Full-Time

Reports to: Danielle White

About the Role:
We are seeking a highly motivated and resourceful Virtual Assistant for a full-time role with expertise in fundraising, grant writing, and business development. The ideal candidate will have a background in AI, healthcare, or education, strong organizational skills, and a productive mindset to support the growth of our Foundation and administrative needs.

This position is fully remote, but it requires a stable internet connection and availability for regular collaboration on Google Meet. The candidate must also be proficient in Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Drive, etc.) and have the ability to use these tools to streamline tasks and projects.

Our Services:
We offer a wide range of healthcare training programs designed to fast-track individuals into critical healthcare roles. Our Phlebotomy, Medical Assistant, and Mental Health Technician certifications are renowned for their quality and efficiency, providing students with the tools they need to succeed in just weeks, not years. We also offer Corporate Biometric Screening services and clinical trials to support both individual and organizational healthcare needs.

Our Scholarship Foundation is committed to providing scholarships for students in need, empowering them to pursue careers in healthcare. This allows us to create educational opportunities for those looking to make a difference in the field.

Key Responsibilities:
Fundraising and Grant Writing

Research and identify grant opportunities aligned with our mission.
Write, prepare, and submit compelling grant applications.
Develop and maintain relationships with donors, sponsors, and funding organizations.
Track and report on grant progress and outcomes.
Business Development

Identify and pursue partnership opportunities with corporate sponsors, healthcare organizations, and educational institutions.
Prepare proposals and presentations to secure contracts and sponsorships.
Manage relationships with stakeholders to ensure ongoing collaboration and support.
Foundation Administration

Coordinate fundraising events and campaigns to support the Scholarship Foundation.
Maintain donor records and manage CRM databases.
Assist with day-to-day operations of the Foundation, including scheduling and correspondence.
Bookkeeping & Financial Tracking

Record and monitor Foundation finances, including donations, grants, and expenses.
Generate financial reports and assist with budget preparation.
Ensure accurate documentation of transactions and compliance with funding guidelines.
General Support

Provide administrative support, including email drafting, meeting scheduling, and file organization.
Participate in daily Google Meet sessions to discuss progress and priorities.
Ensure timely completion of tasks and consistently meet deadlines.
AI Expertise

Utilize AI tools and technologies to streamline administrative tasks and improve efficiency.
Support AI-related projects and contribute innovative solutions for process automation.
Qualifications:
Experience: Minimum of 2 years in fundraising, grant writing, business development, or a similar role.
AI Expertise: Strong understanding of AI technologies and how they can be leveraged to improve operations and productivity.
Skills:
Strong writing and communication abilities for crafting grant applications and donor outreach.
Excellent organizational skills and a proactive, productive mindset.
Proficiency in bookkeeping software (QuickBooks or similar).
Advanced proficiency in Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Drive, etc.).
Tech-savvy with experience in using CRM tools, online collaboration platforms, and AI-powered tools.
Other Requirements:
Stable internet connection and ability to work remotely without interruptions.
Availability for daily meetings on Google Meet.
What We Offer:
Compensation: $300 bi-weekly with opportunities for commission on awarded grants and contracts.
Growth Opportunities: Potential for increased responsibilities and rewards based on performance.
Impact: Be part of a team committed to making a difference in healthcare education and access.
Ready to make an impact?

title: Order Management Lead - Remote Based
description:
APPLY HERE: bit.ly/4ckHyva (Applications not submitted via this form will not be reviewed.)

Job Description

We're seeking a highly capable and proactive Operations Lead to join our dynamic team at HiEnd Accents. This role is critical in ensuring seamless order management and operational excellence across our organization. The ideal candidate will be a problem-solver with strong leadership skills and a track record of driving operational efficiency.

What You’ll Do

- Oversee and optimize the entire order management process, from intake to fulfillment, including:
- Bringing in customer orders from various sources (portals, EDI, emails, faxes)
- Confirming and making changes to orders in the ERP system
- Releasing orders/backorders for shipping and organizing for easy picking
- Creating delivery slips, invoicing shipped orders, and managing EDI documents
- Uploading shipping and invoicing information to customer portals

- Lead and mentor the Order Management team, driving accountability and ensuring KPIs and SLAs are consistently met or exceeded.

- Manage key accounts with complex requirements, ensuring high customer satisfaction through:
- Responding to inquiries with same-day service
- Handling payment issues and order-related problems
- Providing information on inventory availability and product inquiries
- Phone outreach

- Proactively identify and resolve operational issues, developing and implementing solutions to prevent recurrence.

- Drive continuous improvement by:
- Analyzing operational data to identify trends and opportunities
- Collaborating cross-functionally to implement strategic changes
- Contributing to special projects aimed at improving performance and scalability

- Spearhead process documentation (SOP) creation, encompassing both refinement of existing procedures and development of new ones.

- Develop and maintain strong relationships with key stakeholders, including customers, vendors, and internal teams.

- Maintain accurate documentation of all actions, conversations, and issues using designated tools (e.g., Front and Airtable).

- Communicate effectively with the Warehouse team for shipment alignment.

- Perform other duties as assigned.

Who You Are

- A seasoned professional with 5+ years of experience in operations management, preferably in e-commerce or retail
- An experienced team manager
- Bachelor's degree in Business, Operations Management, or a related field
- Must have recent night shift (PH time) experience and willing to report to work during CST hours
- Proven track record of contributing to team success and driving operational excellence
- Expert in order management systems, EDI, and inventory management
- Strong analytical skills with the ability to translate data into actionable insights
- Excellent problem-solving skills with a solutions-oriented mindset
- Outstanding communication and interpersonal skills
- Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple priorities
- Proficient in MS Office suite, with advanced Excel skills
- Experience with ERP systems and process automation tools
- Experience with SAP is not a requirement but definitely a plus

Why HiEnd Accents?

Our small size and fast-paced culture reward people who act and think like owners. If you're someone who has a growth mentality, strives for exceptionalism, are a committed professional and a straight shooter, you'll fit in with our culture and go far with our company.

About HiEnd Accents

HiEnd Accents designs and creates everyday luxury bedding and linens, sheeting, decorative pillows and other home textiles. Founded in 2005 and based in Dallas, Texas, our mission is to elevate our customers' lives via beautifully designed home textiles that deliver quality and value. Our customers love our exceptional designs that span a diverse range of styles and our commitment to offering everyday luxury at accessible prices. We proudly serve a broad clientele, including department stores, furniture stores, boutique hotels, interior designers and retail customers. HiEnd Accents is based in Irving, Texas. Learn more about our brands at [www.hiendaccents.com/](http://www.hiendaccents.com/) and [www.paseoroad.com](http://www.paseoroad.com/).

title: Executive Operations Assistant
description:
Overview:
The Executive Operations Assistant will provide high-level administrative support to senior management and manage day-to-day office operations across multiple business entities. This role is crucial in maintaining efficient office processes, assisting with customer and vendor communications, and overseeing various administrative and operational duties. The ideal candidate will have exceptional organizational skills, attention to detail, and the ability to manage a diverse set of tasks with professionalism and independence.

Responsibilities:
ACCOUNTABILITY #1: Customer & Vendor Communications
Answer and direct phone calls and respond to customer inquiries (e.g., product availability, quotes, production updates).
Address and resolve customer complaints, escalating issues as necessary.
Coordinate with vendors to ensure timely payments, handle prepayments, and manage account statuses.
Objective of Customer & Vendor Communications: Ensure timely and effective communication with clients and vendors to maintain strong relationships and support business continuity.

ACCOUNTABILITY #2: Order Management & Invoicing
Manage order entry and invoicing processes as needed.
Coordinate with the finance team to ensure accurate and timely billing and follow up on past due invoices.
Handle any required documentation for order processing, including shipping details and customer inquiries.
Objective of Order Management & Invoicing: Facilitate efficient order processing and billing to maintain smooth operational workflows and optimize cash flow.

ACCOUNTABILITY #3: Inventory and Product Updates
Regularly update inventory information on internal systems and external platforms.
Manage product listings, including new product uploads, discontinued items, and adjustments on Sage and ESP.
Coordinate with internal teams to ensure up-to-date product information and manage related tasks on BusinessWorks and other ERP systems.
Objective of Inventory and Product Updates: Ensure accurate product data is maintained, enabling efficient inventory management and effective sales operations.

ACCOUNTABILITY #4: Office Management & General Administrative Duties
Act as the primary contact for daily office needs, including supply management and liaising with external vendors.
Coordinate routine maintenance and office IT support, including managing service requests for printers and other office equipment.
Assist with ad-hoc tasks as needed to support overall business operations.
Objective of Office Management & General Administrative Duties: Maintain a productive and organized office environment by managing resources, vendor relationships, and day-to-day office requirements.

ACCOUNTABILITY #5: Task, Email, and Calendar Management for CEO & President
Manage and organize the CEO’s and President’s (Dominic) calendar, including scheduling meetings, appointments, and travel arrangements.
Monitor and respond to emails on behalf of the CEO as required, prioritizing and categorizing communications for timely follow-up.
Assist with task management and follow-up on action items to ensure the CEO’s and President’s daily schedules run efficiently.
Objective of Task, Email, and Calendar Management: Provide seamless administrative support to the CEO and President, allowing them to focus on high-level strategic priorities by managing their daily tasks, communications, and scheduling needs.

Key Skills and Qualifications:

Proficiency in Written and Spoken English:
Exceptional proficiency in both written and spoken English is crucial for this role. Effective communication with US-based clients and employees is essential to maintain professionalism in all interactions.
Ability to articulate and convey technical information clearly to clients and teaUpgrade to see actual infombers.

Technical Proficiency:
Strong working knowledge of ERP systems, such as BusinessWorks, and experience with platforms like Sage and ESP for inventory and product updates.
Comfortable using CRM, task management software (e.g., Asana), and basic accounting tools.

Organizational and Multitasking Abilities:
Proven ability to manage multiple responsibilities, prioritize tasks, and complete work efficiently.
High attention to detail and strong organizational skills to handle administrative, billing, and reporting tasks effectively.

Problem-Solving Skills:
Ability to anticipate challenges and proactively seek solutions, particularly when managing customer and vendor inquiries or coordinating with internal teams.

Interpersonal Skills:
Demonstrates a positive attitude and professionalism in all interactions, with the ability to build strong relationships with teambers, vendors, and clients.

Education and Experience:
Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Communications, or a related field is preferred but not required.
Proven experience in administrative support roles, with a demonstrated ability to manage diverse responsibilities.

Preferred Qualifications:
Experience with ERP systems, particularly BusinessWorks or similar platforms.
Familiarity with Sage and ESP websites for product and pricing updates.
Competency in handling invoicing, billing, and order management processes.

title: Web & Graphic Designer needed for regular, ongoing work
description:
THE COMPANY
Avalon Creative Group is a well established and innovative content marketing agency based in the San Francisco Bay Area and Silicon Valley in California. We specialize in the creation of captivating and engaging content for corporate clients, offering comprehensive content design, production, and creative services.

Working with Avalon Creative Group is an exciting opportunity to join an award winning team of amazing designers, create content for renowned brands, and to expand your potential in a positive environment that encourages continuous learning for personal and professional growth.

JOB DESCRIPTION
Avalon Creative Group is seeking a talented and experienced graphic designer based in the Philippines to work with us as an independent contractor. Our goal is to establish a long term working relationship with the right designer. The right person will become an integral member of our creative team on a full-time basis.

RESPONSIBILITIES:
> Create graphic assets for corporate marketing campaigns, such as…
> Graphic ads for various social media channels
> Website design and banner ad creation
> Slide templates and presentations
> Print collateral
> Brand development
> Promotional materials and “swag” for corporate marketing events
> AI generated illustrations
> Layout and design for white papers

OTHER RESPONSIBILITIES WILL INCLUDE:
> Ensuring consistent application of brand and style guides across all assets created
> Organizing and managing graphic templates and asset libraries
> Documenting guidelines and process details for team members and clients

ENGAGEMENT DETAILS:
> The initial trial period will be a half-time, retainer engagement for 80 hours per month
- Hours per week may vary and unused hours may be carried over to the next month
> The engagement will be expanded to full-time as our workload justifies the need
(we anticipate that will be 2-3 months, possibly longer or shorter)
> This is a remote work position
> At least 50% of the work hours (maybe more) will need to overlap with standard business hours in California, with work starting at 4:00am GMT+8 or earlier, depending on client and internal needs
-See time zone comparison - drive.google.com/file/d/1J9KW_EerdE1suk6bSxbTTRxsR3Qy2I0p/view?usp=drive_link

COMPENSATION
> Full-time compensation rate will be $1300 - 1700 USD per month
>> The rate established will be based on qualifications and experience
> Once transitioned to full-time, paid holidays and paid time off days will be added
> Compensation rate range for the initial trial period will be $500 - 750 USD per month
- This is a retainer engagement for 80 hours of work per month
- Hours per week may vary and unused hours may be carried over to the next month
- No paid holidays or paid time off days will be included during the initial trial period

KEY REQUIREMENTS:
> You must be based in the Philippines with fast, reliable internet access and a robust computer
> You must have a flexible schedule and be able adaptable to receive design requests and quickly start design and production work to deliver assets requested in a timely and efficient manner
> You must have strong creative skills and a portfolio of work that demonstrates your passion and experience with illustrative design and typography
> You must have experience working with various digital and print formats, platforms and tools
> English fluency (written and spoken) along with excellent communication skills are essential

QUALIFICATIONS:
> College degree in graphic design, visual communications or other related field
> At least 5 years of professional experience creating digital and print assets for corporate marketing activities, such as social media advertising, web banner ads, web design and graphics, email templates, slide templates and presentation, white paper layout and design, and promotional materials for events
> A diverse portfolio that demonstrates your direct, hands-on experience creating these type of assets
> A comprehensive understanding of the various formats and specifications of assets required by different social media channels, website platforms, printing options, etc.
> Proven expertise and mastery using the following tools:
- Adobe Creative Suite Tools (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign and others)
- Figma
- Canva
- Midjourney & other AI image generation tools

title: Customer Support Manager
description:
We are on the lookout for a skilled and experienced Customer Support Manager to join our team. Our commitment to helping businesses succeed through effective marketing strategies relies heavily on a high-performing Customer Support Manager. As we expand, we seek someone who can help us enhance how businesses connect with our clients.

Position Summary:
The Customer Support Manager is responsible for overseeing the daily operations of the customer support team, ensuring high-quality service delivery and promoting a customer-centric culture. This role involves managing a team of customer support representatives, developing and implementing support strategies, monitoring performance metrics, and driving initiatives to enhance customer satisfaction and loyalty. The ideal candidate will possess strong leadership skills, excellent communication abilities, and a passion for helping customers.

Responsibilities:

Team Management:
Lead, mentor, and motivate the customer support team, ensuring they have the tools, resources, and knowledge necessary to excel in their roles.
Conduct regular performance evaluations and provide constructive feedback, coaching, and support.
Facilitate training sessions on product knowledge, customer service best practices, and personal development.

Customer Experience:
Develop and implement customer support policies and procedures that enhance the customer experience and streamline support processes.
Respond to complex customer queries and issues, ensuring prompt and effective resolution.
Monitor customer interactions and feedback to identify trends, needs, and areas for improvement.

Performance Metrics & Reporting:
Establish and monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) to gauge team performance and customer satisfaction levels.
Generate and analyze reports on support ticket resolution, team performance, and customer feedback to drive continuous 
improvement.
Provide updates and insights to senior management regarding team performance and customer satisfaction trends.

Collaboration:
Work closely with other departments (e.g., Sales, Product Development, Marketing) to align customer support initiatives with company goals.
Serve as a key point of contact for escalated customer issues and collaborate cross-departmentally to resolve them effectively.

Process Improvement:
Continuously assess and improve customer support workflows and technologies to boost efficiency and enhance user satisfaction.
Stay up-to-date with industry best practices and emerging trends in customer support, applying relevant improvements to the team and processes.

Crisis Management:
Handle escalated customer grievances with empathy and professionalism, aiming to resolve issues to the customer’s satisfaction.
Develop contingency plans and customer communication strategies to maintain customer trust during service disruptions.

Qualifications:

Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Communication, or a related field; additional qualifications in customer service or management are a plus.
Proven experience in a customer support or service management role, preferably in a similar industry, with a track record of meeting and exceeding performance targets.
Excellent leadership skills with the ability to inspire and develop a team.
Exceptional communication skills, both verbal and written, with a strong attention to detail.
Strong problem-solving abilities and a proactive approach to challenges and customer issues.
Experience with customer support software (e.g., Zendesk,) and CRM systems.
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple priorities effectively.


Preferred Skills:
Experience in data analysis and reporting, with a knack for using data to guide decision-making.
Familiarity with support ticketing systems and process automation tools.
Knowledge of customer journey mapping and experience design principles.


How to Apply:
Interested candidates are encouraged to send their resume and a cover letter detailing relevant experience. We look forward to welcoming you to our team!

Key Performance Indicators (KPIs):

• Training Effectiveness: Ensure 90% of clients can independently perform basic GHL operations after the first 90 days.

Desired Qualifications:

• Experience in using Zapier and creating custom GPT solutions.
• Demonstrated ability to explain technical details to non-technical audiences.
• Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently on complex projects.
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
• If you don’t have the skills and knowledge, please don’t apply.


Required Skills and Qualifications:
• Deep understanding of GoHighLevel CRM, with expertise in setting up complex automations, campaigns, and integrations to streamline business operations.
• Proven track record in implementing and optimizing marketing automation systems and integrating cutting-edge AI tools to enhance client engagement and lead conversion.
• Exceptional problem-solving abilities, with a keen focus on technical troubleshooting and process optimization to ensure smooth operations for clients.
• Strong capacity to train and support team members on technical platforms, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement.
• Data-driven approach with proficiency in generating insightful CRM reports and leveraging analytics to drive strategic decision-making for clients.


Non Negotiables:
Screenshot and Productivity Tracker
Graveyard Shift ( Philippine Time )


Congratulations!! You're the one we are looking for!! 

Note: Knowing how to navigate GHL, Zappier / Pabbly, Notion, Discord, Zoom, chatGPT, and Claude is preferred
Working hours: 9 AM - 6 PM PDT (PACIFIC STANDARD TIME)

Please send me your answer to the following questions and please include your email address.
1.? ?Who is the most influential person in your life and how did he/she impact you? 
2.? ?What is the toughest obstacle you have encountered in life? Did you overcome it? How?
3.? ?How would you define success in your personal & business life?

I am Ariane, your Talent Manager and I will be with you all through this fantastic journey. 

We love working with a VA that is an excellent fit with our mission, values, and pace. We are excited to grow with you!! 

So, what are you waiting for? Go ahead and prime yourself and your resume!! We are so excited for you!!
