title: DMCA Takedown, Copyright Infringement, and IP Specialist for E-commerce Dropshipping Company
description:
DMCA Takedown, Copyright Infringement, and IP Specialist
Blue Ocean Enterprise FZCO | Remote Work Option Available

About Us:
Blue Ocean Enterprise FZCO is a fast-growing D2C company dedicated to creating, developing, and scaling online brands. Our international, dynamic team values innovation, collaboration, and autonomy. As we expand, we are looking for a skilled DMCA Takedown, Copyright Infringement, and IP Specialist to protect our intellectual property, safeguard our brand integrity across platforms, and support our e-commerce growth.

Role Overview:
As a DMCA Takedown, Copyright Infringement, and IP Specialist, you will be responsible for identifying, tracking, and enforcing our intellectual property rights across various digital platforms. You’ll play a key role in monitoring for copyright infringement, submitting DMCA takedown notices, managing IP-related communications, and collaborating with both internal and external stakeholders to protect our brands.

Key Responsibilities:
 • Identify and Track Infringements:
Regularly monitor online marketplaces, social media, and e-commerce platforms for potential copyright infringements, counterfeit listings, and unauthorized use of our intellectual property.
 • Execute DMCA Takedowns:
Draft, submit, and manage DMCA takedown notices to swiftly remove infringing content. Collaborate with platform administrators to ensure takedown requests meet platform-specific requirements.
 • IP Rights Enforcement:
Enforce our company’s intellectual property rights by identifying and addressing cases of trademark, copyright, and patent violations across various digital channels. Maintain up-to-date knowledge of relevant IP laws, especially those governing online copyright and trademark protection.
 • Counter-Claim Management:
Respond to counterclaims, providing necessary documentation and working closely with legal counsel if escalated issues arise.
 • Documentation and Reporting:
Keep organized records of all takedown notices, infringement cases, and resolutions. Generate regular reports on infringement trends and enforcement outcomes to support data-driven IP protection strategies.
 • Collaboration with Internal Teams:
Work closely with marketing, legal, and brand management teams to proactively identify potential areas of risk and stay aligned with brand protection goals. Provide recommendations for improving internal IP protection processes.
 • Stakeholder Communication:
Act as the primary contact for external stakeholders on matters related to DMCA, copyright infringement, and IP enforcement. Engage with platform representatives, legal advisors, and external partners to ensure effective handling of IP claims.
 • Policy and Best Practice Development:
Develop and refine standard operating procedures (SOPs) for efficient DMCA takedown and IP enforcement processes. Educate internal teams on best practices for intellectual property protection, including guidelines for identifying and reporting potential violations.

Key Requirements:
 • Proven experience in DMCA takedown processes, copyright infringement monitoring, and IP rights enforcement in a digital or e-commerce environment.
 • Strong understanding of DMCA, copyright laws, intellectual property rights, and the unique challenges of protecting IP online.
 • Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with a strong ability to liaise with internal teams, legal advisors, and external platform representatives.
 • Detail-oriented, organized, and proactive with a strong focus on maintaining meticulous records and tracking trends in IP enforcement.
 • Ability to work autonomously in a fast-paced environment, prioritizing tasks and adapting to changing IP protection needs.

Why Join Us?
 • Work with a dynamic, diverse, and international team.
 • Remote work and flexible schedule options.
 • Flat organizational structure promoting collaboration and innovation.
 • Opportunities for growth and professional development in a fast-scaling D2C environment.
 • Up to 40% employee discount on our exclusive product line.

How to apply: 
*** Messages will not be entertained, please proceed with the website link to apply for the position:

www.blueoceanenterprise.com/job-post-dmca-specialist

title: Skilled Web Developer
description:
We are looking for a skilled web developer with experience in modern JavaScript technologies (such as Node. js and React. js) to join our growing development team. This role will involve building high-performance web applications from the back end (server-side logic) to the front end (UI experience). The ideal candidate will have a solid understanding of both front-end and back-end technologies, a passion for clean code, and a drive to provide innovative web experiences.

Key Responsibilities:
-Collaboration:
   -Work closely with the development team to turn project requirements into high-quality web applications.
   -Contribute to brainstorming and architectural discussions to ensure scalable, maintainable, and performant code.
   -Participate in code reviews to ensure quality and share best practices with the team.

-Web Application Development:
   -Design, develop, and maintain responsive and high-performance web applications using React.js for the front end and Node.js for the back end.
   -Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code across the full stack, following best practices and ensuring cross-browser compatibility.
   -Develop and integrate RESTful APIs, WebSockets, and third-party services to enhance application functionality.

-Front-End Development (React.js):
   -Build and maintain dynamic user interfaces using React.js, with a focus on reusable components, state management (Redux, Context API), and efficient rendering.
   -Implement responsive design and ensure the application performs well across devices and browsers.

-Back-End Development (Node.js):
   -Build and maintain server-side logic, databases, and APIs using Node.js.
   -Work with relational and NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB, MySQL, PostgreSQL).

title: Operations Data Specialist
description:
The Operations Data Specialist is a hybrid role bridging logistics, purchasing, and data management functions. This individual will play a critical role in analyzing, organizing, and uploading large data sets—specifically fitment data—into our ERP system to optimize the shopping experience for our customers. The successful candidate will have strong analytical skills, experience managing and uploading complex data sets, and the ability to work across teams to ensure operational success. 

Key Responsibilities 

Fitment Data Management: 

Analyze, dissect, and organize large volumes of fitment data for product compatibility. 

Upload and maintain accurate fitment data within the ERP system. 

Work towards ensuring a superior and intuitive shopping experience for customers by improving data accuracy and usability. 

ERP and System Management: 

Manage data integrations and updates within the ERP system, ensuring all information is accurate and accessible. 

Collaborate with IT and other departments to troubleshoot data-related issues. 

Cross-Functional Collaboration: 

Support logistics and purchasing teams as needed, ensuring smooth operations between departments. 

Assist in inventory management, purchasing decisions, and freight coordination when required. 

Data Analysis and Reporting: 

Analyze large data sets to identify trends, gaps, and opportunities for improvement. 

Generate actionable insights to enhance efficiency across logistics, purchasing, and customer-facing operations. 

Process Optimization: 

Develop and document efficient processes for managing and maintaining fitment and product data. 

Continuously evaluate and improve workflows related to data entry and management. 

Key Qualifications 

Proven experience managing large data sets with exceptional attention to detail. 

Proficiency in ERP systems and advanced Excel skills (e.g., formulas, pivot tables, VLOOKUP). 

Experience with data management platforms and familiarity with programming languages such as Python or SQL is a strong asset. 

Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, with the ability to translate data into actionable outcomes. 

Clear and fluent English communication skills, both written and verbal. 

Experience working in logistics, purchasing, or a similar operations role is an asset. 

Excellent organizational and time management skills, with the ability to balance competing priorities. 

Preferred Qualifications 

Experience in the powersports or outdoor recreation industries. 

Familiarity with fitment data and product compatibility. 

Knowledge of system integrations and data migration processes.

title: Call Center Appointment Setters
description:
Performance-Driven Cold Calling Experts Wanted - Earn What You’re Worth!
Do you thrive on making connections, setting appointments, and tackling challenges head-on? Are you a cold-calling pro who’s hungry for results, unafraid of rejection, and ready to make 200+ calls a day without missing a beat? If you’re looking for a full-time, performance-based role that rewards your effort, we want to hear from you.
What We Offer:
Performance-Based Pay: Earn big with no fixed salary. Your income depends entirely on the results you deliver—bonuses for appointments set and demos attended. This is a role where hard work pays off.
Flexible Remote Work: Work from anywhere as long as you have a solid internet connection and can maintain a high call volume.
Thorough Training: We provide in-depth training for the first two weeks. Learn the ropes, follow the process, and get set up for long-term success. After that, it’s all about hitting your numbers.
Supportive Environment: Our No Jerks Policy ensures a positive, goal-oriented atmosphere where everyone is driven to succeed.
Who Should Apply:
Cold Calling Pros: You have proven experience making cold calls, building rapport quickly, and setting up appointments. You understand that success comes from volume and persistence.
Self-Motivated Go-Getters: You don’t need to be chased to make your calls. You’re driven by hunger and ready to do what it takes to achieve your goals.
Resilient & Tenacious: You understand that most prospects will say no, and that doesn’t deter you. Instead, it fuels you to keep going.
Tech-Savvy: Comfortable with CRM tools, sales software, and understanding the basics of SEO and online reviews. If you’re not an expert, we’ll train you on the essentials, but you need to be quick to adapt.
Full-Time Commitment: This is not a side hustle. We’re looking for candidates who are ready to dedicate themselves full-time to mastering our process and hitting their targets consistently.
What We Expect:
200+ Calls Daily: High call volume is the foundation of this role. You should be comfortable with a fast-paced environment.
A Willingness to Learn: The first two weeks require a focused learning period. Follow our process diligently to set yourself up for success.
Top 3% Mindset: We want those who aim to be the best, push through challenges, and have a clear why driving their performance.
About Referrizer:
Referrizer is a leading marketing automation company that helps local businesses improve their online presence, increase reviews, and attract new clients. We use cutting-edge technology to make reputation management easy, so companies can focus on what they do best.

title: Customer Support Agent for a High-Volume Cosmetics Brand
description:

Problem Solving: Handle product-related issues such as allergic reactions, application failures, and general troubleshooting with empathy and care.

title: Experienced Airbnb Virtual Assistant – Claims and Review Removal Specialist

title: Risk Analyst for Online Gambling
description:

title: E-Commerce Product Manager with Expertise in Bulk Product Edit and Imports
description:
We are a growing company with 3 eCommerce stores seeking an experienced and tech-savvy Product Manager to join our dynamic team and contribute to our growing businesses. This is a full-time position.

PLEASE READ THE ENTIRE JOB DESCRIPTION AND ANSWER ALL QUESTIONS FOR YOUR APPLICATION TO BE CONSIDERED.

This role demands extremely high attention to detail, a patient demeanor, and a meticulous approach. The ideal candidate must also have proficient English writing and speaking skills as occasional communication with vendors via email, chat, or phone will be required.

Work hours will align with U.S. business hours. Training is provided and compensated. There will be an initial 1-month trial period.

The candidate will be expected to handle the following tasks:

• Manage and Maintain Product Information:
- Uploading new products
- Updating existing product listings with accurate information
- Coordinating with new and existing vendors for product details, ordering processes, lead times, etc.
-Maintaining accurate product and vendor databases

• Research, Analysis, and Optimization:
- Researching new and relevant products/brands
- Monitoring product performance, sales metrics, and customer feedback
- Using data insights to make recommendations for listing optimizations and business strategies

• Technical Expertise and Enhancement:
- Making mass uploads and changes to products on Shopify (e.g., pricing, descriptions)
- Optimize listings for product rankings, conversion rates, and sales growth.
- Quality-checking images, titles, and descriptions for accuracy
- Website coding experience (advantageous)

• Collaboration and Communication:
- Manage 3 stores, and lead a team of 1-2 VAs.
- Collaborate with the team to resolve product and website issues.
- Work directly with manufacturers/vendors for product issues/questions

• Inventory Management and Operations:
- Overseeing inventory reconciliation and efficient tracking of stock levels
- Documentation and Record-Keeping:
- Creating and maintaining up-to-date records of SOPs, listing performance, and product details

• Other basic operations and administrative tasks

Qualifications:
• Work experience as a Product Manager
• Minimum of 2 years’ Product Management experience in an E-commerce company
• Proven expertise in Shopify. Being a Shopify Certified Developer will be an advantage.
• Advanced knowledge of MS Excel and Google Suite software (Google Sheets, Google Docs, etc.)
• Write mushroom in your application to show your attention to detail
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English
• Highly organized, detail-oriented, and good analytical skills with an ability to meet deadlines

Other preferred experience includes:
• Airtable
• ClickUp
• Website scraping tools

Communication and meetings will be primarily conducted through voice chat (Google Meet) and Slack.

Before we proceed, here are a few things we'd like to confirm:
• Payments will be made weekly for the first four weeks starting from the third week of employment, and then bi-monthly every other Tuesday.
• Your work schedule will consist of 40 hours per week
• Your working hours will be from 9 PM to 6 AM (or 10 PM to 7 PM), PHT, with a 1-hour break, five days a week
• You’ll need to send an End of Shift (EOS) report every day, covering the following:
a. What did you do today? (detailed description)
b. What issues did you run into?
c. Is there anything I can help you with?

If you're okay with the above, please reply with "I AGREE TO ALL TERMS" and answer the following questions in complete sentences, using proper grammar and punctuation (please answer in number format instead of in paragraphs):

1. What is your previous experience with managing products for E-commerce companies?
2. Please provide a list of tools or software you have utilized in previous roles for product management. For each tool, include details on its specific functions (such as web scraping or bulk upload) and briefly describe how you applied it in your work.
3. How large of a team have you managed before?
4. Have you worked with Shopify before?
5. Are you currently engaged in another job or commitment?
6. How fast is your internet?
7. Do you have a reliable computer?
8. How often do you experience power outages and internet issues?
9. What backups do you have in case of power outages?
10. What backups do you have in case of internet outages?

Please carefully review the entire job description and also use this format as your subject line when replying to this post: “Your First Name + I Am Your Product Manager" (e.g. Kevin - I Am Your Product Manager). Please also include your resume.

AI-generated responses will not be considered.

title: Virtual Assistant
description:
JOB OVERVIEW

We prioritize candidates with strong customer service skills and an excellent command of English to communicate effectively via emails and Facebook Marketplace Messenger. The ideal candidate should be extremely organized, proactive, and highly responsive to any inquiries. Other skills, while not required, are considered an asset, including social media marketing expertise and basic bookkeeping to track expenses and income in Google Sheets and provide reports to owners.

We are looking for a detail-oriented and organized Administrative Assistant to support the owner of a growing property management business based in Toronto, Canada. The ideal candidate will have a strong foundation in bookkeeping and basic accounting, advanced Excel and Google Sheets skills, and experience in customer service. Familiarity with Facebook Marketplace and social media platforms is a plus. The role involves responding to tenant inquiries, coordinating apartment viewings, managing administrative tasks, and maintaining accurate financial records. Some social media and outreach duties may also be required.

IMPORTANT: Please send your resume and a video link introducing yourself and why you are interested in the job, along with your experience and skills that are applicable in this job opening. We WILL NOT respond to any applications without a video being sent. 

Compensation: TBD hourly or project flat fee based.
Key Responsibilities:

1) Tenant Communication:
--Respond promptly and professionally to prospective tenant inquiries on Facebook Marketplace and other platforms.
--Schedule and coordinate apartment viewings with prospective tenants, ensuring smooth communication and timely follow-ups.
--Address tenant questions or concerns about rental properties, policies, and availability.

2) Vendor Coordination:
--Communicate with vendors and contractors regarding billing, service requests, and maintenance scheduling.
--Ensure timely follow-ups with service providers to address any property-related needs.

3) Administrative and Financial Support:
--Manage email and phone communication on behalf of the property management business.
--Keep organized records of tenant inquiries, scheduled viewings, and vendor interactions.
--Track and file vendor invoices and property-related expenses.
--Perform basic bookkeeping tasks, including reconciling accounts and recording transactions.
--Assist with financial reports and document preparation for property-related expenses.

4) Social Media and Outreach:
--Assist in managing social media accounts for rental properties (e.g., posting ads on Facebook Marketplace or other platforms).
--Help with outreach efforts to promote available properties and expand tenant reach.

5) General Administrative Duties:
--Prepare and maintain spreadsheets, databases, and other organizational tools for tracking property management activities.
--Assist with property lease agreements, renewals, and document preparation.
--Perform other administrative tasks as required, including data entry, scheduling, and basic office support.

Qualifications:

--Experience with Canva and creating designs for Instagram and Facebook posts.
--Photo editing skills are an asset but not required.
--Strong bookkeeping and basic accounting skills are required.
--Proficiency in Microsoft Excel, Google Sheets, and other data management tools.
--Experience with Facebook Marketplace is required (posting ads, managing inquiries).
--Strong English communication skills, both written and verbal.
--Prior customer service experience is a plus.
--Ability to work independently and manage time effectively.
--Familiarity with property management or real estate is preferred but not required.
--Comfortable working in the Eastern Standard Time (EST) zone (Canada – Toronto).
--Basic knowledge of social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram) and outreach.
--Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
--Experience with billing or accounting software is preferred.

title: Experienced Marketing/Social Media Manager
description:
Looking to fill a PT (potentially FT in the future) Experienced Marketing/Social Media Manager position for the startup businesses that I recently launched. 

Generally, these are the requirements of the position in order of descending importance:

1. SOCIAL MEDIA MARKETING (for brand awareness and lead generation) - Devise and own full social media strategy and execution, and growth. Responsible for post design, content creation, and re-use, calendar planning, automation, systems, etc. Platforms include FB, Instagram, YouTube (IE - short-form video), and possibly other platforms in the future (IE - Twitter/LinkedIn/TikTok/etc).
2. MASS EMAIL MARKETING (for lead generation and customer retention) - Devise and own full outbound mass-email marketing strategy and execution.
3. WEBSITE UPDATES - Manage company websites (content updates, FAQs, etc). Utilizing design skills, continuously improve design (UI), flow, user experience, etc.

Nice to Have Skills: NOTE - You do not need to be an expert in the following. Only have the willingness to learn and become an expert

As these businesses are startups, the position will start as a PT role that pays a lower pay rate. However, as the business grows, and if things work out well, the role can grow into a long-term, higher-rate, FT position. 

For the right person, this role can potentially lead to much higher responsibility, and possibly even a leadership role in the company.

At the same time, in preparation for our call, please send me some or all of the following:

title: Go High Level CRM Expert
description:
Job Title: Go High Level CRM Expert!

Are you a Go High Level wizard who knows how to build campaigns, manage pipelines, and drive leads like a pro? We're seeking a tech-savvy CRM Specialist who can elevate our team’s performance and keep our business running smoothly!

What You’ll Do:
Own and optimize our Go High Level CRM—managing pipelines, automating workflows, and maximizing every campaign.
Create and launch effective campaigns that generate high-quality leads and keep our brand top-of-mind.
Serve as a help desk for agents—answering questions, troubleshooting issues, and ensuring everyone’s confident in using Go High Level to its full potential.
Run interactive sessions during team meetings to train agents on CRM best practices, share tips, and keep everyone up to speed.
Analyze data and report insights to leadership, making recommendations to enhance our lead-generation strategies and overall CRM performance.

Who You Are:
A Go High Level expert who’s comfortable managing pipelines, campaigns, and automations.
Experienced in lead generation and nurturing, with a proven track record of running successful campaigns.
Proactive and solution-oriented—you can troubleshoot issues quickly and keep operations smooth for our team.
Organized and detail-focused, with an ability to analyze CRM data and make data-driven recommendations.
A clear and effective communicator who’s comfortable running training sessions, presenting to teams, and helping others succeed.
Strong in English proficiency, both written and spoken, for clear and confident communication with agents.
What We Offer:
The chance to take charge of our CRM operations and make a tangible impact on our team’s success.
Opportunities for full-time roles and advancement as we grow, offering room for career progression within our organization.
A supportive environment where your expertise is valued, and your ideas are welcomed.
The opportunity to work with a dedicated team that appreciates creativity, collaboration, and efficiency.
Ready to make a difference? Apply now!

Please submit your CV, portfolio, and answer this: Describe a campaign you've run using Go High Level that brought in outstanding results—what was your strategy, and why did it work?

Who We Are: Swivel Mortgage Group

Swivel Mortgage Group is a dynamic and innovative mortgage brokerage licensed in Ontario and Alberta, committed to delivering exceptional service to clients across Canada. We specialize in residential and commercial mortgages, working closely with clients to find the right solutions for their unique needs. Our team is passionate about making homeownership accessible, investing in advanced technology, and building strong, lasting relationships with our clients and partners.

At Swivel, we believe in fostering a supportive, forward-thinking culture where every team member has the opportunity to contribute, grow, and make a difference. As part of our team, you’ll be joining a company that values expertise, collaboration, and new ideas to drive success for both our clients and our team.

title: Full Stack Python Developer
description:
Full Stack Python Developer (React/TypeScript + Python)

What We're Looking For

- Full Stack Expertise: You excel in both backend and frontend development, proficient in Python as well as React and TypeScript.
- Passion for Python: You are an expert in Python and its frameworks, with a knack for backend development.
- Frontend Mastery: You have strong experience with React and TypeScript, building intuitive and responsive user interfaces.
- Data Analytics Expertise: You have a proven track record in data analytics, able to turn data into insights.
- AI Enthusiast: You are intrigued by AI technologies and eager to apply them in practical scenarios.

Responsibilities

- Backend Development: Build and maintain robust backend systems using Python.
- Frontend Development: Create and enhance user interfaces using React and TypeScript.
- Data Handling: Design and manage data models and databases.
- Collaboration: Work alongside cross-functional teams to integrate backend services with front-end platforms.
- Code Quality: Write clean, efficient code and participate in code reviews to uphold high standards.
- Data Pipelines: Develop and optimize pipelines for efficient data analytics.
- ETL Processes: Manage the extraction, transformation, and loading of large data sets.
- Insight Generation: Utilize statistical analysis and data visualization for actionable insights.
- AI Integration: Implement machine learning algorithms and embrace data science methods.

Qualifications

- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
- 3-5 years of experience in full stack development with a focus on Python, React, and TypeScript.
- Strong knowledge of Python and its frameworks (e.g., Django, FastAPI).
- Proficiency in React and TypeScript for frontend development.
- Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MongoDB).
- Proficiency in data modeling, ETL processes, and data warehousing.
- Familiarity with RESTful APIs and server-side logic.
- Experience with pandas.
- (Bonus) Knowledge of machine learning libraries (e.g., PyTorch) and data science methodologies.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work independently or as part of a team.
- Strong communication skills and fluency in English.


What is the Compensation Details?
This is a full-time position. The salary based on your experience.

Are you open to part-time or hourly contracts?
Yes, we do.

How much programming experience do I need to have?
This is a mid to senior position focusing on full stack development. You should have at least 3-5 years of experience in creating and sustaining data-oriented initiatives, improving our data systems' efficiency, and enhancing our backend and frontend services.

title: Job Opportunity: Business Analyst & Operations Coordinator
description:
Are you detail-oriented, highly organized, and passionate about creating structure and efficiency? I'm looking for a Business Analyst & Operations Coordinator to help manage the operational backbone of my businesses, including our dropshipping stores and coaching program.

Financial Oversight

Business Reporting

Ideal Candidate
Strong analytical and organizational skills.
Proficient in tools like Excel, Asana, and other project management software.
Excellent communication and follow-up abilities, especially via WhatsApp or email.
Experience in financial management and budgeting.
Knowledge of e-commerce and coaching program operations is a plus.
Why Join Us?
You'll work in a dynamic, fast-paced environment where your contributions will directly impact the success of our businesses and community. If you thrive on structure, love data, and are passionate about supporting growth, this role is for you!

title: Property Contract Coordinator
description:
The Property Contract Coordinator plays a pivotal role in managing the end-to-end client service journey post-property acquisition. This position requires strong organisational skills, an understanding of property contracts and key dates, and a focus on process optimisation to ensure seamless client service delivery. The role supports property transactions by managing critical dates, correspondence, task workflows, and ensuring compliance with established processes.

Key Responsibilities
Contract Management & Task Coordination
Review, manage, and document property contracts to ensure accuracy and compliance with key dates.
Maintain up-to-date task workflows using platforms such as ClickUp and AirTable for all stages of the property transaction process.
Ensure all contract-related key dates are tracked and updated in client management systems.
Collaborate with buyer's agents and internal teams to gather necessary data for contract processing.
Client Service Excellence
Act as the primary liaison for client queries and provide regular updates regarding property contracts and milestones.
Coordinate client correspondence, including automated email templates, and maintain a repository of communication records for transparency.
Proactively identify and address potential delays or issues in the property transaction process.
Systemization & Process Improvement
Develop, document, and update Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for all tasks and processes associated with the role.
Leverage tools like ClickUp’s AI and templates to streamline repetitive tasks and ensure consistency.
Implement scalable systems for managing increasing transaction volumes while maintaining accuracy.
Collaborate with the systems champion to identify process improvement opportunities and assist in documenting workflows.
Collaboration & Communication
Work closely with the Systems Champion and Client Success Manager to ensure processes are aligned with the overall business strategy.
Facilitate seamless handover of responsibilities to new hires by maintaining comprehensive process documentation.
Engage with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth execution of tasks outside critical client flows.
Qualifications
Experience & Skills
Strong familiarity with property contracts, key dates, and client service workflows.
Proficiency in project management tools such as ClickUp, AirTable, or similar platforms.
Excellent communication and organizational skills.
Ability to manage multiple tasks with high attention to detail.
Technical Skills
Familiarity with SOP creation and documentation tools (e.g., AI integrations in ClickUp).
Experience with email automation tools and integrating communication workflows.
Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and other collaboration tools (e.g., Google Workspace).

MUST HAVES!!!

Do not apply if you do not have these:
Minimum 2-3 years experience in property contracts, mortgage broking or conveyancing in Australia. I want to know that you've handled contracts in Australia and understand the differences between each state and the rules around handling those contracts

Do not apply, if you do not have the above. 

COMPANY PROFILE

What do we do?
Property Principles is an Australian real estate and investment company that focuses on providing clients with tailored property solutions. Their services include helping clients with property purchasing, selling, leasing, and management. They aim to simplify the property acquisition process while delivering exceptional customer service and financial advice. They also guide clients on market trends and property development, ensuring they make well-informed decisions. Their expertise covers both residential and commercial properties across Australia, focusing on maximising client returns through strategic investments.

Who are our clients?
Their clients primarily include individuals and businesses seeking expert guidance on property investment, management, and development within Australia.

Workload: Full Time
Schedule: 9am - 6pm Sydney Australia time
Location: Virtual

You must have your own computer suitable to run all programs. 

I want to know that you actually read to the bottom of this, rather than just send me a random resume or response, so please let me know your favourite colour.

title: Full Stack web Developer
description:
**About Us:**
RivetStays is a fast-growing short-term rental company based in Ontario, Canada. We specialize in offering premium accommodations and exceptional guest experiences through various rental platforms. Our tech-driven approach aims to streamline operations, enhance customer satisfaction, and optimize property management. We are seeking a highly skilled **Full Stack Developer** to join our dynamic team and contribute to the continued growth and innovation of our company.

---

**Position Overview:**
We are looking for a Full Stack Developer proficient in both front-end and back-end technologies, with a proven ability to deliver efficient and scalable solutions. The ideal candidate will have strong expertise in Python, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP. They should also be skilled in web scraping techniques to support data acquisition and analytics. Experience with Wolfram Language is a bonus but not required. As part of our team, you will be instrumental in developing, maintaining, and optimizing the systems that drive our short-term rental operations.

---

**Key Responsibilities:**
- Design, develop, and maintain scalable web applications to enhance RivetStays' operational efficiency.
- Implement web scraping solutions to gather, clean, and manage data critical to business insights and decision-making.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
- Ensure high performance, responsiveness, and reliability of applications.
- Build APIs and integrate third-party services into our systems.
- Troubleshoot and debug issues across web applications and internal tools.
- Stay up-to-date with industry trends and emerging technologies.
- Participate in code reviews to ensure code quality and adherence to best practices.
- Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.

---

**Requirements:**
- Strong proficiency in Python, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP.
- Demonstrated experience with web scraping techniques and tools (e.g., BeautifulSoup, Scrapy, Selenium).
- Experience with front-end frameworks such as React, Angular, or Vue.js is a plus.
- Familiarity with databases (SQL, NoSQL).
- Experience with server-side frameworks such as Flask, Django, or Laravel.
- Knowledge of web hosting, cloud services, and server management.
- Proficiency in version control tools like Git.
- Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.

---

**Bonus Qualifications:**
- Familiarity with Wolfram Language.

---

If you are a motivated developer who loves tackling challenges and creating impactful solutions, we’d love to hear from you! Apply today and become a key player in RivetStays' journey.

title: Remote Personal Assistant *Superstar Only*
description:
Kindly read the following instructions carefully, as applications that do not adhere to them will not be considered.


Are you highly organized and detail-oriented with a proven track record as an executive assistant?

Can you effectively manage responsibilities, ensuring no tasks are overlooked even in high-pressure situations?

We're seeking someone capable of handling complex tasks seamlessly, demonstrating proactive problem-solving skills and a commitment to continuous improvement.

If you're driven by delivering excellence and eager to take on new challenges, we encourage you to apply.

ABOUT US
· We're a fast-growing holistic beauty company that is looking for the brightest, most talented minds to work from home. More details will be shared during the interview, but you’ll have the opportunity to work with one of the fastest-growing holistic beauty creators, boasting over 2,000,000 followers.

JOB QUALIFICATIONS:
An executive assistant requires a diverse set of qualities beyond being detail-oriented to excel in their role. Here are the qualifications for the executive assistant role:

• Demonstrated outstanding achievements, such as earning Latin Honors (Summa Cum Laude, Magna Cum Laude, Cum Laude), receiving various excellence awards (e.g., "Agent of the Year", “Employee of the Year”), and showcasing rapid career advancement in previous roles.

• Minimum of 2 years of experience working as an executive assistant.

• Excellent communication skills, both oral and written, characterized by professionalism in tone and manner, clarity in conveying messages, and active listening.

• Strong attention to detail, ensuring accuracy and precision in all aspects of work.

• Proven ability to prioritize tasks effectively and manage time efficiently.

• Successful track record of managing projects.

• Proficient problem-solving skills, with the ability to address challenges effectively.

• Demonstrated excellent decision-making abilities, exhibiting sound judgment and discernment in various situations.

• Adaptability to changing environments, with a flexible approach to handle unforeseen circumstances and adjust plans accordingly.

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES INCLUDE:
Here are the primary duties of an Executive Assistant:

• Support Services: Provide comprehensive administrative support to the executive, including managing calendars, scheduling appointments, and coordinating meetings and events.
• Information Management: Handle correspondence, emails, and phone calls on behalf of the executive, screening, and prioritizing messages as necessary.
• Relationship Facilitation: Serve as the primary point of contact between the executive and internal and external stakeholders, including staff, clients, vendors, and partners. Facilitate communication and maintain positive relationships on behalf of the executive.
• Project Support: Assist with project management tasks, such as tracking project timelines, milestones, and deliverables. Coordinate project-related activities and communications among team members.
• Confidentiality Management: Maintain strict confidentiality and discretion when handling sensitive information, documents, and communications. Safeguard confidential data and ensure compliance with privacy policies and regulations.
• Problem-Solving: Identify and resolve administrative issues and challenges as they arise, exercising sound judgment and problem-solving skills. Anticipate potential problems and take proactive steps to mitigate risks.
• Time Management: Manage the executive's schedule efficiently, prioritizing tasks and activities to maximize productivity and optimize time usage. Anticipate conflicting commitments and resolve scheduling conflicts as needed.

REQUIREMENTS FOR EFFECTIVE REMOTE WORK
· Reliable Computer/Laptop
· High-Speed Internet Connection (+backup)
· Conducive Work Environment

WORKING SCHEDULE
· Full-time Employment Opportunity

BENEFITS
· Competitive Salary
· Training and Development Opportunities
· Opportunity to contribute to a rapidly expanding company dedicated to promoting holistic beauty
· Great potential for career advancement into various leadership positions

APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS
Since this is a long-term position, there will be an in-depth qualification process. If you believe you have what it takes, here's what to do next:

Please apply to this job ad with the phrase “I’m an Executive Assistant Superstar” and answer the following questions:

1.) Why are you specifically interested in this position?
2.) Can you share a situation where you had to solve a problem or address a challenging situation on behalf of an executive? How did you handle it?
3.) How do you handle stressful situations or high-pressure environments while maintaining a high level of professionalism and attention to detail?
4.) What are the names of your last three boss/ supervisors, and how would they rate you on a scale of 1-10? (you may need to arrange calls/email contact with them)
5.) Schedule Availability:
5.1.) What are your preferred work hours? (in PHT)
5.2.) Are you available to work weekends?
6.) On an English Proficiency Scale (from A1-C2), how would you rate your level of English proficiency and your ability to adjust your language to the target audience?
7.) Take the following tests and attach the 3 screenshots of the results in a Google Drive link (set to open access).
7.1.) Go to www.typing.com/student/typing-test/1-minute, complete the test and take a screenshot of your results. You don't need to sign in, just close any requests to sign in.
7.2.) Go to www.grammaring.com/english-grammar-test and take the test. Please take a screenshot of the final result.
7.3.) Go to www.speedtest.net/ and take a screenshot of the final result.
8.) Attach your CV in a Google Drive link (set to open access).

description:

ABOUT US
• We're a fast-growing holistic beauty company that is looking for the brightest, most talented minds to work from home. More details will be shared during the interview, but you’ll have the opportunity to work with one of the fastest-growing holistic beauty creators, boasting over 2,000,000 followers.

• Recognized for exceptional achievements, such as attaining Latin Honors (Summa Cum Laude, Magna Cum Laude, Cum Laude).
• Excellent communication skills, both oral and written. As an email support representative, you will likely interact with US clients whose first language is English. • Fast and accurate typing skills to respond to emails promptly, great attention to detail and reliability are essential qualities for success in this role.
• Highly organized with the ability to efficiently manage multiple tasks and meet deadlines.
• Adeptness at working in a fast-paced environment where others rely on you to deliver is essential. It is expected that you have an innovative mind and are a self-starter.


JOB RESPONSIBILITIES INCLUDE
• Customer Care: Provide excellent customer service through various channels, including email, chat, social media and phone. Address customer inquiries, concerns, and requests with empathy and professionalism.
• Product Knowledge: Develop an in-depth understanding of our holistic beauty programs, their benefits, and the exercises in it.
• Problem Resolution: Troubleshoot and resolve customer complaints and issues promptly and effectively, ensuring customer satisfaction.
• Educational Support: Provide product recommendations, usage guidance, and holistic beauty advice to customers.
• Feedback Collection: Collect and document customer feedback and suggestions to help improve products and services.
• Organizational Skills: Maintain organized records of customer interactions and orders, ensuring accurate and up-to-date customer profiles.
• Cross-functional Collaboration: Collaborate with other departments, such as marketing and product development, to relay customer insights and feedback.
• Process Enhancement: Document the process and create/adapt SOPs to improve the system.

• High-Speed Internet Connection (+backup)
• Conducive Work Environment

WORKING SCHEDULE
• Full-time Employment Opportunity

BENEFITS
• Competitive Salary

• Opportunity to contribute to a rapidly expanding company dedicated to promoting holistic beauty
• Great potential for career advancement into various leadership positions

APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS
Since this is a long-term position, there will be an in-depth qualification process. If you believe you have what it takes, here's what to do next:

Please apply to this job ad with the phrase “I’m a Customer Service Superstar” and answer the following questions:

CEO, M2Enterprises

title: Full Stack Developer (Laravel, Tailwind CSS, AlphineJS)
description:
Test: https://forms.gle/ABpTeDZp5CgvkkDA8 

About KeywordMetrics.com: KeywordMetrics.com is a leading platform for keyword analysis and search engine optimization (SEO) tools. We provide in-depth data to empower businesses to optimize their online presence and drive organic traffic. Our team is dedicated to building innovative solutions that meet the dynamic needs of the digital marketing landscape. Sister company of Embarque.io

Job Overview: We are seeking an experienced Laravel Developer to join our remote team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in PHP and the Laravel framework, with the ability to work independently and deliver high-quality code. You will be responsible for implementing new features, optimizing existing ones, and ensuring the robustness of our platform as it scales.

Key Responsibilities: Feature Development: Implement new features based on the outlined milestones, including automated email reports, customizable time ranges, and enhanced keyword filtering. Develop a settings page allowing users to opt-in for weekly email reports and customize their content.

Data Management & Integration: Extend the existing data management system to support indexing old data for comparison purposes, crucial for tracking changes over time. Work with Google Search Console and Google API to fetch data and implement filters allowing users to inspect different time ranges (e.g., Today, Last 30 days, Last 60 days, Last year).

Bug Fixing & Optimization: Improve the accuracy of keyword filters by identifying and correcting failure cases. Address minor fixes such as displaying total page traffic in the UI and adding tooltips to filters for user guidance.

Code Quality & Collaboration: Write clean, simple, and efficient code following best practices. Ensure all code is thoroughly tested and documented. Collaborate asynchronously with the team, handling pull requests and providing feedback where necessary.

Tech Stack: Backend: PHP, Laravel Frontend: TailwindCSS, AlpineJS Infrastructure: Laravel Forge API & Data: Google Search Console, Google API

Required Qualifications: Experience: Minimum of 3 years working with Laravel. Proven experience with PHP and developing scalable web applications. Familiarity with Laravel Forge, TailwindCSS, and AlpineJS is highly desirable. Experience working with Google APIs and integrating third-party services.

Skills: Strong understanding of software development principles. Ability to work independently and meet deadlines. Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Effective communication skills for remote collaboration. We focus on experience and skills!

Nice to Have: Familiarity with SEO and keyword analysis tools. Experience working in an asynchronous remote environment. Contributions to open-source projects.

What We Offer: Competitive salary and benefits package. Flexible working hours with the option to work remotely from anywhere. Opportunity to work on innovative projects in a fast-paced environment. Collaborative and supportive team culture.

Our Process:

Test Application Form
Assessment Interview
Evaluation (Within 3-5 business days following your interview, we will thoroughly review your test and interview performance to ensure alignment with our company culture and niche.)
Onboarding
Trial Period (1-2 weeks)- During this period, we assess your compatibility with our culture and your confidence in applying your skills and expertise to the position.

If you will not received any responses from us then that means that your application did not meet our standards. Thank you.
