Feature Development:
Implement new features based on the outlined milestones, including automated email reports, customizable time ranges, and enhanced keyword filtering.
Develop a settings page allowing users to opt-in for weekly email reports and customize their content.

Data Management & Integration:
Extend the existing data management system to support indexing old data for comparison purposes, crucial for tracking changes over time.
Work with Google Search Console and Google API to fetch data and implement filters allowing users to inspect different time ranges (e.g., Today, Last 30 days, Last 60 days, Last year).

Bug Fixing & Optimization:
Improve the accuracy of keyword filters by identifying and correcting failure cases.
Address minor fixes such as displaying total page traffic in the UI and adding tooltips to filters for user guidance.

Code Quality & Collaboration:
Write clean, simple, and efficient code following best practices.
Ensure all code is thoroughly tested and documented.
Collaborate asynchronously with the team, handling pull requests and providing feedback where necessary.

Tech Stack:
Backend: PHP, Laravel
Frontend: TailwindCSS, AlpineJS
Infrastructure: Laravel Forge
API & Data: Google Search Console, Google API

Required Qualifications:
Experience:
Minimum of 3 years working with Laravel.
Proven experience with PHP and developing scalable web applications.
Familiarity with Laravel Forge, TailwindCSS, and AlpineJS is highly desirable.
Experience working with Google APIs and integrating third-party services.

Skills:
Strong understanding of software development principles.
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Effective communication skills for remote collaboration.
We focus on experience and skills! 

Nice to Have:
Familiarity with SEO and keyword analysis tools.
Experience working in an asynchronous remote environment.
Contributions to open-source projects.

What We Offer:
Competitive salary and benefits package.
Flexible working hours with the option to work remotely from anywhere.
Opportunity to work on innovative projects in a fast-paced environment.
Collaborative and supportive team culture.

title: API Developer
description:
PLEASE NOTE - you must apply through this link.

https://paradoxmarketing.io/careers/api-developer/

No applications will be accepted through the OnlineJobs.ph website.

API Developer (Philippines-Based)
Company: Paradox Group PTY Ltd
Location: Remote (Philippines-based)
Compensation: Trial Month of $500 USD, then salary assessment, no maximum. 40 hours work per week, tracked through time tracking software - Hubstaff.

Paradox Group PTY Ltd, an Australia-based company, is seeking a talented API Developer to join our innovative team. This role is an opportunity to work on dynamic projects while collaborating with teams across different countries. If you are passionate about building seamless API integrations and have hands-on experience with various systems, we’d love to hear from you!

Key Responsibilities:
Develop, maintain, and enhance API solutions using PHP (Core or Lavel), Python, or Node.js.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless data flow between WordPress, HubSpot, Salesforce and other systems.
Work with Google APIs (Maps, Analytics, Ads) to develop tailored solutions.
(Optional) Develop integrations with Ontraport, Shopify, and DrChrono systems.
Optimize and troubleshoot existing API implementations for enhanced performance and scalability.
Ensure all solutions are secure and compliant with best practices.

Requirements:
Minimum 2 years of experience in API development and integration.

Strong proficiency in working with:
WordPress for API implementation.
HubSpot for CRM and marketing automation.
Google APIs (Maps, Analytics, Ads) for business intelligence and solutions.
Familiarity with (optional but preferred):
Ontraport
Shopify
DrChrono
Proficiency in programming languages such as PHP, JavaScript, or Python.
Strong problem-solving and communication skills.
Ability to work collaboratively in a remote environment.

Interview Process:
First Round: 15-minute Meet & Greet with the Hiring Manager.
Second Round: 1-hour live coding of a basic task with a member of our development team. A simulated work environment would be setup. 
Third Round: Cultural fit and final discussion with the CTO.

Why Join Us?
Flexible, remote working environment.
Opportunity to work with cutting-edge Martech projects.
Collaborative and supportive team culture.
Career growth opportunities with an international team of 50+.

We are excited to work with dedicated professionals passionate about making a difference through technology.

If you have a passion for building effective API integrations and working in a fast-paced, innovative environment, apply now to become a part of the Paradox team!

title: Linux DevOps/SysOps + Some Windows
description:
To apply and to submit application visit https://remotepro.ph/

The best way to look at this role is you would have the main responsibility to own our Linux systems and the responsibility for deployment and the support of team that will handle the maintenance and monitoring of applications on them.  This will include custom and other more standard open source and proprietary applications.
Our favorite candidate will be able to support at least basic needs for Window DevOps and more.

RESPONSIBILITIES

Plan/Design, Build and define the monitoring of our Linux and Windows applications and the systems that run them.
Implement client-requested integrations.
Design/Plan and support team in deploying updates and fixes
Conduct root cause analysis if issues
Investigate and resolve technical issues and create/provide resources to team to prevent.
Develop scripts to automate processes and updates
Provide technical support and design procedures for system troubleshooting and maintenance.

WHAT WE'RE LOOKING FOR

Proven experience with version control system administration, including management of the company’s version control system, code remote repositories, branching, and so on.
Knowledgeable in Linux server administration – management of Linux servers, including but not limited to Ubuntu, Centos, and Debian (you can pick your favorite distro).
Knowledge of web server administration – management of Nginx and Apache web servers
Experience with database administration – management of databases and database servers
Experience with CI/CD and automation – management of the development pipeline and task automation.
Understanding of Development Security Operations – management of development infrastructure security.
Experience with bash scripting (experience in Python and PHP is a plus)
Experience with infrastructure and event monitoring – monitoring infrastructure, resource utilization, security events, and so on.
Proven experience with cloud computing and virtualization – working with hypervisors and cloud service providers.

title: Senior SME/L3+ MSP IT Engineer | WFH | Benefits
description:
To apply, visit our website remotepro.ph/

About the Role:
Our senior team members are critical to supporting our awesome clients and their users. They leverage industry leading tools and their experience to help resolve complex issues and help prevent futures ones

This position is an integral part of the Helpdesk Team, and the ideal candidate should be comfortable serving as a “hands-on” senior team member who responds to support requests from clients and junior team members.

The goal is to deliver exceptional service and long-lasting solutions to clients in order to foster loyalty and client satisfaction.

Responsibilities:

Identify the ideal solution based on the issue and the information provided by the clients.
Perform remote troubleshooting using diagnostic methods and guide the client through the troubleshooting process.
Serve as a point of escalation for issues raised by Level 1 and Level 2 support
Support and troubleshooting for multiple clients leveraging a broad range of solutions
Provide guidance and direction to more junior members of the team.
The role is technically challenging, and it will require you to communicate with clients and vendors over the phone or via email.
Log events, problems, and their resolutions.

What we’re looking for:

Previous experience working in an MSP environment is very valuable.
Deep Microsoft 365 experience with experience in managing complex end user issues and backend provisioning and troubleshooting.
Excellent communication skills – Ability to have a comfortable conversation in English without thinking formal or technical – be a friend
Excellent attention to detail and follow-through abilities (never let it go till solved)
Demonstrable experience working with Windows systems (client/server). Ideally, enough experience with a wide range of end-user and other IT areas to solve problems that others may overlook.
Experience with MSP tools such as RMM, PSA, and similar is helpful.  RMM in particular is important to ensure these tools are properly leveraged.
Essentially, you must demonstrate that you can handle even the most difficult tasks by properly setting expectations and determining the solution in a reasonable amount of time.
Out-of-the-box thinker, proactive/creative, and always improving things.
Willingness to go the extra mile to ensure client satisfaction.
Demonstratable ability to learn on the fly.

Nice to Haves:

Scripting/PowerShell experience
Mac OS use and support experience
Mobile Device Management

Salary depends on experience and over time the value you are able to demonstrate at start or over time.

title: Admin with Workforce Scheduling Experience
description:
*** Please include your resume and a cover letter with the number 650 as the subject header along with outlining your relevant experience and qualifications, to be considered for an interview, otherwise your application will be rejected. ***


Job Title: Admin with Workforce Scheduling Experience 

Job Summary: 

We are looking for a highly organized and detail-oriented Administrator with Workforce Scheduling Experience to manage and coordinate staffing schedules, ensuring the right employees are working on the right thing at the right time. This role requires effective communication, problem-solving skills, and a strong ability to multitask in a fast-paced environment. The ideal candidate will also provide general administrative support to ensure smooth department operations. 

Key Responsibilities: 

1. Workforce Scheduling: 
        a. Create, update, and manage daily, weekly, and monthly staff schedules based on business requirements and employee 
             availability. 
        b. Monitor, track and adjust schedules to address sick leave, vacation, personal time and urgency of tasks. 
        c. Coordinate with the team and the client to ensure the proper staffing levels are maintained. 

2. Communication & Coordination: 
        a. Serve as the point of contact for staff regarding schedule changes. 
        b. Communicate with employees to confirm availability and adjust shifts accordingly. 
        c. Notify team members about upcoming shifts, shift changes, or cancellations in a timely manner. 
        d. Manage and communicate any schedule adjustments. 

3. Employee Deliverables & Task Completion: 
        a. Track employee deliverable timelines and task activities.  
        b. Ensure employees adhere to the expected delivery of tasks and resolve any conflicts or discrepancies. 

4. Workforce Reporting, Documentation and Optimization: 
        a. Maintain accurate records of employee schedules, time-off requests, and attendance. 
        b. Monitor workforce performance and suggest improvements in scheduling practices to optimize productivity and 
            employee satisfaction. 
        c. Assess staffing needs based on workload projections, employee performance, and historical trends. 
        d. Identify and recommend strategies for improving shift coverage, reducing overtime, and ensuring the team works 
            efficiently. 


Administrative Support: 

•Provide general administrative support, including filing, and organizing documents. 
•Manage client communication and email inbox management. 
•Assist with special projects and tasks as required by management. 
•Problem Solving & Conflict Resolution: 
•Resolve scheduling conflicts, including accommodating last-minute time-off requests and unplanned absences. 
•Address employee concerns related to their schedules and work shifts, ensuring positive employee relations. 
•Proactively handle and escalate issues related to workforce shortages, excessive overtime, or operational disruptions. 



Skills and Qualifications: 

•Experience: Minimum of 1-2 years in administrative and scheduling roles with ability to assign and manage tasks for 10-15 people. 
•Communication: Strong verbal and written communication skills for interacting with employees and management. Preferably someone who has experience in client management and/or Executive assistance. 
•Problem-Solving: You are detail oriented and able to troubleshoot issues and resolve conflicts quickly and efficiently. 
•Technology Proficiency: Experience in using Airtable or other Project Management software, Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, Word), and communication tools (e.g., email, Slack). 
•Time Management: Proven ability to meet deadlines and adjust priorities based on changing business needs. 
•Interpersonal Skills: Ability to maintain positive relationships with employees, team members, and management. 


This post is open for Full time and/or part time.  



*** Please include your resume and a cover letter with the number 650 as the subject header along with outlining your relevant experience and qualifications, to be considered for an interview, otherwise your application will be rejected. ***

title: GENERATE LEADS & SCRAPING
description:
Main tasks:
 - Develop and manage scraping tools to collect key data: real estate agencies, owner contact details, marketing or press agencies, and high-income profiles via LinkedIn.
 - Ensure compliance with current regulations.
 - Identify and exploit data sources relevant to our activities (real estate, media, concierge services).
 - Optimize the performance of scrapers and guarantee the reliability of collected data.

Profile required:
 - Expertise in developing scraping tools and automating data collection.
 - Knowledge of best practices and laws governing scraping.
 - Rigor, analytical skills and ability to process large volumes of data.
 - Experience on platforms such as LinkedIn or in similar sectors a plus.

title: Virtual Assistant for LinkedIn Engagement
description:
Please read carefully before applying.

I'm a business consultant who creates content on social media to attract more clients.

I'm looking for a reliable virtual assistant to manage LinkedIn/FB engagement tasks. You'll interact with accounts, leave thoughtful comments, and help grow my network. This role needs consistency, attention to detail, and tiny bit of creativity to keep my presence human and engaging.

This is a long-term role, 4 hours/day, 5 days/week. The job starts at the beginning of Dec 2024

====== What you’ll do ======

- Daily comment on posts from a defined list of creators.
- Reply to comments on my posts.
- Track engagement under my posts and update connection lists weekly.
- Send connection requests and start conversations with new prospects (using a script).
- Identify DM conversations that need my attention.
- Optional: Provide ideas to make comments and replies more natural and engaging.

====== What I'm looking for ======

- Reliable and organized, with an eye for detail.
- Comfortable with routine tasks and long-term consistency.
- Friendly and professional communication style.
- Strong written English skills.
- Nice to have: a creative touch in engagement.

====== What you will get ======

- A respectful and trusting work relationship.
- Clear goals and tasks so you always know what to do.
- Support when you need it, but freedom to work your way.
- Flexibility to bring creativity to comments and replies.
- Regular feedback to help you improve and succeed.
- Recognition and appreciation for the effort you put in.
- A chance to learn from a clear and efficient entrepreneur.

!!!!!!!!!    IMPORTANT!    !!!!!!!!
While applying for the position, please complete these questions to be considered for the role
(don’t use AI while answering, honesty for me is more important than “right” answers):

1. How do you stay motivated and ensure high quality when performing routine tasks daily for an extended period?
2. What makes a social media comment engaging and human rather than generic?
3. What specific experience do you have with LinkedIn or similar platforms in a VA role?
4. If hired, when would you be ready to start?

Applications without answers to these questions will not be considered.

title: Graphic Designer for Fast-Growing E-Commerce Business
description:
We’re a rapidly growing e-commerce business seeking a talented Graphic Designer to help us create visually compelling and high-converting image ads for platforms like Facebook and Instagram.

Key Responsibilities:
 • Designing engaging and innovative image ads based on your own ideas, supplied scripts, examples, and creative briefs.
 • Developing multiple ad variants to test different concepts.
 • Ensuring designs align with brand guidelines and appeal to target audiences.
 • Incorporating feedback quickly to meet daily ad turnover needs.
 • Providing fresh creative ideas and contributing to the overall ad strategy.

Requirements:
 • Creative & Collaborative: You excel in a team environment and consistently deliver unique design concepts.
 • Detail-Oriented with Graphic Design Experience: You have a strong eye for detail and are proficient in design tools like Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, or similar software.
 • Full-Time Availability & Flexibility: You can work full-time with a flexible schedule to accommodate our fast-paced ad creation cycle.
 • Understanding of Ad Formats & Social Media Trends: Familiarity with Facebook and Instagram ad specifications and trends is a big plus.
 • Proficiency with AI Design Tools: Experience with AI tools for design enhancement or automation is an added advantage.
 • Access to Stock Image Libraries: You should have access to stock image platforms for diverse creative needs.
 • Knowledge of Facebook Ad Policies (preferred, not mandatory): Familiarity with guidelines for ad approval would be helpful.

What We Offer:
 • Work with an ambitious, international team.
 • Experience in a fast-growing e-commerce environment.
 • A fixed hourly wage.
 • Potential for a long-term position if we’re a great fit.

Application Requirement:
Please include a portfolio showcasing your graphic design skills and relevant work, particularly any ad designs created for social media platforms.

If you’re passionate about design and ready to contribute to a dynamic team, we’d love to hear from you!

title: Full Stack / Back end (Python and Javascript)
description:
We are looking for a back-end developer with expertise in JavaScript, Python, and advanced scripting? Do you thrive in building innovative solutions with cutting-edge technologies like Large Language Model (LLM) APIs? 

Key Responsibilities:
- Design, develop, and maintain back-end systems using JavaScript and Python.
- Implement advanced scripting and automation solutions.
- Utilize LLM APIs (e.g., GPT-4, Claude) for content generation, parsing, and business logic integration.
- Work with low-code platforms such as Zapier.com and Make.com to streamline workflows.
- Lead a team of developers, providing mentorship, guidance, and technical oversight.
- Apply event-driven and functional programming paradigms to deliver scalable, efficient solutions.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure project goals are met with high quality and attention to detail.

What We’re Looking For?  We’re looking for someone with:

* Experience: At least 5 years in software development have worked with LLM APIs for at least 1 year. Bonus points if you’ve led a team of developers!
* Tech Skills: You’re a pro with JavaScript, Python, and TypeScript, and you know your way around event-driven and functional programming. Experience with tools like Zapier and Make.com is a big plus.
* A Problem-Solver’s Mindset: You enjoy tackling challenges independently and crafting innovative solutions with minimal hand-holding.
* Good Communication: You’re able to explain complex ideas clearly, collaborate with diverse teams, and pay attention to the little details that make all the difference.
*Must be available to work from 8am-5pm Philippines time.


Qualified applicants must email resume and link of your work sample to jobs@onlinejobs.ph

title: Dropshipping Order Fulfillment CS with experience in Data Analytics
description:
The Company in a Nutshell

GTEcom BV (gtecombv.com/) was established in 2018 and headquartered in The Netherlands. Our mission is to continue scaling our operations and opening & sustaining more successful global brands to achieve our target of $500M revenue and more than 50 stores worldwide by 2027. Our diverse team of 70 and growing remote e-commerce experts in their own niches from different parts of the world is helping us transform our vision of growing the company to a reality.
We are committed to cultivating a culture of hard work, freedom and responsibility, constant improvement, and positivity in our team.

The Upsides of Working with Us
-Thrive in a results-driven environment with the autonomy to shape your own approach
-Achieve a great work-life balance with remote work and flexible schedule
-Enjoy a competitive salary that reflects your skills and contributions
-Collaborate with a dynamic remote team
-Be a key player in our rapidly growing company

We’re on the lookout for a Fulfillment Customer Service & Data Analyst to join our expanding team and drive our company’s growth!

Day in the Life of a Fulfillment Customer Service & Data Analyst at GT Ecom
-Respond to customer service team inquiries about order statuses, ensuring accurate and timely updates.
-Regularly analyze and monitor product prices across various suppliers to ensure competitive pricing and profitability.
-Track and record price changes, ensuring the product listings on the website are updated accurately and in a timely manner
-Assist in setting appropriate pricing strategies, taking into account market trends and supplier pricing updates
-Verify supplier invoices for accuracy, ensuring the correct pricing, shipping costs, and any applicable discounts are applied.
-Maintain positive working relationships with suppliers, addressing any issues related to product availability, pricing discrepancies, or order delays.
-Ensure accurate and timely payments to suppliers, keeping records of all transactions and monitoring payment schedules.
-Record and maintain detailed records of pricing, invoices, and payment statuses to ensure transparency and accurate reporting.
-Provide regular updates and reports to management on pricing changes, order statuses, and supplier performance.

We would love to hear from you if…
-At least 5 years of experience in e-commerce.
-Proven experience in customer service (CS) roles
-Proven expertise in data analysis, particularly using Excel.
-Background in Business Intelligence (BI) development or a degree in statistics is preferred.
-Meticulous attention to detail, strong sense of ownership, and numerical proficiency.
-Ability to thrive under pressure and handle stressful situations effectively.

If you are excited about the opportunity and feel like you are a good fit, we encourage you to apply today and talk to one of our recruiters. We look forward to seeing how your skills and experiences align with our vision. If unsure, we still welcome your application and would be happy to discuss other potential roles that may be a good fit for you.

Please apply directly to our careers page through this link: gtecombv.teamtailor.com/jobs/5252106-fulfillment-customer-service-data-analyst

title: Automation Specialist
description:
Automation Specialist 
The Automation Specialist will focus on automating the generation of recurring key reports related to finance, supply chain, and other operational metrics to improve efficiency, timeliness, and accuracy. The role may also support broader automation needs across the organization, such as optimizing workflows, enhancing data integrations, and streamlining processes. 
Responsibilities
Report Automation - Design workflows to automate financial, supply chain, inventory, and sales reports. Integrate Amazon Seller Central with reporting tools to track key metrics.
Workflow Automation - Automate recurring processes like task assignments, notifications, and data sync to reduce manual effort. Maintain automated solutions for project management, communication, and collaboration tools.
Data Integration - Connect systems (e.g., Amazon Seller Central, ClickUp, Slack, Google Sheets) for seamless data flow and workflow continuity. Build real-time dashboards for easy access to key business data.
Recurring Tasks Automation - Streamline P&L reporting, stock forecasting, and order tracking. Automate alerts for low-stock, financial anomalies, or supply chain disruptions.
KPI Monitoring - Create systems to monitor and report KPIs for finance, supply chain, and operations.
Scalable Automation Solutions - Identify new automation opportunities and implement scalable solutions for business growth.
Workflow & KPI Monitoring - Facilitate or support the automation of general workflows to reduce manual effort and coordinate KPI monitoring systems for various business functions as needed.
Documentation & Continuous Improvement - Maintain workflow documentation and enhance existing processes for greater efficiency.

Requirements
Experience
2+ years in process automation, reporting, or workflow optimization, preferably in e-commerce.
Familiarity with ClickUp and Amazon Seller Central reporting (preferred).
Proficient in workflow automation tools and spreadsheets (e.g., Google Sheets, Excel).
Knowledge of APIs, data connectors, and dashboards.
Basic understanding of financial, supply chain, and operational metrics.
Strong analytical, organizational, and time management skills.
Proactive with effective communication and team collaboration.
Experience designing scalable workflows, and basic programming/scripting knowledge (huge plus)

title: EXECUTIVE ASSISTANT (SHOPIFY MANAGER / FUNNELS EXPERT)
description:
We are AIRASSISTANT.io, an award-winning virtual assistant agency that is passionate about helping our clients grow their businesses and processes to new heights using social media automation and sales funnels! We help professional women from the Philippines by training them to be master Executive Assistants to our clients through Social Media Management, Sales Funnel Creation, Executive Assistant Task/Calendar Management, Digital Marketing, as well as Sales & Lead Generation (yea, all that and a bag of chips ????).

Become a certified AirAssistant for FREE, then get guaranteed part-time or full-time job placement with one of our vetted clients within 30 days of certification - with opportunity for raises and full time employment. Before you read any farther - this role is not for the lazy person, freeloader, inexperienced or incompetent. You’ll probably get fired as soon as you start, so save yourself the embarrassment. If you are a detail-oriented, OVERCOMMUNICATING go-getter who loves the idea of helping change lives through entrepreneurship, then read on…

Details below:

EXPERIENCE:
1+ years of experience in Social Media Marketing, Sales Funnels, Shopify, or Digital Marketing: We're looking for a professional woman who is passionate about helping changemakers simplify their lives by setting up systems that will allow them to operate their businesses with more ease and less overwhelm. You have experience with sales funnel and CRM software
1+ years of experience advertising on platforms like Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, within a Marketing team consisting of Paid Acquisition, Organic Marketing, Customer Retention, & Product Marketing: We’re looking for an emerging leader who has the potential to head a team in the future that will report directly to you. Having leadership experience is a MAJOR plus
1+ years of experience as a Virtual Assistant or Executive Assistant with track record of company success.: You've done it all from managing schedules to email & calendar management. You have a meticulous eye for detail where Prioritization and Organization are your love language
Creating SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures): You’ll ensure each business function has detailed documentation for repeatable and scalable growth if it isn't already in place. If you see gaps, you take the initiative to fill them and produce results without anyone knowing there was an issue (yea, we did say all that and a bag of chips :-)
Experience working at a digital/online product/platform: You’re familiar with online courses, digital products & platforms and popular tools in the business space ranging from landing page builders and email service providers to CRMs, and course hosting platforms aren’t foreign to you (We teach tools like Shopify, Convertkit, Kajabi, Teachable, Learnworlds, Calendly, etc)

ABOUT YOU:
“You down with SOP? Yeah you know me!”—You’re an advocate for SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures) to make our systems repeatable & scalable.
Your love language is processes & predictable, meteoric growth. We never question company progress towards the quarterly and yearly goals because you keep real-time metrics for all projects.
You’re aware of new software and can look at current systems and identify how to automate tasks a company has been doing manually for months.
You’re addicted to digital processes & automation in the world of social media because you love building connections in the digital space and you’ve seen how powerful it can be in business growth
You’re driven by metrics & tracking. You know that you can’t improve something unless you measure it, so you develop ways to measure performance so your company is always predictably improving.
Timeliness and deadlines are your jam. When we have a team call at 10:00am, you show up at 9:55am. When the deadline is Tuesday at 5:30pm, you have it done Monday before you clock out.
You overcommunicate clearly and confidently. If you agree/disagree with something, you communicate that without hesitation or overthinking. You’re no stranger to asking why we do things a certain way to ensure we’re intentional with our resources. You send regular updates without having to be asked, and always make sure to treat the company you work for as if it was your own brainchild.
You’re a leader and team player. Ego? What ego? If something needs to be done, you dive in to make sure all critical tasks are accounted and cared for.

*because we care about detail-oriented applicants, mention the secret word “PINEAPPLE” in your application so we know you read this in its entirety*

If you’re nodding your head “Yes” to the above, proceed below to apply.

PERKS:
We're committed to setting you up for success as a certified Air Assistant that is equipped to take on any role your employer assigns you to. Upon acceptance as a candidate, you get exclusive access to trainings that will certify your skills in:

Task & Calendar Management
Launch/Sales Strategy Planning
Sales Funnel Tech Setup (For E-Commerce or Service Based Businesses)
Social Media Management
Digital Media Marketing (Including Email and SMS Marketing)
Lead Generation
After one week of training and assessment, you're officially a certified Air Assistant, which means we work to guarantee a part-time remote job with a woman-owned business dedicated to long term success of her company's team and clients/customers. Before signing an employee agreement under our umbrella, you get to meet them in a virtual Executive Assistant Mixer to make sure there is a connection between brand and AA.

Apply and we'll be in touch soon to invite you to next steps in the application/candidate process! Again - don't apply unless you are ready to hit the ground running with your current digital marketing/automation experience


Part time work hours (minimum 25 hours per week required)
Work from anywhere in the world (as long as your internet signal is strong and computer is fast)
Starting Salary at $350 USD a month ($4200 USD annual)
Free certification program to enhance your professional skills in your career
Guaranteed job placement after certification. Typical time between getting certified and getting placed = 30 days. If it takes longer, your profile will remain in our database and we reach out to all available AA's every week to potentially get matched with a Founder. Be ready!

You’re addicted to digital processes & automation in the world of social media because you love building connections in the digital space and you’ve seen how powerful it can be in business growth
You’re driven by metrics & tracking. You know that you can’t improve something unless you measure it, so you develop ways to measure performance so your company is always predictably improving.
Timeliness and deadlines are your jam. When we have a team call at 10:00am, you show up at 9:55am. When the deadline is Tuesday at 5:30pm, you have it done Monday before you clock out.
You overcommunicate clearly and confidently. If you agree/disagree with something, you communicate that without hesitation or overthinking. You’re no stranger to asking why we do things a certain way to ensure we’re intentional with our resources. You send regular updates without having to be asked, and always make sure to treat the company you work for as if it was your own brainchild.
You’re a leader and team player. Ego? What ego? If something needs to be done, you dive in to make sure all critical tasks are accounted and cared for.

Social Media Management

Lead Generation
After one week of training and assessment, you're officially a certified Air Assistant, which means we work to guarantee a part-time remote job with a woman-owned business dedicated to long term success of her company's team and clients/customers. Before signing an employee agreement under our umbrella, you get to meet them in a virtual Executive Assistant Mixer to make sure there is a connection between brand and AA.

Apply and we'll be in touch soon to invite you to next steps in the application/candidate process! Again - don't apply unless you are ready to hit the ground running with your current digital marketing/automation experience


Part time work hours (minimum 25 hours per week required)
Work from anywhere in the world (as long as your internet signal is strong and computer is fast)
Starting Salary at $350 USD a month ($4200 USD annual)
Free certification program to enhance your professional skills in your career
Guaranteed job placement after certification. Typical time between getting certified and getting placed = 30 days. If it takes longer, your profile will remain in our database and we reach out to all available AA's every week to potentially get matched with a Founder. Be ready!

title: eCommerce Customer Service Manager
description:
About Us:

We are a growing eCommerce business, and we plan on building multiple brands as this is our passion. As our business expands, we are looking for a dedicated and experienced Customer Support Manager to join our team for the long term. This role comes with tons of growth opportunities as you’ll be able to shape and lead our customer service department.

Key Responsibilities:

Basic Tasks:

Respond to customer emails promptly and professionally.

Monitor and manage >>Facebook comments and customer inquiries.

Handle chargebacks and PayPal disputes efficiently. (we have a software that handles this, so you will need to just make sure things are running smoothly with disputes)

Calculate daily profit and loss (P&L) to keep track of performance.

Review and verify weekly bills sent by suppliers.

Advanced Tasks:

Build and implement customer support systems and scripted best fitting for the brand (e.g., SOPs, Zendesk).

Track and report on key support metrics. (response time, resolutions time, customer ticket rate, refund request rate, refund rate, etc)

Manage and improve our TrustPilot profile. (When needed)

Develop a comprehensive help center for customers.

Handle and resolve complex return requests.

Collaborate on product quality improvements based on customer feedback.

Recruit and train customer support agents as the team grows.

What We’re Looking For:

Experience in managing customer service operations (email, social media, disputes).

Strong problem-solving skills, especially with chargebacks and returns.

Familiarity with customer service platforms (e.g., Zendesk) and building support systems.

Ability to create and refine Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs).

Experience with performance metrics, reports, and Trustpilot is a plus.

Leadership qualities and the ability to scale a team.

Excellent communication and organizational skills.

Strong attention to detail.

Why Join Us?

Long-term position with stability and growth potential.

Opportunity to shape the customer service department and team.

Work remotely with flexibility.

If you’re ready to take on a leadership role and be part of a dynamic team, we’d love to hear from you! Apply today to join us on this exciting journey. Also, make sure your first message is blue, if not you won't be considered for this role. I'm looking forward to connecting.

title: Jr. Data Analyst at a Skincare Brand – Full-Time Role + Growth Opportunities
description:
Our 8-figure e-commerce brand is hiring a Data Assistant to help us streamline repetitive data tasks and support our Data Analyst. If you're organized, detail-oriented, and enjoy working with data systems, this role is for you!

Key Responsibilities:

-Assist in creating dashboards to monitor key metrics like profit, inventory levels, and marketing performance.
-Perform repetitive data collection tasks and ensure accuracy across platforms like Shopify, Facebook Ads, and Google Ads.
-Support automations to track shipping delays and flag issues for resolution.
-Help manage and update Profit & Loss reports monthly.
-Ensure timely and accurate updates to reports and dashboards for critical decision-making.

Requirements:

-Proficiency in Google Sheets, including formulas and data organization.
-Basic understanding of Google Looker Studio or willingness to learn.
-Familiarity with e-commerce platforms like Shopify (preferred but not required).
-Knowledge of automating tasks using tools like Zapier (preferred).
-Strong attention to detail and organizational skills.

Tools and Applications:

-Google Sheets
-Google Looker Studio
-Zapier
-Shopify

-Google Ads

-PayPal

Schedule:

-Full-time: 8 hours per day, Monday to Friday.

-$1000/month, with growth opportunities.

About the company:

Founded in Italy, we are a growing skincare brand specializing in acne treatment and anti-aging solutions. Originating from the founder's personal struggle with acne, we now primarily operate in the US. We have improved the skin of over 100,000 women, collaborated with 600 influencers, and partnered with a celebrity doctor as the face of our marketing campaigns.

Our goal is to reach 10 million customers in the next 3 years. We foster a culture of continuous learning from top experts in our field, open communication, and data-driven decision-making. Our fast-paced environment offers endless opportunities for professional growth and the chance to make a real difference in people's lives through skincare.

title: Junior Software Engineer - AI Web App Development (Remote)
description:
We're a startup developing new AI marketing technology that creates highly personalized, interactive user experiences. We're looking for a talented and ambitious junior developer to join our founding team and help shape the future of AI-driven customer engagement.

About Our Vision

We're building a platform that combines custom-trained AI models with interactive web experiences to create deeply personalized marketing journeys. Our current product in the manifestation/spirituality space is just the beginning – we're proving our technology and plan to expand across multiple industries and markets.

What We Are Looking For

We are not looking for years of proven experience. The priority is someone with high agency, problem solving skills, work ethic, and willingness to learn. You must have strong education background and foundational programming skills. 

How We Hire

Our company works on a diverse range of projects and has a remote team of 40+ across the world, we love to hire for talented and motivated junior roles, and train up team members grow their skills careers as much as they want. You'll have access to the best tools and any training you want or require. You'll have the opportunity and freedom to make meaningful contributions to the project right from the start. 

Why This Role is Unique

This new AI project has a team of 5 right now. We have proven the initial concept, and now we need to developer and scale the technology. We want someone who will join the team for the long-term and help develop our technology and grow into a leadership role. 

Ground Floor Opportunity: Join a small, innovative team as we develop cutting-edge technology
Direct Impact: Your work will directly influence our core technology and product direction
AI Technology Focus: Work with custom-trained models and latest AI tools to create unique user experiences
Rapid Growth Path: As we expand to new markets, grow into a technical leadership role
Innovation at Core: We're not just using AI – we're creating new ways to apply it to marketing

Our Current Tech Stack

Frontend: Next.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
Backend: Next.js API routes, Prisma, Express, Python, FastAPI
AI Integration: Custom trained models, OpenAI API, Stability AI
Database: PostgreSQL
Infrastructure: Heroku

Must-Have Qualities

Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities
High initiative and ability to work independently
Fascination with AI and its practical applications
Eagerness to learn new technologies and frameworks
Comfort with uncertainty and rapid changes
Strong programming fundamentals

Nice-to-Have Skills

Any experience with React or web development
Interest in or experience with AI/ML
Basic understanding of APIs
Familiarity with TypeScript or JavaScript

Your Growth Journey

Initial Phase: Master our stack while contributing to our current product
Growth Phase: Take ownership of features and help develop our core AI marketing technology
Leadership Phase: Help architect solutions for new markets and industries

Requirements

Some overlap with Sydney business hours (AEST)
Strong English communication skills
Reliable internet connection
Full-time availability

Application Process

Please put in your application through this Google form:
https://forms.gle/aw15GkSopSTVzX5v7

title: Bookkeeping and Ecomm Virtual Assistant
description:
We are a Global growing Eccommerce Company looking for a Specialist that can help us manager our ecommerce Amazon and Shopify stores as well as do some Accounting/Bookkeeping tasks in Quickbooks for us. Full Time Salaried Position. 

Responsibilities Include:
1. Handle Customer Service Replies via Email and Chat
2. Creating Cases For Reimbursements and Amazon Claims
3. Responding to Customer Service Requests through Amazon Messaging and Email
4. Managing Customer Returns Shipment Requests through PirateShip, Shipstation, or Veeqo
5. Review and Respond to Reviews and Feedback 
6. Filing Claims with USPS for lost shipping
7. Finance Bookkeeping and Excel Reconciliation using Quickbooks
8. Has high energy, flexibility, and great customer service skills. Need to speak, read, and write good English

Tasks Include but not limited to: Bookkeeping, Handling all Customer Service requests, reading all reviews and feedback posted to our seller accounts online and on amazon and responding directly to customers with a solution. Doing product research using Alibaba and google. Contacting Suppliers via email and alibaba, and skype to get quotes, samples, info.  Using Excel daily and Google Docs to manage our products, samples, you will also be tracking inventory and placing our orders directly with manufacturers. Manage our customer service and resolution process.  Once you master these tasks, you will be promoted to a managerial role where you will be responsible for hiring and training other Virtual Assistants to handle similar tasks. 

JOB SKILLS REQUIRED: 
* Customer Service Experience in a previous job with Ecomm Management Experience (Amazon Helpful)
* Accounting Background, degree or experience with bookkeeping/finance management
* Excel, Word, Office, Google Docs, Skype, Gmail, Internet experience required
* Typing 35+ WPM (Please send screen shot of a recent typing test when replying)
* Good English Grammar skills: Able to hold a conversation via Phone in English, Email, Chat

ADDITIONAL EXPERIENCE PREFERRED:
* Trello, Asana Project or Basecamp Project Management Software 
* Quickbooks knowledge and experience
* Amazon Seller Central Account Experience
* tiktok shop Experience
* Shopify Experience
* Photoshop/Graphic work in past is helpful but not required

*** If you meet the requirements above and wish to apply and qualify for this job:

1. Email your current CV/Resume to me at utebrandsllc@gmail.com
2. Write a short paragraph on why you are a good fit and qualified for this role
3. Include a copy of your Typing Test, internet Connection Speed, and your computer hardware make/model/specs
4. Search the internet for the name of the Current CEO of NIVIDIA and then please put in the email subject line when applying:  "I would like to be friends with  _______________ the CEO of Nividia"

title: CRM and Data Reporting Specialist
description:
Overview:
We are seeking a highly skilled CRM and Data Reporting Specialist to manage, customize, and optimize our CRM system (EspoCRM) and create actionable reports using MS Excel and Power BI. The ideal candidate will have strong technical expertise, excellent analytical skills, and the ability to work independently in a fast-paced environment. Must work 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM EST. 

Responsibilities:
- Customize and manage EspoCRM backend, including creating workflows, reports, and data integrations.  
- Build and maintain advanced reports and dashboards in MS Excel and Power BI.  
- Create custom data queries using SQL and optimize database performance for reporting needs.  
- Integrate and manipulate data from CRM using REST APIs.  
- Troubleshoot and resolve CRM-related issues and ensure data integrity.  
- Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into actionable reports.  
- Develop automated solutions for report generation and distribution.  

Qualifications
- Proven experience with CRM systems, preferably EspoCRM or similar platforms (Zoho, Salesforce, etc.).  
- Advanced skills in MS Excel (VBA, Power Query, Pivot Tables).  
- Expertise in Power BI, including DAX and data modeling.  
- Strong knowledge of SQL and database management (MySQL preferred).  
- Proficiency in PHP and REST APIs for CRM customization.  
- Experience in data visualization and creating user-friendly dashboards.  
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.  
- Ability to learn new tools quickly and work independently.  

Preferred Skills
- Familiarity with Tableau or other BI tools.  
- Experience working with data from e-commerce or custom portals.  
- Background in business analysis or data-driven decision-making.

title: SEO OPTIMIZATION -Airbnb Vacation Rental Operations Specialist
description:
We seek a highly skilled and motivated Vacation Rental Specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will be intimately familiar with selling, marketing, and hosting vacation rentals on platforms such as Airbnb, VRBO/HomeAway, Booking.com, Expedia.com, and direct websites using WordPress. This remote position requires excellent communication skills, a proactive attitude, and the ability to manage multiple properties efficiently. The working hours for this position are from **10 am to 7 pm Eastern Time.

WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU FROM JOINING OUR TEAM?
-Government Mandated Benefits
-13th-month Pay
-Paid SL and VL upon regularization
- Competitive with performance-based bonuses.
- Opportunities for professional growth and development.
- Collaborative and supportive team culture.

Key Responsibilities:
Listing Management:
Create and optimize property listings on Airbnb, VRBO/HomeAway, Booking.com, Expedia.com, and direct websites using WordPress to maximize visibility and bookings.

Pricing Strategy:
Develop and implement dynamic pricing strategies to ensure competitive rates and maximize revenue.

Guest Communication:
Handle all guest inquiries, bookings, and reviews promptly and professionally, ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction.

Marketing:
 Utilize various marketing channels, including social media, email campaigns, and SEO, to promote properties and attract potential guests.

Property Management:
 Coordinate with local service providers for cleaning, maintenance, and other on-site needs to ensure properties are well-maintained and guest-ready.

Performance Analysis:
Monitor and analyze booking trends, occupancy rates, and guest feedback to continuously improve property performance.

Compliance:
 Ensure all properties comply with local regulations and industry standards.

Emergency Management:
Develop and implement protocols for handling emergencies, including maintenance issues, guest health emergencies, and natural disasters. Coordinate with local contacts to ensure rapid response and resolution.

KEY COMPETENCIES:
- Proven experience in managing vacation rentals on Airbnb, VRBO/HomeAway, Booking.com, Expedia.com, and direct websites using WordPress.
- Strong understanding of the vacation rental market and trends.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
- Proficiency in using property management software and tools.
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
- Strong organizational and time-management skills.
- Customer-oriented mindset with a focus on delivering exceptional service.

MUST HAVE SKILLS TOWARDS WORK:
-Proactive: Takes initiative to identify and solve problems before they escalate.
-Detail-oriented: Pays close attention to details to ensure listings are accurate and appealing.
- Tech-Savvy: Comfortable using various digital tools and platforms to manage listings and communicate with guests.
- Adaptable: Able to adjust strategies based on market trends and guest feedback.
- Empathetic: Understands and anticipates guest needs, providing a personalized and memorable experience.
- Reliable: Consistently meets deadlines and maintains high standards of service.
- Crisis Management: Capable of handling emergencies effectively, including coordinating with local service providers and maintaining clear communication with guests.

PERFORMANCE METRICS:
- Occupancy Rate: Measure the percentage of booked nights versus available nights to gauge property popularity and booking efficiency.
- Average Daily Rate (ADR): Track the average revenue earned per booked night to assess pricing strategy effectiveness.
Revenue per Available Room (RevPAR): To evaluate overall financial performance, calculate total revenue divided by the number of available rooms.
- Guest Satisfaction Score: Collect and analyze guest reviews and ratings to ensure high levels of customer satisfaction.
- Booking Conversion Rate: Monitor the percentage of inquiries that convert into confirmed bookings to optimize communication and lasting appeal.
- Response Time: Track the average time taken to respond to guest inquiries and booking requests to maintain prompt and professional communication.
- Maintenance and Cleanliness Scores: Evaluate feedback related to property upkeep and cleanliness to ensure high standards are consistently met.
- Marketing ROI: Analyze the return on investment for various marketing campaigns to determine the most effective channels and strategies.

HOW TO BE PART OF OUR DYNAMIC TEAM?
Those applications without this will be immediately rejected.

1. To apply, please submit on Online jobs.ph your resume, cover letter, and writing examples detailing your relevant experience and explaining why you are the ideal candidate for this role. In your cover letter response via Online jobs.ph, please use the word "Zebra" creatively in sentences, so we know you're paying attention to detail. Don't just put the word in a subject line, make a creative sentence.
2.  A link to your 3-5 minute self-introduction video explaining why you would be a good fit for this position. 
2. A link to your updated resume. 
3. A link to any of your work or portfolio, if available.
Ensure that the link is public so we can access it.
Attention to detail is a vital aspect of this role.

Any applications without this will automatically be rejected no matter how experienced or great you may be for this position.


If you are passionate about the vacation rental industry and have the skills and experience to excel in this role, we would love to hear from you!

title: Advanced Backend Developer (Zoho CRM, Deluge, eCommerce)
description:
PLEASE READ THE ENTIRE JOB DESCRIPTION CAREFULLY. THERE ARE IMPORTANT APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS TO FOLLOW.

About Us
We are a fast-paced eCommerce trading group operating multiple websites in the beauty vertical. Our mission is to create seamless business processes, integrate the most advanced technologies, and deliver the best possible site experience for our customers. We pride ourselves on staying ahead in a rapidly evolving industry, leveraging innovation to optimize the customer journey and back-end systems.

We’re looking for skilled and driven individuals who are eager to make an impact by developing solutions that enhance our operations and user experiences. If you thrive in a fast-paced environment, have a strong technical foundation, and enjoy solving complex challenges, this is the perfect opportunity for you to grow with us!

Position Summary: Advanced Backend Developer
We are seeking advanced backend developers with expertise in Zoho CRM and Deluge scripting. The ideal candidate will have strong experience in eCommerce development, with a particular focus on integrating and streamlining back-end systems while understanding the importance of the front-end customer experience. Your primary responsibility will be to create and optimize workflows, build integrations between tech stacks, and ensure our platforms are robust, efficient, and aligned with business goals.

Key Expertise Needed:

- Zoho CRM and Deluge scripting.
- Competency in building integrations between different tech stacks.
- eCommerce platforms and backend system development.
- Ruby (Shopify) and PHP (WordPress).

Responsibilities
- Develop and optimize backend systems using Zoho CRM and Deluge scripting.
- Build seamless integrations between Shopify, WordPress, Zoho apps, and other platforms.
- Create workflow automations and custom functions to improve business processes.
- Collaborate with the team to align backend functionality with front-end customer experience needs.
- Ensure platform reliability by testing and debugging systems in sandbox environments.
- Develop innovative solutions to enhance operational efficiency and improve customer satisfaction.

Skills and Qualifications
- Advanced proficiency in Zoho CRM and Deluge scripting.
- Strong knowledge of Ruby (Shopify) and PHP (WordPress).
- Experience in integrating multiple systems and platforms into a cohesive tech stack.
- Understanding of the eCommerce landscape, including the importance of the front-end user journey.
- Ability to free-code without reliance on AI tools (testing will be conducted during the hiring process).
- Strong attention to detail and ability to meet tight deadlines.
- Creativity and problem-solving skills to tackle complex challenges.
- Preferred (But Not Mandatory) Skills
- Experience with other Zoho One apps (e.g., Zoho Books, Zoho Desk, Zoho Flow).
- Front-end development knowledge (HTML, CSS, JavaScript).
- SEO understanding.
- Android and iOS app development experience.

Working Hours
- Full-Time: Monday to Friday (Saturday optional for additional hours).
- Part-time options are also available for the right candidates.

Compensation and Benefits
- Salary: $650-$1,500/month, based on experience and skill level.
- Qualify for 3 vacation leaves and 3 sick leaves after the 6-month probation period.
- Growth opportunities, including the potential to manage your own projects or team.
- Direct collaboration with senior management, including the CEO.
- Hands-on training to familiarize yourself with our systems and processes.

Why Join Us?
- Work with a growing and dynamic eCommerce group pushing the boundaries of tech innovation in the beauty industry.
- Be part of a collaborative team that values creativity, precision, and forward-thinking solutions.
- Gain exposure to cutting-edge technologies and opportunities for professional growth.

Application Process
- We are committed to finding the best fit for this role. To ensure you stand out and demonstrate your abilities, please follow these steps:

- Visit the Application Link: Go to https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdZ_vk1bAaZ4871WMeb6zb69eGB1uVLWuts70a4EqJLKwPgKw/viewform?usp=sf_link and complete the required application form with all requested details.
- Include a Loom Video: As part of your application, create and submit a Loom video explaining:
- Your experience with Zoho CRM, Deluge scripting, and relevant tech stacks.
- Specific examples of how you've solved complex challenges in eCommerce or backend development.
- Why you believe you are the perfect fit for this role.

Team Interview: Successful applicants will be invited to a detailed technical interview with our development team to assess your expertise.
Final Interview: Shortlisted candidates will meet with our CEO for a final discussion to ensure alignment with our company’s vision and values.

We look forward to seeing your application! Good luck, and we’re excited to meet you!

title: L2 Tech Support Engineer
description:
Dear Technology Lover!
We're a small (but VERY efficient) 20-year-old MSP based in Arizona.
As a small company. we're VERY employee-focused, and believe that our team members are our MOST IMPORTANT ASSET!

Here are some of the things you can expect from working with us:
• Ongoing (monthly) manager review and feedback- you should never guess where you are "standing" and what you, AND THE COMPANY, can do better!
• Paid certifications- we will pay for your courses, and tests and allocate time during business hours to help you achieve your desired goals
• Paid Time Off- it's important to us that you are happy, healthy, and have a work-life balance!
• Bonuses- when the company wins- you win!
• Raises- As we grow, we believe you should as well. We have to stay competitive as an employer to retain our awesome employees!
• Opportunities to grow- In our industry, we can't be on "cruise control"... We need to push our team members to stay ahead of the technology curve. Help you continually to sharpen your skills with a focus on your career aspirations.
• Paid sick days- We understand life happens. We don't want you to feel that you have to drag yourself to work sick if your body tells you to relax...

You're the right fit if you:
• LOVE learning, working with, and experimenting with new technology
• Get excited when you save someone's day and provide great service
• Are a hard-working fun person, and see yourself being in the IT industry for the foreseeable future
• Want to work in a GROWING environment, with STABLE income, Bonuses, and a great attitude!
• Want the opportunity to advance and learn more!

Some of the responsibilities that your position will include are:
Helpdesk (mostly escalations, but some basic if needed), cyber security related tasks/ audits, cloud hosting and virtualization (HyperV, SonicWall, VPN), MS365 management and automation, BCDR (Axcient), networking (Unifi, Sonicwall), IT projects, Servers maintenance (Windows only), scripts creation, testing new technology and other tasks related to IT.

IMPORTANT:
This position requires AT LEAST 2 years of MSP experience, 100% clean background check, highly organized, technologically savvy, and can work diligently with little supervision.
Several hiring steps will take place to verify the above requirements, including reference checking, employment verification, technical testing, and more.

Minimum technical level that you will need to be able to pass a test on:
• Explaining to a non-technical person what the "cloud" is
• Consulting with a new client on what BCDR solution you would recommend to an SMB, and why
• Explaining what the differences are between traditional anti-virus and XDR
• Creating a new Virtual Machine on Hyper-V host, from an ISO file located on a different computer on the network.
• Explaining the differences and commonalities between SharePoint and OneDrive.
• Creating an Intune policy that will install Firefox on an Azure-joined VM, and make Firefox the default browser, with the specific home page we'll provide to you during the test.
• Several other situational and technical questions.
• CCNA certificate candidates preferred but not required.

MORE DETAILS:
• A PRE-EMPLOYMENT BACKGROUND CHECK is performed (at our expense). You must have 100% clean background check. Please do not apply if you don't have 100% clean background check.
• Personality is KEY for us. We are looking for an easy-going, yet professional, friendly and HONEST person.
• You will be working from home. This means you must have a quiet work environment and no excessive background noise.
• FAST AND RELIABLE INTERNET SERVICE IS REQUIRED
• You must have a Computer/Laptop with at least i5 minimum 8th gen (preferably a newer one) with 16 GB RAM or more.
• Your device should be solely dedicated only for work. The provided device by the company will be arranged based on your tenure. Of course, you can still use it for personal, but downloading other stuff unless work-related is prohibited since we are an IT company, security is our priority.
• We evaluate/ review employees monthly and provide consistent feedback.
• We offer raises and bonuses according to performance, certifications, attitude, and customer reviews twice/ year.
• Your manager (our IT director) will create a roadmap for your "KPIs" and certifications track. We always push our team to earn certifications and additional knowledge – even allowing “disconnect study time” during business hours!
• On-call rotation (after-hours) for a week at a time, once every 4-5 weeks. It's VERY rare that we get calls after-hours (the average is only twice/ year!).
• We're closed on major US holidays, and at the completion of the first 3 months of employment, you'll qualify for paid holidays.
• Work hours are Mon-Fri at 8 am till 5:30 pm (UTC-07:00 , MST, Arizona time zone)
• Every 4 to 5 weeks, you'll be working 1/2 day on a Saturday (project work/catch-up work) and get 1/2 day off the week after
• Mandatory 1-hour lunch and additional breaks (as you need those) throughout the day.
• Further details and information will be discussed with qualified candidates.

EXPERIENCE REQUIRED:
• REQUIRED: Relevant minimum 2 YEARS experience working for an MSP
• REQUIRED: Microsoft Azure AD/ M365 experience
• REQUIRED: Experience working with an RMM and PSA software (DATTO preferred)
• Preferred: Cyber Security education/experience
• Preferred: Hyper-V experience

Other tools we use:
Barracuda DNS filter, AutoElevate, Cylance, Infocyte, Syxsense, IT Glue, SonicWall, Unifi, and more

HOW TO APPLY?

send an Email to customerservice+L2TS-Nov2024@galloptechgroup.com with the subject line "L2 Tech Support - November 2024".

In your email body, you MUST include the following, and ONLY the following please:
- An attachment of your resume in PDF format
- A confirmation (simple written statement) that you have a 100% clean background with no criminal history.
- A confirmation (simple written statement) that you understand the business hours (MST\ Arizona time zone.

Answer the following questions:
1. How many years of experience do you have working in an MSP company? Name of the MSP company/s you worked with. 
2. Do you have experience working with RMM and PSA software? What applications did you use? 
3. Do you have experience working with Virtualization, servers, GPO, TCP/IP, hyper-v/vmware, conditional access, Intune, and Scripting such as PowerShell? 

- No other information/cover letter or attachments should be included, besides a simple salutation and signature if so desired.

NOTE- Please do NOT apply using other methods besides the above. Any applicants who reach out to us via phone, social media, or any method other than the instructions above will automatically be disqualified.
Only those who followed the above instructions will be contacted within up to 2 business days, with further instructions.


We're looking forward to having you join our family!


Beits Livneh, Owner
Gallop Technology Group

title: Operations Assistant

As an Operations Assistant, you will be the tech backbone for your designated client “pod,” ensuring all systems are running smoothly, clients are onboarded seamlessly, and any technical issues are resolved efficiently. This role is essential to maintaining high client retention and satisfaction.

 • Client Onboarding: Follow SOPs to set up and launch new clients effectively, ensuring they are equipped for success from day one.

title: E-commerce Product Lead Specialist skilled in Automation, Web Scraping, and Vendor Relations
description:
We are a fast-growing company with three E-commerce stores seeking a tech-savvy, detail-focused E-commerce Product Lead Specialist skilled in Automation, Web Scraping, and Vendor Relations. This full-time role involves managing and automating product data, ensuring that our thousands of SKUs stay accurate and up-to-date. You’ll be working directly with vendors, overseeing product listings, and implementing automation to streamline processes. 

PLEASE READ THE ENTIRE JOB DESCRIPTION AND ANSWER ALL QUESTIONS FOR YOUR APPLICATION TO BE CONSIDERED.

This role requires a high level of attention to detail, patience, and a methodical approach. Strong English writing and speaking skills are essential for occasional communication with vendors via email, chat, or phone to ensure accurate and timely product information. Additionally, expertise in web scraping and automation is critical to streamline data management and product updates.

Work hours will align with U.S. business hours. There will be an initial 1-month trial period.

Key Responsibilities

• Product Management & Data Integration:
- Oversee product listings, managing and updating SKUs.
- Coordinate with vendors for accurate product details, including pricing, specifications, and lead times.
- Maintain and update databases with product and vendor information.

• Automation & Web Scraping
- Develop, configure, and implement web scraping processes to monitor partner sites for product updates, including new additions or discontinued items.
- Automate and streamline Shopify integrations, enabling efficient import/export processes to update product data in bulk.
- Utilize pre-existing systems and tools for automated updates, ensuring future scalability and providing clear documentation for team reference.

• Inventory & Operational Oversight
- Track and reconcile inventory levels.
- Create and maintain Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for data management, product listing optimization, and team workflows.

• Optimization & Analysis
- Analyze product performance data and implement listing optimizations to enhance visibility, rankings, and conversion rates.
- Utilize insights from customer feedback, sales metrics, and data analytics to refine product and business strategies.

• Collaboration & Support
- Lead a team of 1-2 VAs in managing day-to-day operations and addressing product-related issues.
- Train and support team members on using automation tools and implementing SOPs.

• Other basic operations and administrative tasks

Qualifications:
• Work experience as a Product Manager
• Minimum of 2 years’ experience in E-commerce Product Management
• Proficiency in web scraping tools and techniques
• Proven expertise in Shopify. Being a Shopify Certified Developer will be an advantage.
• Advanced skills in MS Excel, Google Suite, and familiarity with Airtable and ClickUp
• Experience in custom solution development is a plus
• Write mushroom in your application to show your attention to detail
• Strong verbal and written communication skills, with high attention to detail
• Highly organized, detail-oriented, and good analytical skills with an ability to meet deadlines

Communication and meetings will be primarily conducted through voice chat (Google Meet) and Slack.

Before we proceed, here are a few things we'd like to confirm:
• Payments will be made weekly for the first four weeks starting from the third week of employment, and then bi-monthly every other Tuesday.
• Your work schedule will consist of 40 hours per week
• Your working hours will be from 9 PM to 6 AM (or 10 PM to 7 PM), PHT, with a 1-hour break, five days a week
• You’ll need to send an End of Shift (EOS) report every day, covering the following:
     a. What did you do today? (detailed description)
     b. What issues did you run into?
     c. Is there anything I can help you with?

If you're okay with the above, please reply with "I AGREE TO ALL TERMS" and answer the following questions in complete sentences, using proper grammar and punctuation (please answer in number format instead of in paragraphs):

1. What is your previous experience with managing products for E-commerce companies?
2. Which automation and web scraping tools have you used in past product management roles? Please share examples of how you've used them to improve product accuracy or streamline processes.
3. Please also provide a list of other tools/software you have utilized in previous roles for product management. For each tool, include details on its specific function and briefly describe how you applied it in your work.
4. How large of a team have you managed before?
5. Have you worked with Shopify before?
6. Are you currently engaged in another job or commitment?
7. How fast is your internet?
8. Do you have a reliable computer?
9. How often do you experience power outages and internet issues?
10. What backups do you have in case of power outages?
11. What backups do you have in case of internet outages?

Please carefully review the entire job description and also use this format as your subject line when replying to this post: “Your First Name + I Am Your Product Lead Specialist" (e.g. Kevin - I Am Your Product Lead Specialist)

AI-generated responses will not be considered.

title: Build out and Automate Real Estate CRM
description:

title: VA for Biz Operations & Personal Life
description:
About Us

At GetListings.com, we help real estate agents get more listings with YouTube Ads. Over the past seven years, we've helped 892+ agents, including some of the biggest names in the US and Canada, and achieved a 94% success rate. With hundreds of case studies and testimonials, we’re on a mission to grow from $100k/month to $1M/month, surpassing Zillow and Realtor.com. We’re proud to be the only lead company offering YouTube Ads and aim to become the Google of internet search, the iPhone of cell phones, and the Tesla of electric cars.

About Mikael (Your Future Boss)

- Started the company at 16 years old (24 years old now)
-  Winner of the 2 Comma Club Award 2023 and Gold SaasPreneur Award 2023
-  Managed $2M+ in ad spend for clients and spent $350k of personal funds on ads
-  Passionate about fitness and self-development

Main Mission

Your primary role is to handle the company’s operations and free up Mikael’s time by managing professional and personal tasks. You’ll work independently with minimal supervision while ensuring tasks are completed efficiently, accurately, and on time.

Key Responsibilities

Operations & Communication:

- Outreach to Realtors who engage with our social media (likes, follows, comments)
- Reply to messages from Realtors on Instagram and Facebook
- Manage client inquiries and support emails (respond directly or on Mikael's behalf)
- Organize and update communication folders and tools (e.g., Skool groups, GHL accounts)

Client Management:

- Re-bill clients for failed payments and follow up with delinquent accounts
- Process refunds and manage client offboarding (e.g., remove from Skool, GHL)
-  Grade leads and strategy sessions, marking unqualified/canceled calls in Hyros

Financial & Administrative Tasks:

- Categorize expenses, classify sales, and attach invoices in QBO/PayTraqer
- Fill out financial dashboards and prepare projections
- Create and send invoices for subscriptions or one-off services
- Process payouts to team members and client referrals

Social Media & Ads Management:

- Monitor and delete negative comments or spam on social media and ads
- Post job openings (e.g., Appointment Setters, Closers) in relevant groups
- Follow Realtors or leads across platforms to foster engagement

Team & Project Coordination:

- Remind team members to complete EOD reports or update trackers
- Onboard new hires with access to tools and resources
- Offboard fired team members and revoke access to company accounts

Support & Personal Tasks:

- Schedule appointments, book services, and order meals/groceries for Mikael
- Handle urgent requests on weekends (as needed)
- Collect dispute evidence and organize billing libraries

What We’re Looking For

Reliability: Stable electricity and internet connection (no frequent outages)
Punctuality & Organization: Always meets deadlines and stays on top of tasks
Problem-Solver: Tackles challenges independently and efficiently
Growth-Oriented: Passionate about learning and self-improvement
Positive Attitude: Enthusiastic and driven to succeed beyond “clocking in and out”
Alignment with Values: Extreme ownership, client-first mindset, transparency, and efficiency

Work Schedule

Monday to Friday 9am to 5pm EST, with occasional weekend availability for urgent tasks.

Why Join Us?

- Work alongside a proven leader in the real estate marketing space.
- Be part of a fast-growing company with ambitious goals and innovative strategies.
- Gain experience in a high-performance culture that rewards initiative and results.

title: Photographic Media Administrator
description:
Are you someone who thrives in a dynamic environment and enjoys taking on a variety of tasks throughout the day? Do you have a passion for organization and helping businesses run smoothly? If so, we’d love to have you join our team!

Why You’ll Love Working with Us:
