Room to Grow: As our business expands,

If you are interested:

Send your resume, a screenshot of an internet speed test, and a video introducing yourself to john@perthrealestatemedia.com, make sure to say John sent you so I know you read the whole job description, we'll be in touch with the next step.

title: Exceptional GHL Support Specialist
description:
Hi, and thanks! 

When you start working with us, you will feel welcomed, supported, and valued. You’ll receive competitive rates of pay and will be encouraged to develop yourself professionally and contribute to improving our business processes. 

Once you’re settled in, your responsibilities will grow and your work will become even more rewarding and interesting. Your pay and benefits will rise in line with your position.

When you show yourself to be a great team member, you’ll be promoted to a role worthy of your abilities and be encouraged to develop managerial and leadership skills.

We currently employ 7 full-time Filipino assistants who run and manage every aspect of our business. Most of whom have been with us for between one and four years. We’re looking for long-term, reliable staff who want interesting and challenging careers.

If you want to join our established and growing team we welcome you to apply and show us what you can do.

About Us:
British Medical Experts (BME) is a leading network of expert witnesses, providing specialist medical knowledge and experience to support legal cases and clinical negligence claims. We pride ourselves on offering exceptional expertise across a variety of medical fields, enabling solicitors and legal professionals to deliver robust and accurate case outcomes.

THE GHL SUPPPORT SPECIALIST WE ARE LOOKING FOR 

You need to be able to pay attention to detail and have the ability to follow instructions carefully.

Excellent understanding of spoken English is essential and you need to be accomplished at writing in the English language

We are looking for a VA who is self-motivated and an accurate but fast worker. The individual needs to be professional and reliable and have a ‘Can Do’ attitude!

You’ll need to be available for part-time work or project-based work. (at least 10 hours per week)

THE VACANCY SPECIFICATIONS

You will be involved in assisting with general administration and ad-hoc tasks. There will be instructional videos to watch to show you how we work. 

You need to work UK office hours.

Role Overview:
We are a growing medical reporting agency seeking a dedicated GHL Support Specialist to provide comprehensive support for our Go High Level (GHL) platform users. This role will play a crucial part in delivering exceptional customer service, resolving technical issues, and ensuring smooth platform operations for our clients. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in technical support, particularly with CRM systems, and will work proactively to provide timely solutions to user inquiries.

Key Responsibilities:
• Provide prompt and effective technical support to clients using the GHL platform, addressing issues related to CRM, scheduling, integrations, and user experience.
• Manage and resolve support tickets and customer inquiries submitted through various channels, including email, chat, and phone.
• Troubleshoot and resolve common platform-related issues, escalating complex issues to the technical team as necessary.
• Guide clients through GHL functionalities, best practices, and workflows to help them optimize platform use.
• Assist with onboarding new users to the GHL platform, ensuring they have the resources and knowledge required to succeed.
• Monitor platform performance and proactively address potential issues before they impact users.
• Collaborate with the internal team to improve processes, documentation, and customer support tools.

Key Skills & Requirements:
• Proven experience in a support or customer service role, ideally with CRM platforms (experience with GHL is a significant advantage).
• Strong technical troubleshooting skills with the ability to quickly identify and resolve issues.
• Exceptional communication skills, both written and verbal, with fluency in English.
• Ability to work independently and manage multiple inquiries efficiently.
• Familiarity with CRM systems, automation tools, and customer support best practices.
• Availability to work standard business hours and be responsive to urgent issues if needed.

NOW THE PART ABOUT THE CLIENT

For the past 15 years, this client has been an entrepreneur, following a decade-long career as a dentist.
They are married, have a young family, and currently manage a medico-legal reporting and business coaching companies based in London, UK.
We are passionate about systems and improving the way things work. We strive to provide an outstanding customer experience so we need the very best employees to help us achieve this goal. We believe in treating our employees in the way we would want to be treated - with respect and kindness.

 You can find out a bit more about our company here: britishmedicalexperts.com/

OUR COMPANY PAY AND BENEFITS

• Starting pay rate: Starting from 250 PHP hourly rate (based on skills and experience)
• Weekly payment via Transferwise
• Flexible Hourspportunity to work remotely
• Bonuses will be paid for exceptional work
• Your pay will increase based on the standard of your work and time with the company
• You will be given holiday and sick pay if you become a permanent staff member
• We pay the 13th month as standard (pro rata) once the first full year of service has been completed
• Career development and progression opportunities
• Access to exclusive BME training programs and resources

NOW THE IMPORTANT PART - HOW YOU CAN APPLY:

If you believe that you are an exceptional assistant and have the knowledge and skills that I am looking for, then please apply for this vacancy by completing the following application form:

https://forms.gle/zZQpQd3DP28sLcRh8

Please note, that we ONLY accept applications through this application process. PLEASE DO NOT use the website’s message board as we don’t monitor this.

The application process will finish after approximately 3-5 days. After this time we won’t be accepting any further applications. We will respond to all applicants within 3-5 days thereafter. We would appreciate it if you do not email us to confirm receipt or send your CV - we will send you an acknowledgment within 48 hours of the closing of the application process. We will request your references from you if you progress to the interview stage.

I look forward to hearing from you.

Icey Mendoza
British Medical Experts

title: Marketing and Inventory Management Analyst
description:
POSITION SUMMARY
We seek a highly efficient and competent Marketing and Inventory Management Analyst to join our growing team who has a broad knowledge of Stock Replenishment and can perform various Marketing initiatives daily. The responsibilities range from but are not limited to weekly inventory review, stock replenishment, and consumption rates to marketing activities such as creating and posting social media content, generating leads, and creating advertisements. This role will involve collaboration with our China facility's inventory and production team. The candidate must have excellent interpersonal skills and communicate ideas with Management and members from various departments. 

OBJECTIVES
Effectively manage and forecast the demand of customers through inventory and supply planning
Provide reports of forecasted inventory on a weekly and monthly basis to our production team
Support inventory and replenishment management by standardizing processes across the organization
Develop and suggest process improvements to the management to align inventories and stocks from our production team
When required they create or update Standard Operating Procedures (SOP) in their relevant inventory-related and marketing-related activities
Performs other marketing-related activities such as content creation, updating marketing metrics, and content database updates as required

COMPETENCIES

Knowledgeable in Inventory Management and Replenish Management
Knowledgeable with the following applications for Inventory Management:
Cloud Inventory Management tool (i.e. Dear System)
Customer Relationship Management tool (i.e. HubSpot)
Shopify for updating the stocks on the website
eBay sales listings
Creative in promoting social media content, promotion, and campaign
Excellent organizational and problem-solving skills with the ability to prioritize tasks.
Present information in forms, tables, and spreadsheets. 
EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE
Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Marketing Analytics or related area of study, or equivalent work experience
4+ years of work experience in Inventory Management function
Strong knowledge and hands-on experience in Inventory Management and Planning
Experience working in manufacturing and corporate office set-up preferred
Strong data analysis, communication, and problem-solving skills
Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Excel, PowerPoint, Word) and Google Workspace (i.e. Google Sheet, Google Drive, Calendar etc.)


BENEFITS
Health insurance
Dental Insurance
Professional development assistance
Paid leaves
13th-month pay


WHO WE ARE
 Highland Park is a company making equipment for artists, jewelers, and craftspeople to turn their creative visions into reality through gemstone and glass cutting, and polishing arts. Currently, we are seeking a Sales and Customer Support Manager to lead our sales team.


Our core values are the backbone of our business. We hire and promote based on our core values:
We are inspirational,
We are accountable,
We are transparent,
We are disciplined,
We are aligned, and
We are results-oriented.


COMMITMENT TO DIVERSITY
 We hire and reward performance of people on what they bring and welcome diversity in our team. We hold our team to high standards, commitment to our people to grow and advance, develop themselves and be successful–empower you to build your personal, professional and financial well-being to help plan for your future. 
 Highland Park Lapidary is a diverse environment where we don’t discriminate against their race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or age.


If this position caught your eye, send us your resume! For best consideration, include the job title and source where you found this position in the subject line of your email to admin@hplapidary.com. Already a candidate? Please connect directly with your recruiter to discuss this opportunity. 


Think you're a good fit? Please complete the job application form: bit.ly/3lmLSVh

title: Google AppSheet & Data Validation Specialist
description:
Location: Remote
Job Type: Part-Time (Flexible hours with availability required during UK business hours for meetings and prompt communication)

Company Overview:
We are a forward-thinking organization focused on leveraging technology to streamline operations and drive efficiency. We are seeking a Google AppSheet & Data Validation Specialist to join our dynamic team. This part-time role is ideal for a tech-savvy professional with expertise in Google Sheets, AppSheet, and data validation processes. The position offers flexibility but requires availability during UK hours for meetings and responsive communication.

Job Description:
The Google AppSheet & Data Validation Specialist will play a key role in developing, optimizing, and maintaining business tools using Google Sheets and AppSheet. The ideal candidate is highly organized, detail-oriented, and capable of ensuring data accuracy while implementing automated solutions that meet business needs. A significant aspect of this role involves ensuring spreadsheets are consistently accurate, up-to-date, and clean. The Google AppSheet & Data Validation Specialist will also focus on ensuring data integrity, quality assurance, and error detection in all operational processes. The ideal candidate will leverage their experience in these areas to maintain high standards of accuracy and reliability across all systems.

Key Responsibilities:

Google Sheets & AppSheet Development:
*Design, develop, and maintain Google Sheets and AppSheet applications to optimize workflows and processes.
*Implement and enforce data validation techniques to ensure input accuracy and reliability.
*Automate processes using Google Apps Script to enhance operational efficiency.
*Apply quality assurance measures to all spreadsheet and AppSheet applications to maintain data integrity.
*Implement robust error detection systems to identify and rectify inaccuracies promptly.

Operational Support:
*Update and manage complex spreadsheets and workflows to reflect the latest business requirements.
*Support customer-facing tasks, providing professional communication and timely updates.
*Assist in Amazon FBA-related workflows, including inventory and distribution tracking.

Collaboration & Communication:
*Participate in meetings during UK hours as required, ensuring seamless collaboration with the team.
*Proactively respond to messages and contribute to projects in a timely manner.

Continuous Improvement:
*Identify areas for optimization and suggest innovative solutions to improve efficiency.
*Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in Google AppSheet and data validation.
*Develop strategies to enhance error detection and quality assurance processes.
*Promote best practices for maintaining data integrity across all workflows.

Spreadsheet Maintenance:
*Regularly update and manage complex spreadsheets to reflect the latest business requirements.
*Ensure spreadsheets remain accurate, up-to-date, and free of errors.
*Monitor and maintain clean data inputs, addressing discrepancies proactively.
*Regularly audit spreadsheets for errors and inconsistencies, ensuring the highest level of data quality and accuracy.

Skills and Qualifications:

Technical Proficiency:
*Advanced knowledge of Google Sheets (e.g., formulas, pivot tables, data analysis).
*Expertise in Google AppSheet for application development and optimization.
*Familiarity with Google Apps Script for process automation.

Data Validation & Accuracy:
*Strong understanding of data validation techniques and best practices.
*Proven experience in keeping spreadsheets accurate, up-to-date, and free of errors.
*Ability to implement safeguards to ensure data reliability.
*Expertise in error detection, quality assurance, and maintaining data integrity.
*Strong ability to audit datasets and workflows for inconsistencies or inaccuracies.

Organizational & Problem-Solving Skills:
*Ability to self-learn and grasp concepts quickly.
*Proactive and resourceful approach to troubleshooting and improving processes.

Preferred Skills:
*Experience with Amazon FBA workflows and distribution processes.
*Comfortable with customer-facing roles and professional communication.
*Prior experience managing inventory systems, dashboards, or business automation.

Behavioral Traits:
*Detail-Oriented: Ensures data accuracy and attention to small details in tasks.
*Proactive: Anticipates challenges and takes initiative to address them.
*Reliable: Dependable in meeting deadlines and delivering quality work.
*Adaptable: Quick to learn and implement new tools and processes.
====================================================================================================
How to Apply? Please read and follow the instructions carefully.

Interested candidates should submit their resume, a cover letter outlining their experience and qualifications, and any relevant portfolio (if applicable).

Use "Google AppSheet & Data Validation Specialist—Your Name" as the subject of your application.

To ensure we select the most qualified candidates for our Google AppSheet & Data Validation Specialist role, please answer the following initial screening questions:

1. Do you have experience in Google AppSheet development? (yes/no)
2. Are you proficient in data validation techniques? (yes/no)
3. Have you automated processes using Google Apps Script? (yes/no)
4. Do you have experience with Amazon FBA workflows? (yes/no)
5. Are you able to work during UK hours when required? (yes/no)
6. Can you manage and update complex spreadsheets to ensure they remain accurate and clean? (yes/no)
7. Do you have experience with error detection in spreadsheets or applications? (yes/no)
8. Are you familiar with quality assurance practices in data workflows? (yes/no)
9. Can you briefly describe a method you’ve used to ensure data integrity in your work?
10. Do you have a stable Work-From-Home setup (reliable internet, computer, back-ups, etc.)? (yes/no)
11. Are you available to start working within the next 30 days or as soon as possible? (yes/no) Please provide your earliest available start date.
12. What is your expected hourly salary (in USD)?
13. Provide the link to your resume here (required):
14. Provide the link to your cover letter here:
15. Provide the link to your sample work/portfolio (if applicable) here:

NOTE: To be considered for this position, please submit your resume, a cover letter, link to your sample works (if applicable), and your responses to all the screening questions. Applications that are incomplete and do not include answers to the screening questions will be automatically disqualified.

We look forward to reviewing your application and thank you for your interest in joining our team. Thank you!

title: AI Tools Developer [Reverse Engineering]
description:
About Us:
At Aniva Company LLC, we are pioneering the development of AI-powered tools to enhance the reverse engineering process for embedded systems, firmware, and software. Our goal is to create advanced solutions that combine AI/ML techniques with traditional reverse engineering methodologies to accelerate vulnerability discovery and security analysis. We are seeking a talented AI Tools Developer to lead the design and implementation of these innovative tools.

Responsibilities:
· Design and develop AI-driven tools and frameworks to assist in reverse engineering tasks.
· Implement machine learning models to automate and enhance the identification of vulnerabilities in firmware and embedded systems.
· Collaborate with reverse engineers and AI experts to integrate AI algorithms into existing workflows.
· Research and experiment with the latest AI/ML techniques and apply them to reverse engineering challenges.
· Develop and optimize algorithms for analyzing and understanding binary code, firmware, and hardware.
· Write and maintain comprehensive documentation for AI tools and processes.
· Present progress and technical concepts to cross-functional teams and stakeholders.

Requirements:
· Strong experience with AI/ML frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch) and their application to security or reverse engineering.
· Proficiency in programming languages such as Python and C/C++, with a focus on developing algorithms for security analysis.
· Knowledge of reverse engineering tools (e.g., IDA Pro, Ghidra) and techniques.
· Experience in low-level system analysis, including assembly language and firmware.
· Ability to develop AI models that analyze binary data, firmware structures, and system internals.
· Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work in an innovative, fast-paced environment.

Preferred Qualifications:
· Experience with reinforcement learning, unsupervised learning, or other advanced AI techniques for code analysis.
· Familiarity with disassembly, decompilation, and binary instrumentation.
· Experience developing tools for vulnerability discovery, malware analysis, or similar security-related applications.
· Knowledge of hardware/embedded systems and experience working with firmware architectures.

If you’re excited about this opportunity, please send your application along with your resume.  We look forward to reviewing it!

title: GoHighLevel/GHL Specialist
description:
!!! PLEASE READ THE WHOLE JOB POST BEFORE APPLYING !!!

GoHighLevel Technical Expert

We are looking for a Marketing Automation Expert with 3+ years of hands-on experience in GoHighLevel, supporting Facebook integrations, workflow design, attribution and reporting, and rolling out workflows across a large number of accounts. The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing and optimizing our marketing automation processes, ensuring seamless integrations, and delivering actionable insights through robust reporting.

-Implement and maintain marketing automation workflows.

-Troubleshoot and resolve integration issues.

3. Workflow Design:
-Design and implement automated workflows to streamline marketing processes.
-Collaborate with the marketing team to understand requirements and translate them into efficient workflows.
-Continuously monitor and improve workflow efficiency.

4. Attribution and Reporting:
-Develop and maintain attribution models to measure campaign performance.
-Create detailed reports and dashboards to provide insights on marketing activities.
-Analyze data to identify trends and make data-driven recommendations.

5. Workflow Rollout:
-Manage the rollout of marketing workflows across 200+ accounts.
-Ensure consistency and scalability in workflow deployment.
-Provide training and support to clients and internal teams on workflow usage.

6. Reputation Management:

-Implement strategies to enhance positive reviews and address negative feedback.
-Analyze reputation data to improve overall client satisfaction.

7. Email and Text Marketing Campaigns:
-Build and execute email and text marketing campaigns using GoHighLevel.
-Develop targeted campaigns to engage and convert prospects.
-Track and analyze campaign performance, making adjustments as needed.

8. Communication and Client Interaction:
-Be available to answer questions on Slack and provide timely support to team members and clients.
-Participate in client calls to discuss project progress, address concerns, and provide expert insights.
-Maintain clear and professional communication with clients to ensure their needs are met.

Qualifications:

-Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Engineering, Business, or a related field.
-3+ years of experience with GoHighLevel administration.
-Proven experience in managing Facebook integrations.
-Strong understanding of marketing automation workflows and design.
-Expertise in attribution models and reporting.
-Ability to manage multiple projects and accounts simultaneously.
-Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.
-Strong attention to detail and organizational skills.

Bonus if you have experience with the GoHighLevel API and utilizing data from 3rd party tools in workflows.

Preferred Skills:
-Experience with other marketing automation tools.
-Knowledge of other social media platforms and their integrations.
-Familiarity with CRM systems and database management.
-Certification in GoHighLevel or related marketing automation tools.

What We Offer:
-Competitive salary and benefits package.
-Opportunity to work with a dynamic and collaborative team.
-Professional development and growth opportunities.
-Flexible work environment.

To apply, please click on the link below:
https://jobs.ashbyhq.com/Moxie/1e3a7d4c-2d8a-4ffd-aa80-a0a404496501

Thank you and good luck!

title: Technical Support Representative (Non-voice) for an AI Tech Chatbot Start-Up
description:
We're looking for a Full-Time Technical Support Representative (fully remote) who can help the current and new customers with tech issues they encounter. Next to communicating with our customers, you're working closely with 2 of our Customer Support Representatives from the Philippines. And 3 of our hardworking developers are located all over the world. This means you need to be capable of speaking and writing proper English. To provide the best Tech Support, we feel that you must be a master in our software; this means your job will also consist of software testing with the development team. Whenever the developers release a new feature, it will be your job to break it. This will help you understand the new feature and its limits, which can help when it comes to dealing with customers.

We'd love to see at least 3-5 years of experience (the more, the better) in Tech Support. The ideal candidate has knowledge of commonly used concepts, practices, and procedures for providing customer support for a tech-based company. The candidate must rely on instructions and pre-established guidelines to perform the job functions. Primary job functions do not typically require exercising independent judgment. The candidate typically reports to a supervisor or manager. The target is to ensure excellent customer service standards and maintain high customer satisfaction.

- In your application, before you introduce yourself, please begin by writing a few sentences about your favorite beverage.

- You should be able to speak and write fluently in English.

- BPO experience is an advantage.
- Excellent problem-solving skills.

- Able to jump right in and start working

- Not afraid to raise new ideas to improve processes

- Can understand how systems work as a whole and how each task fits into the picture
- Able to work on shifting and/or rotating schedules (we have 24x7 operations)
- Evaluate and analyze the issues faced by end-users and provide appropriate troubleshooting and resolution steps
- Responsible for performing determination, resolving and closing the problem
- Able to route to the appropriate level of support if not possible to solve.
- Responding promptly to customer inquiries.
- Ability to communicate possible Tech Issues to Tech Support or the Development team.

- Expediting correction or adjustment
- Following up to ensure resolution
- Recommend our products, collect customer information, and analyze customer needs
- Prepare product or service reports by collecting and analyzing customer information
- Contribute to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed
- Manage large amounts of incoming tickets and chats
- Ability to recognize and generate sales leads
- Identify and assess customers’ needs to achieve satisfaction
- Provide accurate, valid, and complete information by using the right methods/tools
- Handle complaints
- Provide appropriate solutions and alternatives within the time limits and follow up to ensure resolution
- Keep records of customer interactions, process customer accounts, and file documents
- Follow communication procedures, guidelines, and policies

- Answer questions about warranties or terms of sale
- Suggest solutions when a product malfunctions
- Work with the entire team to ensure proper customer service is being delivered
- Resolve customer complaints via Messenger, Service Desk, email, or social media

A Plus:
- Proven tech support experience
- Track record of over-achieving quota
- Strong contact-handling skills and active listening
- Familiar with CRM systems and practices
- Customer orientation and ability to adapt/respond to different types of characters
- Excellent communication and presentation skills
- Ability to multitask, prioritize, and manage time effectively
- Adaptable in terms of working hours (US EST Time-zone preferred)

Customer service representative top skills & proficiencies:
- Customer Service
- Product Knowledge
- Quality Focused
- Documentation Skills
- Listening Skills
- Resolving Conflict
- Multitask
- Patience
- Positive Attitude
- Attention to Detail
- People-Oriented
- Analysis
- Problem Solving
- Organizational Skills
- Adaptability

- Computer Skills

Some tools you will work with:

- Slack

- Click-Up

You'll be working closely with a growing team of 10 people, including 2 hard-working people from the Philippines. I'm looking forward to seeing your application. We do a 45-minute team call on Wednesday to discuss planning and strategy and just hang out.

Your contact will be Bernadette, Head of Support. Please include a 2-minute self-introduction voice recording link as well as your resume link!

title: HR Recruiter *Superstar Only*
description:
Kindly read the following instructions carefully, as applications that do not adhere to them will not be considered.


Do you love putting a smile on people's faces or hearing "you just made my day"?

Love connecting with our customers and fans of a holistic beauty creator with 2 million+ followers?

Do you want to be part of a fast-growing company and collaborate with the brightest, most talented minds?

Then this might be your dream job.

Before you read on, this is NOT a typical customer support job where you just copy paste standard responses or choose a canned response from the help desk software...if that's what you are looking for then you should stop reading right now, because this job is NOT for you.

We are looking for a Customer Service Specialist to help create an amazing customer experience that turns customers into raving fans.

From the Upgrade to see actual infont a person clicks "Follow" or joins our community, the customer needs to feel like she has a special friend who is there to help and support her along the way....and that's exactly your job as a Customer Service Specialist.

As our Customer Service Specialist, you’re the essence of an extraordinary customer service. You love people and love to enrich their lives through dialogue about our products as well. Having a detailed knowledge, you’re not just serving information, but are also making recommendations and play an advisory role.

You are the heart of our reputation, and ensure feedback flows to all teams in order to improve and innovate our services. And you spark customers with new ways to make their experience continuously better.

We are aiming to be the gold standard for customer support in the beauty industry. Customer support is extremely important to us, and we only hire the warmest and the most positive, genuine and dedicated people to represent our company.

ABOUT US
• We're a fast-growing holistic beauty company that is looking for the brightest, most talented minds to work from home. More details will be shared during the interview, but you’ll have the opportunity to work with one of the fastest-growing holistic beauty creators, boasting over 2,000,000 followers.

QUALIFICATIONS
• Distinguished for outstanding accomplishments, including receiving awards like "Top Team Leader of the Year", "Employee of the Year", and demonstrating swift career progression into higher roles.
• Minimum of 2 years of experience in customer service. Most of the support will be conducted via email and chat. However, proficiency in phone support is a plus.
• Recognized for exceptional achievements, such as attaining Latin Honors (Summa Cum Laude, Magna Cum Laude, Cum Laude).
• Excellent communication skills, both oral and written. As an email support representative, you will likely interact with US clients whose first language is English. Your level of English needs to be on the level that an English native speaker thinks they are talking to another native speaker. Adherence to a specific writing style (a mix between friendly/semi-casual and formal; depending on the occasion), flawless grammar, and punctuation standards is highly required.
• Enabling an empathy-driven approach by providing exceptional customer service and fostering positive relationships with customers through email communication.
• Fast and accurate typing skills to respond to emails promptly, great attention to detail and reliability are essential qualities for success in this role.
• Highly organized with the ability to efficiently manage multiple tasks and meet deadlines.
• Adeptness at working in a fast-paced environment where others rely on you to deliver is essential. It is expected that you have an innovative mind and are a self-starter.


JOB RESPONSIBILITIES INCLUDE
• Customer Care: Provide excellent customer service through various channels, including email, chat, social media and phone. Address customer inquiries, concerns, and requests with empathy and professionalism.
• Product Knowledge: Develop an in-depth understanding of our holistic beauty programs, their benefits, and the exercises in it.
• Problem Resolution: Troubleshoot and resolve customer complaints and issues promptly and effectively, ensuring customer satisfaction.
• Educational Support: Provide product recommendations, usage guidance, and holistic beauty advice to customers.
• Feedback Collection: Collect and document customer feedback and suggestions to help improve products and services.
• Organizational Skills: Maintain organized records of customer interactions and orders, ensuring accurate and up-to-date customer profiles.
• Cross-functional Collaboration: Collaborate with other departments, such as marketing and product development, to relay customer insights and feedback.
• Process Enhancement: Document the process and create/adapt SOPs to improve the system.

REQUIREMENTS FOR EFFECTIVE REMOTE WORK
• Reliable Computer/Laptop
• High-Speed Internet Connection (+backup)
• Conducive Work Environment

WORKING SCHEDULE
• Full-time Employment Opportunity

BENEFITS
• Competitive Salary
• Training and Development Opportunities
• Opportunity to contribute to a rapidly expanding company dedicated to promoting holistic beauty
• Great potential for career advancement into various leadership positions

APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS
Since this is a long-term position, there will be an in-depth qualification process. If you believe you have what it takes, here's what to do next:

Please apply to this job ad with the phrase “I’m a Customer Service Superstar” and answer the following questions:

1.) Why are you specifically interested in this position?
2.) Can you provide an example of a challenging customer situation you've successfully resolved in the past?
3.) What are the names of your last three supervisors, and how would they rate you on a scale of 1-10? (you may need to arrange calls/email contact with them)
4.) Schedule Availability:
4.1.) What are your preferred work hours? (in PHT)
4.2.) Are you available to work weekends?
5.) On an English Proficiency Scale (from A1-C2), how would you rate your level of English proficiency and your ability to adjust your language to the target audience?
6.) Take the following tests and attach the 4 screenshots of the results in a Google Drive link (set to open access).
6.1.) Go to www.typing.com/student/typing-test/1-minute, complete the test and take a screenshot of your results. You don't need to sign in, just close any requests to sign in.
6.2.) Go to www.grammaring.com/english-grammar-test and take the test. Please take a screenshot of the final result.
6.3.) Go to www.speedtest.net/ and take a screenshot of the final result.
6.4.) Go to speed.cloudflare.com/ and take a screenshot of the final result.
7.) Attach your CV in a Google Drive link (set to open access).

We are expanding and looking for talented individuals to join our team. If you feel you meet our qualifications and requirements, we strongly encourage you to apply. Please follow the provided instructions to ensure your application is considered.

title: VA SUPERSTAR for 2 Australian businesses
description:
VA SUPERSTAR for 2 Australian businesses

Four-day work week and 2-week Christmas Shutdown!

### TO BE CONSIDERED YOU MUST INCLUDE ALL DETAILS REQUESTED IN SECTION E BELOW ###

ARE YOU LOOKING FOR A NEW CHALLENGE?

We have an awesome opportunity for a Virtual Assistant superstar to join our small team.

KEY DATES:   This role will commence between 6 and 13 January 2025 Full time 

###   Applications from 30 November 2024
###   Shortlisting from 7 Dec 2024
###   Work tests sent  7 Dec 2024 to 12 Dec 2024 
###   Interviews   12 Dec 2024 to 15 Dec 2024
###   Selection by 18 Dec 2024
###   Commencement after 6 January 2025 latest start date 13 January 2025

We have well documented procedures in our online portal. You will be working directly with us and not dealing with an outsourcing company.

A   THE ROLE

We are looking at an experienced administration officer, with excellent written and spoken English. You will spend your time adding value in administration functions, document template creation and marketing activities.

Our Client Service Mantra is “ACE” – Accurate, Cost-effective and Efficient

This role is Monday to Thursday 8:00 am to 5:30 pm AEST (GMT +10), a total of 36 hours per week.

THE ROLE IS PERFECT FOR YOU IF:

# You love to focus on being productive, and delivering client work to them in a timely manner
# You have a can-do attitude
# You love supporting clients
# You’re organised and strong time managers
# You love to improve your use of technology
# You have a history of clients complimenting you for your attention to detail
# You’re brilliant in working in the Office365 / Google Docs environment
# Your commitment to client confidentiality is paramount

We have clearly documented procedures. We are looking for people to follow our established systems so all staff are producing a similar, high-quality product that will add value to our clients’ businesses.

B.1    SPECIFICS OF THE ROLE

Responsibilities included in this role are:

a) ADMINISTRATION SUPPORT - approximately 40% of the role
# Filing of emails generated by accountants into our document management system
# Sending of invoices and other client correspondence
# Collation of final reports
# Assistance in accurate management of incoming and outgoing client records 
# Accurate data entry as requested
# Assist with email management for team members
b) TEMPLATE MANAGEMENT - approximately 40% of the role

# Assistance with maintenance of Document Templates using Word Merge features 
Essential skills and attributes include:

# Six months experience working with an offshore team speaking and writing in English
# Excellent written and spoken English
# Excellent ability in Microsoft Word
# Willingness to be part of a small team and lighten the load of several busy professionals
# Ability and willingness to follow our well-documented procedures
# Ability to understand the end goal of assigned tasks
# Ability to follow verbal and written instructions
# Ability to effectively communicate with team at all levels
# Comfortable to work in an on-screen environment – we run a paperless office
# Client and Team focussed

# Advanced computer skills are essential, and you will be tested prior to interview

There are always opportunities for advancement for star performers.

B.2 EQUIPMENT FOR THE ROLE
# Computer with processor i5 or higher ; minimum of 8MB RAM and at least 2 screens, preferably 3.
    - either a Laptop with at least ONE additional screen or computer with 2 screens.   
# Reliable Internet connection and back up Internet connection

C   WHO ARE WE?

Our CEO has two businesses – Cascade Accounting & Tax and Wise Owl Legal Practice Management Software for Law Firms. This role will work across both businesses. We value people who are self-motivated, great communicators and keen to learn new things. Process automation is paramount, and you need to have a can-do attitude towards computers.

D    WORK SCHEDULE AND HOLIDAYS

The role is 36 hours per week, Monday to Thursday working Australian Hours.
We have a Christmas shutdown, generally of about 2 weeks.

PERKS AND BENEFITS

We pay in PHP directly to your bank account every second week for the preceding fortnight.
On completion of your 6 months’ probation, you will be entitled to pro-rata of 13th month pay.
We accrued 7% of  your time worked as annual leave and 3.5 % of  your time worked as sick leave; you are paid for all gazetted Australian (Brisbane) Public Holidays that fall on your work days.

description:
BOOKKEEPER FOR AUSTRALIAN ACCOUNTING PRACTICE

Four-day work week and 2-week Christmas Shutdown!

E   HOW TO GET OUR ATTENTION

title: Web Developer
description:
About Us:
Life Got Better Staffing Services is a dedicated staffing company that specializes in connecting skilled medical professionals with facilities and organizations. Our comprehensive services extend beyond recruitment, encompassing staffing level management, training, onboarding, and recruitment services. With a commitment to excellence, we strive to bridge the gap between healthcare professionals and the institutions that rely on their expertise.

Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled and motivated Web Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate is passionate about coding, problem-solving, and creating user-friendly, visually appealing web applications. You will collaborate closely with our design, content, and marketing teams to develop and maintain web platforms that support our business objectives and delight our users.

Key Responsibilities:
Web Development: Build, test, and maintain responsive websites and web applications using modern frameworks and technologies.
Collaboration: Work with cross-functional teams to translate design concepts into functional websites and ensure technical feasibility.
Optimization: Optimize web applications for maximum speed, scalability, and user engagement.
Troubleshooting: Debug and resolve issues, ensuring robust performance and security.
Code Management: Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code; participate in code reviews and version control (Git).
Innovation: Stay updated with industry trends and implement emerging technologies to improve development processes.

Required Skills & Qualifications
Technical Expertise:
Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern JavaScript frameworks (e.g., React, Angular, Vue.js).
Experience with server-side technologies (e.g., Node.js, PHP, Python, or Ruby on Rails).
Familiarity with databases (e.g., MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL).
Understanding of RESTful APIs and web services.
Development Tools: Experience with tools like Git, webpack, npm, and debugging tools.

Design Knowledge: Familiarity with UI/UX principles, responsive design, and tools like Figma or Adobe XD.

Soft Skills: Strong problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work both independently and in a team.

Experience: 5 years of experience in web development

Preferred Qualifications
Experience with CMS platforms such as WordPress, Drupal, or Joomla.
Knowledge of DevOps practices and CI/CD pipelines.
Exposure to cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
Familiarity with SEO best practices.

How to Apply
Submit your resume, portfolio, and cover letter detailing your experience and interest in the position to humanreasources@lgbstaffing.com. Add "I'm [Name] your future rockstar Web Dev" in the subject line. Only those who follow the instructions will be entertained.

We look forward to hearing from you and exploring how you can contribute to our dynamic team at Life Got Better Staffing Services!

title: Digital Marketing & Operations Specialist
description:
This position is at the heart of managing the "engine" of Early Beginnings Wellness (EBW), a holistic wellness centre and online business committed to supporting family health and wellness. 

Based on Vancouver Island, BC, Canada, EBW specializes in serving expectant parents, new parents, breastfeeding mothers, newborns, infants, and young children. Led by Christina Hamill, EBW combines hands-on therapeutic care with innovative online resources to deliver exceptional support for families.

The ideal candidate is passionate about optimizing backend systems and has proven expertise in digital marketing. They are highly skilled in leveraging CRM platforms, automations, and AI tools to streamline workflows, improve efficiency, and drive measurable business growth.

A key responsibility of this role is to manage, track, and optimize EBW's Go Plus CRM account, a powerful platform designed for Xperiencify Course Creators (NB: Go Plus has been carefully designed by Go High Level specifically for Xperiencify course creators). So you guessed it, this role also offers exciting opportunities to support the creation of gamified online courses using Xperiencify, which powers EBW's On-Demand learning programs (some video editing skills required).

Initially, you will lead the migration of EBW’s client roster from Jane App (the current booking platform) to Go Plus, ensuring data is organized and up-to-date. You will also set up and manage calendars, including the new calendar for in-person session appointments to provide a smooth booking experience for clients.

Good news! Both Go Plus and Xperiencify offer comprehensive tutorial libraries and open office hours to guide users. Furthermore, Christina has curated additional resources to support you in mastering these platforms and processes.
As the Digital Marketing & Operations Specialist, you will play a pivotal role in developing EBW’s operational and digital strategies, ensuring seamless delivery of services while driving growth across both its brick-and-mortar and online offerings.

Qualifications:
Advanced proficiency in spoken and written English.
Honest, loyal, and highly motivated.
Strong technical and organizational skills.
Prompt daily communication through WhatsApp.
Experienced with using Trello and keeping communication and workflows organized.
Expertise in CRM systems, particularly Go Plus/Go High Level, including syncing with social media accounts.
Excellent proficiency in Google Workspace and Google Chrome.
Advanced skills in Canva Pro, including AI features for creating: Lead magnets, landing pages, and sales pages, order pages, branded fillable Google worksheets, and branded newsletters.
Experience with Canva Pro's video features and CapCut Video Editor.
Familiarity with WordPress for occasional editing and blog posting (training available if needed).
Open to learning and working with Xperiencify.
Strong problem-solving abilities with exceptional attention to detail.
Positive mindset and good sense of humour.

In your response enter "Marketing & Operations Ready Set Go" in the subject heading.

Part-Time starting at 10 hours/week with potential to grow to 40 hours/week quickly based on skills and performance
First Week: This will be a trial week to see if we are a good fit
Part-Time Salary: $160-$200/week based on experience & skills
Part-Time Daily Working Hours: 2 hours/day with potential to grow to 8 hours/day
Working Days: Monday to Friday 
Part-Time Working Hours 5:00-7:00 AM or 6:00-8:00 AM (PST) --negotiable if necessary

title: Medical Records Request Agent
description:
Who We Are

Brolly Labs, now rebranded as CatalyzeX, is a business process outsourcing specialist that combines process expertise with top offshore talent, delivering the best value outcomes for its clients.

Who You Are

You are a dedicated and detail-oriented professional with exceptional communication skills and a strong background in customer service or sales or medical records request for law firms. You are assertive and proactive, excelling at managing complex requests and interacting with various stakeholders, including law firms and medical facilities. Your ability to handle challenging situations with confidence and maintain accuracy ensures that all processes are handled efficiently and effectively.

Qualifications

Minimum of 2 years of experience in one of the following roles: Medical Records Request, Outbound Sales Agent, or High-touch Customer Service roles.
Strong verbal communication skills, with a comfort level for making calls throughout the day.
Outgoing and confident, with the ability to communicate effectively and proactively ask questions when needed.
Excellent administrative and organizational skills, with the ability to manage multiple tasks, prioritize effectively, and maintain a well-organized workspace and schedule.
Experience in requesting medical records from healthcare facilities.
Familiarity or experience within the legal or healthcare industry is a plus, but not required.
What You'll Do:

As a Medical Records Request Agent, you will:

Call medical facilities or hospitals to request medical records and other necessary documents on behalf of law firms.
Provide law firms with updates on request statuses, acknowledge new requests, and resolve any inquiries or concerns.
Ensure that all documentation is meticulously prepared, reviewed, and accurate before submission.
Track request statuses and maintain regular follow-up calls with facilities to ensure timely responses.
Enter and manage records and information in our system with precision.
Adhere to HIPAA regulations and standards to maintain confidentiality and privacy throughout the process.
Technical Requirements

High-speed internet (minimum 20 Mbps or fiber connection)
Noise-canceling headset
Fast computer
Power and internet backup required
Rates and Expectations:

Full-time Role: $4.50 to $5 per hour - negotiable depending on experience and skillset.
Work Schedule: EST/PST business hours.
Dedication: We need someone dedicated to work for this client alone. If you have other full-time commitments that may conflict during business hours, please do not apply.

Please be aware that subcontracting work to other virtual assistants is prohibited due to HIPAA compliance requirements.

Potential Start Date: Immediately

If you're eager to seize this opportunity and ready to leave your mark, please submit your application through our Careers Page. Note that only applications submitted using the career page form will be considered. Thank you.

Apply here: https://www.careers-page.com/brolly-labs/job/QWRXVWY9

title: Bilingual Virtual Property Manager
description:
We are excited to announce an opening for a bilingual virtual property manager who is fluent in both English and Spanish to join our dynamic and expanding multifamily real estate company. As we continue to grow and enhance our services, we are looking for a dedicated professional who can effectively manage our diverse portfolio and foster positive relationships with our tenants.

In this role, the ideal candidate will take on a variety of responsibilities that are vital to the smooth operation of our properties. You will be the primary point of contact for tenant relations, ensuring that all inquiries and concerns are addressed promptly and effectively. Your ability to communicate clearly and empathetically in both English and Spanish will be crucial in building strong relationships with our tenants and creating a welcoming community atmosphere.

A key aspect of this position will involve coordinating and overseeing maintenance requests. You will be responsible for ensuring that all maintenance issues are reported, tracked, and resolved in a timely manner, collaborating closely with maintenance staff and contractors to uphold the quality and safety of our properties.

Additionally, your responsibilities will include maintaining communication with current residents and engaging with prospective tenants interested in leasing.

To excel in this role, strong communication and organizational skills are essential. You will need to effectively manage multiple priorities and maintain a high level of professionalism in all interactions, both written and verbal. Being proactive and detail-oriented will contribute to your success in this position, as will your ability to think critically and solve problems efficiently.


Why Join Us?

Competitive Salary: We offer fair compensation with regular performance-based increases.
Growth Opportunities: Be part of a growing company with room for career advancement and professional development.
Supportive Team Culture: Join a collaborative and cheerful environment where your contributions are valued, and your success is our priority.
Skill Development: Gain hands-on experience with industry-leading tools like Buildium and access ongoing training to enhance your expertise.
Stability: Enjoy the security of a long-term role with a company that invests in its team members.

You’re a great fit if you:

Have an advanced understanding of English & Spanish (written and verbal).
Have property management experience (minimum 1 year).
Are detail-oriented, organized, and a natural problem-solver.
Have a positive attitude, professional demeanor, and strong communication skills.
Enjoy learning, take pride in your work, and are eager to grow in a cheerful, fast-paced work culture.

Required Skills:

Proficiency with Excel, Microsoft Office, and G Suite.
Strong organizational and problem-solving skills.
Advanced comprehension and communication in English & Spanish (both written and verbal).

Preferred Skills:

Real estate administrative experience (preferably for a USA-based company).
Proficiency in Slack and Buildium property management software.

Tech Requirements:

High-speed, reliable internet with a wireless hotspot backup.
Updated computer with capability to run on a hotspot during power outages.
Key Responsibilities:

Income and expense tracking through accurate data entry.
Rent collection and sending past-due notices.
Communicate with prospective tenants interested in leasing opportunities.
Resident communications: emails, phone calls, and retention efforts.
Preparing leases, background checks, and reviewing potential residents.
Electronic file management and maintenance.

How to Apply:

To be considered, please submit:

A cover letter explaining why you’re the best candidate (max. 6 sentences).
Your resume (in English).
A screenshot of your computer specifications.
A screenshot of your internet speed.
A 1–2 minute video introduction including:
Your name, location, and share one fun fact about yourself that others might find surprising.
What you’ve learned from your last two professional experiences (3–6 sentences).
Your knowledge of or experience with the U.S. real estate industry.

Important Notes:

Applicants must comply with all instructions. Applications missing any of the above will not be considered.
Immediate termination will result from:
Working for others during your scheduled hours with us.
Delegating your work to others.
Sharing company information without prior written approval.

If you have a passion for property management and possess a proven track record of success in the field, we would love to hear from you! Join our team and take the next step in your career by contributing to a company that values growth, teamwork, and excellence in service. We look forward to receiving your application and discussing how you can make a meaningful impact in our organization.

title: E-commerce Product Lead with Expertise in Automation, Web Scraping, and Vendor Relations
description:
We are a growing company with 3 E-commerce stores seeking an experienced and tech-savvy Product Manager to join our dynamic team and contribute to our growing businesses. This is a full-time position.

PLEASE READ THE ENTIRE JOB DESCRIPTION AND ANSWER ALL QUESTIONS FOR YOUR APPLICATION TO BE CONSIDERED.

This role demands extremely high attention to detail, a patient demeanor, and a meticulous approach. The ideal candidate must also have proficient English writing and speaking skills as occasional communication with vendors via email, chat, or phone will be required.

Work hours will align with U.S. business hours. Training is provided and compensated. There will be an initial 1-month trial period.

The candidate will be expected to handle the following tasks:

• Manage and Maintain Product Information:
- Uploading new products
- Updating existing product listings with accurate information
- Coordinating with new and existing vendors for product details, ordering processes, lead times, etc.
-Maintaining accurate product and vendor databases

• Research, Analysis, and Optimization:
- Researching new and relevant products/brands
- Monitoring product performance, sales metrics, and customer feedback
- Using data insights to make recommendations for listing optimizations and business strategies

• Technical Expertise and Enhancement:
- Making mass uploads and changes to products on Shopify (e.g., pricing, descriptions)
- Optimize listings for product rankings, conversion rates, and sales growth.
- Quality-checking images, titles, and descriptions for accuracy
- Website coding experience (advantageous)

• Collaboration and Communication:
- Manage 3 stores, and lead a team of 1-2 VAs.
- Collaborate with the team to resolve product and website issues.
- Work directly with manufacturers/vendors for product issues/questions

• Inventory Management and Operations:
- Overseeing inventory reconciliation and efficient tracking of stock levels
- Documentation and Record-Keeping:
- Creating and maintaining up-to-date records of SOPs, listing performance, and product details

• Other basic operations and administrative tasks

Qualifications:
• Work experience as a Product Manager
• Minimum of 2 years’ Product Management experience in an E-commerce company
• Proven expertise in Shopify. Being a Shopify Certified Developer will be an advantage.
• Advanced knowledge of MS Excel and Google Suite software (Google Sheets, Google Docs, etc.)
• Write mushroom in your application to show your attention to detail
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English
• Highly organized, detail-oriented, and good analytical skills with an ability to meet deadlines

Other preferred experience includes:
• Airtable
• ClickUp
• Website scraping tools

Communication and meetings will be primarily conducted through voice chat (Google Meet) and Slack.

Before we proceed, here are a few things we'd like to confirm:
• Payments will be made weekly for the first four weeks starting from the third week of employment, and then bi-monthly every other Tuesday.
• Your work schedule will consist of 40 hours per week
• Your working hours will be from 9 PM to 6 AM (or 10 PM to 7 PM), PHT, with a 1-hour break, five days a week
• You’ll need to send an End of Shift (EOS) report every day, covering the following:
a. What did you do today? (detailed description)
b. What issues did you run into?
c. Is there anything I can help you with?

If you're okay with the above, please reply with "I AGREE TO ALL TERMS" and answer the following questions in complete sentences, using proper grammar and punctuation (please answer in number format instead of in paragraphs):

1. What is your previous experience with managing products for E-commerce companies?
2. Please provide a list of tools or software you have utilized in previous roles for product management. For each tool, include details on its specific functions (such as web scraping or bulk upload) and briefly describe how you applied it in your work.
3. How large of a team have you managed before?
4. Have you worked with Shopify before?
5. Are you currently engaged in another job or commitment?
6. How fast is your internet?
7. Do you have a reliable computer?
8. How often do you experience power outages and internet issues?
9. What backups do you have in case of power outages?
10. What backups do you have in case of internet outages?

Please carefully review the entire job description and also use this format as your subject line when replying to this post: “Your First Name + I Am Your Product Manager" (e.g. Kevin - I Am Your Product Manager)

AI-generated responses will not be considered.

title: Paralegal
description:

title: Technical Support Specialist
description:
Overview:

Hi, we’re Influx! We’re a growing and profitable startup providing customer support for brands and tech companies on-demand, 24/7, every day of the year. To achieve this, our operation includes agents and managers working around the globe. Our head office is in Australia, and we currently have more than 1000+ people around the world.



About the role

Influx is seeking a tech-savvy and enthusiastic individual based in the Philippines to join our team as a Tech Agent. In this role, you'll provide exceptional support and assistance to customers across multiple platforms, ensuring their needs are met with professionalism and expertise.



In this role, you will:

Provide first-level technical support to clients, responding to inquiries and issues in a timely and efficient manner
Provide basic troubleshooting and device management, including setup and enrollment, and escalate complex issues to advanced support as needed
Monitor system dashboards for alerts and compliance issues
Document solutions and procedures in knowledge bases (KBs) and FAQs, and maintain them by keeping them updated.
Ensure that support requests are handled within established Service Level Agreements (SLAs), keeping client satisfaction a priority.
Providing exceptional customer service (solving customer problems, answering customer questions confidently), and voice support through excellent English communication.




This role requires a blend of problem-solving skills, clear communication, and a dedication to delivering excellent customer service. To succeed, you’ll need to be able to think on your feet, communicate clearly and effectively, and empathize with customers.



This is a work-from-home role with occasional meetups and events with other team members!



What we’re looking for:

Outstanding fluency in English (having an IELTS/TOEFL Score is preferable)
High level of confidence to communicate with native English speakers.
Organized, with strong communication skills, able to effectively share information with both technical and non-technical audiences.
Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills with basic understanding of computer systems, mobile devices, and common troubleshooting methods.
Basic knowledge of operating systems (Windows, macOS, or mobile devices)
Willingness to learn and develop skills in technical support and remote device management.


Desirable skills (not required):

Familiarity with Microsoft Intune, including performing tasks like device enrolment, profile configuration etc.
Understanding of network troubleshooting, remote desktop support, and endpoint management.
Experience using tools such as SCCM or basic scripting (e.g., PowerShell) is a huge plus.


What we offer:



Work from home (WFH) arrangement.
A supportive, collaborative, and high-performance environment at work that supports a life outside work.
A set of international clients with high standards of excellence.
An international team.
Comprehensive training to equip you with the knowledge and skills necessary to excel in the role.
Plenty of opportunities to learn from, and work with, high-performing colleagues in a fast-paced environment.


How We Operate / Our Values:

Treat others as you would like to be treated
Do what you say you’re going to do. Show don’t tell
Prioritize the listener
Focus on the facts


If this sounds interesting to you, join us by clicking on Apply! Fresh graduates are also welcome to apply :)



Employment type: Full-time only, 44 hours per week.



IMPORTANT NOTES:

Influx never asks candidates to make any payment throughout the entire recruitment process.
Successful candidates will be contacted only through email ending Upgrade to see actual info

title: Amazon Sourcing Analyst
description:
Overview
Are you someone who thrives on finding hidden opportunities and loves diving deep into data? We’re seeking an Amazon Sourcing Analyst who can consistently deliver results. Your mission will be to identify 20+ profitable leads daily with compelling, data-backed reasoning for why each product is a winner. If you're self-motivated, detail-oriented, and can follow instructions with minimal guidance, this role is for you.

We’re not interested in lengthy resumes or polished cover letters.  Please do NOT share these with us. 
You can show us you can do the job by demonstrating the exact skills we’re looking for in our screening test.

What You’ll Do
Analyze online product listings and sales data to identify products with high profit potential.
Evaluate sourcing opportunities using tools like Keepa, SellerAmp, and manual research methods.
Provide detailed reasoning for each profitable lead, focusing on ROI, competitive landscape, and demand metrics.
Maintain accuracy and consistency while meeting daily lead quotas.
Adapt quickly to feedback and adjust your approach as needed.
What We Expect From You

Strong analytical and decision-making skills.
Ability to identify profitable opportunities using Amazon-specific tools.
Meticulous attention to detail and data-backed reasoning for every lead.
Excellent communication skills to explain your rationale concisely.
Dependable and proactive attitude—able to thrive with minimal supervision.
To ensure you’ve read this listing carefully, include the phrase “Purple penguins are underrated” in your application. Applications without this will not be considered.


What You’ll Need
Familiarity with sourcing tools like Keepa, SellerAmp, or others.
Basic understanding of Amazon FBA business models.
Proven ability to hit quotas consistently in a sourcing role.
Reliable internet connection and access to required tools.

title: E-Commerce Marketing Project Manager
description:
We are seeking an experienced(at least 5 years of experience) and results-driven E-Commerce Marketing Project Manager to lead the marketing efforts for our Shopify store. The ideal candidate will manage a range of marketing channels, including Facebook & Instagram Ads, Google Ads, and email campaigns, and oversee all aspects of our online sales strategy. While you won’t need to handle all the execution yourself, you’ll act as the project manager, ensuring all marketing efforts are cohesive and effective.

You will collaborate with different specialists (PPC experts, social media managers, content creators) and be responsible for analyzing campaign performance, optimizing budgets, and driving sales growth.

Key Responsibilities:

Develop and Manage Marketing Campaigns

- Plan, execute, and optimize Facebook, Instagram, and Google Ads campaigns.
- Manage and track the performance of email marketing campaigns, ensuring high engagement and conversion rates.
- Collaborate with creative teams to produce ad creatives, promotional content, and email copy.

Monitor Performance and Optimize Strategy

- Track and analyze KPIs (ROAS, CTR, CAC, etc.) to ensure campaigns meet performance goals.
- Adjust ad strategies based on data insights to maximize profitability.

Oversee Multi-Channel Marketing

- Coordinate social media ad campaigns on platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, and TikTok.
- Lead influencer and partnership outreach to expand brand visibility.
- Manage Google Shopping and retargeting campaigns to boost conversions.

Project Management

- Act as the main point of contact for all marketing activities and ensure smooth communication between teams.
- Hire and manage external freelancers or agencies as needed.
- Prepare and present regular performance reports to the business owner.

Job Requirements:

Experience & Skills

- 5+ years of experience in e-commerce marketing, preferably with Shopify stores.
- Hands-on experience with Facebook, Instagram, and Google Ads.
- Proficiency in email marketing tools (e.g., Klaviyo, Mailchimp) and understanding of automation flows.
- Strong analytical skills with experience using tools like Google Analytics, Meta Business Suite, or similar.

Soft Skills

- Excellent project management skills with the ability to oversee multiple channels and teams.
- Strong communication skills to collaborate effectively with freelancers, agencies, and stakeholders.
- Creative thinker with an understanding of brand-building strategies.

Additional Requirements

- Fluent in English (written and verbal).
- Availability to work flexible hours to ensure campaign monitoring across time zones.

Preferred Qualifications:

- Experience managing email marketing campaigns on Shopify.
- Knowledge of influencer marketing and affiliate partnerships.
- Familiarity with SEO and content marketing strategies.

Compensation and Incentives:

- Monthly salary: $1,000 - $2,000, depending on experience and qualifications.
- Performance-based incentives tied to key metrics such as sales growth and ROAS.

title: Development Technical Delivery Manager - Odoo Exp Preferred
description:
Are you a technical leader who can turn complex business requirements into well-executed software solutions?  We're seeking a technical leader – someone who speaks both 'business' and 'developer' fluently, and can orchestrate successful software deliveries between our Business Analysts and our Development Teams. 

Our projects truly transform how our clients operate and scale their companies. As our DTO Manager, you'll be the crucial bridge that turns ambitious business visions into technical reality.

Competitive Pay range: $1,200 - $1,800 USD monthly (Full-Time) - based on experience. Plus more in the "What we offer" section below. 

Location: Remote (Canadian Based Company)

Employment Type: Open to Part-Time or Full-time

About Growth Strategy
At GrowthStrategy.ca, we specialize in helping organizations turn ambitious ideas into actionable strategies. Our mission is to empower businesses to thrive through streamlined operations, cutting-edge technology solutions, and a relentless focus on achieving tangible results. With a presence across North America and a fully remote, global team, we pride ourselves on delivering high-impact digital transformations that drive sustainable growth.

Our approach is simple: blend deep industry expertise with innovative thinking, ensuring that every solution is tailored to meet our clients’ unique challenges. As a team, we value transparency, collaboration, and a shared commitment to excellence (yes, we like to make 'Excellence' more than just a buzzword).

Role Overview
We’re on the hunt for a Development Operations (“Dev Ops”) / Technical Delivery Manager to become a pivotal part of our operations. Acting as the bridge between our business analysts and development teams, you’ll ensure the quality, timeliness, and reliability of technical deliverables that are integral to our clients’ success. If you thrive in environments where you can apply your technical expertise, lead high-performing teams, and improve delivery processes, this role is for you.

Key Responsibilities
• Your responsibilities will fall into three core categories:

1. Quality Assurance and Technical Validation
• Validate technical deliverables against business requirements, ensuring accuracy and functionality.
• Conduct rigorous testing of system integrations, customizations, and automations.
• Maintain a high bar for deliverable quality before presenting to clients.
• Document and track technical issues, leading their resolution in a timely manner.
2. Development Team Management
• Act as the primary liaison between business analysts and development teams.
• Translate complex business requirements into clear technical documentation and actionable tasks.
• Coordinate with development partners to meet deadlines and deliver high-quality results.
• Identify potential roadblocks early and resolve them to keep projects on track.
3. Process Improvement
• Design and refine development quality standards.
• Enhance our testing and validation frameworks.
• Maintain and expand technical documentation repositories.
• Promote a culture of continuous improvement by identifying process inefficiencies and suggesting actionable improvements.

Required Skills and Experience

We’re looking for candidates with:
• 3–4 years of ERP experience (Odoo preferred).
• A strong technical background, including an ability to review and validate code.
• A proven track record of managing external development teams.
• Experience in quality assurance or technical project management.
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.
• Strong problem-solving skills and a keen attention to detail.
• Hands-on experience with system integration projects.

Preferred Qualifications
Extra points for candidates with:
• Experience integrating e-commerce platforms like Shopify.
• Knowledge of multi-tax jurisdiction setups and their technical implications.
• A background in implementing ERP systems.
• Python or Java programming experience.
• Familiarity with agile development methodologies.
• Familiarity with accounting systems (QuickBooks experience is a plus).

What We Offer
At Growth Strategy, we know that great talent deserves great perks. Here’s what you can look forward to:
• Competitive salary ($1,200 - $1,800 USD monthly).
• Fully remote work environment with a flexible schedule.
• Opportunities for professional development and upskilling.
• A collaborative, growth-driven team culture.
• Regular training to keep you ahead of industry trends.

Key Indicators of Success:
1. Ability to quickly understand and articulate business requirements in technical terms, and vice versa
2. Development of efficient communication channels between business analysts and development teams
3. Implementation of improved quality control measures that reduce revision cycles
4. Demonstrated capacity to identify potential technical challenges early in the project lifecycle
5. Consistent delivery of thoroughly tested, client-ready functionality for demonstrations
6. Creation of clear, actionable technical documentation that serves both technical and non-technical stakeholders
7. Proactive identification and resolution of potential bottlenecks in the development process

Selection Process
1. Initial Application Review
   a. Submit your video application via our VideoPeel link here: https://app.videopeel.com/c/n5ec98vi .
   b. Complete your pre-hiring assessment here: https://www.ondemandassessment.com/link/index/JB-8GJ6XTLAF?u=1131604 .

2. Initial Interview with Management
   - A conversation focused on your experience, skills, and alignment with our company culture to assess if our expectations are in alignment.

3. Paid Practical Technical Assessment
   - A hands-on task to demonstrate your technical skills and problem-solving approach in a real-world scenario.

4. Final Interview with the Founder
   - A deep dive into the role, expectations, and a chance to discuss the vision of the company.
How to Apply
Please submit:
1.    a. Submit your resume and video application via our VideoPeel link here: https://app.videopeel.com/c/n5ec98vi .
   b. Complete your pre-hiring assessment here: https://www.ondemandassessment.com/link/index/JB-8GJ6XTLAF?u=1131604 . 

Include the word “Excellence” in your application to show you’ve read the full posting.
About Our Culture
We’re not just a team—we’re a community of learners, collaborators, and problem-solvers. We encourage curiosity, welcome new ideas, and believe in making meaningful contributions to our clients and each other. Join us, and you’ll find an environment where your skills are valued, your input is heard, and your growth is supported every step of the way.
