title: Seeking UI/UX Website Designer. Join our Fun Team! - STILL HIRING - APPLY NOW
description:
Are you an experienced designer with a knack for creating beautiful and effective designs for websites and other graphics? This is a gig where you will work as needed on design projects that we receive from our clients. This is a great fit if you have a bit of extra time during the week to fit in some additional design projects. Some weeks we may not have any projects, while other weeks we may have a handful of new projects. You just track your time that you spend on the projects and invoice us for them once complete.

We typically have a few requests per week for designs in the following:
- Website Design Mock-Ups
- New Page Mock-Ups for Existing Websites (to match the look and feel of existing branding)
- Email Newsletter Mock-Ups
- Website Banners and Advertising Banners for Car Dealerships
- Logo Designs
- Social Media Graphics

Required Skills:
- Create and update website designs using design tools such as PenPot, XD, or Figma
- Ability to turn projects around quickly and be responsive to revision requests (within the next business day or two business days depending on the complexity of the ticket) is required, and without much initial information from the client. 
A great example is a client asking for a mock-up of a new page they want on their website but only giving a very vague description of what they want. You should take that initial information, look at their website and find your own inspiration resources to create a polished product to share with the client. We can then make revisions. As we all know, clients usually don't know what they want until they see what they DON'T want.
- Clear communication for when you are starting work on a project, providing status updates as you work, and providing clear estimates on when each outstanding project should be ready so that we can keep the client in the loop. We value open and direct communication since this prevents 99% of issues that clients have when they don't know what to expect for timelines and results.

How the Process Works:
- We will give you access to our ticketing system and design resources
- You will be notified via email through this ticketing system when a new design ticket requires your assistance
- You click to view the details of the ticket, add a note to the ticket to let our team know that you have reviewed the ticket, as well as if there is any other information you need, your estimated time to have the initial product ready to share
- Run the time tracker and work on the project until finished
- Add your time to the ticket
- Leave a note on the ticket with links to your product, as well as the working files (e.g., .PSD, .AI) so that our team can quickly make revisions if needed prior to sharing with client
- Send an invoice for your total time spent on projects every two weeks (the 1st and 15th of the month)

IN YOUR REPLY, YOU MUST INCLUDE THE BELOW TO BE CONSIDERED
- Your desired hourly rate in Php
- Your desired payment method (Paypal, Wise, or Payoneer). We pay every two weeks and you can invoice us
- Your Availability (Be specific with when you are available to respond and work on our projects if we have a new request come in)
- Include examples of your designs

title: GoHighLevel Administrator
description:
We are looking for a skilled GoHighLevel (GHL) Automation and AI Specialist who can support our team on an as-needed basis. This position doesn’t guarantee a specific number of hours each week, but it’s ideal for someone who enjoys flexible, project-based work. We value a positive and proactive approach, ensuring each task is done with excellence and a pleasant attitude. The ideal candidate will have experience in setting up complex automations, funnels, and website integrations within GHL, as well as working with its latest AI features.

Key Responsibilities:

Automations & Workflows: Set up and manage automated workflows in GHL for efficient lead generation, customer engagement, and nurturing.

Funnel and Website Development: Build, test, and optimize high-converting funnels and websites within the GHL platform to capture leads, engage prospects, and drive conversions.

AI-Driven Tools Integration: Leverage GHL’s AI capabilities, including AI employee chat, conversational AI, voice interactions, and review management, ensuring these tools enhance workflows.

Prompt Engineering: Develop and optimize ChatGPT prompts to ensure effective AI-driven customer interactions and automated responses.

Webhooks & Integrations: Set up and maintain webhooks for seamless data flow and integration between GHL and third-party applications.

Performance Tracking & Optimization: Regularly analyze and optimize automation performance, using data to improve processes and results.

Qualifications:
Demonstrated experience with GoHighLevel (GHL), particularly in automations, funnels, and website management.
Strong knowledge of GHL’s AI tools, including AI employee chat, conversational AI, and voice functionality.
Proficiency with ChatGPT and prompt creation for optimized AI interactions.
Familiarity with webhooks, APIs, and third-party integrations.
Analytical and detail-oriented mindset for monitoring and improving workflows.

title: HIRING - SEO Expert. Do you know SEO? Join our Fun Team!
description:
Are you experienced at SEO?

We are seeking an experienced and results-driven SEO Specialist to join our dynamic digital agency. As an SEO Specialist, you will be responsible for developing and executing effective search engine optimization strategies to improve organic search rankings, increase website traffic, and drive qualified leads. You will also be responsible to documenting these processes and checking the work of teammates who will perform SEO work as directed by you.

We are looking for an individual who stays on top of the latest SEO trends and is aware of what the latest best strategies are for both Local SEO and standard SEO (e.g., Google Business Profile optimization).  You must also be able to perform keyword research to find effective content ideas that are RELEVANT to the target website, and are also able to be ranked by the domain based on its DA and other factors. You should understand effective internal and external link building strategies.

You will work closely with our developers to ensure technical SEO tasks are implemented (e.g., Pagespeed Insights and SEMRush Site Audit) and you will develop and implement SEO content using a combination of your own writing along with our SEO tool and AI writing tools. The ideal candidate should have a proven track record of successful SEO campaigns and possess strong analytical and technical skills.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and implement comprehensive SEO strategies to increase organic search visibility, website traffic, and conversions. 
- Conduct keyword research using SEMRush/SERanking/Google Search Console and similar tools to identify target keywords and optimize website content accordingly for a complete topical map.
- Perform ON-PAGE optimization, including meta tags, headings, URL structures, and internal linking.
- Use our AI tools to create compelling content based on your keyword research.
- Create proper INTERNAL LINKING structures within content
- Use the Wordpress block editor to schedule blog posts and optimize page content.
- Develop and execute off-page optimization strategies, such as link building, guest blogging, and social media promotion. 
- Monitor and analyze website performance using SEO tools and make data-driven recommendations for improvements for our development team to implement.
- Find new backlink opportunities via Google Search Console to get contact information of website owners who have ranking articles and add to our email system for outreach. Replying to these leads.
- Stay up to date with industry trends and changes in search engine algorithms to adapt strategies accordingly. (e.g., Julian Goldie, Matt Diggity) We are looking for CUTTING EDGE approaches here. If you aren't subscribed to top SEO YouTube channels and love your craft, embrace automation and AI, you are not our ideal candidate. 
- Conduct regular SEO audits to identify technical issues and provide recommendations for optimization.
- Track, analyze, and report on key SEO metrics, such as organic traffic, rankings, and conversions.
- Collaborate with web developers to implement technical SEO enhancements, such as website speed optimization and mobile responsiveness.
- Stay informed about competitor SEO activities and industry trends to identify opportunities and stay ahead of the competition.

Requirements:
- Experience as an SEO Specialist or similar role.
- In-depth knowledge of search engine algorithms, ranking factors, and SEO best practices.
- Proficient in using SEO tools, such as Google Analytics, Google Search Console, Ahrefs, SEMrush, Moz, etc.
- Strong understanding of Wordpress block editor for post editing
- Experience with website analytics tools and ability to analyze data to drive actionable insights.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
- Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
- Up-to-date with the latest industry trends and changes in search engine algorithms.
- Results-oriented mindset with a focus on driving organic traffic and conversions.
- Familiarity with content management systems (CMS) and website development processes (Wordpress)
- Experience with local SEO and how to optimize a Google Business Profile (or willingness to learn this. It isn't hard, it's just a process that must be followed for local businesses)

If you are a self-motivated and data-driven SEO professional looking for an opportunity to make a significant impact on our digital presence, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your resume and a portfolio showcasing your successful SEO campaigns.

IN YOUR REPLY, YOU MUST INCLUDE THE BELOW TO BE CONSIDERED. If you ignore the below questions, we will not reply:
- Your desired monthly salary in Php
- Your desired payment method (Paypal, Wise, or Payoneer)
- Your Shift Availability (Be specific with when you can work - such as which weekdays, timezone. Example: I am available to work 4 hours per day, Monday through Friday, between 8AM - 4PM PST). This is for a full-time position of 8 hours per day, M-F.
- Describe 1 latest strategy you've utilized to help rank a website

title: Sales & Marketing in Hotel Suppliers
description:
Introduction: We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Hotel Supplier Sales and Marketing Specialist to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for driving new business by reaching out to potential customers, such as travel agents, corporate clients, and other businesses worldwide, encouraging them to sign up and use our portal for hotel bookings. This role requires a combination of sales, marketing, and customer service skills, as well as the ability to manage supplier and agent relationships, ensure smooth account setups, and handle payments. The ideal candidate will be proactive, customer-focused, and comfortable working in a fast-paced environment.

Key Responsibilities:

Sales and Lead Generation:

Reach out to potential customers, including travel agents and corporate clients worldwide, to introduce and promote our hotel booking portal.
Generate new leads, follow up with prospects, and convert them into registered users of the portal.
Build and maintain relationships with key clients and stakeholders.
Use effective sales techniques to close deals and meet monthly or quarterly targets.
Marketing and Advertising:

Develop and implement marketing strategies to attract new users to the platform.
Create compelling marketing materials (emails, brochures, advertisements) to promote our services to travel agents and corporate clients.
Manage and optimize online advertising campaigns to increase brand visibility and platform usage.
Track and report on the performance of marketing campaigns and adjust strategies accordingly.
Account Setup and Customer Onboarding:

Set up new customer accounts on the portal and ensure a seamless onboarding experience.
Provide training or guidance to new users on how to navigate and use the portal effectively.
Customize accounts based on client-specific needs and preferences.
Payment Management and Supplier Coordination:

Handle payment processing for customers, ensuring all transactions are completed smoothly and securely.
Work closely with suppliers and agents to manage payment schedules and ensure that financial transactions are up-to-date.
Resolve any payment-related queries or issues promptly and professionally.
Customer Service and Support:

Serve as the primary point of contact for customer service inquiries related to hotel bookings.
Handle customer complaints, issues, and feedback in a professional and timely manner.
Coordinate with hotels and suppliers to resolve booking discrepancies, cancellations, or special requests.
Provide ongoing support to ensure customer satisfaction and retention.
Qualifications & Skills:

Sales Experience:

Proven track record in sales, preferably in the hospitality or travel industry.
Strong experience in cold calling, lead generation, and closing sales.
Excellent negotiation skills with the ability to influence decision-makers.
Marketing Skills:

Experience with digital marketing, including email campaigns, online advertising, and social media marketing.
Ability to create marketing materials and engage customers through various communication channels.
Customer Service Expertise:

Strong customer service skills with the ability to address client concerns and resolve issues quickly.
A customer-first mindset, with a focus on building long-term relationships.
Technical Proficiency:

Familiarity with hotel booking platforms, CRM systems, and payment processing tools.
Basic knowledge of Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and other office software.
Ability to learn new software quickly and troubleshoot minor technical issues.
Organizational & Communication Skills:

Highly organized with the ability to manage multiple clients and accounts simultaneously.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English; additional languages are a plus.
Strong attention to detail and problem-solving abilities.
Key Attributes:

Self-motivated and goal-oriented.
Comfortable with working in a target-driven environment.
Strong interpersonal and relationship-building skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Flexible, proactive, and adaptable to changing business needs.
What We Offer:

Competitive salary and performance-based incentives.
Opportunity to work in a dynamic and growing company within the hospitality industry.
Collaborative and supportive team environment.
Professional development and career growth opportunities.
If you're passionate about sales, marketing, and customer service in the travel and hospitality sector, and are eager to contribute to the success of our hotel booking platform, we'd love to hear from you. Apply today and join a team dedicated to delivering exceptional service to clients worldwide!

title: Operations/Automations Specialist (GHL Expert)
description:
We’re obsessed with efficiency and innovation. We don’t believe in reinventing the wheel—but we do believe in making that wheel spin faster, smoother, and more intelligently. If you’re an Operations/Automations Specialist with a sharp mind, proven expertise in GHL, and a track record of improving business processes through automation, we want you to join us. This is not a “learn-as-you-go” role; we need someone who already knows the ropes, can build on what we’ve got, and bring us to the next level.

The Role:
As our Operations/Automations Specialist, you’ll be the secret sauce that keeps our business running like a well-oiled machine. We have a solid foundation, but we need an expert who can come in and optimize and scale our processes. You’ll be responsible for automating workflows, improving CRM management, ensuring email and SMS deliverability, and building seamless API integrations between platforms. Additionally, you’ll use data visualization to help us make smarter decisions based on performance metrics. This is an opportunity to bring your problem-solving mindset to the table and make a tangible impact on our operations.

Here’s what you’ll be doing:
- Automate and streamline key operations using GoHighLevel, Zapier, Integromat, and other integration tools to optimize workflows and eliminate inefficiencies.
- Build and manage CRM workflows within GoHighLevel, ensuring that automations are running smoothly, lead tracking is efficient, and pipelines are optimized for conversion.
- Set up and optimize email and SMS campaigns, ensuring deliverability, troubleshooting issues, and analyzing campaign performance to maximize results.
- Create and manage API integrations between GoHighLevel and third-party applications like Google Sheets, Zoom, Mailchimp, etc., to enhance functionality and streamline data flow.
- Design client portals and other customer-facing systems in GoHighLevel, integrating automated workflows and notifications.
- Develop reports and dashboards to visualize key metrics (using GoHighLevel’s reporting features or external tools like Google Data Studio) to track business performance and identify areas for improvement.
- Think outside the box to come up with creative, cost-effective solutions to challenges—using the tools and resources available to us.
- Troubleshoot, monitor, and refine existing automation systems, ensuring they’re always working at peak performance.
- Provide clear, comprehensive documentation of workflows and systems, ensuring smooth handoffs and scalability.

What You'll Ideally Bring to the Table:
- 3+ years of experience in operations, automation, and CRM management, with a focus on GHL.
- Proven expertise in building and managing automations, particularly within GoHighLevel, including CRM workflows, email and SMS campaigns, and custom integrations.
- Experience working with API integrations (GoHighLevel’s API or third-party platforms like Google Sheets, Twilio, Zapier, etc.).
- Strong knowledge of email and SMS deliverability, with experience troubleshooting and optimizing these channels for best performance.
- Ability to visualize data using GoHighLevel’s native reporting tools or external tools like Google Data Studio.
- A data-driven mindset with the ability to analyze performance metrics and adjust strategies for better results.
- A passion for process improvement, with a natural ability to spot inefficiencies and implement smarter ways to get things done.
- Strong problem-solving skills and a knack for simplifying complex processes while thinking creatively.
- Comfort with Google Suite, and the general tech-savviness to pick up new tools quickly.

Why You’ll Love Working with Us:
- Competitive salary based on experience and expertise.
- A high-performance environment where we don’t just talk about excellence—we live it.
- Freedom to innovate: You’ll have the autonomy to fine-tune existing systems, implement new solutions, and make a significant impact on the business.
- The opportunity to work with cutting-edge tools and make a lasting difference in our operations.

How to Apply:
**Please do not apply if you are just starting out as a VA or looking for an entry-level role. This is a high-level position that requires proven expertise and experience.

If you’re serious about this opportunity, please title your submission "Serious Inquiry - [Full Name]" and include a link to a recording of you presenting:

1.  A brief summary of your experience with GHL (or similar tool), CRM automation, API integrations, and email/SMS deliverability.
2.  Examples of workflows, automations, reports etc. you’ve created in GHL or other platforms.
3. A short segment on a 2 problem-solving challenges you’ve tackled in a previous role and how you approached it.

Nothing less will be considered. 

We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Email Marketer for Food & Lifestyle Influencer (using Flodesk but substack-style personal emails )
description:
I am a food influencer and recipe developer (plant-based) with a website and around 900k followers across social media channels. 

I am looking for somebody who can take complete ownership and responsibility of my email marketing strategy. I want you to help create segmented email funnels for my community and create better engagement, affiliate sales and drive traffic to my website using email marketing. 

I currently have a basic welcome sequence set up as a pop-up "5 day free guide to plant-based living" which you can preview here: https://glow-diaries.com/ but no real segmenting of the audience.

I would need you to write daily emails to drive traffic to recipes and also to ghost write in my tone of voice, sharing personal updates behind the scenes in my life (we will communicate mostly on Slack so I can give you a quick voicenote of what to say in the email). 

You will also develop segments for my audience and use polls to engage them and learn more about them. You will help craft a sales email funnel sequence (I already have one that needs to be updated) for a digital nutrition course I sell. You will also help me craft emails specifically geared towards affiliate marketing. 
The role in future may expand to include responsibility for affiliate marketing in a broader scope - creating strategies across not just email but also my website links and social media.

My email list is about 44k, mostly USA, UK and Australian women who are interested in eating healthy plant based meals. Many of them are mothers. Majority are 25-44 but I also have a very engaged group of slightly older women who have adult children (I think I remind them of their own daughters) who are about 55-65.

I also use ManyChat on social media and it would be a great bonus if you have experience creating funnels for that platform, as this will need to be integrated into the email strategy too (this is how I drive most of my traffic and email sign ups). 

The interview process will consist of a small paid trial task and email interviews. Please include the subject line "email foodie" so I know you have read this application :) please also include a link to your resume, portfolio and any other relevant experience you may have.

I estimate this role is part time however I am also looking for social media manager, so if you perform well in this role, I can expand the responsibilities for the right candidate. I believe to write 1 email daily, plus create the funnels and other automations, it is about 2 hours work per day or 14 hours / week. Salary is  $160 / month (about $2.90 / hour) but can increase this for the right candidate if you have Many Chat experience, social media management, keyword research or Wordpress skills. Let me know what you can do and your preferred number of daily hours :)

title: Customer Support / Virtual Assistant For Growing Wedding Beauty Co.
description:
ABOUT

This non-graveyard Customer Support / Virtual Assistant position is with a successful and established company in the US, with a premier brand and a long-standing reputation for excellence in our industry (18+ years).

We are seeking a female customer support representative who is exceptionally detail-oriented, hard-working, organized, and proactive to join our high-growth expansion. This role offers significant growth opportunities, including the potential to become an operational partner with substantial profit-sharing bonuses, in addition to high monthly compensation and reimbursement for health benefits. You must be meticulous, a self-starter, tech-savvy, honest, and reliable. This position demands full dedication, with availability for after-hours work when necessary. You must also have a can-do attitude and a desire for long-term growth.


REQUIREMENTS – Read carefully

3+ years of full-time experience as a Customer Support agent (ideally in a fast-paced environment)
2+ years of Virtual Assistant
Availability from 6 am to 4 pm PH time (minimum). Also, available outside of working hours when necessary
Appointment setting skills
Exceptional communication skills with an emphasis on customer support
Fluent in spoken and written English with excellent phone and email communication skills
Excellent problem-solving skills
Organized and meticulous attention to detail
A self-starter, able to follow simple instructions and adapt new tools
Proficiency with Google Calendar, Docs, Sheets, Zoom, ClickUp, CRM, etc
2 most recent professional references and 2 personal references
High regard for integrity, excellence, dedication, continuous learning


BENEFITS

World-class happiness & wellness membership
Healthy and caring work environment for you to thrive
Opportunity to advance into an operational partner
Top compensation: base salary + monthly performance bonus + annual bonus
Paid Philippines holidays
Health benefits reimbursement
13th month bonus


KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

1. Customer Support:
• Serve as a main point of contact for client communications, responding to inquiries via emails, texts and/or calls as needed within 24 hours, delivering the BEST client experience. Uphold inbox ZERO daily.
• Appointment setting.
• Create invoices and proposals, managing bookings and payments. Apply appropriate workflow(s)
• Create personalized documents and tailor schedules for projects.
• Anticipating client needs and proactively reaching out when any milestones are coming due.
• Utilize HoneyBook (CRM), Google Calendar, Google Slides, Google Voice with a high level of proficiency to manage project timelines and tasks, ensuring all relevant information is seamlessly integrated in HoneyBook and Asana.
• Monitor urgent matters, be it email or text, at all times

2. Organizational Support:
• Provide comprehensive support to the CEO and team. Handle day-to-day administrative tasks.
• Manage calendars, schedule meetings, and allocate time for various appointments.
• Organize files and documents for easy access and efficiency.
• Monitor and manage project tasks, ensuring accuracy and timely execution.
• Oversee attendance and issue monthly and quarterly rewards.
• Utilize ClickUp to prioritize tasks and manage project deadlines strategically.

3. Sales & Marketing:
• Track leads in systems, maintain appropriate project stages and manage detailed checklists tailored to each project stage.
• Ensure all inquiries are responded to in a timely manner, taking charge of lead follow-up and turning leads into sales.
• Develop and manage automation to boost sales, making necessary changes to increase effectiveness.
• Design promotional newsletter, copywriting, and tracking metrics to advance campaign effectiveness.
• Handle birthday cards, research and purchase gifts for special occasions.
• Utilize platforms such as Flodesk, Paperless Post, Amazon, William Sonoma, etc.

4. Vendor Support:
• Act as a liaison, to facilitate efficient communication with vendors, answering inquiries and assisting with needs, demonstrating exceptional judgment in problem-solving to deliver the best vendor experience
• Manage referral partner bonus points with 100?curacy, issue rewards as needed.
• Create and update a partner's personal reward portal with accurate points monthly.
• Ensure vendor’s personal and professional information is up to date.

5. Project Management:
• Play a central role in project management, ensuring that every client's journey through our service process is meticulously planned and monitored. This involves a detailed understanding of each project's status and the ability to adapt workflows as necessary.
• Coordinate effectively with referral partners and vendors to ensure a seamless integration of services, which requires excellent communication skills and the ability to build rapport and nurture relationships proactively.

6. Professional Development:
• Engage in self-directed learning and proactively participate in training to embody insights of the wedding and the beauty industry.
• Acquire knowledge and required skills as an excellent executive assistant, including familiarity with industry standards and processes.

7. Website/Platform Maintenance:
• Update web pages as needed
• Add new albums to the website, showcasing the latest work
• Manage company profiles on third-party platforms, generating positive reviews


We seek individuals who aren't just seeking a job but a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to evolve into a valued partner within our team. If you meet these high qualifications, start your application: form.typeform.com/to/DIc7hAz7
Type "OJ" after your full name.

We look forward to welcoming you to the Kohnur team!

title: Senior Software Developer
description:
Are you looking to make a significant impact in a small, agile team? We're a small company seeking an experienced .NET Windows Forms Developer to join our close-knit team. 
This is a remote position where you'll have the opportunity to shape and influence our key technical direction.

About Us:

Small, focused development team .
100% remote work environment
Daily virtual standup meetings to stay connected and aligned
Direct impact on technical decisions and product direction

Key Responsibilities:

Work closely with your fellow developer to design and develop scalable n-tier Windows Forms applications
Take ownership of significant portions of our codebase
Implement and maintain MVC architecture patterns in enterprise applications
Participate in daily virtual standups to discuss progress and challenges
Contribute directly to technical decision-making and architecture planning
Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code

Required Skills & Experience:

5+ years of experience in .NET Windows Forms development
Strong proficiency in C# and .NET Framework
Proven experience building full standards-compliant, scalable n-tier applications
Extensive knowledge of MVC architecture patterns and implementation
Hands-on experience with professional UI control libraries including:

DevExpress
Telerik
Infragistics
Kendo UI


Proficient with version control systems (Git/SVN)
Experience using Jira for project management and issue tracking
Strong understanding of software design patterns and best practices
Excellent self-management skills and ability to work independently
Strong remote communication skills

Desired Skills:

Experience with WPF or .NET MAUI
Knowledge of SQL Server and database design
Understanding of RESTful APIs
Experience with automated testing frameworks
Previous remote work experience
Experience in small team environments

What We Offer:

Competitive salary
Fully remote work environment
Flexible working hours (core hours for daily standups)
Technology allowance for home office setup
Professional development opportunities
Direct influence on technical decisions
No corporate bureaucracy
Work-life balance
Health and wellness benefits

Requirements:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field
Strong problem-solving abilities
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Self-motivated with ability to work independently
Reliable internet connection and quiet home office space
Ability to attend daily virtual standup meetings
Located in [Time Zone requirement, if any]

What Makes This Role Special:
As one of only two developers, you'll have unprecedented input into technical decisions and the evolution of our products. There's no corporate red tape – just two professionals collaborating to create excellent software solutions. You'll have the freedom to influence our technical direction while working from the comfort of your home office.
To apply, please send your resume and a cover letter explaining:

Your experience with Windows Forms development and enterprise architecture
Your approach to remote work and self-management
Examples of when you've worked in small team environments

Location: 100% Remote
Employment Type: Full-time
Experience Level: Senior
Equal Opportunity Employer
Join us in creating impactful software solutions while enjoying the flexibility of remote work and the benefits of a small, agile team environment.

**Additional Requirements:**

- Reliable internet, quiet workspace, and willingness to connect to the company’s Active Directory Domain
- Hours: 8:30 AM - 5:30 PM AEST

**To Apply:**

Send a short introduction (voice if possible) on WhatsApp at +61 412 173 939 or Skype at BrentonAGM, covering: what your core skills are and last 3 roles )

title: Risk Analyst for Online Gambling
description:
*** PLEASE DO NOT APPLY FOR THIS POSITION IF YOU DO NOT HAVE PREVIOUS WORK EXPERIENCE IN CONDUCTING KYC CHECKS WITHIN THE ONLINE GAMBLING INDUSTRY ***


We are a leading online sweepstakes casino offering an exciting array of games, including slots, table games, and more, exclusively to players in the USA. Our platform is designed to offer a thrilling gaming experience in a secure and responsible environment. We are committed to delivering exceptional customer service and a seamless gaming experience to all our players.

We are seeking a diligent and detail-oriented Risk Analyst to join the team. The Risk Analyst Specialist will play a crucial role in ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements and maintaining the integrity of our customer verification processes. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of KYC principles and regulations, along with excellent communication and analytical skills. 

Responsibilities: 
• Conduct thorough customer due diligence checks to verify the identity of new and existing customers. 
• Review and analyze customer documentation, including identification documents and proof of address, to ensure compliance with regulatory requirements. 
• Collaborate with internal teams to resolve KYC-related issues and escalate any compliance concerns. 
• Stay up-to-date with changes in regulatory requirements and industry best practices related to KYC and AML (Anti-Money Laundering) regulations. 
• Maintain accurate records of KYC checks and related documentation in accordance with company policies and procedures. 

Requirements: 
• Excellent English communication skills: verbal, written, and reading is a MUST 
• Proven KYC experience, ideally in the online gambling industry is a MUST 
• Strong understanding of KYC principles, AML regulations, and industry best practices 
• Excellent attention to detail and analytical skills 
• Must be able to work in a fast-paced environment and handle multiple tasks simultaneously. 
• A commitment to upholding the highest standards of privacy and confidentiality 

Work Schedule:
• This is a full-time position in a work-from-home setup. You will be working 8 hours a day, 5 days a week.

TO APPLY FOR THIS POSITION, FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS BELOW:
1. Include the phrase "KYC" in your SUBJECT.
2. Send a COVER LETTER with a LINK to your CV/Resume.

***APPLICATIONS WITHOUT CVS/RESUMES WILL NOT BE CONSIDERED***

title: Notion Manager Virtual Assistant
description:

To support our growing operations, we’re looking for a Notion Manager Virtual Assistant to help us organize, maintain, and optimize our Notion workspaces. If you’re tech-savvy, detail-oriented, and a Notion expert, we’d love to have you on board!

Automation and Integration:

Team Support:

Skills:

Attention to detail and ability to manage multiple tasks.

Reliable internet connection and a suitable home workspace.
Ability to work collaboratively in a remote environment.

Benefits:
Competitive pay based on experience.

Opportunity to grow with the company.
Supportive, collaborative remote team environment.

How to Apply:
Submit your updated resume.

title: Social Media Marketing Manager
description:
Position Overview
We are seeking a dynamic, creative, and results-driven Social Media Marketing Manager to join our growing marketing team. In this role, you will be responsible for developing, implementing, and managing our social media strategy across multiple platforms to increase brand awareness, drive engagement, and support lead generation. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of social media trends, content creation, audience targeting, and analytics, along with a passion for engaging with online communities and driving business results.

Key Responsibilities

• Social Media Strategy & Planning
o Develop and execute a comprehensive social media marketing strategy aligned with company goals and brand positioning.
o Create and manage social media calendars, ensuring consistent content flow across platforms.
o Stay up to date with the latest trends, tools, and best practices in social media marketing, ensuring that campaigns are innovative and relevant.

• Content Creation & Curation
o Oversee the creation of engaging, high-quality content, including graphics, videos, blog posts, and social media posts, that resonates with target audiences.
o Curate relevant content from industry leaders, partners, and influencers to share with the community.
o Ensure brand voice and messaging consistency across all social media platforms.

• Community Management
o Build and nurture relationships with followers, fans, influencers, and key stakeholders across social media platforms.
o Monitor social media conversations, respond to comments and messages in a timely and professional manner, and engage with the community to foster brand loyalty.
o Address customer inquiries, complaints, and feedback via social media, escalating when necessary.

• Analytics & Reporting
o Analyze and report on social media performance metrics (e.g., reach, engagement, click-through rates, conversions) to assess the effectiveness of campaigns.
o Track social media trends and competitor activity, providing actionable insights to refine strategies.
o Provide regular reports to senior management on social media performance and campaign results.
o Perform cold calls

• Paid Social Media Campaigns
o Develop and execute paid social media campaigns, including budget management, targeting, and creative development.
o Optimize paid ads across platforms (e.g., Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter) to drive brand awareness, lead generation, and sales.
o Monitor ad performance, adjust targeting and creatives, and report on ROI.

• Collaboration & Cross-Functional Coordination
o Work closely with the content, design, and product teams to align messaging and campaign goals.
o Collaborate with PR, events, and other departments to integrate social media efforts with broader marketing initiatives and brand campaigns.


Qualifications
• Experience & Education
o Bachelor’s degree in marketing, Communications, Business, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
o 3+ years of experience in social media marketing, digital marketing, or a related field.
o Proven track record of managing and growing social media channels (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, TikTok, etc.).
o Experience with social media advertising, analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, Facebook Insights, Sprout Social, Hootsuite), and content management systems.

• Skills & Competencies
o Strong understanding of social media platforms, algorithms, and best practices.
o Strong with lead generation software, CRM (Hubspot, marketing SME
o Able to set marking automation via software tools
o Solid Graphic Design and marketing skills
o Exceptional written and verbal communication skills, with a keen eye for detail and brand voice consistency.
o Creative mindset with the ability to generate fresh ideas for engaging content.
o Solid experience with social media content creation tools (e.g., Canva, Adobe Creative Suite).
o Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data, track trends, and adjust strategies for optimal performance.
o Strong organizational and project management skills, with the ability to manage multiple priorities and deadlines.

• Personal Traits
o Passionate about social media and staying current with trends in digital marketing.
o Team-oriented with the ability to work cross-functionally.
o Highly motivated, proactive, and results-driven.
o Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to think strategically while executing tactically.


Preferred Qualifications
• Experience with influencer marketing and partnership building.
• Knowledge of SEO and its integration with social media strategies.
• Familiarity with email marketing and automation tools (e.g., MailChimp, HubSpot).
• Experience in eCommerce or B2B social media marketing.

title: SENIOR LEVEL EXECUTIVE ASSISTANT
description:
STOP! Before you apply, this role is ONLY for the top 1% of executive assistants who can meet these non-negotiable requirements:

1. You MUST work Mountain Time Zone hours (10PM - 6AM Philippines Time) - No exceptions
2. You MUST have 8+ years of executive assistant experience with C-level executives
3. You MUST write and speak English at a native level
4. You MUST have stable internet (20+ Mbps) and backup power
5. You MUST have video editing and design skills

IF YOU DON'T MEET ALL OF THESE - DO NOT APPLY.

Still here? Good. Let's continue...

WHO WE ARE:
We're a US-based Marketing/SaaS firm led by a marketing veteran who's been dominating since '95. We're not looking for a VA - we're looking for an operations commander who can run complex marketing campaigns, manage advanced systems, and think three steps ahead.

YOUR ROLE:
You'll work directly with our CEO to:
1. Execute marketing campaigns across multiple channels
2. Manage complex CRM systems (GroundHogg.io)
3. Create and edit content (blogs, videos, social media)
4. Run marketing automation systems
5. Handle high-level communications
6. Manage YouTube and podcast strategies

REQUIRED SKILLS & EXPERIENCE:
1. Advanced CRM management
2. Marketing automation expertise
3. Video editing proficiency
4. Social media management
5. Content creation and management
6. Project management
7. Calendar and email management
8. Strong problem-solving abilities
9. System creation and optimization
10. Excellent written and verbal communication

TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS:
1. Professional home office setup
2. Dedicated computer for video editing
3. High-quality headset with microphone
4. Backup internet connection
5. Backup power solution
6. Minimum 20 Mbps stable internet

DO NOT APPLY IF:
1. You can't work US hours (10PM - 6AM Philippines Time)
2. You need constant supervision
3. You don't like fast-paced environments
4. You're not comfortable making decisions
5. Your English isn't excellent
6. You don't have marketing experience
7. You're not tech-savvy
8. You don't have video editing skills

APPLICATION PROCESS:
Step 1: Create a 3-minute video showing:
- Your experience with marketing automation
- Your video editing skills
- Why you're different from other applicants

Step 2: Provide detailed examples of:
- Marketing campaigns you've managed
- Systems you've created
- Results you've achieved
- Tools you're expert in

Step 3: Answer these questions:
1. What hours can you work? (Must be Mountain Time)
2. Describe your home office setup
3. What's your internet speed? (Include screenshot)
4. List all marketing tools you're expert in
5. Describe your video editing experience
6. Share your biggest achievement as an EA

NOTE: Applications missing ANY of these elements will be automatically rejected.

This is a long-term, full-time position with a direct impact on our business growth. The right person will have significant career growth opportunities.

Remember: If you don't meet ALL requirements, please do not apply. We review applications thoroughly and test all claims made in applications.

title: WordPress Developer, PHP, HTML, JS
description:
Do you want to work somewhere you are appreciated? Work with us! We are a very small team for a small web development company.  We work on a wide variety of projects, from simple to complex. You will be the primary PHP, HTML, and CSS developer for the team, developing custom plugins, troubleshooting WordPress problems, and handling technical implementations. 

**Who Are We Looking For?**

Seeking a motivated, and intelligent full-time or part-time experienced WordPress developer. Must have experience with WordPress, PHP and creating/maintaining custom plugins. Must have experience troubleshooting WordPress errors. Must be flexible and adaptable, willing to learn and do new things. This is a long-term position, we are looking for the right person to keep for a long time. 

**Benefits**

- Flexible Hours
- Flexible Vacation
- Philippine holiday schedule
- Paid Time Off (PTO)
- 13-month pay

**Job Duties and Responsibilities**

- Receive and complete tasks from the project manager
- Tasks will likely be technical in nature, for example, “fix this responsive issue at 550px screen width” or “fix this critical error that appears on this page” or “modify this custom plugin to include this new functionality”
- Responding to support requests from a client, especially if it is highly technical.
- Creating custom plugins that expand the functionality of WordPress using PHP, HTML, CSS, and JS
- Researching and finding the best plugin to accomplish a desired function
- Navigating WordPress. Changing Settings, or making changes as needed.
- Help to update and create documentation
- Using various plugins, and updating settings. Learning how to use new plugins via documentation, videos, or experimentation will be required
- Making changes to existing custom plugins
- Communicating with the team the status of your work
- Occasional server-level troubleshooting
- Help build out websites using a page builder.
- Daily report on progress during the work week via email

**Requirements** 

- English Fluency
- Reliability and integrity
- Responsive: Quick with email and chat communication
- An advanced understanding of WordPress, 5+ yrs experience
- woocommerce coding and customization experience
- An advanced understanding of troubleshooting WordPress
- Experience coding PHP
- Experience creating custom plugins
- Experience using various plugins, and page builders
- Strong Organizational Skills
- The ability to teach yourself how to do things by using Google and following how-to guides
- HTML and CSS proficiency
- Typical work hours will be flexible, but work will be performed between 9am to 11pm EST, for communication with the rest of the team.
- 4-8hr per day.

**Preferred Extra Skills [not required]:**

These skills might be useful, but they are not needed or could be learned along the way.

- experience with Git
- page builder experience
- SEO Experience
- Email Marketing
- API Development
- Node and React experience

If selected, a video interview will be required

**To apply for this job:**

Respond to this job posting with a message. in the message, do the following:

1. Change the subject line to “I Want to work for you [insert the Yearly cost of our budget Level care plan listed here https://tollewebdesign.com/careplans ]
2. Let me know briefly about any relevant experience you have, we can get into more details in an interview. If you have a resume that would work as well.
3. Let me know if you are ok with the listed hourly rate range
4. Let me know how many hours you want to work per week. It can be more or less than 20, what is ideal for you?
6. let me know if you are ok with the time difference, working between 9am and 11pm est

title: Power BI Developer / Data Engineer
description:
As a Data Engineer & Power BI Developer, you will play a pivotal role in our growth strategy by empowering teams with actionable data insights. This role is instrumental in developing dashboards and automations that drive revenue growth, optimize service mixes, and inform staffing decisions across our centers. In addition to your primary responsibilities, you will assist with basic technical needs, such as managing user access, resetting passwords, and providing troubleshooting support, ensuring smooth day-to-day operations.

Key Responsibilities:
-Develop and maintain automated workflows using Power Automate to streamline document management and routine reporting.
-Create, optimize, and sustain intuitive data models and schemas to support our analytics framework using Power BI, enabling leadership to make data-driven decisions.
-Design compelling Power BI dashboards and reports that translate complex data into actionable insights for field sales, daily labor hours, marketing performance, and lead conversion.
-Support the integration and automation of data from Microsoft 365, Zenoti, and other platforms, utilizing API connections or -Excel-based syncing as needed.
-Assist with technical needs such as managing user access, resetting passwords, and basic troubleshooting.
-Maintain comprehensive documentation for data workflows, dashboards, and automated processes.
-Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including field operations, marketing, and HR, to identify reporting requirements and deliver solutions aligned with business objectives.
-Provide operational training and user documentation to ensure team members can effectively leverage dashboards and tools.

Tech Stack:
-Primary Platforms: Microsoft 365, Zenoti, Dynamics 365
-Automation Tools: Power Automate
-Visualization & Reporting: Power BI (including DAX for data transformation)
-Collaboration Tools: Slack, Microsoft Teams

Experience & Skills Required:
-3–5 years of experience designing and developing Power BI dashboards across business domains, with proficiency in DAX and SQL for data manipulation.
-Experience integrating data from multiple platforms, including scenarios requiring Excel-based syncing for platforms without API connections.
-Strong understanding of relational database systems (e.g., MS SQL Server) and data modeling.
-Basic technical troubleshooting skills, including managing user access and resetting passwords.
-Ability to collaborate effectively across teams and communicate insights clearly, reflecting Evolve’s values of teamwork, empathy, and accountability.
-Attention to detail, excellent time management, and a commitment to delivering impactful solutions.

What Success Looks Like:
-Seamless integration of data from all centers and platforms, ensuring accurate and timely reporting.
-Empowered team members leveraging dashboards to achieve center revenue growth, optimize service offerings, and make informed staffing decisions.
-Scalable workflows and data solutions that adapt as Evolve expands into new markets.
-Smooth day-to-day operations supported by timely resolution of basic technical issues.

Schedule: 9PM to 5AM - Philippine Time

For interested applicants, kindly send your CV to hr.tin.ems@gmail.com with the subject line: I am submitting my application for the Power BI / Data Engineer position.

Afterward, please take a moment to write a couple of paragraphs outlining why you would be an excellent candidate for this position and what makes you well-suited for the role.

(Note: DO NOT SEND YOUR APPLICATION through our websites or social media platforms. FAILURE TO COMPLY WITH THIS INSTRUCTION may result in DISQUALIFICATION)

title: Technical Documenter (Software and Workflows) - 100% Work from Home, Day shift
description:
About the Work
Are you an experienced technical documenter or tech writer seeking new and exciting career opportunities? This role is an excellent match for individuals passionate about advancing their career, gaining international experience, and enjoying the benefits of a work-at-home lifestyle.

You will be responsible for writing user manuals and training materials in English for business software, as well as documenting procedures for business processes that utilize this software. This position focuses heavily on big data, AI/ML, and Python. While you don’t need to be a software developer, experience in writing technical documentation and documenting business processes and flowcharts is essential.

About the Company
Our client is a leader in data-driven business systems software, committed to providing exceptional services to their clients. They value innovation, efficiency, and client satisfaction and understand the vital role this position plays in achieving these objectives.

Position Overview
As a Technical Documenter, you will be a crucial part of our technical documentation team. You will contribute to creating clear and concise documentation for various technical projects. Your responsibilities include documenting procedures, analyzing new tools, providing step-by-step guides, and creating training materials for new users. This role offers an exciting opportunity to collaborate with diverse technical teams and communicate complex concepts effectively.

Responsibilities

*Develop and maintain comprehensive documentation for software and Business Process Management (BPM) projects, including automation workflows and procedural documents.
*Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather information and insights for documentation.
*Analyze new tools, technologies, and processes, and create detailed documentation outlining their functionalities and usage.
*Ensure accuracy, completeness, and consistency in all documentation, adhering to industry best practices and standards.
*Revise and update documentation as needed to reflect changes in technology and project requirements.
*Update, maintain, and expand existing documentation libraries.
*Work with subject matter experts to extract technical information and translate it into user-friendly documentation.
*Provide guidance on documentation best practices and contribute to continuous improvement initiatives within the documentation team.

title: Passionate Mid/Senior Python Developer
description:
Are you passionate about Python and becoming the best developer you can become? Let’s team up. 

We believe in people. This is why we only work with clients who serve people. From firefighters, to law firms, to suppliers sending life-saving food to kids dying of malnutrition, the code you write will help make the world a better place.

Our team is made up of people who want to do the best work of their life. People who love to learn, challenge themselves, grow and have some fun along the journey. We also care about each other – we support each other in our own personal goals and vision. We are human beings before employees and we love to bring out the best in each other. 

Now, ready to learn more about this opening? Buckle up.

If you work here, you’ll be: 
- Challenged to do the best work of your life in a supportive environment.
- Become the best communicator you can become (this is the most important thing we do).
- Have the space to ask questions, voice your feedback and make a difference (and be yourself).
- Help expand our codebase and tools, participate in code reviews, and grow with your fellow developers. 

You’ll do well in this job if you:
- Have a strong background in Python and understand HTML, CSS and Javascript enough to be dangerous.
- Enjoy working with people who actually care about what they do and will not let you be lazy or do sloppy work.
- Have an opinion and care about best practices and love learning and creating and building. 
- Are familiar with common things we deal with as developers: Git, SQLAlchemy, building and engaging with APIs, linters, etc. 
- Have grit and determination and are someone who will exceed no matter what gets in your way.
- Are attentive to details.
- Have 3+ years of Python development experience. 

You probably shouldn’t apply if:
- You’re “just looking for extra money.”
- You like working 5 full-time jobs because all you care about is work. 
- You get offended easily and take things personally. 
- You are not someone with grit and determination who can persevere while being challenged to do great work.
- You get overwhelmed easily with new code, new habits, new learnings and chat messages. 

The interview process:
- Since 99% of our work is done via Slack (we don’t do scheduled calls), the entire interview process will be via email. (With lots of questions, sprinkled with a few voice notes)
- You may be able to speak with a developer or two on our team to see how they like the role. 

If you work here:
- You’ll get 13th month salary, Filipino holidays, unlimited time off (we don’t count sick days), a normal working day schedule (no night shifts, although an early start is preferred for time overlap) with some flexibility, 2 weeks off during the holidays in December, and the opportunity to grow and become your best self. 

A little more about us:
- We’ve been in business for a decade+. Our teams are remote (mostly in the Philippines). Our longest standing team member has been with us for over 13+ years. We've had people quit smoking on our teams with our help, lose weight, learn a new instrument, speak a new language, and more. We all love what we do. 

How to begin
- Your mission, should you choose to accept, is to send us an email with 3 questions you have about this role. If you’re currently in a full-time role and are looking for something new, we’re open to a transition window. We actually care about your happiness.

NOTE: While we like AI, and we use it in certain circumstances, we ask that no AI be used during communication. Communication is the most important thing we do. If I don't see your natural voice from our first interaction, then you're setting an inaccurate representation of who you are and how you communicate. And when I see that change, it's going to come across as a lack of harmony in how you communicate.

title: Full Stack Developer (Nuxt.js Specialist) for International Web Studio | $10-12/hr
description:
Who We Are:
Tassu is a boutique web design studio crafting sophisticated websites for high-end businesses and nonprofits. Founded by a senior designer with 20+ years of experience working with brands like Swiss Airlines, ETH Zürich, and Credit Suisse, we're expanding our team to serve clients in California. We create lasting relationships with both our clients and team members, focusing on quality and innovation.

The Opportunity:
We're looking for a Full Stack Developer who loves working with Nuxt.js and Vue.js to create modern, performant websites. You'll work directly with our founder and team to build beautiful, functional web experiences for our clients. This role is perfect for someone who enjoys both frontend and backend development, with a passion for clean code and modern web technologies.

What Makes This Role Exciting:
- Build sophisticated websites for international clients
- Work with modern tech stack (Nuxt.js, Vue.js)
- Flexible hours with long-term growth potential
- Direct collaboration with experienced designer/founder
- Stable workload with interesting projects
- Opportunity to grow with an expanding studio

Must-Have Soft Skills:
- Strong problem-solving abilities
- Attention to detail and clean coding practices
- Self-motivated and proactive
- Good English communication skills
- Ability to manage time and meet deadlines

Required Technical Skills:
- Strong experience with Nuxt.js and Vue.js
- Proficient in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript
- Experience with REST APIs and backend integration
- Git version control
- Responsive design implementation
- Frontend performance optimization
- CSS frameworks (Tailwind preferred)

Desired Additional Skills:
- WordPress theme development
- PHP/MySQL
- Experience with headless CMS
- Server configuration and deployment
- UI animation implementation
- Basic SEO understanding
- Experience with Figma

Daily Responsibilities:
- Develop custom websites using Nuxt.js
- Implement responsive designs from Figma mockups
- Create reusable components and modules
- Optimize website performance
- Debug and solve technical issues
- Collaborate with design team
- Document code and development processes
- Provide time estimates for tasks
- Send daily progress reports
- Track time using Clockify or similar tool

Work Examples We're Looking For:
- Custom Nuxt.js applications
- Dynamic web applications with API integration
- Responsive websites with modern features
- Examples of component architecture
- Performance optimization results

Schedule & Availability:
- 20-30 hours per week to start, potential for more
- Must overlap 2-3 hours with US Pacific Time (9am-5pm)
- Flexible scheduling for remaining hours
- Available for team meetings when scheduled
- Filipino holidays observed

Compensation & Benefits:
- Starting rate: $10-12 per hour based on experience
- Monthly performance bonuses available
- Paid training period
- Increase after 90-day review
- 13th month pay after 1 year
- Paid time off after 6 months

Growth Opportunities:
- Potential for full-time role
- Regular salary reviews
- Learning and development support
- Opportunity to lead development team
- Work on increasingly complex projects

How to Apply:
1. Send email with subject "Nuxt Developer - [Your Name]"
2. Include:
   - Your resume
   - GitHub profile or code samples
   - Portfolio of relevant projects
   - Available hours in Pacific Time
   - Current rate expectations
3. Answer these questions:
   - What's your experience with Nuxt.js?
   - Describe a challenging project you completed
   - How do you approach performance optimization?
   - Share your experience with WordPress (if any)

NOTE: Please follow these application instructions exactly. Applications that don't follow the format won't be considered.

Technical Assessment:

Shortlisted candidates will be asked to:
1. Complete a small coding challenge
2. Walk through previous project code
3. Participate in a technical discussion

We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Multi-Skilled Web Developer & Social Media Manager – GHL Expert
description:
Type: Full-Time  
Location: Remote (Australian Working Hours)  
Salary: $5 AUD per hour  

---

About Us: 
Safety SecQR PTY LTD is a forward-thinking company dedicated to providing digital solutions for construction, safety, and service-based industries. We are looking for a talented and versatile **Multi-Skilled Web Developer & Social Media Manager** with proven expertise in **Go High Level (GHL)** to join our dynamic team. If you are a self-motivated professional passionate about technology, design, and digital marketing, we’d love to hear from you!  

---
 Key Responsibilities:

1. Web Development & GHL Expertise:  
   - Customize and develop **Go High Level (GHL)** portals for optimal functionality.  
   - Build and optimize workflows, automation, and integrations within the GHL platform.  
   - Customize tabs and menus (e.g., converting "Learning Tab" into "Forms Tab").  
   - Use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and other coding languages to develop and troubleshoot web applications.  
   - Complete a **GHL snapshot** tailored to our business needs as part of the onboarding process.  

for Client Portal:
Customize and configure Go High Level (GHL) tabs, menus, and layout to support the Safety SecQR Workers Portal functionality.
Create a seamless, user-friendly navigation system that allows workers to access key functions easily.
Design and style the portal interface to match Safety SecQR’s branding (using black and yellow safety colors) and functional requirements.
Ensure the portal’s layout supports quick access to critical safety documentation and forms (such as SWMS, WIR, WHS, and Permit to Work).
Integrate features to enhance worker engagement, autonomy, and safety compliance.
Collaborate with the Safety SecQR team to align portal features with worker needs, including access to personalized forms, QR codes, and client-specific resources.
Test and troubleshoot the portal to ensure a smooth user experience.

2. Social Media Management:
   - Create and execute social media strategies for various platforms (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, etc.).  
   - Develop high-quality content and visuals for posts and campaigns.  
   - Schedule and monitor social media posts, ensuring brand consistency.  
   - Engage with followers and respond to inquiries promptly.  

3. Digital Advertising:
   - Plan, manage, and optimize **Facebook Ads** and **Google Ads** campaigns to maximize ROI.  
   - Track analytics and provide reports on campaign performance.  
   - Identify opportunities to increase brand visibility and engagement.  

4. Content Creation & Branding:
   - Design creative content, graphics, and videos that align with our brand identity.  
   - Collaborate with the team to develop engaging and informative marketing materials.  
   - Ensure all digital outputs align with the company’s vision and branding guidelines.  

---

Requirements:
- Proven experience in **web development** and **web design**, specifically with **Go High Level (GHL)**.  
- Strong expertise in **UX/UI design principles**, especially in a client or worker portal setting.

title: Digital Marketing - funnels + socials
description:
About Us: Emma Louise Roger Therapy & Coaching provides Transformational Therapy and coaching for people to breakthrough their blocks so they can get clear about their unique gifts, life direction & soul purpose. 

Emma currently works 1:1 with clients and is currently expanding her business to offer online group coaching programs and developing online evergreen transformational programs. 

Time Commitment: Initially, 5-10 hours will be required per week on average.  As the company continues to grow we’ll need 10-20 hours per week most of the time so please be flexible to accommodate this. 

Availability: While most of the work can be done flexibly on your own schedule, we need you to be reachable and available for work (if needed) from the hours of 9am - 2pm Sydney time Monday through Friday. 


Responsibilities:

*Create and update web pages and funnels - systeme.io, wordpress 

*Create and update membership pages

*Set up autoresponder and broadcast emails

* Create lead magnets with e-books, quizzes etc 



Other technical tasks:

*Set up free webinars with zoom

*Record marketing metrics

*Light video editing (primarily cutting segments)

*Light design and graphics editing using Canva

*Post on social media platforms (using content provided by our creative team)

*Screen Facebook Group requests

*Provide customers with technical access to their members area



Qualities we’re looking for in this role:

*Perfectionist about details 

*Extremely organized

*Self-directed

*Excellent at following instructions

*Reliable and punctual

*Responsive and clear communication skills

*Meets deadlines

*Works well during high-pressure busy times

*Willing to work overtime/weekends if leading up to a campaign or launch

title: Social Media Outreach Specialist
description:
Our company seeks skilled Social Media Outreach Specialists to connect with Instagram and TikTok influencers and engage Facebook Groups to promote our unique e-commerce SaaS brand.

Responsibilities:
- Identify and reach out to targeted influencers on Instagram, TikTok, and Facebook Groups.
- Use tools to scrape relevant audiences and generate leads.
- Coordinate with influencers, negotiating promotion rates and finalizing deals.
- Track influencer performance, creating revenue diagrams to measure each influencer’s contribution.
- Task that will come in later is the opportunity Manage our brand's Instagram and TikTok accounts, keeping them active and engaging.

Requirements:
- Proven experience in social media outreach and influencer marketing.
- Strong negotiation and communication skills.
- Proficiency with audience scraping and lead generation tools.
- Self-motivated, organized, and capable of working independently.

How to Apply:

- Sending your portfolio link is an advantage. 
- Mention the tools you’ve used in past projects, beyond manual research, and describe how they supported your Influencer Outreach tasks. (Tools such as BuzzSumo, Sprout Social, or other similar platforms)
- Use "Swift Outreach Specialist" as your application subject line.

title: Technical Sourcer
description:
We are seeking a Technical Sourcer to join our team. This is a remote, part-time role for someone with deep expertise in technical sourcing and a strong ability to identify the right candidates for startup companies.

Key Responsibilities:

- Source and identify top technical talent (e.g., engineers, data scientists) using tools like LinkedIn, Betterleap, and other tools. 
- Analyze candidate backgrounds to ensure a strong fit with hiring company needs, with a focus on product-first startups.
- Understand and evaluate the nuances of engineering roles 
- Craft tailored outreach messages to attract high-quality candidates.
- Collaborate with the hiring team to prioritize sourcing needs and deliver pre-screened candidates who meet role requirements.
- Maintain accurate and organized records of sourcing activities in the ATS/CRM system.

Key Qualifications:

Proven Experience: Demonstrated success sourcing engineers and technical talent, ideally for startups or fast-paced organizations.
Startup Savvy: Familiarity with startup hiring environments and the types of engineers who excel in them.
Nuanced Judgment: Ability to differentiate between engineers suited for product-first companies versus enterprise settings, even with similar technical skills.
Tool Proficiency: Hands-on experience with LinkedIn Recruiter, ATS/CRM platforms, and email automation tools.
Strong Communication: Excellent written skills to craft compelling, personalized outreach messages.
Process-Oriented: Ability to follow detailed instructions and deliver consistent results while working independently.
